title: Crazy Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. creamy peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix together and roll into balls; flatten with fork.', 'Bake on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Makes 2 dozen.', 'Quick, easy and good.']

title: Donah'S Coffee Milk
ingredients: ['1/2 c. brewed coffee', '1/2 c. milk', '2 tsp. sugar']
directions: ['Pour 1/2 cup coffee into a coffee mug.', 'Pour in the milk.', 'Add the sugar.', 'Stir.']

title: No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. dry milk', '1 c. oatmeal', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '1/2 c. honey']
directions: ['Thoroughly mix everything together.', 'Shape the dough into little balls, then enjoy.']

title: Oatmeal Cookie Candy
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1/2 c. butter', '1/8 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. peanut butter', '3 c. oatmeal']
directions: ['Boil together sugar, milk, butter and salt for 1 minute. Remove from heat and add peanut butter and vanilla.', 'Stir until smooth.', 'Add oatmeal and mix together.', 'Drop by tablespoon onto waxed paper.']

title: Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 pieces bread', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Place cheese sandwich in microwave for 30 seconds.']

title: New Orleans Orange Chicken
ingredients: ['1 chicken', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1 c. ketchup', '1 c. frozen concentrated orange juice']
directions: ['Cut up chicken as desired.', 'Combine mayonnaise, ketchup and orange juice.', 'Pour over chicken in a shallow baking dish.', 'Bake at 350° for 1 hour (uncovered).', 'Extra sauce may be used over rice.']

title: Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. milk', '1 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Bring the sugar and the milk to a boil until it makes a ball. Add the rest of the ingredients and pour on a plate and let it sit.']

title: Francese Sauce
ingredients: ['6 oz. white wine', '1 lemon, squeezed', '1/2 lb. softened butter']
directions: ['Put white wine in saucepan.', 'Squeeze lemon and reduce volume to half its original size.', 'Swirl in 1/2 pound softened butter to make an emulsion.', 'If it separates, remove from heat and stir to re-emulsify, or add cold chicken stock.', 'If too loose, roll small pieces of butter in flour and stir until sauce is desired thickness.', 'Use as a sauce on chicken or fish.', 'Top with parsley and sliced blanched mushrooms.']

title: Guacamole Dip
ingredients: ['1 avocado', '1 small tomato, chopped fine', '1/2 small onion, chopped fine']
directions: ['Combine ingredients.', 'Add to taste salt, garlic, pepper, 1/2 lime or lemon juice, vinegar or oil to give creamier texture.', 'Mix everything together, taste and then add a touch of Tabasco sauce if you like it a little hotter.']

title: Microwave Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['2/3 c. margarine', '2/3 c. peanut butter', '6 c. 10x sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Microwave butter for 1 1/2 to 2 minutes.', 'Stir until blended and well melted.', 'Add remaining ingredients.', 'Mix well (I knead with my hands).', 'Microwave until soft, 1 to 1 1/2 minutes.', 'Stir and pour into 9 x 9-inch pan.', 'Refrigerate.']

title: Sausage Casserole
ingredients: ['1 to 2 lb. browned pork sausage, drained', '1 1/2 to 2 c. boiled white instant rice', '1 bag boiled broccoli']
directions: ['Cook all ingredients at the same time individually.', 'In a casserole dish, layer sausage, rice and broccoli.', 'Top off with Velveeta cheese.', 'Microwave until cheese melts.']

title: Double Lemon Pie
ingredients: ['2 small cans flaked coconut', '3 Tbsp. butter, melted']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325°.', 'Combine coconut and melted butter in large bowl.', 'Press mixture on bottom and sides of 9-inch pie plate. Bake in oven about 20 minutes or until golden brown.']

title: Citrus Roast Chicken
ingredients: ['1 roasting chicken', '1 lemon, quartered', '1 orange, quartered', '1 onion, quartered', '3 large cloves garlic, sliced', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Clean roasting chicken, removing insides.', 'Salt and pepper (I use lemon pepper).', 'Stuff the bird with the lemon, orange, onion and garlic.', 'Bake at 450° for 1 1/2 hours.', 'If bird starts to get too brown, you can cover it with foil.']

title: Chicken And Rice
ingredients: ['chicken', 'rice', 'onion', 'minced garlic', 'salt']
directions: ['Boil chicken with skin on until done when it is done remove from broth and take off bone.', 'Cut up onion put into broth.', 'Add minced garlic; cook for 5 minutes.', 'Add rice and', 'cook until done. Add the chicken to the ingredients add salt to taste.', 'Serve with pears or bread.']

title: Aunt Lee'S Punch
ingredients: ['1 qt. milk', '2 c. sugar', '1 small can frozen orange juice']
directions: ['Pour milk in bowl.', 'Pour thawed orange juice into milk and beat.', 'Gradually add sugar.', 'Freeze.', 'When you thaw punch, add 2 quarts ginger ale.']

title: Bite-Sized Stuffies
ingredients: ['1 loaf bread dough, thawed', '36 cubes ham, cheese, shrimp, etc.']
directions: ['Let dough rise slightly.', 'Divide into thirds, then divide each third into 12 pieces.', 'Shape each piece around the meat or cheese and seal well.', 'Place on greased cookie sheet.', 'Cover; let rise in warm place until doubled in size, 30 to 60 minutes.', 'Bake at 400° for 10 to 12 minutes.']

title: "I Can'T Cook" Chicken
ingredients: ['1 whole frying chicken', 'garlic salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450°.', 'Remove excess fat from chicken.', 'Cut chicken in half from one side of breast to opposite side of back. Fold up wings and place bone side down on broiler (save inerds and cook separately or discard or cook on end of broiling pan). Sprinkle to taste with garlic salt and pepper.', 'Put on rack in middle of oven; cook for 15 to 20 minutes (until nice golden brown).', 'Reduce heat to 350° and cook 45 minutes to 1 hour.']

title: Toasted Cheese With Bacon Please
ingredients: ['12 slices bacon, already lightly fried and drained', '6 pineapple rings', '12 slices white American cheese', '6 slices bread']
directions: ['Spread both sides of bread with margarine or butter.', 'Place on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Put two slices of cheese on each piece of bread; top with one pineapple ring and 2 slices of bacon.', 'Bake at 325° for 5 to 10 minutes.', 'Yummy and quick!']

title: Shrimp Sauce
ingredients: ['1 stick butter', 'juice of 1/2 lemon', '3 Tbsp. wine', "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt", 'pinch of garlic powder']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in large pan.', 'Saute approximately 1 pound of medium boiled shrimp for 5 minutes in shells.']

title: Caramel Icing
ingredients: ['1 can evaporated milk', '2 c. sugar', '3 tsp. butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a saucepan.', 'Boil until mixture thickens, stirring constantly.']

title: Easy Hershey Fudge
ingredients: ['4 1/2 c. sugar', '1 can evaporated milk', '1 1/2 lb. margarine', '2 large bars Hershey chocolate']
directions: ['Cook the first 3 ingredients until boiling; boil for 5 minutes.', 'Remove from heat; let cool for 10 seconds.', 'Add the chocolate bars.', 'Stir until mixed.', 'Pour into a 10 x 13-inch greased glass container.']

title: Cup Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together.', 'Drop by spoonfuls onto cookie sheet.', 'Press flat.', 'Bake at 325° for approximately eight minutes. Watch carefully for these goodies burn easily.']

title: Toad-In-A-Hole
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice bread', 'butter']
directions: ['Melt a bit of butter in skillet.', 'Using the rim of a glass, press the center out of the slice of bread.', 'Reserve center circle. Put slice of bread in pan.', 'Crack egg into center hole of bread. Turn when egg is set.', 'Cook over low heat until egg is done. Season with salt and pepper.', 'Serve with bread hole covering egg center (Toad)!']

title: Caramel Sheet Cake
ingredients: ['Duncan Hines butter cake mix']
directions: ['Mix according to directions on box.', 'Prepare a 13 x 9-inch and a small square pan by greasing pans and sprinkling with powdered sugar.', 'Bake according to box directions.', 'Cool in pans and spread frosting on tops.']

title: Willie'S Homemade Boiled Chicken And Rice
ingredients: ['8 chicken thighs', 'salt and pepper', '2 c. rice']
directions: ['Boil chicken thighs for 1 hour and 45 minutes.', 'Stir in 2 cups rice.', 'Cook, covered, for 20 minutes longer.', 'Ready to serve.']

title: Peanut Butter Quickie
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Mix ingredients together and drop by spoonfuls onto greased cookie sheets.', 'Press with a fork (sugar coated).', 'Bake for 10 minutes.', 'Makes 1 dozen.']

title: Oven Fries
ingredients: ['5 oz. potato', '2 tsp. olive oil', 'garlic', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Cut potato into quarters lengthwise and dry with a paper towel.', 'Coat all over with the oil.', 'Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic powder.', 'Place in a nonstick pan or a Pam sprayed pan and bake at 450° for 20 minutes or until done.']

title: Honey Butter
ingredients: ['honey', 'butter, softened']
directions: ['Place butter in a bowl; add honey a little at a time, stirring until syrupy looking.', 'Great on fresh hot rolls.']

title: Orange Julius
ingredients: ['1 6-oz can frozen orange juice concentrate', '1/2 c milk', '1 t vanilla extract', '1/4 c sugar']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in blender with 1/2 cup water and enough ice cubes to fill container.', 'Process until liquified.']

title: Orange Blossom Cream
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. sugar', '1 c. orange juice, chilled', '1 tall can evaporated milk, chilled']
directions: ['Dissolve sugar in orange juice.', 'Whip evaporated milk until stiff.', 'Combine with juice; mix well.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Peanut Butter Candy
ingredients: ['3 c. sugar', '1 1/2 c. milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', '3 Tbsp. peanut butter']
directions: ['Bring to a fast boil, then reduce heat to medium and cook about 20 minutes or until test for a hard ball.', 'Add vanilla and peanut butter.', 'Mix well.', 'Pour into buttered dish with 1-inch sides.', 'Let cool, then cut into squares.']

title: No Bake Cookies
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. butter', '1/2 c. milk', '3 c. quick oatmeal', '1 c. coconut', '1/2 c. nuts', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine and boil sugar, butter and milk 1 minute.', 'Stir in oatmeal, coconut, nuts and vanilla.', 'Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper.']

title: Strawberry Preserves
ingredients: ['equal parts fresh berries and sugar']
directions: ['Boil 10 minutes and remove from heat to cool dark place.', 'Let stand 3 days, stirring 3 or 4 times each day. Can cold in sterilized jars.', 'Seal.', 'The berries remain whole and the juice is thick.']

title: The Best And Easiest Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Mix all ingredients well.', 'Roll into 1-inch balls and place on slightly greased cookie sheet.', 'Press each ball with fork.', 'Bake for 15 to 20 minutes or just until cookies start to turn brown.']

title: Cherry Delight
ingredients: ['18 graham crackers, crushed', '2 Tbsp. sugar', '3/4 stick melted butter']
directions: ['Combine ingredients and put into a 9 x 13-inch cake pan.']

title: Batter Dip For Frying
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/2 c. milk']
directions: ['"How many ways can you eat peanut butter.', 'Let me count the ways."']

title: Tomato Slaw
ingredients: ['1/2 lettuce', '1 whole tomato', '1 to 1 1/2 Tbsp. mayonnaise']
directions: ['Cut lettuce into small pieces.', 'Cut tomato into cube.', 'Add mayonnaise, mix well.', 'Chill until ready to eat.']

title: Never Fail Caramel Frosting
ingredients: ['2 1/2 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', 'pinch of salt', '1 stick margarine', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Bring to boil all ingredients, except 1/2 cup sugar and vanilla.', 'Brown', '1/2', 'cup', 'sugar while other ingredients boil. Add the', 'browned', 'sugar and cook until soft ball forms in cold water. Add vanilla and beat to desired consistency.']

title: Jenna'S Grilled Cheese(Kindergarten Recipe)
ingredients: ['2 pieces of bread', 'butter', '2 slices of cheese']
directions: ['Put the butter on the top of the bread.', 'Put the cheese inside and grill it on the stove.', 'Flip it over.', 'If the side is brown, then you are ready to eat it.']

title: Golden Fried Chicken
ingredients: ['1 chicken, cut up and seasoned', '1 egg, beaten', '2 Tbsp. milk']
directions: ['Combine egg and milk.', 'Roll chicken in flour, then dip in egg batter.', 'Roll in flour again.', 'Fry in oil in skillet.']

title: Zucchini Scallop
ingredients: ['2 c. zucchini, cooked', '2 c. saltine crackers, crumbled', '2 Tbsp. onion, minced', '1 c. cheese, cubed', '1 c. milk', '1 egg, beaten', '2 Tbsp. margarine, melted', 'pepper']
directions: ['Layer zucchini, crackers, onion and cheese in a 2 quart casserole.', 'Combine milk and egg.', 'Pour over zucchini mixture. Pour melted margarine over all.', 'Sprinkle with pepper.', 'Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.']

title: Instant Pizza
ingredients: ['1 piece bread', '1 piece cheese', '1 tomato']
directions: ['Place piece of bread on a small pan.', 'Put on 1 sliced tomato first and then a slice of cheese.', 'Place in oven for 2 minutes. Great for afterschool snack.']

title: Salmon Soup
ingredients: ['1 can salmon', '1 can milk', '1 small onion, chopped', '1/4 c. butter']
directions: ['Combine in pot.', 'Bring to boil.', 'Serve warm with crackers.']

title: Salmon Cakes

directions: ['Mix all together.', 'Pat out in cakes.', 'Fry in butter or meat fryings.']

title: Grandpa Witzel'S Potato Pancakes

directions: ['Peel and grate potato, then stir in egg and salt.', 'Fry in a large skillet as one large pancake in a small amount of oil over medium heat, turning once.', "The pancake should be rather dark or it won't be cooked through."]

title: Tomato Juice
ingredients: ['tomatoes', 'salt']
directions: ['You will need quart canning jars.']

title: Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['3 qt. milk', '9 Tbsp. rice', '2 1/4 c. sugar', '1/4 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Combine and bring to a slight boil.', 'Place in oven at 300° or 325°.', 'When skim forms on top, stir it down.', 'Continue until desired thickness.']

title: Easy And Good Rice Pudding

directions: ['Mix and put in a deep baking dish.', 'Bake for about 1 1/2 hours at 350°.', 'Stir once or twice during baking.', 'I like to add a little cinnamon, nutmeg and raisins.']

title: Boiled Cookies (No Bake)
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 stick margarine', '1/2 c. evaporated milk', '2 1/2 c. oatmeal', '2 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 to 2/3 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Mix the sugar and margarine in a saucepan; add milk.', 'Let it come to a full rolling boil.', 'Cook 2 minutes.', 'Remove from heat and add oatmeal, vanilla and peanut butter.', 'Mix and drop by spoonfuls (use teaspoon) on wax paper.', 'Use cookie sheet; let cool.']

title: How To Cook A Christmas Turkey
ingredients: ['1/2 lb. turkey', '7 shakes salt', '10 lb. pepper']
directions: ['Cook 18 minutes in oven.', 'Serve with pretzel salad.', 'Put pretzel salad in oven for 19 minutes, then take out.']

title: Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Mix all together.', 'Roll into balls.', 'Put on a cookie sheet, press with a fork.', 'Bake at 350 for 10 to 12 minutes.']

title: Honey Glazed Carrots

directions: ['Melt butter or margarine in skillet.', 'Blend in honey.', 'Add carrots, heating slowly.', 'Turn occasionally until carrots are nicely glazed.']

title: Roge Can Ice Cream

directions: ['Mix together all ingredients.', 'Pour into a 1 pound coffee can with snap lid.', 'Put 1 pound can into 2 pound can.', 'Add ice and salt.', 'Snap lid onto 2 pound can.', 'Roll can for 10 minutes and serve with favorite topping or just plain.']

title: Fried Zucchini
ingredients: ['2 to 3 slices bacon', '1/3 to 1/4 c. margarine', '1 small onion, diced', '2 to 3 sliced zucchini', '1 to 2 tomatoes, cut in chunks', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Fry bacon that has been cut in small pieces.', 'Drain off grease.', 'Add margarine and melt.', 'Add onion and stir-fry until onion is half done.', 'Add zucchini and tomatoes.', 'Add salt and pepper and stir-fry rapidly, about 5 minutes.', 'Cook until done, but not mushy.']

title: Madress Cooler
ingredients: ['3 parts orange juice', '1 part cranberry juice']
directions: ['Fill tall glass with juice; top with a splash of lemon-lime soda.', 'Serve over ice with an orange slice.']

title: French Toast
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1/3 c. milk', '1 tsp. butter', '4 slices bread']
directions: ['Beat egg until frothy.', 'Add milk; beat well.', 'Melt butter in skillet on low heat.', 'Dip bread slices, one at a time, into egg mixture.', 'Lift them into skillet with pancake turner.', 'Brown on each side.', 'Serve with confectioners sugar, maple syrup or cinnamon and sugar, if desired.']

title: Easy Cookies

directions: ['Mix and drop on lightly greased and floured cookie sheet. Bake 7 to 9 minutes at 375° to 400°.']

title: Peanut Butter Play Dough(Play Dough You Can Eat.)

directions: ['Mix all ingredients until smooth.', 'Let kids make critters of their choice out of the mixture.', 'Decorate with peanuts, raisins, chocolate chips or coconut and eat.']

title: Nutrition Bombs
ingredients: ['2 c. peanut butter', '1 c. honey', '1 c. oatmeal', '1 c. dry milk', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together.', 'Mixture will be stiff.', 'Shape into balls.', 'Roll in sesame seed, coconut, chopped nuts, etc.']

title: Favorite Cheesy Grill

directions: ['Top 1 bread slice with processed cheese and second slice of bread.', 'Spread sandwich with margarine.', 'Cook in skillet on medium heat until lightly browned on both sides.', 'Makes 1 sandwich.']

title: Tomatoes With Honey And Black Pepper
ingredients: ['1 large tomato, peeled', 'honey', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['To make this salad, peel a large tomato, cut it into slices and spread each slice with honey.', 'Sprinkle the slices with salt and pepper, then reassemble the tomato.', 'Brush with more honey and give a sprinkle with salt and pepper.', 'Refrigerate for 20 minutes. Serve cool.']

title: Cinnamon Rolls
ingredients: ['Yeast Rolls dough']
directions: ['Divide dough and roll out on floured table until 1/4 inch in depth.', 'Spread with melted butter, Land of Lakes is best, and sprinkle brown sugar and cinnamon to cover.', 'Roll dough up and cut into 3/4 inch slices or larger if desired.', 'Place on a buttered pan, butter tops and let rise until doubled.', 'Bake at 400 degrees for 10 minutes, or golden brown.', 'Take out immediately and invert on another pan.']

title: Cracker Candy
ingredients: ['24 single saltine crackers, crushed', '6 Tbsp. peanut butter', '2 c. sugar', '2/3 c. evaporated milk']
directions: ['Crush crackers; boil sugar and mix exactly 4 minutes.', 'Remove from heat immediately and quickly stir in crackers and peanut butter.', 'Drop by spoonfuls on wax paper.', 'Allow to cool and enjoy.']

title: 1 - 2 - 3 Chocolate Sauce
ingredients: ['3 sq. Chocolate', '2 c. Sugar', '1 can Evaporated Milk', 'Pinch Salt']
directions: ['Mix and bring to a boil, stirring constantly.', 'Let it boil 1 minute, then add 1 teaspoon vanilla.', 'Mix well for 1 minute. Serve warm.']

title: Skippy Quick Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. Skippy peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325°.', 'In medium bowl, combine ingredients; stir making a dough.', 'Shape dough into 1-inch balls.', 'Put on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Place 2-inches apart and with a fork, gently flatten each cookie making crisscross pattern on each cookie.', 'Bake 8 minutes or until lightly brown and slightly puffed.', 'May be topped immediately with sprinkles, chocolate chips or Hershey Kisses if desired.', 'Cool on rack completely.']

title: Broiled Salmon Steaks
ingredients: ['2 fresh salmon steaks', 'garlic salt', 'one lime']
directions: ['Buy two salmon steaks from the fresh seafood section of the supermarket.', 'Rinse with cold water and pat dry.', 'Preheat broiler (if using Jenn-Air, spray grill with Pam).', 'Lightly sprinkle both sides with garlic salt and fresh lime 15 minutes before cooking. Use more lime during cooking to prevent drying.', 'Turn twice at least.', 'Broil for a total of 10 to 12 minutes.']

title: Miracle Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg, well beaten', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Form into balls and press down with fork.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes.']

title: Peanut Butter Toast
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', 'peanut butter']
directions: ['Toast bread in toaster.', 'As soon as it pops up, spread peanut butter on one side of each slice.', 'The peanut butter will melt slightly on the warm toast.', 'Cut it diagonally.', 'Great as a breakfast food or a snack.']

title: Microwave Parched Peanuts
ingredients: ['Peanut in shell']
directions: ['Put a thin to medium layer of peanuts in a microwaveable dish.', 'Set heat on highest setting and run for about 2 minutes. Take out of microwave (use an oven mitt or small towel to keep from getting burned).', 'Stir peanuts very good and put back and run for 1 more minute.', 'Remove and stir again.', 'Then run for 1 more minute.', 'You can sample peanuts at various times and get the stage of parched peanuts you like best.', 'You may want to run for extra time if desired.', 'Peanuts will continue to cook some after removing from the microwave.', 'Cooking time 4 to 5 minutes.']

title: Olmstead Manor'S Peanut Butter Spread
ingredients: ['5 lb. peanut butter', '2 lb. butter', '1 c. honey']
directions: ['Blend all together very well.', 'Needs to be refrigerated, but tastes better at room temperature.', 'Can be used on bread, crackers or carrot sticks.']

title: Easy Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients.', 'Cook at 350° for 10 minutes.']

title: Caramel Dumplings
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. sugar', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Melt butter and 1/2 cup sugar.', 'Brown.', "Keep stirring so it won't burn.", 'Add 1 cup sugar and 2 cups hot water.']

title: I Can'T Believe It'S A Cookie
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['Roll tablespoon of dough in a ball.', 'Dip fork in sugar and press to flatten cookie.', 'Bake at 350° until light brown.']

title: Easy Ice Cream
ingredients: ['1 c. half and half milk', '2 Tbsp. sugar', '1/2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['In a pint-sized Ziploc bag, put milk, sugar and vanilla in bag. Mix well.']

title: Butter Pecan Dessert

directions: ['Crush Ritz crackers. Melt butter and mix with crumbs in a 13 x 9 pan.']

title: Framed Eggs
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'butter']
directions: ['Butter skillet.', 'Cut hole in center of bread with a glass. Cook separately in skillet.', 'When golden brown, turn over.', 'Take one egg and scramble in bowl.', 'Pour egg in hole of bread.', 'Cover hole of bread with center of bread.', 'Cook until egg is done. Makes 1 serving.']

title: Peanut Butter Fudge Frosting
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', 'dash of salt', '4 Tbsp. peanut butter', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1 Tbsp. vanilla', '1/2 c. coconut', '1/4 c. chopped nuts']
directions: ['Cook over medium heat the sugar, milk and salt to soft ball stage.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Stir in peanut butter, butter, vanilla, coconut and chopped nuts.', 'Wait 5 minutes.', 'Beat with spoon until spreading consistency.', 'Spread over 9 x 13-inch pan.']

title: Mammy'S Chicken And Dumplings
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken, cut up']
directions: ['Wash chicken very good.', 'Put whole chicken in large roaster with water covering chicken.', 'Put 1/2 stick butter on top of chicken and cook until tender.', 'Remove chicken to pan to be browned under broiler before serving.']

title: Quay'S Tea Cakes
ingredients: ['1 stick butter', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Make real stiff with flour.', 'Drop on lightly greased cookie sheet and mash with fork.', 'Bake at 350° for 5 to 8 minutes.']

title: English Toffee

directions: ['Put sugar and butter in a heavy pan and cook, stirring until it turns the color of brown paper bag.', 'Pour on buttered surface and melt chocolate bars on top.', 'Sprinkle on chopped nuts.']

title: Mystery Drops

directions: ['Boil sugar and milk 3 minutes.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Stir in other ingredients.', 'Stir until thickened.', 'Drop on wax paper.']

title: B~B~Q Tomato

title: Lemon Chicken
ingredients: ['2 1/2 to 3 lb. chicken', '1 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. pepper', '1 lemon']
directions: ['Put chicken in a shallow pan.', 'Sprinkle salt and pepper on top.', 'Inset lemon in cavity.', 'Bake, breast up, at 350° for 1 hour, breast down at 350° for 1/2 hour and breast up at 400° for 1/2 hour.']

title: Caramel Frosting
ingredients: ['2 sticks butter', '2 c. sugar', '1 c. milk']
directions: ['Let butter melt; add sugar and brown.', 'Add milk and bring to a soft ball stage on candy thermometer.', 'Remove from heat and beat with mixer until of spreading consistency.', 'Spread on cake.', 'Makes enough to frost 2 (9-inch) layers.']

title: Calorie On A Ritz

directions: ['Mix first three ingredients.', 'Let come to a boil.', 'Boil hard for three minutes.', 'Have Ritz crackers placed on a cookie sheet. Pour mixture over crackers.', 'Take a spoon and make sure mixture is spread well on crackers.', 'Put chopped nuts on top of crackers. (Nuts are to be chopped fine.) Put in a 300° oven and bake 10 minutes (preheat oven).', 'Remove from oven and place on aluminum foil until cool.']

title: Auline'S Icing

directions: ['Boil sugar, butter and milk until thick.', 'It will get bubbly and change colors when thick.', 'Add nuts and coconut; stir well.']

directions: ['Place chicken pieces, skin side up, in shallow baking dish. Sprinkle with salt, garlic powder, pepper and paprika.', 'Bake at 375° for 1 hour or until golden brown.', 'Yields 6 servings. Contains 175 calories per serving.']

title: Ma Ma'S Peanut Butter Fudge

directions: ['Use half as much milk as sugar (or twice as much sugar as milk).', 'Cook to soft ball stage.', 'Put in hunk of butter, some vanilla, pinch of salt and a gob of peanut butter.', 'Stir well and put into buttered dish.', 'Cool and cut into squares.']

title: Miracle Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 beaten egg', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients.', 'Make 3/4-inch balls and flatten with a floured fork.', 'Bake at 350° on an ungreased cookie sheet for 10 minutes.', 'Cool completely before removing.', 'Makes 4 dozen.']

title: Chicken Salad
ingredients: ['2 c. cooked, cubed chicken', '1 c. chopped celery', '1/2 tsp. salt', 'mayonnaise']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients.', 'Add enough mayonnaise to mix up well.']

title: Canned Tomatoes
ingredients: ['tomatoes', '1 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. sugar']
directions: ['Peel tomatoes, then cut into pieces.', 'Cook for 30 minutes. Put into jars and add salt and sugar.', 'Use quart size jars and seal with lids.']

title: Birds' Nests
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice bread', 'butter', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Place bread on cutting board.', 'Cut a hole out of the center of the bread, using a small drinking glass.', 'Gently remove the bread from the opening of the glass so as not to tear the bread.', 'Melt butter in skillet and put the slice of bread in the butter.', 'Break the egg gently into the hole of the bread.', 'Toast the middle of the bread in the skillet beside the piece of bread.', 'Add salt and pepper to the egg.', 'Gently turn when the egg white is set and cook until desired doneness.', "Serve the toasted middle of the bread on the side of the Bird's Nest."]

title: Orange-Pineapple Slush
ingredients: ['1 c. orange juice', '1/2 c. pineapple juice', '1 tsp. honey']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients, stirring well to blend.', 'Pour mixture into a freezer tray or an 8-inch square baking pan and freeze until almost firm.']

title: Mackerel Patties
ingredients: ['1 pound can of mackerel', '1/4 box of saltine crackers, crumbled', '1 egg']
directions: ['Drain juice from mackerel into a bowl.', 'Debone mackerel under slow running water and drain. Break up mackerel into bowl of juice, add the egg and crackers, mix well. Shape into eight patties. Cook in a well buttered skillet and top with a pat of butter on uncooked side. Brown on both sides.']

title: Peanut Butter Rite Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 tsp. peanut butter', '4 Ritz crackers', '2 pieces bread']
directions: ['On one piece of bread, put the peanut butter.', 'Split the Ritz in half and spread on the bread.', 'Put it together and enjoy.']

title: Grilled Cheese
ingredients: ['4 slices bread', '2 slices Kraft cheese', 'squeeze butter']
directions: ['You will need a sandwich machine.']

title: Mackerel
ingredients: ['1 can mackerel', '8 saltine crackers, crushed', '1 egg', '1/4 c. milk']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in a bowl.', 'Make out into patties and fry in hot oil until brown.']

title: Bacon Wrapped Crackers
ingredients: ['sliced bacon', 'Club crackers']
directions: ['Heat oven to 400°.', 'Wrap raw bacon slices around Club crackers.', 'Bake in broiler pan for 10 to 15 minutes.']

title: Baked Chicken
ingredients: ['1 good size chicken, cut up', '1 large can crushed tomatoes', '1/2 c. chopped onion and green pepper', 'salt, pepper and garlic powder to taste']
directions: ['Spread chicken in one layer in baking dish.', 'Pur crushed tomatoes over chicken.', 'Next, put chopped onion, green pepper and seasoning on chicken.', 'Bake uncovered for 1 1/2 hours at 350°.']

title: Tomato Pudding To Eat With Beans
ingredients: ['1 pt. canned tomatoes', '3 slices bread, crumbled', '1/2 c. sugar', '5 small slices butter']
directions: ['Cook', 'in', 'small pan in microwave on High for 8 minutes, stirring in between, until bubbly through.']

title: Easy Caramel Frosting
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 stick margarine', '1 c. milk', '1/2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['In a large skillet, combine margarine and sugar.', 'Place over medium', 'heat', 'and', 'cook, stirring constantly, until sugar melts and', 'syrup', 'is', 'light', 'golden brown.', 'Add milk, stirring constantly.', '(The', 'mixture', 'will', 'tend', 'to', 'lump,', 'but becomes smooth with further cooking.) Cook over medium heat, stirring, until a small', 'amount', 'dropped into a small bowl of cold water forms a', 'soft', 'ball.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Add vanilla.', 'Beat to almost', 'spreading consistency.', 'Spread on your favorite chocolate or yellow cake which has been cooled.']

title: Sheet Cake
ingredients: ['1 box Betty Crocker German chocolate SuperMoist cake mix']
directions: ['Use a 9 x 15 jelly roll pan. Prepare cake mix, following directions on box.']

title: Strawberry Pineapple Punch
ingredients: ['2 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid', '2 c. sugar', '1 qt. can unsweetened pineapple juice']
directions: ['Mix Kool-Aid and sugar in a gallon container and add pineapple juice and water to fill the container.']

title: Honey-Avocado Butter
ingredients: ['1 medium to large soft avocado, peeled, seeded and mashed', '1/3 c. mild flavored honey']
directions: ['Blend or whip avocado and honey.', 'Cover mixture with plastic wrap placed directly on surface of the spread.', 'Refrigerate until well chilled.', 'Delicious on hot cornmeal muffins or English muffins.']

title: Peanut Butter Balls
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. oatmeal', '1 c. butter', '3 c. peanut butter', '1/4 c. milk']
directions: ['Mix thoroughly until the butter and milk are gone.', 'Then roll into little balls.', 'Put in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.']

title: Pumpkin Soup
ingredients: ['2 c. cooked pumpkin, drained', '2 qt. milk', '6 tsp. sugar', '3 Tbsp. butter', '1/8 tsp. pepper', '1/4 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Saute', 'pumpkin and sugar in butter over medium heat for 15 minutes.', 'Add', 'milk,', 'salt\tand', 'pepper.', 'Bring to a boil. Serve with toast on crackers.', 'Yields 6 servings.']

title: Cheese Toast
ingredients: ['bread', 'cheese']
directions: ['Get a piece of bread.', 'Put cheese on top.', 'Put it in the toaster oven until cheese is melted, then eat it.']

title: Chicken And Dumplings
ingredients: ['1 chicken', '1 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. pepper', '1 stalk celery, cut in chunks']
directions: ['Select a plump chicken.', 'Dress.', 'Cut in pieces.', 'Place in saucepan.', 'Cover with boiling water.', 'Add celery, salt and pepper. Cover.', 'Simmer slowly until chicken is tender.', 'Prepare dumpling dough.']

title: Pineapple Icing
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1/2 stick margarine', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. evaporated milk', '1 large drained can crushed pineapple']
directions: ['Bring to a rolling boil sugar and milk.', 'Cook 7 minutes.', 'Add margarine, pineapple and vanilla.', 'Pour over yellow cake.']

title: Broccoli And Cauliflower Salad
ingredients: ['1 head broccoli', '1 head cauliflower', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 cucumber, chopped']
directions: ['Mix with Ranch dressing.']

title: Garlic Croutons
ingredients: ['Whole wheat bread slices', 'Garlic, crushed', 'Olive oil']
directions: ['Rub bread slices with garlic and olive oil.']

title: Jim Ingoglia'S Tuna
ingredients: ['1 can tuna in spring water', 'bread', 'mayonnaise']
directions: ['Mix tuna and mayonnaise.', 'Spread on bread.']

title: Joyce'S Baked Beans
ingredients: ['1 large can Showboat pork and beans', '1 c. chopped onion', '1 c. sugar', 'sliced bacon']
directions: ['Put pork and beans in pan.', 'Put in sugar and onions; stir well.', 'Then put sliced bacon on top of the beans and bake in a preheated oven at 350° or 400° for 30 minutes to 1 hour.']

title: Brownies
ingredients: ['nuts', 'sugar']
directions: ['You make up at home and for Thanksgiving dinner.', 'Get a brown potato that is white inside.', 'Carve it out and throw away the peelings.', 'Smash it good and put some milk in it.', "(I think that's how you make it.)"]

title: Coleslaw Dressing
ingredients: ['1 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. pepper', '3 oz. pineapple juice', '3 Tbsp. sugar', '1 1/2 c. mayonnaise']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients and refrigerate.', 'Great on cole slaw and tossed salad.']

title: Hot Milk Cake
ingredients: ['1 c. milk', '1/4 lb. butter']
directions: ['Boil milk and butter.']

title: Avocado Magnificent
ingredients: ['1 avocado, cubed', '1 tomato, diced', '1 lime', 'Garlic salt']
directions: ['Place cubed avocado and diced tomato in a bowl.', 'Squeeze lime juice over mixture.', 'Lightly salt with 2 dashes of garlic salt. Blend well.', 'Serve with garlic pita chips.', 'Serves 2.']

title: Earthquake Cake
ingredients: ['1 c. coconut', '1 c. chopped nuts']
directions: ['Sprinkle evenly in greased pan, 9 x 13-inch.']

title: Grilled Shrimp A La Waco
ingredients: ['1 lb. large shrimp, peeled', 'thin sliced bacon', 'jalapeno pepper slices']
directions: ['Cut bacon strips in half and wrapped peeled raw shrimp. Secure bacon with toothpicks.', 'Place on grill for 15 to 20 minutes.', 'Wrap jalapeno peppers with the shrimp to add some "spice."']

title: Peanut Butter Oatmeal Candy
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 stick margarine', '3/4 c. evaporated milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. peanut butter', '3 c. uncooked oatmeal']
directions: ['Bring sugar, margarine and milk to a boil over medium heat. When it starts to boil, cook for 4 minutes stirring constantly. Remove from heat and add peanut butter, vanilla and oats.', 'Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed pepper.', 'Let cool.']

title: Orange Rice
ingredients: ['1 1/3 c. orange juice', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 1/3 c. Minute rice']
directions: ['Combine orange juice and salt in skillet, bring quickly to a boil.', 'Stir in rice.', 'Cover and remove from heat.', 'Let stand 5 minutes.']

title: Salmon Loaf
ingredients: ['1 can salmon', '1 egg', '1/4 c. milk', 'crackers']
directions: ['Beat egg; add milk, salmon and crackers until you can make a loaf.', 'Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.']

title: Turkey And Homemade Dressing
ingredients: ['thawed turkey']
directions: ['Thaw in refrigerator per directions/pound.']

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwiches
ingredients: ['1/4 stick butter', '2 slices bread', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Heat butter in skillet.', 'Put cheese in between bread.', 'Put in pan.', 'Cook until nice and brown.', 'Then eat it.']

title: Fast And Easy Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 egg']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes. Makes 12 to 16 cookies.']

title: Zucchini Stir-Fry
ingredients: ['2 c. sliced zucchini', '1 small onion, chopped fine', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Wash and slice thin 2 cups zucchini.', 'Chop 1 small onion fine. Melt butter in skillet on medium heat.', 'Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender.']

title: Smoked Shrimp
ingredients: ['3 lb. uncooked shrimp, shelled and deveined', 'garlic powder', 'margarine']
directions: ['Melt margarine and pour into pan.', 'Place shrimp in margarine. Sprinkle with garlic powder.', 'Place on smoker for 1 hour.', 'Serves 5 or 6.']

title: Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 egg, beaten', '1 c sugar', '1 c creamy peanut butter']
directions: ['In a large bowl, mix all ingredients. Roll level tbsp into balls. Place on an ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten with a fork. bake at 350° for 10-12 min. makes about 2 dozen.']

title: Can'T Believe It'S A Cookie
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Stir together the 3 ingredients until mixed.', 'Drop by spoonful into greased cookie sheet; flatten with fork.', 'Bake at 350° for 12 to 15 minutes.', 'Wait 5 minutes before you remove from sheet.']

title: 1-2-3 Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ['1 - large can evaporated milk', '2 - C. sugar', '3 - squares sweet chocolate', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Put all ingredients in a saucepan on low heat, stirring constantly with a wire whist.', 'Bring to a boil and cook for 5 minutes.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Add vanilla and beat until smooth. Great for ice cream!']

title: Chicken Pineapple Spread
ingredients: ['1/2 c. crushed pineapple', '1 c. chicken, cooked and minced', '4 Tbsp. mayonnaise']
directions: ['Drain pineapple and reserve liquid.', 'Combine all ingredients and mix well.', 'Thin mixture to desired consistency with pineapple juice.', 'Spread on crackers or toast squares.']

title: Blender Chocolate Frosting
ingredients: ['6 oz. unsweetened baking chocolate', '1 1/2 c. sugar', '1 c. evaporated milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', '6 Tbsp. margarine']
directions: ['Cut up chocolate in small pieces. Put in blender. Add other ingredients. Cover. Blend on low speed until larger pieces are chopped. Stop and stir with long-handled spoon. Cover and blend on high speed until thick and creamy. Makes 3 cups.']

title: Papa Wood'S "Sugar Popcorn"
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. milk', '1 c. sugar', '1 tsp. butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Scoop out the seeds from the pumpkin.', 'Wash the seeds.', 'Pat dry on a paper towel.', 'Salt the seeds.', 'Grease a cookie sheet with 1 to 2 tablespoons butter.', 'Spread seeds on cookie sheet.', 'Bake at 400° for 20 minutes or until seeds are golden brown and crispy.']

title: Brandied Caramel Flan
ingredients: ['3/4 c. sugar']
directions: ['Melt in heavy skillet to form light syrup.', 'Coat 10-inch pie dish (deep) on bottom and partially up sides.']

title: Marge T.'S Croutons For Caesar Salad
ingredients: ['1 loaf French bread', '4 cloves crushed garlic', '1/2 c. olive oil']
directions: ['Cut French bread into 1-inch squares.', 'Simmer garlic and oil about 5 minutes.', 'Cool down oil.', 'Place croutons, oil and garlic in Ziploc bag.', 'Shake it, place on tray.', 'Bake at about 300° until golden brown.', 'Then add to Caesar Salad.']

title: Rabbit
ingredients: ['1 rabbit', '1 c. onion', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Boil rabbit until tender in water with salt and onion.', 'Put in baking container and bake until brown.', 'Sprinkle with pepper.']

title: I Can'T Believe Its A Cookie
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix ingredients.', 'Roll into balls and place on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Flatten cookies with a fork.', 'Bake at 350 degrees for 10-12 minutes.']

title: Alberta Toomey'S Zucchini Squash
ingredients: ['1 small onion', '1 can tomatoes', '2 Tbsp. butter', '2 to 3 zucchini squash', '1 Tbsp. sugar', '1/2 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Melt butter in frying pan.', 'Add chopped onion and cook until tender.', 'Slice zucchini thin and add to butter and onions.', 'Cook on low heat until squash starts to get tender.', 'Add tomatoes, salt and sugar.', 'Cook on low heat for 1/2 hour.', 'Then put in a greased baking dish.', 'Top with sharp cheese and bake in oven for 15 minutes.']

title: Ono Oven Fried Chicken
ingredients: ['2 lb. boneless, skinless chicken thighs', '1 1/2 tsp. salt', '1/2 tsp. pepper', '1 1/2 c. mayonnaise', '2 c. cornflakes, crushed']
directions: ['Salt and pepper chicken.', 'Roll pieces in mayonnaise, then roll each piece in the crushed cornflakes.', 'Bake for one hour in 325° oven or until done.']

title: Peanut Butter 'N Nana Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', 'peanut butter', 'banana']
directions: ['Spread peanut butter on one slice of bread.', 'On ther other one, slice up part of the banana to cover up the bread.', 'Put together and eat.', '"Num Num," says Cale and Kayla.']

title: Glazed Carrots
ingredients: ['1 qt. cooked, diced carrots', '3 Tbsp. butter', '1/4 c. honey']
directions: ['Cook the carrots.', 'Add butter and honey.', 'Cook until glazed.']

title: Parmesan Onion Canapes
ingredients: ['4 Tbsp. Parmesan grated cheese', "1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise", 'onion, thinly sliced']
directions: ['Mix cheese with mayonnaise.', 'Make small rounds of thin sliced bread; spread with mayonnaise mixture.', 'Place a very thin slice of onion on each.', 'Put 1/2 teaspoon mayonnaise mixture on top of onion and sprinkle top generously with Parmesan cheese.', 'Put canapes on cookie sheets in refrigerator until ready to use.', 'Broil in preheated oven until golden brown.', 'Watch closely as these burn easily.']

title: Quick Fudge Frosting
ingredients: ['6 Tbsp. milk', '6 Tbsp. butter', '1 1/2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Boil the ingredients 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Then add 1 cup chocolate chips and a handful of small marshmallows.', 'Spread on brownies and cake.']

title: Apple Impromptu
ingredients: ['1 Tbsp. butter', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Pour pie filling in 8-inch cake pan and cover with topping. Bake 20 to 25 minutes at 400°.']

title: Tuna Fish
ingredients: ['bread', 'tuna fish', 'mayonnaise']
directions: ['Take a piece of bread.', 'Take the tuna fish.', 'Mix it with mayonnaise.', 'Then spread the tuna with mayonnaise on the piece of bread.', 'Then take another piece of bread and put it on top of the bread and tuna fish and mayonnaise.', 'Then eat.']

title: Country Style Smothered Chicken
ingredients: ['1 cut-up chicken', '4 to 5 slices bacon', '1/2 medium onion, sliced', 'celery leaves']
directions: ['Salt chicken; roll each piece in flour and place in roasting pan.', 'Lay 4 to 5 pieces bacon, onion slices and celery leaves on top of chicken.', 'Cover with water and bake 3 hours.']

title: Chocolate Kiss Drops
ingredients: ['1 c. margarine', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Beat until fluffy.', 'Add 2 cups self-rising flour; mix thoroughly.', 'Chill.', 'Wrap small amount of mixture around kisses. Bake 10 minutes at 350°.', 'Cool; dust with powdered sugar.']

title: Tuna Salad
ingredients: ['1 can tuna, drained', '1 c. chopped celery', '1 c. grated carrot', '1/4 c. chopped onion', '3/4 to 1 c. mayonnaise']
directions: ['Toss ingredients together and just prior to serving add 1 can shoestring potatoes.']

title: Unbelievable Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['Combine peanut butter, egg and sugar and mix well.', 'Shape into small balls and flatten with fork.', 'Bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes.']

title: Onion Pie
ingredients: ['30 saltine crackers, crushed', '1/2 c. butter, melted']
directions: ['Line bottom of shallow casserole.']

title: Peanut Butter Tempters
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 egg']
directions: ['Combine and drop ingredients with a tablespoon on cookie sheet (do not grease cookie sheet).', 'Bake 15 minutes at 325°. Yields 1 1/2 to 2 dozen cookies.']

title: Fudge Sauce

directions: ['Bring milk, sugar and chocolate squares to full boil over medium heat.', 'Boil 5 minutes, stirring hard.', 'Remove from heat. Add vanilla and beat well 1 minute.']

title: Peanut Butter Whimsies
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1/4 c. milk', '1/4 lb. margarine', '1 c. peanut butter', '2 1/2 c. oatmeal']
directions: ['Bring to a boil and boil for 1 minute.', 'Remove from heat and add 1 teaspoon vanilla (liquid and margarine).', 'Add peanut butter and oatmeal.', 'Drop by teaspoon on wax papered cookie sheet and cool.']

title: Bacon Crisps

directions: ['Wrap 1/2 piece bacon around cracker.', 'Place wrapped crackers in toast pan.', 'Bake in a slow oven (200°) until bacon is done, about 45 minutes.', 'Let set a few minutes so bacon can crisp. Serve warm.']

title: Creamy Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['3 cups cooked rice', '3 cups milk', '1/2 cup sugar', '3 Tbsp. margarine', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine rice, milk, sugar and margarine.', 'Cook over medium heat until thickened (about 30 minutes).', 'Stir often.', 'Add vanilla.', 'Pour into serving dish.', 'Serve hot or cold.']

title: Cheese Sticks
ingredients: ['bread', 'cheese']
directions: ['First, toast your bread and then put cheese on your bread. Then put it in the microwave for 21 seconds.', 'Take it out and then cut it in long strips.']

title: Salmon Croquettes
ingredients: ['1 can salmon', '1 grated potato', '1 egg', 'crushed crackers']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients and form into patties.', 'Fry in oil until golden brown.']

title: Easy Peanut Butter Candy

directions: ['Combine sugar and milk in a large pan.', 'Cook over medium heat until dissolved.', 'Boil, stirring occasionally, until soft ball. Remove from heat.', 'Add peanut butter and vanilla.', 'Beat lightly and pour into pan.', 'Cool and cut into squares.']

title: Peanut Butter Frosting
ingredients: ['3 c. sugar', '1 1/2 sticks margarine', '3/4 c. milk', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients except vanilla in heavy saucepan. Stir over medium heat until sugar dissolves.', 'Boil for approximately 2 minutes.', 'Remove from heat and add vanilla.', 'Cool and beat until right consistency for spreading.', 'Frost tops and sides of three 9-inch layers.']

title: One-Eyed Monster
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', 'margarine', '1 egg']
directions: ['Spread margarine on both sides of bread.', 'Cut a hole in the center with a biscuit cutter.', 'Brown one side of bread in pan over medium heat.', 'Turn add 1 egg into the hole and cook for 3 minutes. Cover and cook 3 more minutes.', 'Makes 1 serving.']

title: Old-Fashioned Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['1/4 c. rice', '4 c. milk', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1/3 c. sugar', '1/2 tsp. vanilla', 'grated rind of 1/2 lemon']
directions: ['Wash rice; mix ingredients and pour into buttered pudding dish.', 'Bake 3 hours in a very slow oven (250°).', 'Stir 3 times during the first hour of baking to prevent rice from settling.']

title: Croutons Or Bread Crumbs
ingredients: ['2 slices light bread']
directions: ['Cut bread into cubes.', 'Place in a single layer on paper towel in microwave.', 'Heat uncovered in microwave 1 to 2 minutes on High. Rearrange once.', 'Let stand 5 minutes.', 'During standing time, bread will completely dry.']

title: Prudence Island Apple Icing
ingredients: ['1 apple, peeled and sliced', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg white', 'juice of 1/2 lemon']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients', 'together.', 'Beat', 'with mixer at slow speed, gradually', 'increasing to medium.', 'Beat until thick and smooth and all graininess has disappeared.']

title: Graham Fingers
ingredients: ['1 box honey graham crackers, divided']
directions: ['Line cookie sheet with graham crackers (this will take about one package)', 'making sure they are laying in the same direction.']

title: Amy'S Peanut Butter Balls
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 egg', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375°. Mix all ingredients together. Roll into 1-inch balls. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes at 375°. Enjoy!']

title: Inflation Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Combine ingredients.', 'Shape into 1-inch balls and press top of cookie', 'with', 'fork.', 'Bake at 350° for about 5 minutes. Time may vary according to ovens.', 'Makes 2 dozen.']

title: Fat-Free Croutons
ingredients: ['1 sourdough bread', 'Butter Buds']
directions: ['Cut bread into 1-inch slices.', 'Sprinkle with Butter Buds, covering completely.', 'Let stand 2 minutes.', 'Turn and sprinkle other side.', 'Cut into crouton size pieces.', 'Put into brownie tin and cook at 350° for about 20 minutes or until golden in color. Absolutely the very best for salads, soups and just munching!']

title: Baked Tomatoes
ingredients: ['1 large can tomatoes', '3/4 c. sugar', '1/3 stick butter', 'salt and pepper', '3 slices bread']
directions: ['Combine ingredients and cook at 350° until thick (about an hour).']

title: Saltine And Peanut Butter Candy
ingredients: ['1 stick margarine', '2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '1 long pack saltine crackers']
directions: ['Cook milk, sugar and margarine 2 minutes.', 'Add peanut butter and crushed crackers.', 'Pour into 13 x 9-inch slightly buttered pan.', 'Allow to cool and cut into squares.']

title: Old Fashioned Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['3 c. sugar', '3/4 c. milk', '3 Tbsp. butter', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. vanilla', '16 oz. jar peanut butter']
directions: ['Put sugar into heavy 3-quart pan. Add milk.', 'Stir until thoroughly mixed over medium heat.', 'Keep mixing until mixture bubbles.', 'Cook to a soft ball stage.', 'Remove from heat and add other ingredients.', 'Beat with wooden spoon until gloss is gone. Pour into a 9 x 13-inch pan. Cool and cut.']

title: Old Fashion Fudge
ingredients: ["2 sq. Baker's semi-sweet dark chocolate, chopped fine", '2 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', '1 stick butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Chop chocolate fine; add sugar and milk.', 'Boil to a rolling boil approximately 20 minutes over medium-high heat to soft ball stage, stirring constantly.', 'Add butter and vanilla.', 'Stir with pan in cold water until stiff.', 'Add nuts if desired and stir quickly into 8 x 8-inch pan (coated with Pam).', 'Put in refrigerator to set hard.']

title: Graham Cracker Toffee Bars
ingredients: ['12 double graham crackers', '2 c. nuts', '2 sticks butter', '1/2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Cover cookie sheet with foil.', 'Lay graham crackers on cookie sheet; sprinkle nuts on top. Boil sugar and butter for 2 1/2 minutes. Pour over graham crackers and nuts. Bake in 325° oven for 10 to 12 minutes.']

title: Pineapple Salad In Can
ingredients: ['1 large can sliced pineapple', '1 pkg. lime Jell-O']
directions: ['Mix Jell-O according to package directions, except use only 1 can of water.', 'For other liquid, use pineapple juice, which has been drained out of can.', 'Pour Jell-O into can; chill until set. Run a little hot water on sides to loosen Jell-O, or cut bottom from can and push salad through.', 'Cut between pineapple slices. Serve as a salad or dessert.']

title: Homemade Croutons
ingredients: ['1 loaf French bread, sliced 1/4-inch thick', 'butter', 'garlic powder']
directions: ['Spread butter evenly on bread slices, taking to edges of bread. Sprinkle with garlic powder and cut into cubes. Bake at 350° until crispy. Store in airtight bags. Will keep for several days.']

title: Honey-Baked Chicken
ingredients: ['4 to 6 chicken parts', '1/2 c. orange juice', '1/3 c. honey']
directions: ['Baste chicken with orange juice and honey.', 'Bake in oven at 350° for about an hour.', 'Baste 2 to 3 times during the hour. The chicken has a glazed look when done.']

title: Sweet And Sour Chicken
ingredients: ['2 lb. chicken']
directions: ['Bake in shallow pan for 30 minutes at 350°.', 'Continue baking and baste with sweet and sour sauce.']

title: Peanut Butter Milk Drink
ingredients: ['1 qt. milk', '6 Tbsp. honey', '1/2 c. creamy peanut butter']
directions: ['Beat all ingredients together until smooth.', 'Refrigerate. Serve cold.', 'This is a very delicious and nutritional drink. Serves 6.']

title: Purple Cow
ingredients: ['ice cream', 'grape carbonated drink']
directions: ['With a big spoon, get ice cream out of box and put in blender. Pour grape drink over the ice cream, push one of the buttons until the ice cream and grape drink are mixed real good.', 'Pour into a tall glass and drink up!']

title: Pickle Pies
ingredients: ['butter and nothing else']
directions: ['You just have to roll it, and then you have to smash it.', 'Then you put some stuff in it and', 'then you cook it.', 'You put it on the stove and cook it.', 'Then you take it off and freeze it and then make it warm.', 'Then you eat it.', "That's all."]

title: Sweet Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['9 pt. tomatoes', '3 c. sugar', '1 tsp. salt', '8 slices bread']
directions: ['Scald tomatoes and remove skins.', 'Quarter and cook until soft and well separated (20 minutes at least).', 'Add sugar, salt and bread, broken up in pieces.', 'Then cook for another 10 minutes, stirring often.', 'Have tomatoes simmering on medium heat.', 'Do not burn!', 'They are ready for jars at this point.']

title: Mock Lobster Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', 'smallish pared cucumber', 'sliced tomato']
directions: ['Spread 1 slice bread with deviled ham.', 'Slice a smallish pared cucumber lengthwise.', 'Place on deviled ham.']

title: Lane'S Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['1/3 c. sugar', '1/3 c. rice', '1 qt. milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 c. cream']
directions: ['Put all ingredients, except cream, into casserole dish.', 'Place in 375° oven.', 'Stir every 20 minutes for 1 1/2 hours.', "Then put in cream and don't stir for 1/2 hour."]

title: Pineapple Filling
ingredients: ['1 large can pineapple, drained', '1 small can evaporated milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 stick butter', '3 c. sugar']
directions: ['Boil 5 minutes.', 'Make 2 cake layers and split to make four layers.', 'Put filling between and on top of layers.', 'Soaks in good.']

title: Delicious Chewy Macaroons
ingredients: ['1 pkg. coconut', '1 large can Eagle Brand sweetened milk']
directions: ['Blend together.', 'Spoon onto cookie sheet.', 'Bake in a 350° oven until light golden brown.', 'Let cool and eat!']

title: Honeyed Carrots
ingredients: ['6 c. sliced carrots', '3 Tbsp. orange juice', '3 Tbsp. butter', '1 1/2 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. dry ginger', '4 Tbsp. honey']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in saucepan; cook over low heat for 25 minutes, stirring occasionally.']

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 slice cheese', '2 slices bread', 'butter']
directions: ['Take 2 slices bread and butter one side of each.', 'Put one piece of the bread buttered side down onto a hot griddle.', 'Put a slice of cheese on top of bread and put the other piece of bread, buttered side up, on top of cheese.', 'Let bottom get light or golden brown.', 'Turn and do the same to other side.']

title: Salmon Pie
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 c. milk', '1/4 c. melted margarine', '3 slices soft bread, cubed', '1 small onion, diced', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 large can salmon']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients and let set for a few minutes.', 'Pour into a greased 9-inch pie plate.', 'Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.']

title: Butter Icing
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. margarine', '1 c. canned milk', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Cook in heavy saucepan.', 'Boil until it forms soft ball in cold water.', 'Beat until thick enough to spread on cake.']

title: Garlic Chicken
ingredients: ['2 to 3 lb. chicken', '40 cloves garlic']
directions: ['Put the chicken (whole or in pieces) into a roaster.', 'Cover it with the unpeeled garlic cloves.', 'Roast at 350° for 1 to 1 1/4 hours.', 'When chicken is done, you can make a white sauce and squeeze the garlic cloves into it for a gravy or just squeeze the cloves onto a piece of bread and eat with the chicken.']

title: Crostini Toasts
ingredients: ['1 loaf French bread']
directions: ['Diagonally slice bread 1/4 inch thick.', 'Arrange in single layer on baking sheet.', 'Bake for about 8 to 10 minutes, or until crisp and lightly browned.']

title: Bacon Roll-Ups
ingredients: ['1 small can sliced pineapple', '1/2 lb. bacon, cut crosswise']
directions: ['Cut pineapple in 1-inch sections.', 'Take 1/2 slice bacon and roll up and secure with toothpick.', 'Place on cookie sheet and bake 15 minutes until bacon is brown.', 'Serve hot.', 'You may also use 1/2-inch pieces of cream cheese instead of pineapple.']

title: Chicken A La Orange
ingredients: ['2 1/2 to 3 lb. frying chicken, cut into 8 pieces', '1/4 c. butter', '1/4 c. sugar', '1 1/2 c. orange juice', '1 orange']
directions: ['Heat oven to 375°.', 'In skillet, combine butter, sugar and orange juice.', 'Cook over high heat, stirring occasionally until thickened (12 to 17 minutes).', 'Arrange chicken in 13 x 9-inch pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes, until tender, brushing with sauce every 15 minutes.', 'Cut orange colored peel from orange.', 'Cut half of the peel into narrow strips and add to remaining sauce.', 'Slice orange into 1/4-inch slices.', 'Dip slices in sauce and arrange on serving platter with chicken.', 'Serve with additional warm sauce. Makes 4 to 6 servings.']

title: Fresh Garden Pasta
ingredients: ['2/3 c. each: finely chopped celery, onion, carrot, bell pepper, red bell pepper and ripe tomato', '8 oz. pasta, cooked just tender']
directions: ['Toss vegetables with hot pasta and a scant 1/4 cup olive oil. Top with fresh chopped basil and salt and pepper to taste.', 'Serve with Parmesan cheese.']

title: Chicken And Peas
ingredients: ['chicken', 'peas']
directions: ['Take a cold chicken, open it up.', 'Put peas in, put it in the oven.', 'Cook at 90° for 10 minutes.', 'Chicken is done when buzzer goes "eeehhhtt!"']

title: Roasted Asparagus
ingredients: ['1 lb. asparagus', '2 to 3 cloves chopped garlic', '3 to 4 Tbsp. olive oil']
directions: ['Break off tough ends of asparagus.', 'Peel lower white sections; place in baking dish.', 'Drizzle with olive oil.', 'Sprinkle on chopped garlic.', 'Bake at 450° for 8 to 10 minutes.', 'Makes 2 to 3 servings.']

title: Tuna Apple Salad
ingredients: ['1 small can tuna, drained', '1 Granny Smith apple, chopped', '1 stalk celery, sliced']
directions: ['Mix together with small amount of Miracle Whip.', 'Chill. Serves 2.']

title: One Minute Caramel Icing
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1/2 stick butter', '1/2 c. milk', '1/2 tsp. vanilla', 'pinch of salt']
directions: ['Put 1/2 cup sugar in black skillet and heat until it melts. Heat 1 1/2 cups sugar, butter and milk.', 'When hot, add the sugar you have melted and cook for 1 minute after it begins to boil. Remove from heat.', 'Add vanilla and salt.', 'Beat until smooth enough to go on cool cake.']

title: Bootlegger Beans
ingredients: ['3 slices bacon', '1 small chopped onion', '1 can pork and beans']
directions: ['Saute bacon.', 'To bacon drippings, add chopped onion and saute. Crumble bacon.', 'Add bacon and onion to pork and beans.']

title: Amazing Peanut Butter Cookies(No Flour)
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix and form into small balls.', 'Flatten with fork.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 minutes.']

title: Easy Bake Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['In a mixing bowl, combine all ingredients and mix together (use a spoon, not a mixer) until smooth. Place on lightly greased cookie sheet by teaspoon fulls. To make cookies come out better, gently mash a fork on top of them making little squares. Eat and enjoy!']

title: Quick Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Cream sugar and egg; add peanut butter.', 'Mix well.', 'Form into small balls.', 'Flatten with fork.', 'Bake 8 to 10 minutes at 350°.']

title: Snow Ice Cream
ingredients: ['1 c. milk', '1 egg, beaten', '1/2 c. sugar', 'dash of salt', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Blend the ingredients well and add clean fresh snow until absorbed.']

title: Spinach Dip
ingredients: ["1 pt. Hellmann's mayonnaise", '1 chopped onion', '1 box frozen chopped spinach', 'garlic powder to taste']
directions: ['Thaw spinach and squeeze out all water.', 'Stir all ingredients together.', 'Serve with crackers.']

title: Fried Banana
ingredients: ['1 banana, peeled', 'butter']
directions: ['Use enough butter to cover bottom of frying pan.', 'Slice banana.', 'Cook in butter until golden brown. Turn and brown other side.', 'Eat and enjoy.']

title: 3 Ingredients Cookies
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix sugar and egg together until creamy.', 'Add peanut butter until well blended.', 'Shape by teaspoonful into a ball.', 'Bake about 2-inches apart on an ungreased cookie sheet at 350° for 9 minutes.']

title: Rice - Quick And Easy
ingredients: ['8 Tbsp. butter', '1/2 chopped onion', '2 c. hot chicken stock', '1 c. rice']
directions: ['Melt in a saucepan 2 tablespoons butter.', 'Add and stir until golden brown the 1/2 chopped onion.', 'Add and shake until the grains are coated.', 'Add hot chicken stock.', 'Cover the pot and simmer the rice or bake it in a 375° oven until the liquid is absorbed.', 'Add 2 tablespoons melted butter.', 'Toss the rice with a fork to distribute it.']

title: Roasted Garlic
ingredients: ['whole garlic pod', '1/8 tsp. olive oil']
directions: ['Place whole garlic pod in foil.', 'Pour over this the oil. Roast in a 350° oven for about 30 to 45 minutes.', 'Keep in refrigerator until ready to use and take off as many cloves as needed.', 'This will squeeze out like a paste.', 'May be used with mashed potatoes.', 'Rub over roast beef before cooking or any other place that you need garlic or mix with oleo for garlic butter spread.', 'Spread garlic with mayonnaise for sandwiches.']

title: Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. chocolate', '1/2 c. milk', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '1 Tbsp. vanilla', '2 c. oatmeal']
directions: ['Combine sugar, chocolate and milk.', 'Heat to boiling and cook for 3 minutes, then remove from stove.', 'Add butter, peanut butter, vanilla and oatmeal.', 'Mix all together thoroughly.', 'Drop by spoonfuls on wax paper.', 'Makes 24 cookies.']

title: Tomatoes In Red Wine
ingredients: ['6 large tomatoes', '1/2 c. celery, chopped', '1 large onion, sliced', '1 bottle red wine']
directions: ['Slice tomatoes; mix in bowl with onion and celery.', 'Cover with red wine and chill overnight.', 'Garnish with celery leaves and serve.']

title: Soft Pretzels
ingredients: ['1 loaf frozen white bread dough, thawed', '1 egg white, beaten with 1 tsp. water', '3 Tbsp. coarse salt and/or caraway seed']
directions: ['Cover dough; let rise in warm, draft-free place until doubled. Divide in 12 pieces.', 'With lightly floured hands, roll each piece into a 16-inch rope.', 'Form in pretzel shape.', 'In a large skillet, bring 2 inches of water to a boil.', 'Slip pretzels, a few at a time, into gently boiling water.', 'Cook until pretzels rise to the surface, about 45 seconds.', 'Remove with slotted spoon; drain on paper towels.', 'Brush lightly with egg-white mixture.', 'Sprinkle with salt and/or caraway seed.', 'Do not let pretzels rise.', 'Bake immediately in preheated 400° oven for 15 to 20 minutes until browned.']

title: Blackberry Jam
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar to 1 c. blackberries']
directions: ['Mash blackberries with a potato masher. Add sugar to mashed berries. Cook 1 hour. Place in hot sterilized jars.']

title: Navy Carrots
ingredients: ['1 lb. carrots', '1 Tbsp. sugar', '1 small onion', 'butter', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Cut carrots into long strips, julienne style.', 'Add sugar to water and boil carrots for 15 minutes.', 'Saute onion in butter and place in baking dish.', 'Add carrots and salt and pepper to taste. Bake at 400° until tender.']

title: Instant Oatmeal(Microwave)
ingredients: ['1 packet instant Quaker oatmeal', '1/2 c. milk']
directions: ['You will need a microwave-safe bowl.']

title: Bagged Turkey
ingredients: ['1 thawed turkey', '1 large onion', '2 to 4 ribs celery', 'seasoned salt']
directions: ['You will also need 1 Reynolds turkey bag.']

title: Todd House Baked Chicken
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken, cut up', "Sauer's seasoned salt"]
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Place as many pieces of chicken as will fit into a baking dish.', 'Generously sprinkle chicken with seasoned salt.', 'Add a little water in bottom of dish; cover tightly with foil.', 'Bake at 350° for 1 to 1 1/2 hours, or until tender.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Graham Cracker Delight
ingredients: ['42 to 48 graham crackers', '1 stick butter', '1 stick margarine', '1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 to 1 c. chopped nuts']
directions: ['Place graham crackers in a jelly roll pan (spray pan with Pam).', 'Combine butter, margarine and sugar.', 'Boil 3 minutes.', 'Add chopped nuts.', 'Pour over graham crackers.']

title: Green Pasta With Bacon Sauce
ingredients: ['1 lb. spinach pasta', '2 cloves garlic', '1/2 lb. bacon', 'salt and pepper', '1 can crushed tomatoes']
directions: ['Fry bacon. Cut in pieces and add the garlic (if the juice of the bacon is too much, pour out). Add the crushed tomatoes and simmer. Add salt and pepper. Boil pasta; mix with sauce. Add grated Parmesan cheese.']

title: Garlic Bread
ingredients: ['melted butter', '1 Tbsp. crushed fresh garlic', '1 loaf bread, uncut']
directions: ['Cut bread crossways, but not completely through.', 'Add fresh garlic to melted butter; put in bread slices with a spoon or pastry brush.', 'Pour remaining mixture across top.', 'Wrap in aluminum foil. Bake 10 minutes at 400°.']

title: Pork And Beans Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 slice bread, toasted', '1/3 c. drained pork and beans', '1 slice cheese', '2 slices bacon', '1 tsp. diced onion']
directions: ['Spread pork and beans over top of bread slice.', 'Top with slice of cheese.', 'Sprinkle with diced onion.', 'Place 2 slices of bacon on top and place under broiler until bacon is done. Great with glass of milk.', 'This could be done in a microwave if the bacon was precooked.']

title: Mother'S Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['Minute rice', '3 c. milk', '1 rounding c. sugar', '3 egg, separated', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Make Minute rice according to package directions for 6 servings.', 'Add milk and sugar.', 'Stir well; heat until just before boiling.', 'To egg yolks add the vanilla.', 'Gradually add egg mixture to rice mixture as not to curdle egg.', 'Stir well.', 'Pour into a 3-quart bowl.']

title: Brandied Carrots
ingredients: ['1 1/4 lb. carrots', '1/4 c. butter, melted', '1/4 c. pineapple juice', '1 tsp. sugar', '1 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Cut carrots into 2 1/2 x 1/4-inch strips.', 'Place carrots in ungreased 8 x 8 x 2-inch square pan.', 'Mix remaining ingredients; pour over carrots.', 'Cover and cook in a 375° oven until carrots are tender, about 40 minutes.']

title: 1-2-3 Cookies
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Mix ingredients.', 'Form 1-inch balls.', 'Press down with a fork. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes at 350°.']

title: Pretzels
ingredients: ['frozen bread dough', 'butter', 'salt']
directions: ['Thaw dough.', 'Roll small amount into snake shape.', 'Twist.', 'Melt butter; brush on dough.', 'Salt lightly.', 'Bake in a 350° oven until lightly browned on top.']

title: Egg In A Cup
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', 'cooked bacon', '1 egg', 'butter']
directions: ['Butter 1 slice of bread for each person.', 'Place the buttered side of the bread down in each muffin cup.', 'Put a bacon slice on top of the bread and crack an egg into the center of the bread cup.', 'Bake them in the oven at 350° for 20 minutes. Remove the muffin pan from the oven using hot pads.', '(Make sure there is an adult there to supervise.)']

title: Glaze For Cakes
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 stick margarine', '1 c. milk', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Bring to a boil. Boil until it begins to thicken. Add coconut or flavoring.']

title: Fish Baked In Milk
ingredients: ['4 3/4 fillets of fish', 'milk', 'butter']
directions: ['Place the fish in bottom of glass pan.', 'Cover with milk up to top of fish.', 'Dot in several places with butter.', 'Seasonings may be added.', 'Bake at 325° until flaky, about 75 minutes.']

title: Favorite Caramel Frosting
ingredients: ['3 c. sugar, divided', '3/4 c. milk', '1 egg, beaten', 'pinch of salt', '1/2 c. butter, cut up']
directions: ['Sprinkle 1/2 cup sugar in a heavy saucepan; place over medium heat.', 'Cook, stirring constantly, until sugar melts and syrup is light golden brown.', 'Combine remaining 2 1/2 cups sugar, milk, beaten egg and salt, stirring well; stir in butter.', 'Stir butter mixture into hot caramelized sugar.', '(The mixture will tend to lump, becoming smooth with further cooking.)', 'Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, until a candy thermometer registers 230° (about 15 to 20 minutes).', 'Cool 5 minutes.', 'Beat with a wooden spoon to almost spreading consistency (about 5 minutes) and spread on cooled cake.', 'Yield:', 'about 2 1/2 cups.']

title: Italian Salad
ingredients: ['cauliflower', 'broccoli', 'celery', 'tomatoes']
directions: ['Wash and cut all vegetables, amount to your desire.', 'Add salad dressing and marinate.', 'Use salad dressings for vegetarian.']

title: No Flour Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix well, measure out by rounded spoonfuls and flatten with floured fork.', 'Cook in oven at 350° until well browned around edges.', 'Makes 12 servings.', 'Preparation time:', '5 minutes.']

title: Potato Soup
ingredients: ['1 c. celery, cubed', '1 medium potato, cubed', '1/4 c. carrot, cubed', '12 oz. milk', 'salt', 'pepper', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Cover celery with water.', 'Boil 12 minutes, add potato and carrot and boil 15 more minutes.', 'Add milk and butter, salt and pepper to taste.', 'Serve with crackers.', 'Do not drain water, vitamins and minerals are in the water.', 'A favorite during the Great Depression 1929-36.', 'I make it often.']

title: Tomato Preserves
ingredients: ['3 c. tomatoes', '2 c. sugar', 'juice from 1/2 lemon']
directions: ['Peel and cut tomatoes in small pieces.', 'Cook in sugar on high, stirring often.', 'When it begins sticking to the bottom of pot, stir in juice from 1/2 of a lemon and cook for a few more minutes. Put in jar and seal.', 'Makes 1 pint.']

title: *Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. peanut butter', '3 c. sugar', '1 c. evaporated milk', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix sugar and milk in heavy, deep pot.', 'Let mixture come to a boil.', 'Cook over low heat until it forms a soft ball when tested in cold water.', 'Remove.', 'Add peanut butter and vanilla.', 'Beat until creamy.', 'Pour into greased dish.', 'Cut into squares.']

title: White House Cheese Rings
ingredients: ['1 lb. grated sharp cheese', '1 c. finely chopped nuts', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1 small onion, finely grated', 'dash of black pepper']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients and season with pepper, mix well and place in lightly greased mold.', 'Chill until firm.', 'Serve with crackers.']

title: Peanut Butter Sandwiches
ingredients: ['peanut butter', 'bread']
directions: ['Get 2 breads and take one bread and put the peanut butter on it and put the other one on top.', 'And cut it up and eat it.']

title: Peanut Butter Jelly Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Cream together.', 'Place 1 teaspoon of dough rolled into ball on cookie sheet.', 'Press a hole in center of imprint fork.', 'Place jelly if desired.', 'Bake 8 to 10 minutes at 325°.']

title: Yogurt Cheese
ingredients: ['3 c. plain non-fat yogurt']
directions: ['Line a colander with cheesecloth.', 'Spoon in yogurt and set colander in a bowl.', 'Let it drain in the refrigerator overnight.']

title: Chicken Soup
ingredients: ['1 small chicken', '1 small onion and onion tops', '1 tomato', '1 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Put chicken in a good size pot.', 'Add enough water to cover. Simmer slowly over a small fire to draw out as much of the juices as possible.', 'Add onion, salt and tomato, then cook again until these are tender.', 'When ready the flesh will fall of the bones. Serve hot.']

title: Garlic Cheese Spread
ingredients: ['1 c. softened butter', '1/2 c. olive oil', '4 to 6 oz. Blue cheese', '2 cloves garlic, minced']
directions: ['Beat all ingredients in blender until light and fluffy. Spread on split French loaves.', 'Broil until spread is bubbly and brown.']

title: Tomato-Cucumber Mayonnaise Dressing
ingredients: ['1 c. mayonnaise', '1/2 c. drained, diced tomato', '1/2 c. drained, diced cucumber', '1 tsp. minced onion', 'dash of salt']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together, blending thoroughly.', 'Store in airtight container.', 'Great for green salads, meat and seafood salads.']

title: Salmon Patties
ingredients: ['1 can pink salmon and its juice', '1 egg, beaten', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. black pepper', '16 saltine crackers, crumbled']
directions: ['Remove all skin and big bones from salmon.', 'Flake salmon and mix with other ingredients until crackers are moist.', '(If you have time, refrigerate 30 minutes.)', 'Dip by rounded tablespoon and form into 10 patties.', 'Fry over medium heat until brown and crisp. Serve hot.']

title: Waterless  Carrots
ingredients: ['3/4 c. carrots, sliced', '1 tsp. sugar', '1 Tbsp. margarine', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Place carrots, sugar, margarine, salt and pepper in tight fitting pan on low heat for 15-20 minutes.', 'This is one serving.']

title: Diced Carrots And Bacon
ingredients: ['2 1/2 c. diced, boiled carrots', '1/4 lb. bacon', '1 onion, chopped']
directions: ['Chop bacon and saute until almost crisp.', 'Drain off part of the fat.', 'Add carrots and onion to the bacon and saute until brown.']

title: Chicken Under A No. 10 Can
ingredients: ['2 to 3 lb. whole chicken', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['You will also need heavy-duty foil, a No. 10 can and a skewer.']

title: Baked Rice
ingredients: ['1 cup rice', '1 1/2 cups sugar', '1 cup cream', '2/3 cup milk', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Cook rice until tender in salt water.', 'Mix the rest of the ingredients add rice.', 'Pour into baking dish.', 'Dot top with butter. Sprinkle with cinnamon.', 'Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour.']

title: Baked Salmon
ingredients: ['1 can salmon', 'crackers', 'salt and pepper', '1 Tbsp. butter', 'milk']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Butter a square pan.', 'Put thin layer of crackers on bottom.', 'Drain salmon; remove skin and bone. Alternate layers of crackers and salmon.', 'Dot with butter, salt and pepper.', 'Add just enough milk until slightly soggy.', 'Cook 1 hour until brown on top.']

title: White'S Chocolate Fudge
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', "3 oz. Baker's chocolate", 'pinch of salt', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Put the chocolate over low heat and let melt.', 'Then add the sugar and milk.', 'Turn the heat up, a little at a time, stir to keep the candy from burning.', 'Cook to soft ball stage.', 'Set the pan in a large container of cold water.', '(Mrs.', 'White said, the secret to good non-grainy fudge is to let it cool in a big pan of cold water before beating it, she sometimes used the sink.)', 'Then add butter and vanilla.', 'Beat it until it has cooled somewhat and ready to pour.', 'Pour it into an already prepared buttered dish.', 'Let it harden and cut into squares.']

title: Old Fashioned Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['1/3 c. uncooked rice', '4 c. milk', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1/4 c. sugar', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients together in a flat baking dish (6-1/2x10-1/2x1-3/4 inches) and place in a slow oven (300°F.) and bake for 1 1/2 hours or until rice is perfectly tender and pudding is thick and creamy.', 'NOT DRY.']

title: Pork And Beans
ingredients: ['1 can pork and beans']
directions: ['Buy one can of pork and beans and take it home.', 'Open the can. Pour beans into a pan; heat them.', 'Take the beans out of the pan and put them in a bowl.', 'Eat them carefully because they are hot.']

title: My Favorite Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix ingredients.', 'Place by rounded teaspoonfuls on greased pan.', 'Bake at 325° until brown.']

title: Green Punch
ingredients: ['2 pkg. lime Kool-Aid', '2 c. sugar', '1 large can pineapple juice']
directions: ['Mix ingredients in gallon container.', 'Finish with water to make 1 gallon.']

title: Peanut Bacon Wraps
ingredients: ['8 crackers', 'peanut butter', '8 bacon strips']
directions: ['Spread cracker on both sides with peanut butter.', 'Wrap a strip of bacon around each cracker.', 'Micro-cook on paper towel in roasting pan 4 minutes on High or until bacon is crisp.']

title: A Really Delicious Recipe
ingredients: ['1 large onion', 'salt', 'pepper', 'slice of margarine']
directions: ['Take the onion, preferably a Vidalia.', 'Peel the onion and quarter 3/4 of the way down the onion.', 'Cut a cup shaped depression in the top of the onion.', 'Place a piece of margarine on top of onion and salt and pepper.', 'Place in microwave for 5 to 8 minutes. Cover with waxed paper.', 'This is a great tasty treat.']

title: Easy Frozen Yogurt
ingredients: ['2 c. plain low-fat yogurt', '1/4 c. frozen orange juice concentrate', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['In medium size bowl, mix all ingredients.', 'Freeze for about 4 hours; stir hourly for first 3 hours.']

title: Easy Macaroon Cookies
ingredients: ['3 c. Angle Flake coconut', '1 c. Eagle Brand condensed milk', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients, mixing well.', 'Drop from teaspoon 1 inch apart on well-greased cookie sheet.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes, or until golden brown.', 'Remove at once from baking sheet.', 'Makes about 4 dozen.']

title: Mom'S Baked Rice
ingredients: ['1/3 c. rice', '1/3 c. sugar', '1 qt. milk', 'pinch of salt']
directions: ['Stir all together in greased casserole.', 'Bake at 300° for 3 hours.', 'Stir every 15 minutes for first hour.', 'May add raisins and nuts.']

title: Monkey Bread
ingredients: ['2 loaves frozen bread, thawed', '1 stick margarine, melted', '1 c. sugar and 4 Tbsp. cinnamon, mixed']
directions: ['Break off balls of dough.', 'Roll in margarine, then sugar-cinnamon mixture.', 'Place in greased tube pan.', 'Let rise for 1 hour.', 'Bake for 30 minutes at 350°.', 'Invert pan to cool.']

title: Vegetable Delight
ingredients: ['1 zucchini', '1 head broccoli', '1 head cauliflower', '4 carrots', '2 large cloves garlic', '1/2 c. olive oil']
directions: ['Saute garlic until lightly brown.', 'Add all vegetables and saute until cooked.', 'Can be added to rice or pasta.']

title: Tuna Cakes
ingredients: ['6 1/2 oz. can tuna, drained', '1 egg, beaten', '12 saltine crackers', '1/4 c. milk', 'salt and pepper to taste']
