directions: ['Mix all ingredients.', 'Shape into 6 patties.', 'Fry in 10-inch skillet over medium heat in 1 teaspoon margarine until browned. (Can substitute canned salmon for tuna.)']

title: Bacon
ingredients: ['bacon']
directions: ['Put it in a pan and flips it over.', "Cooks until it's done. Then you can eat it."]

title: Cauliflower Casserole
ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower', '3 slices bread', '1/2 c. chopped onion', '1/2 c. chopped celery', '3 c. milk', '8 slices cheese', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Wash cauliflower.', 'Separate head; cook in salted water until done, but not mushy.', 'Put cauliflower in buttered 9 x 12-inch baking dish.', 'While cauliflower is cooking, soak white bread (that the brown edges have been trimmed) in 3 cups of milk.', 'Break up bread after soaking; add onion and celery.', 'Cook in heavy skillet milk, bread, celery and onion until thick and creamy.', 'Salt and pepper to taste.', 'Pour over cauliflower.', 'Cover with cheese.', 'Bake at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes.']

title: Pan-Braised Celery
ingredients: ['3 c. thinly sliced celery', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Put butter in saucepan, then celery.', 'Cook covered until celery sizzles.', 'Reduce heat.', 'Braise 4 to 5 minutes.', 'Add a few extra drops of water, if necessary. Cook only until crisp-tender. Season with salt.']

title: Cucumber Side Salad
ingredients: ['1 cucumber, peeled and sliced thin', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/4 c. sugar']
directions: ['Put all ingredients in small bowl; stir good.', 'Set in refrigerator until meal time.', 'Drain off liquid.', 'Serves 2.']

title: Kelly'S Cucumber Sandwiches
ingredients: ['1 large cucumber, peeled', '1/4 c. mayonnaise', 'garlic salt']
directions: ['Halve cucumber and scrape out seeds, then grate.', 'Squeeze out water.', 'Mix together with mayonnaise and garlic salt.', 'Spread on bread and cut into small sandwiches.']

title: Tomato Sandwich
ingredients: ['fresh tomatoes', 'salt', 'pepper', 'mayonnaise', 'bread']
directions: ['Peel tomatoes and slice in small pieces.', 'Add salt, pepper and mayonnaise to taste.', 'Toast bread and add the tomato spread.']

title: Fried Shrimp Balls
ingredients: ['1 medium onion, grated', '1 medium raw potato, grated', '1 1/2 lb. raw shrimp, chopped fine', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients.', 'Form in small balls.', 'Fry in deep fryer at 375° until golden brown.']

title: Sesame Bars
ingredients: ['2/3 c. honey', '1/4 c. peanut butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 tsp. salt', '3 c. sesame seed', '1 1/2 c. coconut']
directions: ['Mix together first 4 ingredients in a bowl.', 'Add sesame seed and coconut.', 'Mix well.', 'Dip hands in water, then press ingredients into 9 x 13-inch baking dish.', 'Bake at 300° for 30 to 40 minutes.', 'Cool.', 'Cut into squares.', 'Yield:', '30 (2-inch) bars.']

title: White Wash For Chicken Coop
ingredients: ['50 lb. hydrated lime', '1 Tbsp. salt']
directions: ['Fill pail with water.', 'Throw in salt.', 'Keep adding lime, stirring until you get paint-like mixture.', 'Paint coop every year and', 'hose it down between paintings.', 'The lime helps control pests.']

title: 1-2-3 Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup peanut butter', '1 cup sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix together until smooth. Roll into one inch balls. Place on cookie sheet. Flatten with fork into criss-cross pattern. Bake at 300 degrees until brown, about 8-10 minutes.']

title: Vanilla Milk
ingredients: ['1 c. milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 tsp. sugar']
directions: ['Heat milk in microwave or on stove.', 'Remove from heat before boiling.', 'Add sugar and vanilla.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Candied Mint Leaves Or Violets
ingredients: ['1 egg white', '1 Tbsp. orange juice', 'superfine sugar']
directions: ['Beat egg white until frothy and add juice.', 'Dip or paint leaves or flowers with mixture.', 'Spoon sugar carefully on flowers. Place on wax paper to dry.', 'When dry, put in an airtight container.']

title: Heath Cake
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. sugar', '1 stick butter, melted', '2 c. crushed Ritz crackers']
directions: ['Mix and press in bottom of 9 x 13-inch pan.', 'Refrigerate.']

title: John'S Favorite Pepper Shrimp
ingredients: ['2 lb. shrimp', '2 sticks butter', '2 cloves garlic', 'black pepper']
directions: ["Melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic and simmer for 5 minutes. Spread raw shrimp evenly in 13 x 9 Pyrex dish. Pour melted garlic butter over shrimp. Toss gently with your hands. Sprinkle pepper over all the shrimp. Just when you think you've put enough pepper, add more. You can't add too much. Toss again with your hands. Put in 350° preheated oven and bake for 15 to 20 minutes. Shrimp should be pink. Toss with spoon and bake only 5 minutes more. Save the juice off of this; it's very good for dipping toasted bread."]

title: Quick And Easy Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix the ingredients together, form in small balls.', 'Place on cookie sheet, crisscross with a fork.', 'Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 350°.', 'Do not overbake.']

title: Baked Garlic
ingredients: ['1 pod garlic', 'butter']
directions: ['Place pod of garlic into piece of foil.', 'Cut top so you can get some butter into center area.', 'Close foil around it and bake at 350° for about 30 minutes.', 'Garlic will slip out of peeling when done.', 'Spread on hot buttered bread or mix with butter for great garlic butter.']

title: Beer With Egg
ingredients: ['1 can beer', '1 egg']
directions: ['This is an excellent antidote for the chef who has overindulged the night before.', 'Fill a tall glass to the 3/4 mark with beer.', 'Add an egg; beat with a fork.', 'This makes a gold-colored, bland drink for one.', 'Try poaching eggs with beer. The brew adds a special something to both the taste and the texture.']

title: Melba Toast
ingredients: ['low calorie bread']
directions: ['Arrange bread on cookie sheet.', 'Place in a 325° oven.', 'Let dry.', 'Remove after each side has browned.']

title: Doris' Excellent Fruit Torte
ingredients: ['1 pkg. Pillsbury Refrigerated Sugar Cookie Dough']
directions: ['Grease and flour a 12 pizza pan, then press the dough into it. Bake at 350° for about 15 minutes, or until golden brown.']

title: Fast Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients together.', 'Drop by spoonful on baking sheet.', 'Bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes.', 'Make 12 large cookies or 24 small ones.']

title: Tomato Jelly
ingredients: ['tomatoes', 'sugar']
directions: ['Strain juice of tomatoes to remove the seeds.', 'Mix 1 part tomato juice with 1 part sugar.', 'Cook until desired consistency.']

title: Yogurt
ingredients: ['1 qt. milk', '3 Tbsp. yogurt']
directions: ['Bring milk to a boil.', 'Remove from heat after reaching a boil. If you want thicker yogurt, boil milk for 5 minutes.', 'Let cool to 85° (slightly warmer than lukewarm).', 'Stir in yogurt - store bought or previously homemade - and stir well.', 'Pour into large bowl and place in a warm spot where it will not be disturbed. Cover bowl.', 'Wrap in towels or other available swaddling.', 'Let stay until set - 5 hours or more.', 'Place in fridge.', 'When chilled, use!', 'I like it best unstirred and drizzled with honey.']

title: Fish Baked In Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['2 lb. fish', 'juice of 1 lemon', '1/2 c. olive oil', '5 tomatoes, cut up', '1/2 c. white wine']
directions: ['Put lemon juice on both sides of fish.', 'Put in baking pan. Heat in skillet; add tomatoes, wine, garlic and sugar.', 'Simmer 15 minutes.', 'Add salt and pepper.', 'Put parsley, bread crumbs and sauce on fish.', 'End up with bread crumbs and parsley.', 'Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.', 'Baste a couple of times.']

title: Quick Frosting
ingredients: ['1 egg white', '1/2 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 c. granulated sugar']
directions: ['Beat egg white until very stiff, add sugar, slowly beat until the mixture is smooth, add vanilla and spread on cake.']

title: Graham Cracker Crust
ingredients: ['20 graham crackers, rolled fine', '1/3 c. sugar', '1/4 lb. margarine, softened']
directions: ['Mix together and press into a 9 x 12-inch pan; keep a few crumbs for topping.']

title: Poor Man'S Dinner
ingredients: ['1 lb. cheese', '1 loaf bread']
directions: ['Place cheese between slices of bread and add mayonnaise.']

title: Tangy Shrimp
ingredients: ['16 shrimp, peeled and deveined', '8 bacon strips']
directions: ['Wrap shrimp in bacon strips and saute until bacon is done.']

title: Cranberry Sorbet
ingredients: ['2 c. cranberry juice', '1/2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Process in blender until sugar dissolves.', 'Place in metal bowl and freeze until almost firm.', 'Return to blender and blend again. Freeze until solid.', 'Makes 3 cups.']

title: Baked Brie And Sourdough Bread
ingredients: ['1 round loaf sourdough bread', '1 1/2 lb. Brie cheese', '2 cloves pressed garlic', '1/3 c. melted margarine']
directions: ['With a bread knife, cut a circle through the top of round loaf about 1-inch from edge.', 'Gently remove center portion of bread loaf, leaving a bowl-shaped bottom.', 'Cut removed center portion into 1/2-inch strips.']

title: Poppy Seed Torte
ingredients: ['24 graham crackers, crushed', '1/4 c. butter', '1/4 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix together and line bottom and sides of pan. Save 1/2 c. for topping.']

title: Low-Fat Chicken
ingredients: ['1 chicken', '2 Tbsp. honey', '3 Tbsp. apple juice']
directions: ['Mix honey and apple juice and pour over chicken.', 'Bake at 350° until done, approximately 1 hour.']

title: Copper Pennies
ingredients: ['2 lb. carrots', '1 small onion', '1 small pepper']
directions: ['Slice carrots in rounds; dice onion and pepper.', 'Cook until soft.', 'Drain and let cool.']

title: Peanut Butter Roll Ups(Childrens Recipe)
ingredients: ['Bread slices', 'Peanut butter']
directions: ['Flatten bread with rolling pin.', 'Spread with peanut butter and roll up.']

title: Ice Cream Cake
ingredients: ['1 box butter fudge cake mix']
directions: ['Mix up and bake in 4 layers.']

title: Cream Of Broccoli And Cheese Soup
ingredients: ['1 qt. milk', '1 large bunch broccoli, washed and chopped', '1 onion, pureed', '1 tsp. salt and pepper']
directions: ['Cook altogether until broccoli is tender.', 'Add 1 1/2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese to soup and boil, stirring constantly. Thicken to desired consistency with water and flour.']

title: Boiled Turkey
ingredients: ['1 turkey']
directions: ['Use a large stewing pot.', 'Fill it with enough water to cover turkey.', 'Put whole turkey in pot, turn on burner high enough to boil water.', 'When water boils, turn timer on for 1 hour, depending on if turkey is frozen or unfrozen.', 'Boil until meat on wings is done.', 'It comes off bone slightly when done.', 'The turkey remains soft and tastes like turkey out of the oven.', 'It saves time to cook and does not have the fat content involved.', 'If stuffing is necessary, make it separate in the oven.', 'This cooking is for plain unstuffed turkey.']

title: Broccoli Salad
ingredients: ['1 bunch broccoli', '1 onion', '4 slices bacon', "Hellman's mayonnaise"]
directions: ['Break broccoli into tiny flowerets, peel stems and dice. Slice 1 onion very thin. Dice up 4 pieces of bacon and fry, drain well.', 'Use enough mayonnaise to moisten mixture.', 'Salt lightly if desired.']

title: Chocolate Fudge Icing
ingredients: ['1/2 c. milk', '1/2 c. butter', '2 oz. chocolate', '2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Melt chocolate; add sugar, butter and milk. Let come to a boil. Boil for 1 minute only. Set aside to cool and beat until creamy and until it is a spreading consistency.']

title: Chocolate Blender Frosting
ingredients: ['1 c. evaporated milk', '1 1/2 tsp. vanilla', '1 1/2 c. sugar', '5 blocks chocolate, cut in small pieces', '6 Tbsp. margarine']
directions: ['Put in blender in order given.', 'Blend on medium speed until blended.', 'Blend on high until thick and creamy.', 'Stop and stir frequently.']

title: French Bread With Biloxi Butter
ingredients: ['1 lb. butter, softened', '1 1/2 lb. shrimp, boiled, peeled, deveined and processed in a blender', 'garlic powder to taste', 'fresh French bread']
directions: ['Cream butter and garlic until light and fluffy.', 'Fold shrimp into butter and mix well.', 'Serve on hot French bread.', 'May also be toasted under broiler.']

title: Sweet Rice
ingredients: ['2 c. milk', '2 c. rice', '3/4 c. sugar', '2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine milk, sugar and vanilla in saucepan.', 'Bring to a boil. Turn off heat and add rice. Cover until all liquid is absorbed into the rice.', 'Fluff with fork and serve.']

title: Lemon Sauce(Especially Good On Gingerbread)
ingredients: ['juice of one lemon', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar', '1 stick butter']
directions: ['Add all ingredients together and cook in double boiler until thick.']

title: Butter Baked Carrot Sticks
ingredients: ['1 lb. carrots', '2 tsp. sugar', '1 tsp. salt', '1/8 tsp. pepper', '4 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Pare carrots; cut in 3-inch long sticks.', 'Place in shallow 6-cup baking dish.', 'Sprinkle with seasonings.', 'Dot with butter. Cover.', 'Bake at 400 ° for 45 minutes or until tender.']

title: Mulled Apple Cider
ingredients: ['4 c. apple juice', '1 c. cranberry juice', '1 scoop orange juice concentrate']
directions: ['Simmer several hours with a cinnamon stick. Make in multiples for large groups.']

title: Peanut Butter Milk Shake
ingredients: ['3 Tbsp. peanut butter', '4 c. milk', '3 tsp. sugar']
directions: ['Put peanut butter, milk and sugar into blender.', 'Mix for 2 to 3 minutes.', 'If desired, may put more of any/either ingredient.']

title: Peanut Butter
ingredients: ['4 c. roasted nuts', '1 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Shell 4 cups of peanuts and roast.', 'Remove skins, grind the peanuts through a food chopper or meat grinder, add 1 teaspoon salt.', 'Remove 1/2 cup of the crushed peanuts, grind the remainder the second or third time using a smaller knife or take up the tension of the plate until the grinder is hard to turn.', 'Mix coarse butter with the fine.', 'Fill into clean, sterile jars.', 'Pack the peanut butter so that all air is expelled to prevent rancidity.', 'Seal the container air tight.', 'If the peanut butter is to be stored for several months, process for 10 minutes in a water bath to remove air from top of the jar.', 'Store in cool, dry, dark place.']

title: Impossible Cookies
ingredients: ['1 egg', '2/3 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1/2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Beat egg; add sugar and beat until creamy.', 'Add vanilla and peanut butter.', 'Mix well.', 'Form 1-inch balls on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 350°.', 'Let cookies harden on cookie sheet a few minutes.', 'Makes 30 to 40 cookies.', '(This does not have any flour.)']

title: "Snow" Ice Cream
ingredients: ['1 c. milk', '1 beaten egg', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Blend together milk, egg, sugar and vanilla.', 'Add clean, crushed ice until the mixture is absorbed.', 'Then serve in an ice cream cone, topped off with maple syrup or thawed orange juice concentrate.']

title: Honey Fudge
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '3/4 c. milk', '1/4 c. cream', '1 sq. chocolate', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1 c. nuts', '1/4 c. honey']
directions: ['Boil sugar, milk, cream and chocolate for 5 minutes.', 'Add honey and cook until it forms a soft ball in cold water; 236°.', 'Remove from heat and allow to cool to 120°.', 'Beat until it loses its shiny look.', 'Pour into 8 x 8-inch pan.', 'Cut in 1 inch squares.', 'Store in refrigerator.']

title: Old-Fashioned Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '3/4 c. milk', '1/4 tsp. salt', '3/4 c. peanut butter', '2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix sugar and milk.', 'Cook without stirring, until forms a soft ball.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Cool slightly.', 'Add peanut butter and vanilla.', 'Beat until it loses its gloss.', 'Makes 1 1/2 pounds.']

title: Homemade Caramel
ingredients: ['1 can Eagle Brand milk']
directions: ['DO NOT PUT HOLES IN CAN!!', 'Place can in pot of boiling water.', 'Boil for at least 3 hours.', 'Open can and serve.']

title: Potato Candy
ingredients: ['1/4 c. boiled mashed Irish potato', '1 box 4x powdered sugar', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: ["Boil potato until tender. Let cool until it's workable. Then mix in powdered sugar, enough until thick. Pinch small amount of dough and pat in palm of hand until oblong. Place oblong dough on piece of wax paper. Sprinkle with powdered sugar. Spread dough with peanut butter. Roll up and slice with knife. Refrigerate the candy until firm."]

title: Kristina'S Cheese Toast
ingredients: ['2 pieces bread', '2 slices cheese', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Use 3 mixing bowls.']

title: Three Minute Pie
ingredients: ['1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 stick butter', '1 c. coconut', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients; pour in 9-inch unbaked pie crust. Bake 45 minutes at 350°.']

title: Icy Melon Freeze
ingredients: ['3 c. pureed melon', '1/3 c. sugar', '1 c. orange juice']
directions: ['Combine puree and sugar until sugar dissolves.', 'Add juice and stir.', 'Place in a freezer container and freeze until partially frozen.']

title: Orange Glazed Carrots
ingredients: ['1 1/3 c. melted margarine', '1 tsp. sugar', '1 c. orange juice', '1 lb. carrots, peeled and sliced']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a saucepan.', 'Cover and simmer 15 to 20 minutes or until tender.', 'Uncover and cook until liquid is absorbed.', 'Makes 4 to 6 servings.']

title: Carrots
ingredients: ['2 lb. carrots', '1/3 c. margarine', '1 Tbsp. sugar', '1 medium onion', 'salt']
directions: ['Peel and slice carrots into microwavable casserole dish.', 'Cut up onions on top of carrots.', 'Cut up margarine into 4 to 5 pats on top of carrots and onions.', 'Spread sugar over top.', 'Salt as you would any vegetable.', 'Do not stir.', 'Microwave on High 10 to 15 minutes.', 'Stir carrots and microwave another 10 to 15 minutes or until done.']

title: Bacon Crackers
ingredients: ['saltine crackers', 'bacon']
directions: ['Wrap cracker in 1/2 slice bacon.', 'Bake at 375° until brown. Delicious.']

title: Andy'S Homemade Peas
ingredients: ['1 can peas']
directions: ['Heat to a boil and serve.']

title: Uncooked Cookies
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1 Tbsp. vanilla', '1/2 c. butter', '2 sq. chocolate', '3 c. oatmeal', '1 c. coconut']
directions: ['Drop by teaspoon on wax paper and put into refrigerator.']

title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Crackers
ingredients: ['Ritz crackers', 'peanut butter', 'chocolate']
directions: ['Put peanut butter between 2 crackers.', 'Melt chocolate; dip crackers one at a time in chocolate.', 'Place on rack to harden. After hardened, place in airtight container.']

title: Easy Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['3 cups sugar', '1 -1/2 cups milk', '1 cup peanut butter']
directions: ['Cook sugar and milk until soft ball stage. Add peanut butter. Beat until thick and pour into buttered 9 inch square pan.']

title: Pileau(Pearl O)
ingredients: ['1 large chicken, cut in pieces', 'rice']
directions: ['You could also use ham, shrimp or sausage.']

title: Egg In A Frame
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', 'butter', 'egg']
directions: ['Cut center of bread with cookie cutter to make a hole in bread.', 'Melt butter in frying pan.', 'Place bread in butter and break egg in the hole in the bread.', 'Fry until egg is done. Butter round piece and serve with frame.', 'Kids love this one!']

title: Christmas Porridge(Risengrynsgrot)
ingredients: ['6 c. milk', '1 c. rice', '3 Tbsp. sugar', '1/2 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Put all 4 of the ingredients together in top of a double boiler.', 'Cover and cook over simmering water 2 1/2 to 3 hours, or until rice is entirely soft when a kernel is pressed between fingers and the mixture is quite thick.', 'Remove cover for last 10 minutes if mixture is not thick enough.', 'Serve with cool milk, sugar, cinnamon or serve with a fruit sauce.']

title: Believe It Or Not Cookie
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix ingredients.', 'Roll into small balls.', 'Spread with fork. Bake at 400° for 10 minutes.']

title: Colorful Beverage
ingredients: ['64 oz. bottle orange juice', '64 oz. bottle cranberry juice']
directions: ['Pour the orange juice into ice cube trays and freeze them. Chill the cranberry juice in the refrigerator.', 'When the orange juice cubes are frozen, Place them in a large pitcher and pour in the cranberry juice.']

title: Blt Sandwiches
ingredients: ['3 strips fried bacon to 1 sandwich']
directions: ['This sandwich is especially good on toasted whole wheat bread. If you prefer, it can be made on plain white bread, but it is not as eye-appealing.']

title: West Virginia Fried Chicken
ingredients: ['1/2 tsp. each: salt, pepper, oregano, sugar, thyme, garlic powder, paprika, brown sugar, rosemary and onion']
directions: ['Mix all together. Coat chicken in mixture and fry in butter and oil.']

title: Believe It Or Not Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 large egg', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Beat all together well.', 'Form into balls as for peanut butter cookies.', 'Flatten with fork and bake at 350° for about 10 minutes.']

title: Chocolate Icing
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', '1 stick butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '4 to 4 1/2 Tbsp. chocolate', '1 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients together in saucepan and bring to a boil.', 'Boil for exactly 2 minutes.', 'Cool thoroughly.', 'Beat for 1 1/2 minutes.', 'Spread on cake.']

title: Angela'S Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together.', 'Bake on ungreased cookie sheet at 350° for 7 minutes.']

title: Breakfast Drink
ingredients: ['6 to 8 oz. orange juice', '1 sliced banana', '1 Tbsp. yogurt']
directions: ['Place all in blender and blend until smooth.']

title: Ground Nut Frosting
ingredients: ['1 c. finely ground nuts', '1 c. margarine', '1/2 c. scalded milk', '9 Tbsp. granulated sugar']
directions: ['Pour milk over ground nuts and cool.', 'Cream butter.', 'Add sugar tablespoon at a time.', 'Add cooled nut mixture and 1/2 teaspoon vanilla or almond flavoring.', 'Cut angel food cake in half crosswise.', 'Spread lower portion with frosting.', 'Replace top layer and frost remainder of cake.']

title: Chicken Stew
ingredients: ['1 large chicken', '1 qt. tomatoes', 'crackers', '1 large onion', '1 lb. Hoop cheese']
directions: ['Boil chicken, debone and reserve broth.', 'Boil broth, tomatoes and onion until onions are tender.', 'Add meat back to mixture.', 'Add shredded cheese and crackers until desired consistency.']

title: Amazing Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix together peanut butter and sugar.', 'Drop by spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Bake at 325° for 10 to 15 minutes. Should be lightly cracked and brown.', 'Do not overbake.']

title: Lunchbox Sandwich
ingredients: ['3/4 c. peanut butter', '1/4 c. mayonnaise', '1/3 c. mashed, ripe banana', '2 slices bread']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together well and spread on bread. Refrigerate remaining mixture for next day.']

title: Banana Shake
ingredients: ['3/4 c. milk', '1 ripe banana', '1 egg', '1/2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a blender.', 'Then cover and mix at high speed until foamy.', 'Makes 1 serving.']

title: Chuck'S Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['3 c. sugar', '1 1/2 c. milk', '1/8 tsp. salt', '1/4 c. butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2/3 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Butter 8 x 8-inch glass dish, set aside.', 'Mix sugar, milk and salt together.', 'Cook over medium heat to soft ball stage.', 'Remove from heat and add vanilla, butter and peanut butter.', 'Beat fudge until it stiffens and loses its glaze.', 'Quickly pour into glass dish.', 'Refrigerate until ready to serve.']

title: Piggy Back Crackers
ingredients: ['1 lb. bacon', '48 saltine crackers']
directions: ['Cut bacon slices in half.', 'Wrap one piece around each cracker. Place on broiler pan.', 'Cook in 200° oven for 2 to 2 1/2 hours. Makes 4 dozen.']

title: Super Apple Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 apple, sliced and cored', '1 Tbsp. dry milk', '2 Tbsp. peanut butter']
directions: ['Wash apple.', 'Mix dry milk and peanut butter in small bowl. Slice apple into 4 sections, remove core.', 'Spread mixture over 1 slice, top with 1 more apple slice.']

title: Grandma'S Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['1 qt. milk', '4 Tbsp. rice', '4 Tbsp. sugar', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix together the milk, rice, sugar, salt and vanilla.', 'Bake for 2 to 3 hours at 350°.', 'Stir once in a while.']

title: Salad
ingredients: ['1 pkg. raspberry Jell-O']
directions: ['Mix and let set.']

title: Mom B'S Peanut Butter Candy
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '3/4 c. milk', '1/4 tsp. salt', '3/4 c. peanut butter', '2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Boil sugar, milk and salt until it forms a soft ball.', 'Cool slightly, then add peanut butter and vanilla; beat until creamy. Put in 8 x 8-inch pan.']

title: Milk Toast
ingredients: ['milk', 'bread']
directions: ['Toast some bread.', 'Pour milk into a mug.', 'Tear the toast into strips and dip into milk.', 'Eat.']

title: Fried Toast
ingredients: ['sliced bread', 'margarine']
directions: ['Coat both sides of a slice of bread with margarine.', 'Fry in a hot skillet until brown.', 'Serve like a pancake or French toast with syrup, jam or a poached egg.']

title: Turkey Ole
ingredients: ['leftover turkey', 'Minute rice, flavored with medium-hot picante to taste']
directions: ['Arrange sliced turkey over flavored rice.', 'Add turkey gravy, if desired.', 'Garnish with ripe olives.']

title: Special Potatoes
ingredients: ['1 large potato', '2 tsp. butter', '1 onion', '1 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. pepper']
directions: ['Wash potato.', 'Cut into slices (with skin on).', 'Add butter and potato slices to skillet.', 'Add onion, salt and pepper. Continuously stir and flip potatoes with spatula for about 5 minutes.']

title: Brendan'S Special Drink
ingredients: ['3 carrots', '1 Granny Smith apple']
directions: ['Wash and peel carrots and apple.', 'Cut into small pieces.', 'Put through juicer.', 'A yummy and nutritious drink!']

title: Peanut Butter Bread Fingers
ingredients: ['1/2 c. peanut butter', '1 c. milk', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. pepper', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '12 slices of bread']
directions: ['Cream together peanut butter and milk; add salt and pepper, then add slightly beaten egg.', 'Remove crusts from bread slices and cut into narrow strips.', 'Dip in the mixture and saute in butter.']

title: Garlic Oil
ingredients: ['1 c. olive oil', '5 to 6 large garlic cloves']
directions: ['Combine oil and garlic in a covered container.', 'Store in cupboard 2 to 3 days.', 'Shake occasionally.']

title: Easy Peanut Butter Cookies(Children Can Make)
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 c. granulated sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine all four ingredients with a spoon.', 'Chill mixture for at least an hour before baking.', 'Preheat oven to 325°.', 'Roll into small balls and place on an ungreased cookie sheet about 1-inch apart.', 'Press slightly with a fork to flatten.', 'Bake 15 to 20 minutes.', 'Yields 3 dozen.']

title: Sour Cream Coconut Cake
ingredients: ['1 box butter Duncan Hines yellow cake mix']
directions: ['Make as directed on box.', 'A 3 layer cake.', 'Cool cut into six layers.']

title: Orange Sugared Nuts
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '10 Tbsp. orange juice', '1/4 tsp. salt', '3 c. nuts']
directions: ['Boil until it forms a soft ball.', 'Remove from stove, add nuts. Stir until it begins to whiten.', 'Lift out nuts, put on waxed paper.']

title: Surprise Rice And Gravy
ingredients: ['10 c. rice', '2 c. roast beef', '1 chicken leg', 'bread']
directions: ['Cut the chicken and roast beef.', 'Stir it; put in rice.', 'Add some bread and cook for a while.', 'Yum!']

title: 48 Little Miracles
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg, beaten', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine peanut butter and sugar; mix well.', 'Stir in egg and vanilla.', 'Roll into 48 balls.', 'Place on ungreased pan.', 'Flatten with floured fork.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 minutes.', 'Allow to cool before removing from cookie sheet.', "That's all there is to it. Enjoy."]

title: Banana Sandwiches
ingredients: ['1 banana, cut lengthwise in 4 slices', '2 slices your favorite bread', 'peanut butter', 'mayonnaise']
directions: ['Spread bread with peanut butter and mayonnaise.', 'Put banana between the two slices of bread and add lettuce, if desired.']

title: Delicate Pineapple Cake
ingredients: ['1 pkg. Duncan Hines pineapple supreme cake mix']
directions: ['Make the cake mix as directed on package.', 'Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Grease and flour 2 (9 x 13-inch) pans.', 'Divide batter evenly in pans.', 'Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.', 'Cool.']

title: Graham Cracker Treats
ingredients: ['1/3 box honey graham crackers', '1 stick margarine', '1 stick real butter', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 c. finely chopped nuts']
directions: ['Separate crackers and arrange on bottom of a long cookie sheet.', 'Melt margarine and real butter; add sugar and cook 2 minutes.', 'Pour over crackers and sprinkle with nuts.', 'Bake for 10 minutes at 325°.']

title: Marrow Bone Butter
ingredients: ['3 beef marrow bones', 'pepper and salt']
directions: ['Crack bones and roast in 350° oven for 1 hour or when marrow feels soft.', 'Scoop out marrow and season with salt and pepper. Serve on Indian bread or tortillas.']

title: Scalloped Chicken
ingredients: ['1 large whole chicken', '1 box saltine crackers']
directions: ['Boil chicken until done. Remove from pot and let broth cool. Skim off excess fat from broth. Remove chicken from bone and place in bowl. Crumble crackers over chicken. Pour broth over chicken and crackers. Mix until very moist, but not soupy. Pour into a sprayed 9 x 13 baking dish and bake at 350° until top is golden brown and pulling away from sides of dish.']

title: Fruit Dressing
ingredients: ['1/2 c. yogurt', '4 tsp. unthawed orange juice', '1/2 c. mayonnaise']
directions: ['Mix together and pour over any fruit.']

title: Bacon, Cheese, Tomato Sandwiches
ingredients: ['bacon', 'bread', 'cheese', 'tomato', 'butter']
directions: ['Cook bacon.', 'On 1', 'slice', 'of', 'bread,', 'put', 'a', 'slice', 'of cheese.', 'On another, put tomato slices.', 'Put bacon between and put the 2 slices of bread together.', 'Butter the sides of bread and cook same as a grilled cheese sandwich.']

title: Clarified Butter
ingredients: ['1 c. butter']
directions: ['Place butter in 2-cup glass measure.', 'Cook on 20% power for 3 1/2 minutes.', 'Let stand 3 to 4 minutes.', 'Skim foam from top. Slowly pour off yellow oil into small serving dish.', 'This is the clarified butter.', 'Discard the leftover impurities.', 'Serve as dipping sauce for clams, crab legs, lobster or shrimp.']

title: Orange Rolls
ingredients: ['1 c. orange juice', '3/4 c. sugar', '1/2 stick butter']
directions: ['Bring to a rolling boil; set aside to cool.']

title: Hector'S Favorite Flan(Baked Custard)
ingredients: ['1/2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Caramelize sugar in skillet on top of stove.', '(Heat until it turns brown.)', 'Pour into 1-quart casserole dish.']

title: Easy Shrimp Dip
ingredients: ['1 carton French onion dip', '1 can tiny cocktail shrimp']
directions: ['Rinse shrimp and drain well. Mash 1/2 of the shrimp with a fork. Mix with French onion dip. Fold in the rest of whole shrimp. Chill.']

title: Garlic Storage
ingredients: ['garlic']
directions: ['Garlic can be kept indefinitely by putting it in a tightly-covered glass jar and storing it in the freezer.']

title: Egg Nog
ingredients: ['1 c. milk', '2 Tbsp. sugar', '1 egg', '1/4 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Blend well. Sprinkle with nutmeg.', 'For chocolate, omit vanilla and add chocolate syrup.']

title: Pineapple Boat
ingredients: ['1 large pineapple', '1 banana, sliced', '1/4 c. mayonnaise', '1 1/4 c. cooked chicken', '1/4 c. diced celery', '1/2 c. coconut']
directions: ['Cut pineapple lengthwise.', 'Scoop out pineapple.', 'Mix pineapple pieces with all of the remaining ingredients.', 'When ready to serve, return ingredients to pineapple halves.']

title: Toad In A Hole(Breakfast)
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', '1 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Cut center of bread out with end of a glass or round cookie cutter.', 'Melt butter in a skillet.', 'Add bread (both pieces).', 'Add egg to the center of cut bread.', 'Flip egg as desired.']

title: Sweetened Condensed Milk
ingredients: ['1/3 c. plus 2 Tbsp. evaporated milk', '1 c. sugar', '3 Tbsp. plus 2 tsp. butter']
directions: ['Mix together in heavy saucepan. Heat until butter and sugar have melted. Cool and use. Makes 15 ounces.']

title: Creamy Hot Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ['1/4 lb. butter', '4 sq. chocolate', '3 c. sugar', '1 can evaporated milk']
directions: ['Melt butter over low heat.', 'Add chocolate and melt it, stirring so it won\'t "catch".', 'Add sugar and milk.', 'Stir until sugar is completely dissolved. Add 2 tablespoons vanilla.', 'Place in 1-quart container.', 'When ready to use, place what you need in pan.', 'Bring to rolling boil for a minute and serve over ice cream or dessert.']

title: Blender Eggnog
ingredients: ['1 c. milk', '1 egg', '2 Tbsp. sugar', 'a little vanilla']
directions: ['Stir or beat in blender all of the ingredients.', 'May add nutmeg, if desired.']

title: Rainbow Trout
ingredients: ['whole trout', 'lemon', 'salt', 'pepper', 'butter']
directions: ['Take whole trout and put 1/2 lemon into cavity.', 'Salt and pepper cavity.', 'Put 2 pats butter into it also and wrap in aluminum foil to form a boat.', 'Wrap it all the way around trout. Cook on open fire with hot coals for 5 minutes on each side.']

title: Old Fashioned Creamy Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['5 c. milk', '1/2 c. rice', '1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Bring to a boil 4 cups milk, sugar and rice.', 'Add the rice that has been rinsed well.', 'Simmer slowly, covered.', 'Cook for about 1 hour on low heat.', 'Pour into a greased 9-inch casserole. Add the remaining 1 cup milk and vanilla.', '(Raisins may be added if desired.)', 'Bake in 400° oven until the skin on the pudding is browned.', 'Allow to cool.']

title: Icing For Jam Cakegroves, Texas
ingredients: ['1 c. canned cream', '2 c. sugar', '1 c. butter']
directions: ['Bring to a boil until a drop in cup of cold water forms a soft ball.']

title: Herb Filled Croustades
ingredients: ['24 slices fresh, soft white sandwich bread', '2 Tbsp. soft butter']
directions: ['Cut 3-inch rounds from each slice of bread with a 3-inch plain or fluted cookie cutter; press carefully into well-buttered tiny muffin tins (about 2 inches wide).', 'Bake in preheated 400° oven for about 10 minutes until rims are lightly browned.', 'Fill with the following:']

title: Egg In A Basket(Great Kids Dish)
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg']
directions: ['Cut a 2-inch circle in center of bread using a jelly glass or juice glass. Place bread in hot, lightly greased skillet. Break egg in center of bread; fry until done. Use the center circle of the bread to toast in skillet. Serve with jelly.']

title: Microwave Even Easier Candies
ingredients: ['1/2 lb. chocolate']
directions: ['In 2-cup glass measure, melt chocolate on High until shiny; stir until smooth.']

title: Sesame Asparagus
ingredients: ['1 bunch asparagus', '2 tsp. olive oil', '2 tsp. sesame seed']
directions: ['Cut rough, hard ends off of asparagus.', 'Spread asparagus in pan.', 'Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with sesame seed.', 'Bake in a 500° oven for 10 minutes.']

title: Cali'S Culinary Cuisine
ingredients: ['1 piece bread', 'a tad of butter']
directions: ['Put bread in toaster.', 'Spread butter on bread when it pops up. Enjoy.']

title: Warm Coconut Icing
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. sugar', '1 stick butter', '1 small can evaporated milk', '7 oz. coconut']
directions: ['In a large skillet, melt butter in sugar, then pour in milk, stirring slowly until mixed well. Bring to boil and maintain a rolling boil, stirring constantly for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in coconut, then cool to desired consistency. Then pour over cake.']

title: Patrick'S Peanut Butter Apples
ingredients: ['1 apple', '3 Tbsp. peanut butter']
directions: ['Wash and core apple.', 'Cut into wedges.', 'Spread peanut butter on wedges.', 'Serves 2 children.']

title: Combination Marmalade
ingredients: ['1 orange', '1 lemon', '1 grapefruit']
directions: ['Quarter, remove seeds, run through food chopper.', 'Measure. Place in large pot.', 'Add 3 cups of water to each cup of pulp. Bring to a boil for 15 minutes.', 'Let stand overnight.', 'Measure out 3 cups of stock into large pot.', 'Bring to a boil.', 'Add 3 cups sugar.', 'Stir to dissolve sugar and cook rapidly to 220°.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Let cool to 190° and pour in clean jars.', 'Seal at once with self-sealing lids.']

title: Amy'S Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients.', 'Roll in balls.', 'Mash with fork.', 'Bake 8 to 12 minutes at 350°.']

title: Old-Fashioned Bread Pudding
ingredients: ['1/3 c. uncooked rice', '4 c. milk, scalded', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1/4 c. sugar', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a flat baking dish and place in a slow oven (300°) and bake for 1 1/2 hours or until rice is perfectly tender and pudding is thick and creamy, not dry.', 'Stir every 15 minutes with a fork, carefully turning the brown top and scraping the edges down.', 'Serve hot or cold.', 'Yields 5 servings.']

title: Peanut Butter Kisses
ingredients: ['2 c. dry milk', '1 c. peanut butter', '1/2 c. honey', '1/4 c. coconut']
directions: ['In a 2-quart bowl, mix dry milk, peanut butter and honey. Roll dough into balls. Roll the balls in coconut. Makes about 24 kisses.']

title: Canadian Vanilla Syrup
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Bring ingredients to a full boil (frothy).', 'Delicious especially on waffles.']

title: "The Famous Peanut Butter Cookies"
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in bowl.', 'Take teaspoon of batter and roll into ball.', 'Put on cookie sheet.', 'Press with fork dipped in sugar, twice.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes.', 'Makes about 2 to 3 dozen.']

title: Shrimp Pilaff
ingredients: ['1 1/2 lb. shrimp', '4 bacon slices, cut into squares and fried until crisp', '1 small minced onion', '2 1/2 c. canned tomatoes', '1 c. uncooked rice', 'salt']
directions: ['Partly cook and clean shrimps.', 'Remove bacon from pan and drain.', 'Add other ingredients to bacon fat.', 'Place in double boiler and steam over hot water for 45 minutes.', 'Stir in peeled, cooked shrimp and a pinch of chervil.', 'Turn into a casserole. Bake in a moderate oven for 15 minutes.', 'Serve with Mornay Sauce. Serves 6.']

title: Peanut Butter Play Doh
ingredients: ['2/3 c. honey', '1 c. peanut butter', '2 c. dry milk']
directions: ['Knead together.', 'Let children make shapes with cookie cutter or use their imaginations.', 'Guaranteed to occupy children at least 30 minutes!']

title: Granny'S Tomatoes
ingredients: ['2 large cans stewed tomatoes', 'day old bread, cubed', '2 Tbsp. honey']
directions: ['Cook tomatoes until they will easily break apart with fork. Break or mash tomatoes and bread until thickened.', 'Let simmer, then add honey.', 'Continue to simmer for about 15 to 20 minutes until bubbly.', "Don't thicken too much.", 'Should be a medium thickness.']

title: Peanut Butter Fondue
ingredients: ['1 c. milk', '1 c. peanut butter', '1/2 c. honey']
directions: ['Mix well.', 'Place over very low heat until mixture is smooth and creamy.']

title: Pasta And Peas
ingredients: ['1 box ditali pasta', '1 bag peas', '1 onion', 'olive oil to cover bottom of pot']
directions: ['Chop onion.', 'Put olive oil in pot just to cover the bottom. Heat the oil, then put in onion and saute until golden brown.', 'Put in peas and cook until soft, ten to twenty minutes.', 'Then put a pot of water up for pasta and cook to desired time.', 'After pasta is ready; drain it, then take the peas and pour it onto the pasta and serve.']

title: Coconut Squares
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1/2 c. milk', '1 c. shredded coconut', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine sugar, butter and milk in saucepan.', 'Simmer, stirring constantly to soft ball stage or 238° on candy thermometer. Remove from heat; stir in coconut and vanilla.', 'Beat until creamy. Pour into a greased 9-inch pan.', 'Allow to stand for 30 minutes. Cut into squares.']

title: Sam'S Blackened Shrimp
ingredients: ['3 lb. medium shrimp', '2 sticks margarine', 'black pepper']
directions: ['Rinse and drain shrimp. Pour into a 9 x 13-inch Corning Ware dish, sprayed with vegetable oil. Place margarine slices on top of shrimp. Pepper shrimp heavily. Bake at 400° for approximately 10 minutes. Turn shrimp with a spatula. Cook an additional 10 minutes.']

title: Peanut Butter Popcorn
ingredients: ['lemon', 'peanut butter']
directions: ['Put lemon and peanut butter in bowl with popcorn.', 'Cook 1 minute.']

title: Florida Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Stir only these 4 ingredients together.', 'Roll in ball, 1-inch in diameter.', 'Flatten with fork.', 'Bake on greased sheet at 375° for 10 to 11 minutes until light golden brown.', 'Makes about 30 cookies.']

title: Chocolate Marshmallow Pie
ingredients: ['18 graham crackers, crushed', '1/2 c. margarine, melted', '1/4 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix and mold into pie pan (saving some crumbs for top of pie later).', 'Chill.']

title: Egg In A Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'butter']
directions: ['Butter both sides of bread after tearing out a hole (in the center', 'of the slice) about the size of the egg yolk.', 'Put bread in frying pan and then break egg into hole.', 'Cook slowly and flip to', 'finish', 'cooking', 'egg.', 'Salt and pepper to taste. Serve.']

title: Healthy Apple-Walnut Muffins(From Great American Home Baking Cooking Series)
ingredients: ['1 small Granny Smith apple, peeled, cored and cut into 12 thin slices']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°.', 'Grease 12 standard size muffin pan cups or use paper liners.', 'Beat together butter and sugar at medium speed until light and fluffy.', 'Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.', 'Beat in bananas until smooth.', 'Mix together flour, salt, baking powder and baking soda.', 'Alternately stir flour mixture and buttermilk into egg mixture until dry ingredients are just moistened.', 'Stir in nuts and vanilla.', 'Do not overmix batter.', 'It should not be completely smooth.']

title: De-E-Licious Cookies
ingredients: ['40 graham crackers', '1 stick butter', '1 stick margarine', '1/2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Put graham crackers on cookie sheet lined with foil over the sides.', 'Melt butters; add sugar and bring to a boil.', 'It will be foamy.', 'Pour over graham crackers.', 'Sprinkle with chocolate chips and nuts.', 'Bake at 350° for 12 minutes.', 'Easy and quick.']

title: Dennis Scales' Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Cook for 2 minutes after it starts to boil.', 'Then add the peanut butter.', 'Beat well and pour into a buttered pan.']

title: Stuffed Pumpernickel
ingredients: ['1 medium whole pumpernickel bread', '1 glove garlic', '1 small onion, chopped fine', '1 large Wis-Pride sharp Cheddar', '1/2 c. beer']
directions: ['Mix ingredients together until soft.', 'Refrigerate at least 1 hour.', 'Scoop out bread and fill with cheese mixture.', 'Put extra pieces of bread on the side for dipping.']

title: Dinner Rolls
ingredients: ['1 loaf frozen bread dough']
directions: ['Thaw as directed.', 'Cut lengthwise in half.', 'Cut each half into 7 equal parts.', 'With greased hands, roll each piece into a ball and place in a greased pan.', 'Allow to raise.', 'Bake at 350° for about 15 minutes.']

title: Shoe String Potato Salad
ingredients: ['1 c. finely diced celery', '1 c. grated carrots', '2 c. boned, diced chicken', '1 tsp. grated onion', '1 c. mayonnaise']
directions: ['The above ingredients may be fixed ahead of time and chilled in the refrigerator.', 'Just before serving, add 1 (4 ounce) bag or can of shoestring potatoes.', 'Serve on lettuce cups.']

title: Veggie Mix
ingredients: ['1 bunch broccoli', '1 head cauliflower', '1 onion']
directions: ['Cut into bite size pieces.']

title: Chicken Noodle Soupgroves, Texas
ingredients: ['1 can Chicken Noodle soup', 'crackers']
directions: ['Get soup out of cabinet and open with can opener.']

title: Mother Ripp'S Hot Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ['1/2 c. margarine', '2 1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 tsp. salt', '3 sq. chocolate', '1 large can evaporated milk', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Melt margarine in top of double boiler.', 'Drop in chocolate and melt.', 'Gradually add sugar, 4 tablespoons at a time.', 'Add salt. Gradually add milk.', 'The water in the double boiler must be kept boiling.', 'Lastly, add vanilla.', 'Cook until desired thickness, about 1 hour.', 'Stir often.', 'Store in refrigerator.', 'Can be reheated.']

title: Peanut Butter Sandwich With Sugar
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '2 Tbsp. peanut butter', '1 Tbsp. sugar']
directions: ['On 1 slice of bread, spread peanut butter, then sprinkle sugar on top.', 'Top with other slice of bread and enjoy.', 'Makes 1 serving.']

title: Boiled Oatmeal Cookies With Peanut Butter
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1 stick butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '3 c. quick oatmeal', '1/2 c. nuts', '1/2 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Bring the first 4 ingredients to a boil and boil for a few minutes.', 'Stir to avoid burning. Add the oatmeal, nuts and peanut butter. Drop by spoonfuls onto wax paper.']

title: Kayte Beth'S Favorite Cookie
ingredients: ['1 store bought sandwich type cookie']
directions: ['Examine cookie from all angles to make sure that there is filling inside.', 'Pull apart cookie.', 'With your teeth, scrape off all the filling.', 'Set cookie part aside or give it to your dog and ask mom for another one.']

title: Fruit Topping
ingredients: ['1 egg', 'juice from 1 medium can pineapple', '1 c. sugar', 'juice from 1 lemon']
directions: ['Beat egg; add pineapple juice, lemon juice and sugar.', 'Bring to a boil and cook for about 5 minutes.', 'Refrigerate until cold. Serve over any combination of fruit.', 'I like the pineapple chunks that the juice was drained from, bananas, white grapes, peaches, etc.', 'Fruit can be fresh or canned.']

title: Pinwheels
ingredients: ['10x sugar', 'milk', 'butter', 'peanut butter']
directions: ['Mix together first three ingredients and roll out on waxed paper.', 'Spread on peanut butter.', 'Roll up and cut thin. Refrigerate.', 'Enjoy!!']

title: Snowballs
ingredients: ['ice cream', 'coconut']
directions: ['Shape ice cream balls.', 'Roll in flaked coconut.', 'Freeze until very firm.', 'Remove from freezer one at a time and decorate with icings and gels to resemble Christmas tree ornaments or decorate with flowers. Use simple designs and work quickly.', 'Return each snowball to freezer when finished.']

title: Rice Pudding(Top Of Stove)
ingredients: ['3 c. cooked rice', '3 c. milk', '1/2 c. sugar', '3 Tbsp. butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine rice, milk, sugar and butter.', 'Cook over medium heat until thickened, about 30 minutes.', 'Stir often.', 'Add vanilla. Serve hot or cold.']

title: Peanut Butter Chews
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. honey', '1 1/4 c. dry milk', '1 1/4 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix together.', 'Roll into balls and chill.']

title: Watermelon Popsicles
ingredients: ['1 ripe watermelon']
directions: ['Seed the watermelon and puree it in a food processor or blender.', 'Pour into plastic popsicle molds or paper cups and freeze for several hours.', 'If you are using paper cups, wait until the popsicle is partially frozen, then insert a popsicle stick.']

title: Mom'S Cherry Cream Cheese Pie
ingredients: ['16 graham crackers', '1/3 c. melted butter', '1/2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Crush graham crackers into fine crumbs.', 'Add sugar and melted butter and mix well.', 'Pat crust into 9-inch square pan and set aside.']

title: Very Good Cooked Icing(An Old Family Recipe)
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1/2 stick butter', '2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Boil sugar and milk for 8 minutes in iron skillet.', 'Take off and add 1/2 stick butter and vanilla; beat until thickens, then ice cake.']

title: P'Nut Kiddie Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '3/4 c. sugar', '1 egg, beaten']
directions: ["Mix ingredients and drop by teaspoon on cookie sheet! That's all!", 'Bake in 350° oven for 10 minutes.']

title: Homemade Noodles
ingredients: ['1 egg, beaten', '1/2 tsp. salt', '2 Tbsp. milk']
directions: ['Add flour to form a ball that you can pick up.', 'Roll out thin. Cut into strips and cook until tender.']

title: Poached Salmon
ingredients: ['2 salmon steaks', '1 tsp. butter', '1/2 c. white wine']
directions: ['In a large skillet, over high heat, melt butter and coat the pan.', 'Place the salmon, flesh side down and sear (about 2 minutes).', 'Turn salmon and reduce to medium heat.', 'Add wine, cover and cook for 4 or 5 minutes.', 'The salmon will still be very pink inside.', 'Serve with a little of the liquid drizzled over the fish.']

title: Buckeyes Candy
ingredients: ['1 lb. margarine', '2 c. peanut butter', '3 lb. 10x sugar', '2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Make into balls and dip into melted chocolate chips (16 ounce bag).']

title: Easy Fruit Punch
ingredients: ['1 pkg. cherry Kool-Aid, unsweetened', '1 large can pineapple juice']
directions: ['Mix Kool-Aid with water; add', 'pineapple juice and fruit cocktail; mix thoroughly.']

title: Toad In A Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 Tbsp. butter', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Cut 2-inch hole in center of bread.', 'Melt butter in skillet. Fry bread in skillet until golden brown.', 'Turn bread over and break egg into center hole.', 'Reduce heat and cook to desired doneness.', 'Salt and pepper.', 'May flip bread over if desired.']

title: Sweet Syrup
ingredients: ['1 pt. apple juice', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix and boil for at least 15 minutes or until thick.', 'Yields 1 1/2 cups.']

title: Bread Custard Pudding
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. crumbled bread', '1 Tbsp. butter', '2/3 c. sugar', '1/2 tsp. vanilla', '1 egg', '3 c. scalded milk']
directions: ['Combine the crumbs and milk; bring to boiling point.', 'Add the butter and stir into the egg and sugar, beaten until light in the baking dish.', 'Add vanilla.', 'Place baking dish in a pan of hot water and bake at 350° until a knife inserted in center comes out clean, about 45 minutes (raisins can be added 1 cup).']

title: Low-Fat Garlic Croutons
ingredients: ['6 to 8 pieces diet bread', 'garlic powder']
directions: ['Sprinkle bread with garlic powder on both sides. Put on a cookie sheet sprayed with nonstick cooking spray or use a rack to put bread on.', 'Bake in 300° oven until bread is dry and crispy, about 25 minutes.', 'Turn bread halfway to get both sides dry. Break in pieces and keep in airtight container until ready for use.']

title: Icing For Jam Cake
ingredients: ['2 1/2 cups sugar', '3/4 cup milk', '1 stick butter', '1 egg, beaten', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Put 1/2 cup of the sugar in iron skillet over low heat.', 'In sauce pan, mix remaining 2 cups of sugar, milk, butter, and egg. Stir mixture over low heat until butter melts then increase heat and boil rapidly.', 'Take sugar that is in iron skillet melted and pour in other mixture.', 'Stir fast and constantly.', 'Cook until soft ball stage.', 'Remove from heat and add 1 tsp. vanilla.', 'Beat well and spread on cake.']

title: Baked Stuffed Fish(Any Type Fish May Be Used)
ingredients: ['fish', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Sprinkle fish with salt and pepper.', 'If whole fish, rub cavity with lemon juice.']

title: Quick And Easy Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '3/4 c. milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', '3 heaping Tbsp. peanut butter']
directions: ['Boil sugar and milk until a soft ball forms when dropped in cold water.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Add vanilla and peanut butter. Mix well.', 'Put in a 9-inch pie pan. Cut when cool.']

title: Peanut Butter Drops
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg, beaten']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients.', 'Let stand 5 minutes.', 'Shape into small balls.', 'Lay on greased cookie sheet.', 'Flatten with a fork.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes.']

title: Rice And Okra
ingredients: ['1/4 c. rice', '1/2 lb. bacon', '1 small onion']
directions: ['Cook bacon until crisp; cook about 1/4 cup of rice and add onion.', 'Pour some of the fat from the bacon in a frying pan and add the okra.', 'Cook until it is done.', 'Add the rice and onion and let simmer for awhile.']

title: Peanut Butter Balls(Quick And Easy)
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients and stir until well blended.', 'Form into 1-inch balls.', 'Bake on ungreased cookie sheet for 15 to 20 minutes at 300° or until lightly browned.']

title: Old Fashion Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['1/3 c. uncooked rice', '4 c. scalded milk', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1/4 c. sugar', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in flat baking dish.', 'Place in 300° oven for 1 1/2 hours.', 'Stir every 15 minutes with fork, carefully turning under the brown top and scraping the edges down.', 'Serve hot or cold.']

title: Tuna Tasties
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1/2 c. tuna', '1/2 slice bread per child', '4 Tbsp. peas', '1/4 c. cheese']
directions: ['Break the bread into very small pieces.', 'Mix the bread with tuna, egg and peas.', 'Spray the muffin tin with Pam and press the tuna mixture into muffin tin.', 'Grate cheese to sprinkle over each muffin.', 'Bake at 350° for 15 minutes.']

title: Shrimp Wrapped In Bacon
ingredients: ['8 large shrimp, shelled and deveined', '8 slices bacon']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Wrap shrimp with bacon; fasten with toothpicks.', 'Place in baking pan.', 'Bake for 15 to 20 minutes. Remove from oven; drain and serve.']

title: No Bake Cheesecake
ingredients: ['24 graham crackers, crushed', '1/4 c. sugar', '1/2 c. margarine, melted']
directions: ['Butter a 9 X 13 pan.', 'Mix cracker crumbs, sugar and margarine. Spread and press into pan.', 'Refrigerate (or bake at 375° for 8 minutes and cool).']

title: Peanut Butter And Jelly French Toast
ingredients: ['1 peanut butter and jelly sandwich', '1 egg', '2 Tbsp. milk']
directions: ['Make peanut butter and jelly sandwich.', 'Dip both sides in egg/milk mixture.', 'Cook on buttered griddle until brown on one side, then turn over and brown other side.', 'Eat with a knife and fork.']

title: Peanut Butter Celery Stuffer
ingredients: ['peanut butter', 'celery']
directions: ['Cut celery into small chunks.', 'Stuff with peanut butter.']

title: Sweet Cinnamon Rice
ingredients: ['1 c. rice', '1 1/2 c. milk', '1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 stick butter', '1/2 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Cover rice with water good.', "Put on low flame with lid (watch it so it doesn't boil over).", 'After the water cooks down a lot, turn fire out.', 'Leave lid a little ajar.', 'When ready to fix, add milk, butter, salt, vanilla and sugar.', 'Mix in bowl.', 'Sprinkle with sugar/cinnamon.']

title: Banana Egg Nog
ingredients: ['1 mashed banana', '1 egg', '1 c. milk']
directions: ['Add banana and egg to milk.', 'Mix thoroughly.', 'Chill and pour in container.', 'Shake before using.']

title: Jean'S Cookies
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 Tbsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix egg, peanut butter, sugar and vanilla.', 'Add anything else you want (chocolate chips, coconut, nuts, raisins).', 'Bake at 300° for 20 minutes.']

title: Alex'S Favorite Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 1/2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Combine all together. Roll into balls and press with fork. Bake at 350° about 8 to 10 minutes.']

title: Quick Salad
ingredients: ['1 can coconut', '1 small can crushed pineapple', 'grated carrots']
directions: ['Combine all three ingredients.']

title: Ona Chapman'S Coffee Frappe
ingredients: ['1 gal. strong coffee', '2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Dissolve sugar in hot coffee and cool. Add 1 pint of whipped cream. When ready to serve, add 6 to 8 quarts vanilla ice cream.']

title: Honey Sesame Chicken
ingredients: ['Chicken', 'Honey', 'Sesame Seed', 'Salt', 'Pepper']
directions: ['Let the chicken sit in the honey, turn over to moisten both sides.', 'Then dip into the sesame seeds.', 'Season with salt and pepper to taste.', 'Bake for 1 hour in a 325 degree oven.']

title: Roasted Broccoli Florets(Like Popcorn)
ingredients: ['2 bunches broccoli', '1 Tbsp. olive oil', 'salt to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450°. Cut broccoli into bite size pieces. Put in plastic bag. Pour 1 tablespoon olive oil over and coat. Pour pieces onto sheet pan in single layer and bake 25 minutes or until brown and crispy. Salt to taste after baking. Use in place of popcorn for a low carbohydrate diet. It is delicious fresh out of the oven. Not good left over.']

title: Christmas Punch
ingredients: ['1 can pineapple juice', '2 cans frozen orange juice, will make 2 qt', '2 pkg strawberry kool aid, will make 4 qt']
directions: ['Mix ingredients. Add 2 qt chilled ginger ale before serving. Top with pineapple sherbet.']

title: Hot Fudge Topping
ingredients: ['4 Tbsp. butter', '4 squares semi-sweet chocolate', '1 1/2 C. sugar', '1 lrg. can evaporated milk', 'dash of salt', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Melt chocolate and butter together in a saucepan.', 'Add sugar, milk and salt.', 'Cook slowly at low heat until thickened; about 15 minutes.', 'Add vanilla.']

title: Tuna Fish Patties
ingredients: ['1 can tuna', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper to taste', '6 to 8 crushed saltine crackers']
directions: ['Crush saltine crackers.', 'Add to mixture.', 'After completely mixed, make round balls.', 'Flatten out.', 'Coat with cornmeal.', 'Put enough grease to cover bottom of skillet.', 'Put patties in.', 'When grease is hot, brown.', 'Turn over.', 'Brown both sides.', 'Drain on paper towel.', 'Makes about 8 patties.']

title: Baked Creole Eggplant
ingredients: ['2 eggplant, diced', '1 onion, chopped', '1 c. raw peeled, deveined shrimp, chopped', '1 to 2 ribs celery, chopped', '1/2 c. butter']
directions: ['Boil eggplant until soft.', 'Saute onion, shrimp and celery in butter.', 'Combine with eggplant.', 'Pour into casserole and sprinkle with bread crumbs.', 'Bake for 30 minutes at 350°.']

title: Five Layer Butter Pecan Cake
ingredients: ['1 Betty Crocker butter pecan cake mix']
directions: ['Prepare cake mix according to directions on cake box except add 1 extra egg and use milk in place of water.', 'Make 5 thin layers in 8-inch cake pans.', 'Bake according to directions on box.']

title: Yogurt Popsicles
ingredients: ['1 pt. yogurt', '1 small can frozen orange juice', '2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Pour into paper cups and put tongue depressor in center. Freeze.']

title: Sink Toast
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1/4 lb. margarine']
directions: ["You will need 1 kitchen knife and 1 pop-up toaster that doesn't pop up."]

title: Gold Fingers
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1/2 c. sharp Cheddar, grated']
directions: ['Toast bread lightly.', 'Cover bread with cheese.', 'Place on foil covered cookie sheet.', 'Bake 2 to 3 minutes at 400° or until cheese is melted and bubbly.', 'Remove from oven and cool.', 'Slice each piece into 4 strips (fingers) for a snack.']

title: Fruit Of The Palm Tree

directions: ["Put the ice cream and milk in the blender. Push each button for 10 seconds. Pour out and there's a good milk shake ready to drink."]

title: Inexpensive Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix well and roll into balls.', 'Bake on greased baking sheet in a 350° oven for 10 minutes.', 'Remove from cookie sheet while still warm.']

title: Coconut Pecan Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 c. margarine', '1 well beaten egg', '1/2 tsp. vanilla', '1 1/2 c. coconut']
directions: ['Cream the sugar and margarine.', 'Add egg.', 'Blend vanilla and coconut into mixture.', 'Refrigerate dough for 3 hours.', 'Shape into balls and roll in 1/2 cup coconut.', 'Place on cookie sheet.', 'Press pecan half into top of cookie.', 'Bake at 325° for 20 minutes.', 'Can be glazed with white Karo syrup while cookies are still hot. Yields 4 dozen.']

title: Better Than Mounds
ingredients: ['2 c. nuts', '1 c. Eagle Brand milk', '1 1/2 to 3 c. coconut, shredded', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in bowl.', 'Refrigerate overnight.', 'Roll in balls.', 'Taking a few out at a time, keeping rest cold, dip in melted chocolate.', 'Put on waxed paper.']

title: Buttercream Eggs

directions: ['Mix well and shape into eggs.', 'Place on cookie sheet lined with waxed paper after coating with chocolate.', 'Let stand until cool.']

title: Honey Play Dough
ingredients: ['1 part honey', '1 part peanut butter', 'dry milk']
directions: ['Mix honey and peanut butter together.', 'Add enough dry milk to make it less sticky.']

title: Soda Cracker Candy
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '2/3 c. milk', '6 Tbsp. creamy peanut butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '27 soda crackers, crushed real fine']
directions: ['Bring milk and sugar to a rolling boil.', 'Let it boil for 1 minute, stirring now and then.', 'Take off stove and beat in peanut butter, vanilla and crackers.', 'Spread into a buttered 13 x 18-inch pan.', 'When it sets a little, cut into desired squares.']

title: Paige'S Apples
ingredients: ['apple']
directions: ['Peel the skin off.', 'Cut it up.']

title: Pineapple Magic
ingredients: ['1 can pineapple chunks']
directions: ['Put pineapple chunks in a bowl.', 'Put it in the freezer for 3 to 4 hours.', 'Take it out when it is ready.', 'Then put in the blender.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Finnish Carrot Casserole

directions: ['Cook and mash carrots; cook rice until soft and mix with carrots.', 'Mix egg with milk and add to carrot mixture.', 'Season with salt.', 'Pour into greased casserole.', 'Dot with butter and bake in a 350° preheated oven for about 1 hour or until brown.']

title: Snow Logs
ingredients: ['1 banana', '2 Tbsp. peanut butter', 'shredded coconut']
directions: ['Cut banana the long way.', 'Put peanut butter on banana halves. Put the other half banana on top.', 'Roll banana logs in coconut. Put Snow Logs on wax paper and freeze slightly.', 'Serves 5.']

title: Baked Shredded Carrots

directions: ['Lightly toss together carrots and onion.', 'Put sugar and salt with mixture until combined.', 'Spread in 1-quart casserole.', 'Dot with butter.', 'Bake, covered, at 325° for 1 hour.']

title: Strufoli(Honey Clusters)
ingredients: ['1 c. honey', '1 Tbsp. sugar']
directions: ['Cook over low heat.', 'Add pieces of "cookies" stirring constantly until all pieces are coated.', 'Remove with slotted spoon and set in refrigerator to chill slightly.', 'Remove and shape into desired shape and sprinkle with multi-colored sprinkles.']

title: Egg With A Hat
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1 egg']
directions: ['With a 2 1/2-inch round cutter, cut out a circle on the slice of bread.', 'Melt butter in a heavy frying pan.', 'Put in both pieces of bread.', 'Cook over moderate heat until they begin to brown. Break an egg into the hole and sprinkle it with salt and pepper. Continue cooking until the bread is brown.', 'Turn and brown the other side.', 'Add butter as needed to keep the bread from sticking. Serve with the cut-out piece on top.']

title: Hot Apple Slices
ingredients: ['apple', '1 can sugar-free cherry Coke']
directions: ['Slice apple as if you are making a pie. Place slices in a saucepan and pour in sugar-free soda. Heat until it boils. Serve hot with low-fat ice cream on top or frozen yogurt.']

title: Shrimp Appetizers

directions: ['Wrap each shrimp in a half slice of bacon.', 'Secure with toothpick.']

title: S'More Cookies

directions: ['Melt chocolate and candy quick in microwave and mix together. You could use Marshmallow Creme instead of peanut butter or in addition to the peanut butter.']

title: Hawaiian Chicken Salad

title: Terri'S Fruit Drink

directions: ['Mix well and chill.', 'Better than Kool-Aid.']

title: Pineapple Mint Sauce

directions: ['Cook until thick.', 'Add green food coloring and one teaspoon of essence of peppermint.', 'Chill.']

title: Mamaw'S Egg Custard
ingredients: ['1 c. milk', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Beat (on low speed) with mixer until combined.', 'Pour into pie shell (homemade is best).', 'Bake in preheated 350° oven until firm and brown.', 'Add meringue and bake if desired.']

title: Cherry Devilicious Cake
ingredients: ['1 Duncan Hines Butter Recipe fudge cake mix']
directions: ['Prepare cake mix according to package directions, baked in 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan.', 'Cool.']

title: Coconut Cream Candy

title: Appetizer Bacon Snack

title: Pineapple Casserole

directions: ['Bake at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes.']

directions: ['Mix milk, sugar and chocolate together and cook in a double boiler 20-25 minutes. Beat 2-3 minutes and add vanilla. This is good either warm or cold.']

title: Baked Shrimp

title: Kimmy'S Cheezy Eggs
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Beat egg', 'in', 'a', 'bowl.\tBreak cheese into small pieces. Add to egg.', 'Microwave for 30 seconds.', 'Stir.', 'Cook 10 seconds and stir.']

title: Crock-Pot Turkey(Easy!)

title: Simple Punch

title: Punch Bowl Cake

directions: ['Bake as directed on box.']

Let them lay on your counter until you get lots made.', 'Boil a large kettle of water.', 'Place each Kringla in the boiling water until it floats to the top (like donuts).', 'Remove them and place on well-greased cookie sheet.', 'Bake at 350° until golden brown, about 15 minutes depending on the size you make.', 'Best fresh with butter!']

Mix well and add vanilla.', 'Shape dough into a large ball.', 'Pinch off pieces.', 'Shape into 1-inch balls (marble size) and place on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Place 2 inches apart.', 'Press with a fork, making cross marks and flattening.', 'Bake at 325° for 10 minutes until brown.', 'Let cool before removing from cookie sheet. Results: Crispy cookies.']
