ingredients: ['1 pkg. Good Seasons honey mustard salad dressing', '2 1/2 lb. chicken']
directions: ['Prepare salad dressing according to package directions.', 'Pour 1 cup prepared dressing over chicken in large bowl.', 'Refrigerate 3 hours to marinate. Remove chicken from marinade.', 'Bake at 350° for 60 minutes.']

title: Fruit Shake
ingredients: ['1/4 c. milk', '1/4 c. orange juice', '1/2 banana', '1 tsp. honey', 'dash of vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in a blender for 30 seconds.']

title: Coconut Macaroons
ingredients: ['1 egg white, beaten stiff', '1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. coconut', '1 c. cornflakes', '1/4 to 1/2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix in order given.', 'Drop from tip of spoon on greased cookie sheet.', 'Bake in 350° oven until golden brown.', '(Keep back a small amount of coconut to sprinkle on top of macaroons before baking. I always double recipe.)']

title: Chocolate Fudge
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '2/3 c. cream', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Melt butter; add cocoa.', 'Add sugar and milk.', 'Bring to boil, stirring all the time until sugar is dissolved.', 'Cover and without removing lid, boil 4 minutes.', 'Take off cover.', 'Boil slowly until soft ball is formed when you drop a bit of cooking mixture in a cup of water.', 'Cool 20 minutes off heat.', 'Add vanilla, if you wish add peanut butter and/or marshmallow whip.', 'Beat until thick.', 'Pour into buttered pie tin.']

title: Broccoli-Cauliflower-Carrot Medley
ingredients: ['1/2 head broccoli, chopped', '1/2 head cauliflower, sliced', '2 large carrots, sliced']
directions: ['Steam or boil until tender; drain water.']

title: Cracker Crumb Chicken
ingredients: ['1 pkg. boneless, skinless chicken', '1/2 stick butter, melted', '1 pkg. Town House crackers']
directions: ['Cut chicken in small 2 x 2-inch pieces.', 'Dip in butter; roll in cracker crumbs.', 'Place on cookie sheet lined with foil.', 'Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes, turning once.']

title: Peanut And Bacon Sandwich
ingredients: ['3/4 c. Peanut Butter', '1/4 c. Crisp Bacon', '8 slices of bread']
directions: ['Mix peanut butter and bacon well.', 'Spread on sandwich bread.']

title: Honey Carrots
ingredients: ['10 carrots, peeled and sliced', '4 Tbsp. margarine', '1/3 c. orange juice', '1/3 c. honey']
directions: ['Melt margarine in frying pan.', 'Add orange juice and honey. Toss in carrots until well coated.', 'Cover and simmer about 1 hour or until fork tender.']

title: Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice
ingredients: ['1 orange']
directions: ['Cut hole in top of orange or cut orange in half.', 'Squeeze into glass.', 'Take seeds out.', 'Makes 1 glass.']

title: Old Fashion Lemon Sherbet
ingredients: ['juice of 1 lemon', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', '1 c. cream, whipped']
directions: ['Mix and freeze in hand-cranked freezer.']

title: Caramel Flan
ingredients: ['3/4 c. sugar']
directions: ['Place sugar in a large, heavy skillet.', 'Cook over medium heat until sugar melts and forms a light brown syrup; stir to blend. Immediately pour syrup into a heated 8 1/4-inch round, shallow baking dish.', 'Holding dish with pot holders, quickly rotate to cover bottom and sides completely.', 'Set aside.', 'Preheat oven to 325°.']

title: Easy Scalloped Tomatoes
ingredients: ['1 large can chopped tomatoes', 'about 18 Krispy crackers, rolled', '1 tsp. sugar', '1/2 tsp. salt', 'pepper as desired']
directions: ['Combine and spread in buttered 8-inch square pan.', 'Dot top with butter and bake at 350° for about 3/4 hour.']

title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ["3 large bars Hershey's chocolate", '1 c. peanut butter', '1/2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Lightly grease 9 x 13 pan.', 'Melt chocolate in double broiler until melted.', 'Add peanut butter to chocolate until blended.', 'Pour into pan and let cool at room temperature completely.', 'Cut into pieces.', 'Enjoy!']

title: A Good Snack
ingredients: ['50 Club crackers', '1/2 c. nuts', '1/2 lb. butter', '1/2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Lay the crackers on a pan, then put 1/2 cup of nuts on top. Cook the butter and sugar for 2 minutes.', 'After the sauce comes to a boil, put the sauce on top of the crackers.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 minutes.']

title: My Favorite Snack:  Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['1 c. rice', '1 can evaporated milk', '1 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Get a pot.', 'Mix it all together.', 'Heat until mix thickens. Cool and serve.']

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ['1 c. grated extra sharp cheese', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1/2 c. chopped nuts', '1 Tbsp. grated onion']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together, forming into a ball.', 'Can be chilled overnight to blend flavors.', 'This recipe is easily doubled or more to make a larger batch.']

title: Margaret'S Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['5 Tbsp. rice, washed', '1 qt. milk', 'pinch of salt', '6 Tbsp. sugar', '2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients, except vanilla.', 'Bake at 325°.', 'Stir once in a while.', 'Add the vanilla when you take from oven.', 'Bake for 1 1/2 hours, or until thick.']

title: Mixed Vegetable Casserole
ingredients: ['1 large pkg. frozen mixed vegetables', '1 c. cheese, grated', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1 c. celery, chopped', '1 c. onion, chopped', '1 stick butter', '1 tube Ritz crackers, crumbled']
directions: ['Cook vegetables according to directions on package until just tender.', 'Put into a greased casserole.', 'Mix onion, celery, cheese and mayonnaise.', 'Spread over vegetables.', 'Melt butter; mix with cracker crumbs and sprinkle on top.', 'Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.']

title: Broiled Whole Lobster On Grill
ingredients: ['1 1/4 lb. lobster for each serving', 'melted butter']
directions: ['Broil over medium hot coals, turning from time to time, about 12 to 14 minutes.', 'Remove stomach and fill with melted butter. Serve on heated plates with melted butter and lemon juice.']

title: Egg In Toast
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 piece of bread', 'butter']
directions: ['Butter one side of the bread.', 'Make a hole in bread.', 'Place in pan.', 'Crack egg inside of hole.', 'Fry till egg is cooked.', 'Salt and pepper to taste']

title: Toad In Hole
ingredients: ['3 Tbsp. butter', '1 slice bread', '1 small egg']
directions: ['Melt butter in a small frying pan.', 'Using a biscuit cutter, cut a circle from center of bread slice.', 'Fry bread until brown and crisp on one side, then turn over and break egg into circle.', 'Fry over low heat until done.', 'Use fried bread round to dip into egg when served.']

title: Shrimp Gumbo
ingredients: ['chopped celery', 'chopped onion', 'can tomatoes', '2 cans shrimp', 'rice']
directions: ['Cook celery and onions with a can of tomatoes and the juice from the shrimp.', 'When celery is soft, add the shrimp.', 'Serve over rice.']

title: Tuna-On-Bun
ingredients: ['1 can tuna', '1 onion, chopped', '1/2 c. cheese', '1/4 c. mayonnaise']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together.', 'Put on bun and place in toaster oven until heated through and cheese melts.']

title: Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['tomatoes', '1 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. sugar']
directions: ['Wash and take out any bad spots.', 'Put tomatoes through Squeezo.', 'Cook juice until it boils. Strain the juice and add salt and sugar in quart jar. Process for 10 minutes.']

title: Chocolate Surprise Cake
ingredients: ['1 c. nuts', '1 c. coconut']
directions: ['Put in bottom of 9 x 13-inch pan.', 'Do not grease.']

title: Graham Cracker Pie
ingredients: ['16 graham crackers', '1/2 c. butter', '1/4 c. sugar']
directions: ['Crush graham crackers to form crumbs.', 'Combine remaining ingredients.', 'Reserve 1/4 cup.', 'Press remainder into 9-inch pie plate.']

title: Birds Nest(Easy)
ingredients: ['1 thick slice bread', '1 Tbsp. margarine', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Cut a hole in the middle of the piece of bread, large enough to contain the egg yolk.', 'Melt margarine in skillet and brown bread on one side.', 'Flip and carefully crack egg, dropping it into the hole so as not to break the yolk.', 'Cover skillet and simmer slowly until egg firms.']

title: Dave'S Good Ole' Egg Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 egg', '2 pieces bread', 'Kraft real mayonnaise', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Spray #5 skillet with Pam on medium heat.', 'Crack egg on edge of pan and slowly drop egg into pan.', 'Bust yolk with edge of spatula, be sure not to scramble the egg.', 'Add salt and pepper to taste.', 'When egg has firmed up, flip once.', 'When egg is done, put egg on a napkin to soak up any oil.', 'Spread mayonnaise on the 2 pieces of bread.', 'Put egg between the bread and enjoy.', 'Makes 1 serving.']

title: Watermelon Rind Preserves
ingredients: ['1 large ripe watermelon', 'sugar']
directions: ['After the red has been eaten, scrape out the pink down to the light pink color.', 'Peel off the rind and cut the other into strips, then into thinner strips.', 'Place in open pan with sugar (according to pear preserves recipe).', 'Cook until thickened into preserves. Spoon into jars while hot and seal.']

title: Easy Creamy Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '2/3 c. milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/4 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Boil sugar and milk until soft ball stage.', 'Remove from heat. Add vanilla and peanut butter; mix until creamy.']

title: Orange Honey Glazed Carrots
ingredients: ['1 - 1 pound bag frozen baby carrots', '3 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons honey', '1/4 cup orange juice', '1/4 cup sugar', 'salt to taste']
directions: ['Cook carrots in salt water until tender and drain.', 'Melt butter in skillet.', 'Add honey, orange juice, sugar and carrots.', 'Cook on medium head until carrots are glazed.']

title: Toasted Salted Coconut
ingredients: ['1 uncracked fresh coconut', 'Salt']
directions: ['Heat oven to 425°.', 'Pierce at least 1 eye of coconut with an ice pick or nail and hammer.', 'Drain liquid.', 'Bake coconut about 15 minutes, or until shell cracks.', 'Remove from oven.', 'When cool enough to handle, rap nut with a hammer to break open.', 'Pull meat away from shell; discard shell.', 'Working over a baking sheet and using a vegetable peeler, shave meat into long, thin strips. Separate shavings evenly over baking sheet.', 'Bake 30 to 40 minutes, tossing occasionally, until shavings are a light golden brown (shavings will not cook evenly;', 'some will brown, some will only have brown tips).', 'Remove from oven and pour onto a large sheet of wax paper.', 'Sprinkle hot coconut with salt.', 'Cool completely before storing in an airtight container. Yield:', 'About 8 cups.']

title: 1, 2, 3 Step Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix ingredients together.', 'Drop by spoonfuls on cookie sheet and bake until golden brown.']

title: Coffee Delight
ingredients: ['2 1/2 stacks Ritz crackers', '1 1/2 blocks butter, melted']
directions: ['Crush crackers into crumbs.', 'Mix crumbs and butter.', 'Press into ungreased 9 x 13-inch pan.', 'Bake 10 minutes at 350°; cool.']

title: Jello Salad
ingredients: ['1 box lime Jell-O', '1 small can crushed pineapple', '1 large carrot, grated']
directions: ['Mix Jell-O according to directions using 1/4 cup less water. Add undrained pineapple and grated carrot. Chill and serve.']

title: Barbecued Beef 'N Pork
ingredients: ['2 to 3 lb. each: pork and beef roasts', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Place both roasts in roaster; cook in a 325° oven for 3 to 4 hours, or until meat falls apart.', 'Make gravy out of drippings. Add your favorite barbecue sauce.', 'Add the beef and pork to it. Serve on buns.']

title: Unbelievable Cookieswestboro, Missouri
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1/2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together.', 'Drop by scant tsp. on a cookie sheet.', '(Be careful not to make them too large or they will burn on the bottom before the top is done)', 'Bake till lightly browned on top at 325° for 12 to 15 minutes.']

title: Hopple Popple
ingredients: ['1 medium potato', '1/4 chopped onion', '1/2 slice dried rye bread', '1 egg, beaten']
directions: ['Peel and dice potato; mix with onion and fry in bacon drippings.', 'Add salt and pepper and cubed bread until grease is absorbed.', 'Beat egg and pour slowly into skillet until cooked. Serve vegetables and salad or as a breakfast with toast or biscuits.', 'Can add ham or bacon chunks.']

title: Bacon Wands(Microwave)
ingredients: ['12 very thin bread sticks', '12 slices bacon']
directions: ['Wrap each bread stick with a bacon slice in a spiral.', 'Place 6 at a time on paper towel lined plate.', 'Cover with paper towel. Microwave 6 minutes on High or until bacon is crisp, turning once.']

title: P-Nut Butter Apples
ingredients: ['apple', 'peanut butter']
directions: ['Core the apple and stuff with peanut butter.', 'Cut into circles or eat whole.']

title: Chocolate Mounds
ingredients: ['2 sticks Margarine', '2 1/2 c. Nuts', '2 1/2 boxes Powdered Sugar', '2 14 oz. packages Coconut', '1 can Sweetened Condensed Milk', '1 Tbsp. Vanilla']
directions: ['Mix above ingredients. Shape into balls. Chill in refrigerator for 30 minutes.']

title: Chocolate Oatmeal Candy
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 stick margarine', '1/2 c. milk', '3 c. oatmeal', '3 Tbsp. chocolate', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Boil sugar, margarine and milk for 3 minutes.', 'Mix with remaining ingredients, then spread mixture in a 9-inch buttered pan.', 'Let cool and cut into squares.']

title: Tuna Rice And Cheese Bake
ingredients: ['1 c. cooked rice', '1 qt. milk', '1/3 lb. cheese', '1 small can tuna']
directions: ['Melt cheese in the milk; microwave or melt in a double boiler. Add tuna, flaked.', 'Bake at 300° to 350° for 1 hour.']

title: Microwave-Toasted Cheese Sandwiches
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Put 2 slices of bread into toaster.', 'Pull knob down.', 'When it pops up, put the bread on a plate.', 'Put 1 slice of cheese between the bread.', 'This makes the sandwich.', 'Then put it in the microwave for 15 seconds to melt the cheese.', "It's delicious!"]

title: Toad-In-The-Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '2 tsp. butter', '1 egg', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
directions: ['Heat skillet.', 'Butter 1 slice of favorite bread on both sides. Use the rim of a small juice glass to cut a hole in the middle of bread.', 'Put bread and "hole" in the skillet.', 'Break 1 egg and put it in the hole.', 'Add salt and pepper.', 'Turn bread when egg turns white, turn "hole" too.', 'Serve with "hole" as lid to cover "toad." Serve with orange or grape juice . Yields 1 serving.']

title: Banana Float
ingredients: ['1 c. ripe, sweet orange juice', '1 ripe banana']
directions: ['Blend at low speed.']

title: Eggy Thingys
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice bread', '1 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Heat 8-inch skillet on medium heat.', 'Lay bread on cutting board.', 'With 12 ounce glass, place on center of bread and twist until donut hole appears.', 'Now eat donut hole.', 'Butter bread (both sides).', 'Place in pan, crack 1 egg to pour into center of hole.']

title: Mom'S Winter Special
ingredients: ['4 c. cooked rice', 'sugar to taste', 'milk to cover']
directions: ['For many years a man watched his wife take a locked box down from the cupboard.', 'She would unlock the box, take a pinch, sprinkle it over whatever she was cooking, relock the box and return it to its place.', 'One day, while his wife was away, his curiosity got the best of him.', 'He went to the cupboard, took the box down and opened it.', 'To his surprise it was empty.', 'He turned it over and on the bottom was written the word "love".', 'Don\'t keep your "love" locked up in a cupboard.', 'Keep it within easy reach and use generously.', 'So into everything you cook, put a pinch of "love".']

title: Almond Candy Cookies
ingredients: ['1 can sweetened evaporated milk', '2 sq bitter chocolate', '3 c sweetened flaked coconut', '1 t vanilla', 'dash of salt']
directions: ['Mix evaporated milk and 2 squares of chocolate in saucepan, cook 5-6 minutes until chocolate is melted and mixture is thick and smooth.', 'Mix together coconut, vanilla and salt, blend very well.', 'Pour chocolate mixture over coconut mixture and blend well. Drop by teaspoonful on a cookie sheet covered with parchment paper.', 'Top each cookie with a whole almond.', 'Bake at 350 F for 10-12 minutes.', 'Check after 8 minutes.', 'Do not overcook.', 'Cookies should be soft but firm.', 'Cool completely.']

title: Sunshine Sipper
ingredients: ['1 qt. orange juice', '1 1/2 c. milk', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Pour orange juice in freezer container.', 'Freeze until slushy. Using a blender, add milk, sugar and vanilla.', 'Blend well.', 'Makes 4 to 6 servings.']

title: Kit Kat Bars
ingredients: ['Keebler Club crackers']
directions: ['Line a 13 x 9-inch pan with the crackers.', '(Separate them into individual squares, this way the crackers lay better in the pan.)']

title: Steven'S Peanut Butter Apple Treat
ingredients: ['1 medium to large apple', 'peanut butter']
directions: ['Peel, core and slice apple into eighths.', 'Spread peanut butter on one side of sliced apple and serve.', "Eat 'em up and enjoy!"]

title: Pineapple Tidbits
ingredients: ['1 lb. bacon, cut crosswise', '1 large can pineapple chunks, drained']
directions: ['Pat pineapple chunks dry on paper towel.', 'Wrap 1/2 piece bacon around chunk and secure with toothpick.', 'Place chunks in pan and broil in oven on 450° to 475° until bacon has browned.']

title: Easy Chocolate Frosting
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. butter', '2 sq. chocolate', '1/4 c. milk', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '1 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Melt together butter and chocolate.', 'Add milk, egg, sugar, vanilla.', 'Cook over slow heat to boiling, about 5 minutes.']

title: Cucumber Salad With Sour Cream
ingredients: ['1 big cucumber, sliced very thin']
directions: ['Two hours before serving, sprinkle it with salt.', 'Drain this brine when ready to make the salad.', 'Add parsley (cut fine), garlic (cut very fine), 1 sliced onion, 1 salad spoon of vinegar, 1 salad spoon of salad oil, 2 spoons of thick sour cream and then more salt and pepper to taste.']

title: Christine'S Baked Chicken
ingredients: ['chicken parts', 'butter pats', 'garlic powder', "Johnny's seasoning salt"]
directions: ['Wash cut up chicken parts and place in a shallow baking dish. Dot with pats of butter.', 'Sprinkle generously with seasonings. Bake at 375° for one hour or longer, until chicken is golden brown and falling off the bone.', 'A family favorite.']

title: Perfect Roast Chicken
ingredients: ['4 to 5 lb. chicken', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
directions: ['Heat oven to 450°.', 'Thoroughly rinse chicken inside and out. Season with salt and pepper.', 'Place chicken on roasting pan with shallow sides, no higher than one inch, and place in oven.', 'Bake 30 minutes.', 'Reduce heat to 400° and bake 15 to 25 minutes more, or until the thigh meat registers 160° on a meat thermometer. Remove chicken from oven and let stand 10 to 20 minutes before carving.', 'Serves 4 to 6.']

title: Panoramic Easter Egg(Great Project With Kids!)
ingredients: ['5 c. sugar', '1 egg white']
directions: ['Mix sugar and unbeaten egg white until thoroughly blended (consistency of wet sand).', "Wash plastic egg mold (large size that is divided lengthwise); dry carefully and dust with cornstarch to be sure it's completely dry.", 'Fill both halves of mold with sugar mixture and unmold gently onto breadboard.', 'Let dry until it is firm enough to handle, about 2 to 3 hours.']

title: Zucchini And Tomatoes
ingredients: ['1 medium onion', '2 medium zucchini, sliced', '1 can stewed tomatoes']
directions: ['Saute onions 5 minutes.', 'Add sliced zucchini.', 'Saute 5 minutes.', 'Add stewed tomatoes and 5 more minutes.', 'Turn into greased casserole dish and bake 15 minutes at 300°.', 'Put cheese on top and melt.']

title: Chicken Cacciatore
ingredients: ['2 1/2 to 3 lb. chicken', '1/2 c. olive oil', '1 finely sliced onion', '3 1/2 c. canned tomatoes', '2 cloves garlic', '1 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. pepper', '1/2 c. white wine']
directions: ['Brown chicken in oil.', 'Pour almost all of the oil off.', 'Add onion.', 'When soft, add tomatoes, garlic, salt and pepper.', 'Cover and simmer 45 minutes.', 'If not thickened, add a little cornstarch. Add wine the last 15 minutes.']

title: Secret Hot Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ['8 oz. unsweetened baking chocolate', '1 1/2 c. sugar', '1 c. evaporated milk', '4 Tbsp. butter', '1 1/2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Place chocolate, sugar and milk in a heavy saucepan over low heat.', 'Let melt, stirring occasionally.', 'When completely melted, remove from heat and stir in butter, 1 tablespoon at a time.', 'Add vanilla.', 'Serve warm.']

title: Impossible Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix ingredients together.', 'Form into small balls.', 'Dip into sugar, place on cookie sheet.', 'Press with fork to flatten. Bake 15 minutes at 325°.', 'Leave on cookie sheet for 5 minutes to hold together.']

title: Grandma Rother'S Sweet Rice For Two
ingredients: ['1/2 c. rice', '1 1/2 c. milk', 'sugar and cinnamon to taste', 'butter']
directions: ['To the rice stir in milk and cook in the top of a double boiler until milk is absorbed, approximately 1 hour, stirring occasionally.', 'Add sugar to taste and after putting in bowl, top with butter.', 'Sprinkle with cinnamon and sugar.']

title: Quick Kabobs
ingredients: ['banana', 'apple', 'melon', 'cheese', 'orange juice', 'coconut']
directions: ['Cut banana, apple, melon and cheese and put on wood skewer. Dip in orange juice and then coconut.', 'Eat!']

title: Barbecued Beef (Or Chicken)
ingredients: ['beef']
directions: ['Brown beef in a small amount of fat in a skillet.', 'Transfer meat to a casserole or roaster.']

title: Snack Club Crackers
ingredients: ['1 c. margarine', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 pkg. Club crackers', '1 c. chopped nuts']
directions: ['Spray cookie sheet generously with Pam.', 'Lay crackers flat and close together.', 'Cover cookie sheet with crackers.', 'Boil butter and sugar for 2 minutes (no more, no less).', 'Pour over crackers. Sprinkle with nuts.', 'Bake for 10 minutes at 350°.', 'Remove from pan and break apart.']

title: Tropical Juice
ingredients: ['1/4 c. cranberry juice', '1/4 c. pineapple juice', '1/4 c. orange juice', '1/4 c. apple juice']
directions: ['Combine juices.', 'Top with sliced orange and a cherry with a toothpick through them.']

title: 1-2-3 Fruit Dressing
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 egg, well beaten', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'juice of 1 lime', 'juice and grated peel of orange']
directions: ['Mix sugar, egg, juice of lemon and lime and juice and grated peel of orange.', 'Heat to boiling over medium heat, stirring constantly.', 'Boil for 1 minute.', 'Cool and refrigerate.']

title: Jello Graham Cracker Pie
ingredients: ['20 graham crackers', '5 Tbsp. melted margarine']
directions: ['Mix well and press into pie plate.']

title: Baked Cauliflower
ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower, cut up', '36 crumbled Ritz crackers', '1/2 c. melted margarine', 'yellow American cheese']
directions: ['Cook cauliflower until tender.', 'Place in 8-inch glass dish. Cover with slices of yellow American cheese.', 'Crumble on Ritz crackers.', 'Drizzle melted margarine over crackers.', 'Bake uncovered 30 minutes at 350°.']

title: Elegant Frosting
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. sugar', '1 c. evaporated milk and milk', '5 sq. unsweetened baking chocolate', '1/2 c. butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine sugar and milk in heavy saucepan; bring to boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat and simmer 6 minutes without stirring. Remove from heat; add chocolate. Stir to blend. Stir in butter and vanilla. Chill until mixture begins to thicken. Beat until thick and frost.']

title: Carrots And Bacon
ingredients: ['2 lb. carrots', '2 lb. smoked bacon']
directions: ['Wash and trim carrots; split into 2-inch lengths.', 'Wrap each carrot with 1 bacon half and secure with toothpick.', 'Wrap in tinfoil loosely and place on cookie sheet.', 'Bake at 350° until carrots and bacon are done.', 'Do not add water.']

title: Lemon Glaze
ingredients: ['1/4 c. sugar', 'juice of 1 lemon']
directions: ['Mix sugar and lemon juice until well mixed.']

title: Sauteed Zucchini
ingredients: ['3 strips bacon', '3 small zucchini', '1/2 c. diced onion', '1 clove minced garlic', '2 diced tomatoes']
directions: ['Cook bacon over medium heat until crispy; drain on paper towels.', 'Pour off all but 1 tablespoon fat.', 'Slice zucchini; add to hot fat.', 'Add onion and garlic.', 'Cook, stirring often, until soft, but not mushy.', 'Add tomatoes.', 'Cook for 2 minutes.', 'Serve with bacon crumbled over top.', 'Serves 4.']

title: Fish Patties
ingredients: ['4 crackers', '1 egg', '2 cans fish']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients and cook in skillet 5 minutes on each side.']

title: Simple Fudge
ingredients: ['1 c. milk', '3 Tbsp. chocolate', '1 Tbsp. butter', '2 c. sugar', '1 Tbsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix everything, except butter and vanilla.', 'Cook until it forms soft ball in water.', 'Take off stove; add butter and vanilla. Pecans, if desired, can be added now.', 'Stir until cool.', 'Pour into buttered dish.', 'Cut when cold.', 'Foolproof.']

title: Whole Roasted Garlic
ingredients: ['4 whole medium heads garlic', '1/4 c. olive oil']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees.', 'Remove outer skin from garlic and arrange right side up in an 8 X 8 X 2 pan.', 'Drizzle oil over garlic, letting it run between cloves.', 'Cover and bake 1 hour, basting occasionally.', 'Cool to serve.', 'Pull off cloves and gently squeeze paste onto bread.']

title: Old Fashioned Fudge
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', '2 squares chocolate', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix in saucepan the sugar, milk, baking chocolate and salt. Stir until mixture begins to boil.', 'Boil slowly to soft ball stage (236°).', 'Set pan in cold water and leave until cold.', 'Add butter and vanilla.', 'Beat mixture until it becomes thick and creamy. Pour into buttered tin and, when set, cut in squares.', 'This recipe is 50 years old.']

title: Grapefruit, Orange And Lemon Marmalade
ingredients: ['1 grapefruit', '1 orange', '1 lemon', 'sugar']
directions: ['In the afternoon', 'shave', 'the', 'fruit skins very thin and about an inch', 'long.', 'Break inside in pieces, taking out seeds and inner core.', 'Measure', 'and', 'to', '1\tpart', 'fruit, add 3 parts water.', 'Let stand overnight.', 'In the morning boil hard for ten minutes.', 'Then put', 'away until next morning.', 'Measure mixture, add 1 pound of sugar', 'to', 'each', 'pint.', 'There will be 6 or more pints according to size', 'of', 'fruit.', 'Place', 'on stove and boil hard for about 1 hour.', 'Do', 'not cover.', 'Test by cooling a few drops until it jells.']

title: Candied Popcorn
ingredients: ['1 c. milk', '2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Cook the milk and sugar until syrup spins a 4 to 6-inch thread.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Add cake coloring and pour over popped corn.']

title: Caramel Cake
ingredients: ['1 Duncan Hines butter cake mix']
directions: ['Prepare cake as directed on box.', 'Cool.']

title: Mock Chicken Divan
ingredients: ['1 cooked and deboned chicken', '2 cans broccoli and cheese soup', '1 1/2 c. milk', 'rice']
directions: ['Place deboned chicken in casserole dish.', 'Mix soup with milk. Pour over chicken.', 'Cook for about an hour at 350°.', 'Serve over rice.']

title: California-Style Blue Cheese Dressing
ingredients: ['1 c. mayonnaise', '1 c. Blue cheese, crumbled', '1/4 c. dry white wine', '1 Tbsp. onion, grated', '5 drops hot pepper sauce']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients.', 'Cover; chill at least 2 hours. Makes 1 2/3 cups.']

title: Amber Jam
ingredients: ['1 large orange', '1 lemon', '1 grapefruit', '1 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Wash, remove peel and cut peel into thin slices.', 'Add 1 quart water to peel; boil 5 minutes.', 'Drain; add 1 quart fresh water. Boil; repeat 3 more times.', 'Remove seeds and strings from fruits. Slice the fruit; add to boiling peel.', 'Add twice as much water as fruit mix; boil 40 minutes.', 'Add equal amount of sugar as fruit mix; boil now until thick and amber colored, usually about 25 minutes.']

title: For Two Pain Perdu
ingredients: ['1 egg', '3/4 Tbsp. sugar', '1/4 c. milk', 'few drops vanilla', '4 slices bread', '1/8 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Beat egg.', 'Add salt, sugar, milk and vanilla.', 'Pour into shallow dish and dip bread into mixture letting the bread absorb as much egg mixture as possible.', 'Arrange slices in greased pan and place in hot oven (400°) until dry and brown.', 'Serve with butter and honey.']

title: Corn Bread
ingredients: ['1 pan corn bread', 'bacon', 'onion', '2 cans tomatoes']
directions: ['Make pan of corn bread; let cool.', 'Fry bacon and onion and drain.', 'In a big bowl break up corn bread; add bacon and onion. Add tomatoes and mix well.', 'Put into baking dish.', 'Bake about 20 to 25 minutes in oven on about 350°.']

title: Broccoli Florentine
ingredients: ['1 lb. broccoli', '2 garlic cloves, sliced thin', '1/4 tsp. pepper', '2 Tbsp. olive oil', '1/4 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Remove and discard outer leaves and cut off tough ends of stalks from broccoli.', 'Split lengthwise heavy stalks over 1/2 inch thick.', 'Boil 2 inches of water in saucepan and add broccoli.', 'Cover pan, allowing water to form steam.', 'Cook 10 to 20 minutes or until broccoli is tender.', 'Do not overcook.']

title: Bacon-Tomato Dip
ingredients: ['1 lb. bacon, cut and fried, drain', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1 tomato, diced']
directions: ['Mix together.', 'Serve cold with rye crackers.']

title: Milk Frosting
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1 tsp. butter', '1/2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Melt butter in saucepan; add sugar and milk.', 'Stir; heat to boiling.', 'Boil about 10 more minutes.', 'Take from heat; beat until thick enough to spread, then add flavoring.', 'Pour over cake.']

title: Believe It Or Not Candies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients together.', 'Drop by teaspoon onto cookie sheets.', 'Press flat with fork.', 'Bake at 325° for 10 minutes.']

title: Peanut Butter Cookie Clusters
ingredients: ['1/8 tsp. salt', '2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1/2 c. butter', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '3 c. oatmeal']
directions: ['Place in saucepan the salt, sugar, milk and butter.', 'Boil one minute.', 'Remove from heat and add the peanut butter and vanilla. Stir until smooth. Add the oatmeal and mix well.', 'Cool until mixture begins to hold its shape.', 'Drop by teaspoonful on waxed paper.', 'Cookies harden as they cool.']

title: Rice Croquettes
ingredients: ['1 c. rice, cooked', '2 Tbsp. milk', '1 tsp. salt', '1 egg', '1 Tbsp. sugar', '1 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['You will need:', '3/4 bushel fresh red chile, string or twine and sisal rope.']

title: Eggs In A Whole
ingredients: ['bread', 'margarine', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Use a glass or anything round to cut a circle out of center of slice of bread.', 'Melt margarine in frypan.', 'Put bread and center cut out in hot butter.', 'Break and cut out in hot butter.', 'Break an egg into center of cut out bread slice.', "Salt and pepper to taste. Don't break yellow of egg.", 'Brown on both sides.', 'May need to add more butter when flipping over.']

title: Uncooked Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['12 oz. peanut butter', '1/2 c. butter', '1 lb. 10x sugar', '1 egg', '2 Tbsp. milk']
directions: ['Melt peanut butter and margarine on low; stir constantly. Remove from heat; add egg, sugar and milk.', 'Mix together with your hands until smooth.', 'Place in 8 x 8-inch buttered pan for thick fudge.', 'Place in 15 x 10-inch buttered pan for thinner fudge.', 'I prefer the thinner.', 'Refrigerate.']

title: Pizza
ingredients: ['2 lb. rice', '2 lb. cheese']
directions: ['Mash with hands and put on pizza pan.']

title: Grilled Toast With Cheese
ingredients: ['10 slices bread', '10 slices cheese', 'butter']
directions: ['In a large frying pan, melt 1 tablespoon of butter.', 'Place 2 slices of bread in pan.', 'Let brown; turn over.', 'On side facing up place one slice of cheese.', 'When other side is brown, put both slices together to form a sandwich.', 'Repeat for each sandwich.']

title: E.S.P. Cookies
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Mix together and drop by teaspoonfuls on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes.', 'Makes 2 1/2 dozen cookies. Add chocolate or butterscotch chips, if desired.']

title: Instant Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 egg']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325°.', 'Put peanut butter, sugar, vanilla and egg in mixing bowl.', 'Stir until well mixed.', 'Drop by rounded teaspoons onto cookie sheet.', 'Space 2-inches apart.', 'Bake for 10 to 13 minutes.']

title: Tuna Roll-Ups
ingredients: ['1 loaf frozen bread dough', '2 cans tuna, drained', '3 Tbsp. minced onion', '1/2 tsp. salt', 'dash of pepper', 'minced celery']
directions: ['Roll bread dough out on floured board.', 'Brush with melted butter.', 'Combine remaining ingredients.', 'Spread evenly over dough. Roll up like jelly roll and cut into 8 slices.', 'Put slices, cut side up, on greased cookie sheet.', 'Let rise for several hours. Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes, until bread is golden brown.']

title: Cauliflower And Broccoli Salad
ingredients: ['bunch broccoli', '1 onion, chopped', '1 head cauliflower']
directions: ['Cut broccoli and cauliflower into bite-size pieces.', 'Add onion.', 'Then coat with following dressing.']

title: Chicken Volcano
ingredients: ['small roasting chicken', '1 Tbsp. margarine', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Rub', 'a small roasting chicken with a generous amount of margarine.\tSeason\tit', 'liberally with salt and pepper.', 'Place the chicken', 'in', 'a', 'pouch', 'made', 'from\tseveral thicknesses of heavy-duty\taluminum', 'foil.', 'Insert', 'a clean hot volcanic rock into the', 'cavity of the bird.', 'Make sure the rock is as hot as it can', 'be.', 'Crimp the edges of the foil shut.', 'Wrap the pouch in', '20 thicknesses of newspaper for insulation.', 'Put the whole package in a heavy paper bag.\tLeave for 3 hours and serve.']

title: Guess Again Carrots
ingredients: ['2 lb. carrots', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1 medium onion, grated', '6 to 8 oz. sharp Cheddar, grated', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/8 tsp. pepper']
directions: ['Pare, slice and boil carrots until tender.', 'Mash; add butter, cheese, salt, pepper and onion.', 'Place in buttered 1-quart casserole.', 'Sprinkle 1 cup buttered Ritz crackers, crushed.', 'Bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes.']

title: Brass And Copper Cleaner
ingredients: ['juice of 1 lemon', '1 tsp. salt dissolved in lemon']
directions: ['Brush on with toothbrush.', 'Let set 2 hours.', 'Wash off with water.', 'Buff with steel wool.', 'Coat with acrylic lacquer or tongue oil.']

title: Christmas Cake
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1/2 c. orange juice']
directions: ['Prepare first.', 'Combine the sugar and orange juice.', 'Heat until completely cooked and simmer for 20 minutes.']

title: Five Cup Salad
ingredients: ['1 c. canned salmon, well drained', '1 c. chopped celery', '1 c. shredded carrots', '1 c. mayonnaise']
directions: ['Mix all together. Let chill in refrigerator for 1 hour. Serve with bread, crackers or Chinese noodles. Makes 8 servings.']

title: Honey-Glazed Carrots
ingredients: ['4 large carrots, cut diagonally', '3 Tbsp. honey', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['In a medium saucepan, bring carrots, honey and 1 cup water to a boil.', 'Reduce heat to low; cover with lid slightly ajar and simmer until water is evaporated and carrots are tender, stirring occasionally.', 'Season with salt and pepper.']

title: Peanut Butter Clouds
ingredients: ['1 egg white', 'dash of salt', '6 Tbsp. sugar', '1/4 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['In a small bowl, beat egg white and salt until soft peaks form.', 'Gradually beat in sugar, beating until stiff peaks form. With a rubber spatula or spoon, work in peanut butter.', 'Drop mixture from teaspoon 1-inch apart on greased cookie sheet.', 'Bake at 325° for 18 minutes or until lightly browned.', 'Cool slightly before removing from sheet.', 'Yields 12.']

title: Perfect Roasted Garlic
ingredients: ['6 heads garlic', '12 tsp. olive oil']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Remove the outer layer of skin from 1 to 6 heads of garlic.', 'Cut 1/2 inch off from each head straight across top and arrange in a shallow baking pan.', 'Drizzle 2 teaspoons olive oil over each head, letting it run between the cloves.', 'Cover with foil and bake 30 minutes.', 'Remove foil and bake 30 to 45 minutes, until garlic is tender when pierced with a toothpick.', 'Cool slightly.']

title: Cheesy Ghost On Toast
ingredients: ['1 slice white American cheese', '1 slice bread']
directions: ['Toast 1 slice of bread.', 'With butter knife, cut 1 slice of cheese into a ghostly shape.', 'Use straw to cut out eyes.', 'Place cheesy ghost on top of toast.', 'Then enjoy.']

title: Fruit Concentrate
ingredients: ['3 pkg. orange Kool-Aid', '2 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid', '4 small cans orange juice', '1 large can unsweetened pineapple juice', '3 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in a large gallon jug or jar.', 'Store in refrigerator.', 'Use 1 cup of mix to 3 cups of water.', 'Children love this one!']

title: Lena'S Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['3 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', '1 stick margarine', '3/4 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Boil sugar, milk and margarine until it will form a soft ball in ice water.', 'Remove from heat and add peanut butter.', 'Beat until thick and creamy.', 'Pour into greased 9 x 13-inch dish or pan.', 'Cool for 1 hour, then cut into squares.']

title: Bus Driver Drink
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1/2 c. milk', '1/2 c. orange juice', '1/2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients in the blender until frothy.', 'Drink on the way to the school bus.']

title: Banana Spice Pancakes And Whipped Honey Butter
ingredients: ['1/2 c. butter', '1/4 c. honey']
directions: ['Whip or beat butter; mix in honey.', 'Chill.']

title: Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ['1 carton small curd cottage cheese', '1 cucumber, diced', '1 tomato, peeled and diced']
directions: ['Mix cottage cheese with cucumber and tomato.', 'Mix well and serve.']

title: Ellie'S Chocolate Milk
ingredients: ['milk', 'chocolate']
directions: ['Pour milk in your cup.', 'Stir in your chocolate.']

title: Coconut Crust (9-Inch)
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. coconut', '2 Tbsp. soft butter']
directions: ['Spread butter on bottom and sides of an 8 or 9-inch pie pan. Sprinkle coconut and press evenly into the butter.', 'Bake in a preheated 300° oven for 15 to 20 minutes or until brown.', 'Fill with cream filling.']

title: Cheese Appetizers
ingredients: ['4 oz. sharp Cheddar, grated', '1/4 tsp. minced onion', '1/8 tsp. sugar', '1 1/2 tsp. butter', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 1/2 strips bacon']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together to make a paste. Trim the crust off 3 pieces of bread. Butter lightly and make 3 slices of each piece. Slice bacon strips in half. Spread cheese mixture on bread and roll with bacon on outside. Hold together with 2 toothpicks. Cut each in half between the toothpicks. Broil until browned on one side, turn and brown other side. Makes 18 yummy appetizers!']

title: Easy Drop Cookies
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '2/3 c. milk', '24 soda crackers, crumbled', '6 Tbsp. peanut butter']
directions: ['Combine sugar and milk in saucepan.', 'Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture boils.', 'Stir in crackers and peanut butter.', 'When well blended, drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes.', 'Yields 4 dozen.']

title: Cream Of Broccoli Soup
ingredients: ['1 pkg. frozen chopped broccoli, partially thawed', '1 envelope Lipton chicken noodle soup', '3 1/2 c. milk']
directions: ['Combine and cook gently until done.', 'Add 8 ounces shredded cheese with 1 tablespoon flour.', 'Simmer and serve.']

title: Ritz Cracker Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. evaporated milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', '6 rounded Tbsp. peanut butter', '21 Ritz crackers, crushed into powder']
directions: ['Heat sugar and evaporated milk over low heat three minutes. Remove from heat.', 'Add vanilla, peanut butter and cracker crumbs. Pour into buttered 9-inch square pan.', 'Cool.', 'Cut into squares.']

title: Microwave Carrots
ingredients: ['carrots']
directions: ['The easiest way to cook carrots is to scrape them first, then toss into a 1 gallon size plastic food bag. Place bag on plate. Microwave on High for about 6 minutes. Cool slightly.', 'Remove from bag, slice or serve whole.']

title: White Bread
ingredients: ['2 1/4 c. lukewarm milk', '3 Tbsp. sugar', '1 Tbsp. salt', '2 pkg. yeast, dissolved']
directions: ['Dissolve 2 packages yeast in 1 cup warm liquid; stir until well mixed.', 'Add 2 tablespoons soft shortening and 7 to 7 1/ 2 cups Gold Medal flour, adding flour in 2 additions, using the amount necessary to make easy to handle.', 'Knead dough and let rise until double in bulk.', 'Knead and let rise again.', 'Work into loaves and let rise again.', 'Bake in 425° oven until golden brown, about 30 minutes.']

title: Cran-Orange Punch
ingredients: ['1 gal. cranberry juice', '1 gal. orange juice']
directions: ['Mix juice and serve over ice cream.', 'A sprig of fresh mint completes this beverage.', 'Yield:', '2 gallons.']

title: Easy Grilled Cheese
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Put the bread in the toaster, when it pops up put the cheese on it, then put it in the microwave for about 30 seconds.']

title: Quick Tuna Dip
ingredients: ['1 can tuna', '1 container French onion dip']
directions: ['Mix one can of tuna (drained) with 1 container of French onion dip.', 'Serve with chips or crackers.', 'Better when chilled.']

title: Easy Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['1 qt. milk', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 Tbsp. butter', '1 c. rice', 'pinch of salt', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients and bake 1 hour in 350° oven.']

title: Mary Ella Paige'S Apple Frosting
ingredients: ['1 c. granulated sugar', '1 egg white', '1 large raw apple, peeled and scraped into pulp']
directions: ['Combine in a 1-quart bowl and beat on 3/4 speed until stiff. If no beater is available, a fork may be used, with the ingredients on a pie plate.', 'This takes about 20 minutes or until the fork will stand upright in the piled up frosting.', 'Will frost a 2 layer cake and should be eaten the same day it is made.']

title: Caramel King
ingredients: ['3 c. sugar', '1 c. evaporated milk', '1 stick butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Brown 1/4 cup of the 3 cups of sugar.', 'Mix milk and remaining sugar.', 'Bring to a slow boil.', 'Add brown syrup slowly.', 'Bring to a boil and cook until it forms a hard ball in water.', 'Beat; add butter and flavoring.']

title: Holiday Jello
ingredients: ['1 pkg. lime Jell-O']
directions: ['Put in pan and let set.']

title: Granny'S Chicken Noodle Soup
ingredients: ['1 can chicken noodle soup']
directions: ['Will also need 1 small pot, 1 can opener, 1 bowl and 1 spoon.']

title: Seven Layer Salad
ingredients: ['1 c. mayonnaise', '1/3 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix together mayonnaise and sugar, being sure to mix well. Set aside.']

title: Piquant Fish
ingredients: ['2 - 3 pieces of orange Roughy']
directions: ['Place fish in cold water and lemon juice for a few minutes. Place fish in a baking dish.', 'Pour sauce (recipe to follow) over fish coating very well.', 'Bake at 500° for 10', 'minutes or until flaky.']

title: Curd And Onion Chutney
ingredients: ['1 big onion, sliced finely', '1 tomato', '1 c. yogurt', 'salt']
directions: ['Slice onion and tomato.', 'Add yogurt and enough salt; mix well. Serve with the Biryani.', 'One small finely chopped chili may be added to this and mixed well.']

title: My Favorite Snack:  Peanut Butter Coffee
ingredients: ['peanut butter', 'bread', 'coffee']
directions: ['You toast the bread.', 'Then you put peanut butter on the bread. Then make the coffee. Then, dip the peanut butter bread in the coffee and taste.', 'Enjoy!']

title: My Sister'S Cucumber Dip
ingredients: ["large container of Hood's Small Curd Cottage Cheese", 'Garlic Salt', 'small chunks of Cucumber']
directions: ["Mix a large container of Hood's small curd Cottage Cheese with a sprinkling of Garlic Salt and several chunks of Cucumbers.", 'Bring out the potato chips and watch it disappear.']

title: Crispy Fried Chicken
ingredients: ['chicken pieces', 'melted margarine', 'finely crushed equal parts crackers and cornflakes', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Dip raw pieces of chicken', 'into', 'melted margarine, then roll in crumbs.', 'Place in well oiled, 9 x 13-inch baking dish, laying pieces side by side, not', 'crowding.', 'Sprinkle with salt and pepper.', 'Bake at 350° for an hour', 'or', 'until meat is brown and tender.']

title: Peanut Butter Eggs
ingredients: ['8 oz. peanut butter', '8 oz. margarine', '1 lb. box 10x sugar']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients until blended.', 'Use heavy-duty mixer. When soft dough is formed, refrigerate overnight.', 'Cut in 8 equal portions.', 'Makes 8 (4 ounce) eggs.']

title: Quick Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Toast bread in toaster.', 'Place cheese on bread; top with second piece of bread.', 'Place on paper plate.', 'Microwave on High for 15 to 20 seconds, or until cheese melts.', 'Makes 1 serving.']

title: Hot Punch
ingredients: ['3 cans cranberry juice', '2 cans pineapple juice', '1 bottle apple juice']
directions: ['Pour juices in a 36 cup coffee maker.', 'In basket, put 2 cinnamon sticks and a few red hots.', 'Let it perk.']

title: Mikey'S Cheesy Tost
ingredients: ['a piece of bread', '1 slice of cheese']
directions: ['Tost bread, a peace of cheese on tost on for sauce.', 'Put tost in microwave.', 'Heat for 24 seconds or until cheese is melted.']

title: O.J. Flip
ingredients: ['2 c. orange juice', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. yogurt', '1 to 3 tsp. honey']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in the blender and mix well.']

title: "Easy Ice Cream"
ingredients: ['1 c. whole milk', '3 Tbsp. sugar', '1/4 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine in a sandwich size plastic bag. Seal the "Ziploc" bag so there is a minimal amount of air trapped inside the bag. Shake the bag for 5 seconds to blend the contents. Place the sandwich bag in a gallon size plastic bag that is halfway full of ice. Add 1/3 cup of table salt or rock salt to the gallon bag. Seal the "Ziploc" gallon bag. Shake and/or roll the gallon bag on a table until the mixture reaches the consistency of Dairy Queen ice cream, approximately 10 minutes. Remove the sandwich bag. Rinse the sandwich bag in cold water until the salt is removed from the outside of the bag. Eat and enjoy the ice cream.']

title: Unbelievable Quick Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix well.', 'With 1 tablespoon mixture. shape into balls.', 'Bake at 350° until done.', "Take from oven; push Hershey's Kiss into center and let cool."]

title: Haystacks
ingredients: ['12 oz. milk chocolate', '12 oz. coconut']
directions: ['Melt chocolate in double boiler.', 'Add coconut, stirring until coconut is completely covered.', 'Spoon onto wax paper or greased cookie sheet.', 'Cool completely.']

title: Salmon And Cucumber
ingredients: ['1 tin salmon', 'mayonnaise', '1 large English cucumber']
directions: ['Remove the skin and bones from the salmon; mix together with mayonnaise to taste.', 'Slice the cucumber into 3/4-inch slices and with a sharp paring knife make a shallow indentation in each slice.', 'Top each slice with salmon.']

title: Hot Turkey Salad
ingredients: ['2 c. turkey, cubed', '2 c. celery, cut fine', '2 Tbsp. onion, cut fine', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 c. mayonnaise']
directions: ['Mix well.', 'Put in casserole and cover with 1/2 cup buttered bread crumbs.', 'Bake 30 minutes at 350°.']

title: Unbelieveables
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Mix all the ingredients together in a bowl.', 'Drop small balls onto an ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Press down lightly with a fork.', 'Cook for 8 to 10 minutes, then enjoy!']

title: Edible Clay
ingredients: ['1 c. honey', '1 c. peanut butter', '2 c. dry powdered milk']
directions: ['Mix and knead well.', "Shape to heart's content.", 'Then eat your project!']

title: Caramel Popcorn
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '3 Tbsp. margarine']
directions: ['Cook until brown.', 'Pour over popped corn and mix.', 'If not crisp, bake in slow oven at 250°.', 'Extra delicious!']

title: German Pancakes
ingredients: ['1/2 c. milk', '1 egg', 'dash of salt', '1 Tbsp. sugar', '1/4 stick butter']
directions: ['This is best if cooked in cast-iron skillet.', 'Heat oven and pan to 425°.']

title: Zucchini And Cheese Broil
ingredients: ['sliced raw zucchini', 'melted butter', 'garlic powder', 'Feta cheese']
directions: ['Place zucchini in casserole.', 'Put melted butter on top. Sprinkle garlic powder on and top with Feta cheese.', 'Put under broiler until cheese melts and browns slightly.']

title: Dad'S Microwave Grilled Cheese
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Toast bread in toaster. Then put toasted bread on plate and place cheese on one slice of the bread.', 'Cover with other slice of toasted bread.', 'Place in microwave for 15 to 20 seconds or until cheese is melted.', 'Yields 1 serving.']

title: Quick And Easy Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Mix.', 'Make into balls.', 'Put on cookie sheet.', 'Mash with a fork.', 'Bake.', 'Cookies should be done in eight minutes.']

title: Chocolate Chip Sandwich Cookies
ingredients: ['Duncan Hines cookie mix']
directions: ['Prepare cookies and bake as directed on cookie mix.']

title: Fried Chicken Of Arles
ingredients: ['1 chicken, cut up', '1/4 c. olive oil', '1 c. dry white wine', '4 tomatoes, peeled and seeded', '2 whole cloves garlic', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Cut up the chicken and brown the pieces on all sides in hot oil.', 'Remove chicken and deglaze the pan by pouring the wine into it and, with a wooden spoon over medium heat, rubbing down all the good brown substances into the liquid in the skillet.', 'Then add the tomatoes and garlic.', 'Simmer until this sauce is somewhat reduced.', 'Season with salt and pepper to taste.']

title: Christmas Day Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['1 qt. milk', '1 c. rice', '1 c. sugar', '2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Boil all ingredients together for 2 hours.', 'Add cinnamon and raisins after pudding cools.']

title: Cookie Or Brownie Icing
ingredients: ['1 box 4x powdered sugar', '1 stick butter, softened', '3 Tbsp. milk', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together until there are no lumps left. Add food coloring, sprinkles, chocolate chips or whatever you desire and frost.', 'After use, refrigerate.']

title: Hot Peanut Butter Sauce
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. cream', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/4 stick butter']
directions: ['Put cream, peanut butter and sugar on medium heat and boil 1 minute.', 'Remove from heat and add vanilla and butter.', 'This is especially good by itself or to use over cake or ice cream.']

title: Quick Coconut Crust
ingredients: ['1/4 c. butter, melted', "2 c. Baker's coconut"]
directions: ['Mix butter and coconut.', 'Press evenly in 9-inch pie pan. Bake in a slow oven (300°) until light brown, 30 to 35 minutes or brown coconut mixture lightly in skillet for 7 to 8 minutes, stirring constantly.', 'Press evenly in a pie pan.', 'Fill cooled crust with ice cream, a cream or chiffon filling.']

title: "Great" Grandma'S Dessert
ingredients: ['1 can Eagle Brand condensed milk']
directions: ['In large pan, boil the can (unopened) of condensed milk for 3 hours.', 'Make sure can is completely covered with water the entire 3 hours.']

title: Delicious Broiled Trout
ingredients: ['1 trout', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Cover the broiler pan with aluminum foil.', 'Remove the head of the fish.', 'Cut down the backbone to open the fish.', 'Wash and dry the opened trout thoroughly.', 'Turn the oven to broil and place the trout, skin side down, on the broiler pan.', 'Season with salt and pepper and broil 5 minutes, 3 inches from the heat.', 'Baste with melted butter seasoned with salt and pepper.', 'Broil 10 minutes longer or until trout is dry and flaky.', 'Serve with tartar sauce or horseradish mixture and ketchup.']

title: Pickled Cauliflower
ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower', '1 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Break cauliflower into florets.', 'Place in a bowl and sprinkle with salt.', 'Cover and let stand 2 hours.', 'After 2 hours, rinse cauliflower and dry well.']

title: Macaroons
ingredients: ['1 bag coconut', '1 can Eagle Brand milk', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix together ingredients.', 'Drop by teaspoonfuls onto greased and floured cookie sheet.', 'Bake 10 to 15 minutes or until lightly brown.', 'Remove from sheet immediately.']

title: Easy Baked Turkey
ingredients: ['10 to 13 lb. turkey', 'margarine', 'salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 500°.', 'Season turkey with margarine and salt. Place in a roasting pan with a good fitting lid.', 'Add 8 cups of hot water.', 'Place turkey in oven, making sure lid is on good.', 'After oven has again reached 500°, bake for 1 hour.', 'Turn oven off and do not open oven door until the next morning.', '(I usually start mine at 8 p.m. and open oven door next morning at 6 a.m.)', 'This is very easy and the meat is very tender and moist.']

title: Mac And Cheese
ingredients: ['1 box any brand mac and cheese']
directions: ['Boil water.', 'Put noodles in pot.', 'Cook for 8 minutes or until tender.', 'Drain.', 'Return noodles to pot.', 'Add the can of cheese to noodles; mix well.', 'Makes about 4 servings.']

title: Chicken
ingredients: ['chicken', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['First you have to kill the chicken.', 'Then you have to take the feathers off the chicken.', 'Now, you put the chicken in the oven for hours.', 'Cook at 25 degrees.', 'After the chicken is done, put salt and pepper on it and eat.']

title: Mater Sandwich Extrodinaire
ingredients: ['fresh tomato', 'fresh loaf bread']
directions: ['Take two pieces of fresh loaf bread.', 'Spread with regular mayonnaise liberally, but not excessive, on one side of each piece of bread.', 'Gather a fresh tomato from the garden in season, remove peel and radially slice, beginning from the bottom side, in slices approximately 3/8-inch thick.', 'Cover one piece of bread, mayonnaise side, with tomato slice or slices being careful to remove any hard spots that may exist in tomato.', 'Apply salt and pepper to tomato slices to suit individual taste.']

title: Unbelieveable Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 egg, slightly beaten', '1 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. chunk-style peanut butter']
directions: ['Beat the egg slightly in a bowl.', 'Add the sugar, peanut butter and vanilla and beat together until smooth. Drop by teaspoon on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in a slow oven at 325° for 20 minutes or until nicely brown.', 'Makes about 40 cookies.']

title: Pecan Cookie Bars
ingredients: ['40 graham crackers', '2 sticks butter', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. nuts']
directions: ['Melt butter slow and stir in sugar and vanilla.', 'Let boil for 2 minutes.', 'Stir in pecans.', 'Pour over graham crackers in lined pan.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 minutes.', 'Take off foil immediately or they will stick.']

title: Low Carb Hollandaise With Steamed Asparagus
ingredients: ['2 lb. asparagus']
directions: ['Steam the asparagus and set aside.']

title: Candy Bar Pie
ingredients: ['1 1/3 c. coconut', '2 Tbsp. melted butter']
directions: ['Mix together and press into a pie pan.', 'Bake at 325° for 10 minutes.']

title: K & B'S Famous Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '2 pieces Kraft cheese', 'butter']
directions: ['Set oven at broil.', 'Take one slice of bread and put butter on one side of it.', 'Lay, butter side down, on a cookie sheet, then take both slices of cheese (unwrapped) and put them on the bread. directions: ["That I'm not among the dead.", "Though I'm getting more forgetful and mixed up in the head.", "I got use to my arthritis, to my dentures I'm resigned.", "I can manage my bifocals, but gosh I miss my mind, for sometimes I can't remember, when I stand at the foot of the stairs, if I must go up for something or have I just come down from there? And before the fridge so often, my poor mind is filled with doubt have I just put food away or have I come to take some out?"]
