Beat until cooled and spreading consistency.']

title: Fried Rice
ingredients: ['3 c. cooked rice', '5 slices bacon', '2 carrots, grated', '1/4 c. onion, chopped', 'salt to taste']
directions: ['While rice is cooking, fry the bacon and remove from skillet. Saute the grated carrots and chopped onion.', 'Crumble the bacon. Add bacon and sauteed vegetables to cooked rice.', 'Mix ingredients together and salt to taste.']

title: Fried Pork And Beans
ingredients: ['1 medium onion, chopped', '1 can pork and beans', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Brown onion in 2 tablespoons Crisco oil.', 'Add beans.', 'Salt and pepper to taste.', 'Cook over low heat for 10 minutes.']

title: Peanut Butter Crisscrosses
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together.', 'With floured hands, roll into balls.', 'Smash them with a fork.', 'Bake at 350° on greased cookie sheet for 10 minutes.']

title: Beef And Rice
ingredients: ['1 pkg. beef', '1 box Minute rice', '1 large onion', '1 large pepper']
directions: ['Cook beef until done.', 'Cook onion and pepper with beef.', 'Put rice in pot.', 'Cook on low heat until done.', 'Salt and pepper to your taste.']

title: Zucchini Surprise
ingredients: ['1 medium zucchini', '1 medium onion', '1 large can tomatoes', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Clean and wash vegetables. Chop.', 'Cook zucchini until half done.', 'Add onion, tomatoes and season to taste.', 'Cook until done. Serve.']

title: Irish Potato Candy
ingredients: ['1 small cooked potato', '1 lb. box 10x sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', 'peanut butter']
directions: ['Cook potato and mash until smooth.', 'Add sugar, a little at a time.', 'When heavy enough to knead, add vanilla.', 'Knead in the sugar.']

title: Hot Cocoa
ingredients: ['a full spoon of milk', '2 oz. sugar', '1 oz. salt', '5 oz. chocolate']
directions: ['Put it in a pot and turn it on.', 'Let it get hot to where the sugar goes down to the bottom and melts.']

title: Carrots In Orange Juice
ingredients: ['1 lb. carrots', 'orange juice']
directions: ['Grate on fine grater one pound of carrots.', 'Sprinkle with 2 to 4 teaspoons of sugar.', 'Add orange juice as needed to moisten. Some carrots need more orange juice than others and more or less sugar added to taste.']

title: Family Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['2 qt. milk', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. rice', 'pinch of salt', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in baking dish; stir lightly.', 'Bake in 325° oven for 1 hour or until rice is tender, stirring twice.']

title: Perfect Yogurt(Makes 2 Quarts)
ingredients: ['2 qt. milk', '2 Tbsp. yogurt']
directions: ['Heat the milk to 176°.', 'Cover; turn off heat.', 'Wait 10 minutes.', 'Turn heat on for 45 seconds.', 'Turn heat off; wait 10 minutes.', 'Turn into a heavy casserole dish, a crock-pot or Dutch oven.', 'Cool milk to between 105° and 115°.', 'Stir in the yogurt from the store.', 'It must be the kind with live cultures.', 'Cover the pot; wrap in 2 bath towels.', 'Keep at 90° for 3 to 6 hours. Remove towels.', 'Put yogurt in fridge overnight to set.']

title: No Flour Peanut Cookie
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together.', 'Use teaspoon at a time to drop onto cookie sheet.', 'Flatten with fork.', 'Bake at 375° for 15 minutes. Let cool before taking out of pan.']

title: Weight Watchers Layered Pie
ingredients: ['8 graham crackers, crushed into crumbs', '1/4 c. low calorie margarine']
directions: ['Mix together.', 'Press into pie pan and bake for 10 minutes at 350°.', 'Cool.']

title: Lo-Cal Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices 40 calorie bread, toasted', '2 tsp. peanut butter', '1/2 banana']
directions: ['Smear peanut butter on toast.', 'Make it very thin. Slice banana thin and put', 'on', 'top of peanut butter.', 'Put thin layer of peanut butter on other', 'slice', 'of bread and place on top of bananas.']

title: Leo'S Favorite
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Mix all ingredients well.', 'Form into small balls and place on ungreased cookie sheet 2 inches apart. Press with a fork until flat.', 'Cook exactly 10 minutes.']

title: Shish Kabob "Russian Style"
ingredients: ['2 lb. lamb', 'pepper', 'sliced onion', 'white wine']
directions: ['Cut lamb into squares.', 'Pour into big bowl.', 'Cover, or mix with sliced onion and pepper, then soak in the white wine.', 'On the next day, you may put it into the grill.', 'Soaking lamb should be stored in refrigerator overnight.']

title: Strawberry Cheese Cake
ingredients: ['20 graham crackers', '1/2 stick margarine, melted', '1/4 c. sugar']
directions: ['Crumble graham crackers.', 'Add sugar and butter and press into pie pan about 12 inches in size.']

title: Chicken And Beer
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken', '1 can beer', 'sprinkle garlic powder', 'sprinkle celery seed', '1 onion', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Put cut up chicken and sliced onion in pan.', 'Let cook for 30 minutes.', 'Add beer, spices, salt and pepper.', 'Cook for 30 minutes more at 375°.']

title: Waverlies
ingredients: ['1 stick margarine', '1 stick real butter', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. chopped nuts']
directions: ['Bring to boil the margarine, butter and sugar for 3 minutes. Remove from heat and add vanilla and nuts.', 'Have cookie sheet lined with Waverly crackers and quickly drizzle mixture over crackers.', 'Work quickly.', 'Bake 7 to 8 minutes at 300°.', 'Watch closely and do not burn.']

title: Yummy Zucchini
ingredients: ['2 medium zucchini, sliced thinly', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 stick margarine', '6 slices bread, broken up', 'milk', 'salt and pepper', 'dash of sugar']
directions: ['Put sliced zucchini and onion in large skillet with melted margarine.', 'Saute until zucchini is transparent.', 'While it is cooking, break bread in bowl and cover with milk.', 'Add bread to zucchini and season.', 'Simmer for 15 to 20 minutes, until blended. Serve as side dish with any meat entree.']

title: Kelly'S Graham Cracker Cookies
ingredients: ['1 1/2 packages of Graham Crackers from box', '3/4 c. granulated sugar', '2 sticks margarine', '1 c. finely chopped nuts']
directions: ['Line long baking pan with foil.', 'Lay graham crackers on foil.', 'Melt margarine with sugar and boil (full) for 2 minutes or until the mixture changes color.', 'Pour over crackers and sprinkle chopped nuts over this.', 'Bake 10 minutes at 325°.', 'Let cool and break crackers and enjoy!']

title: E-Z Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients.', 'Shape into small balls.', 'Press onto baking sheet.', 'Bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes.']

title: Gouchies
ingredients: ['12 double cinnamon graham crackers', '1 3/4 sticks melted margarine', '3/4 c. sugar']
directions: ['Fit crackers on cookie sheet.', 'Stir sugar into melted margarine.', 'Cook about 3 minutes over medium heat.', 'Sprinkle chopped pecans on crackers and pour sugar mixture over each cracker.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes.', 'Place on wax paper immediately.', 'Cool completely, then break into pieces.', '(Like peanut brittle.)']

title: Tomato Bread
ingredients: ['tomatoes', 'bread']
directions: ['Peel and cut up tomatoes into large pieces.', 'Break up bread as for filling.', 'Mix and put into hot greased pan.', 'Stir and cook until well blended and hot.']

title: Lighthouse Egg
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice bread', 'butter']
directions: ['Butter both sides of bread.', 'Cut out center of bread in the shape of a circle, about 1 1/2 inches in diameter (one way is to use the cover of a pill bottle).', 'Put bread in frying pan.', 'Break egg and place in hole in center of bread.', 'Fry bread on both sides until egg is thoroughly cooked (yolk no longer runs).', 'Use low flame.', 'Remove from pan and eat.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Golden Honey-Glazed Chicken
ingredients: ['3 1/2 to 4 lb. chicken, cut up', '1/2 c. Lea & Perrins white wine Worcestershire sauce', '3 Tbsp. honey']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Rinse chicken well and pat dry.', 'Place on a rack in a shallow baking pan.', 'In a mixing bowl, combine white wine Worcestershire and honey.', 'Coat chicken with mixture and bake 35 to 40 minutes at 350°, basting occasionally, until chicken is golden.', 'Serves 4.']

title: One Vanilla Milkshake
ingredients: ['1/2 c. frozen low-fat yogurt', '1 c. skim milk', 'vanilla extract to taste']
directions: ['Whirl all ingredients together in blender.']

title: Vegetable Snacks
ingredients: ['cucumber', 'salt', 'celery', 'peanut butter']
directions: ['Cut cucumbers into nice circular shapes and spread with salt. Wait a minute or two and serve.']

title: Special Toast Topping
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. peanut butter', '1 Tbsp. butter', '1 Tbsp. honey']
directions: ['Combine ingredients and spread on toast.']

title: Tomato Juice Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 qt. cut up ripe tomatoes', '1/2 c. celery', '1 medium onion', '2 Tbsp. sugar', '1 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Cook vegetables together until soft (20 to 30 minutes). Put through a colander and then', 'through', 'a fine sieve or food mill. Add sugar and salt to juice; heat to boiling.']

title: One-Eye Bandits
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice bread', 'butter']
directions: ['Cut a hole in the center of the slice of bread, using a small cup or with a knife.', 'Heat a frying pan over medium fire, melting butter in the pan.']

title: Simple Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix peanut butter with sugar and egg.', 'Then roll into 1-inch balls and put on a cookie sheet.', 'Press with a fork.', 'Bake for 10 minutes at 350°.']

title: Havasu Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['3 heaping c. sugar', '1 1/2 c. milk', '1/8 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 stick butter', '5 heaping Tbsp. peanut butter']
directions: ['Bring all ingredients, except peanut butter, to a boil until soft ball stage.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Add the peanut butter; use wooden spoon.', 'Place pan in cold water and beat 1 minute.']

title: Chicken In A Basket
ingredients: ['1 slice bread per person', '1 egg per person', 'soft margarine', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Butter both sides of bread with soft margarine.', 'Cut hole in center of bread in any shape you desire.', 'Put bread in skillet and lightly brown on one side.', 'Turn bread over and place egg in center hole.', 'Cook egg and season to taste with salt and pepper. Flip over and finish cooking and browning.', 'Serve hot.']

title: My Favorite Snack:  Pumpkin Seeds
ingredients: ['a pumpkin', 'butter', 'salt']
directions: ['Clean off the seeds.', 'Get an oiled pan and put butter on it. Put the seeds on and put them in the oven for about 20 minutes. Take them out, let them cool, put salt on it and eat.']

title: Line'S Fried Chicken
ingredients: ['1 egg, beaten', 'milk', 'salt and pepper', 'chicken']
directions: ['Add beaten egg to milk.', 'Salt and pepper chicken.', 'Dip in milk and egg mixture.', 'Batter chicken in flour.', 'Deep-fry or cook in electric skillet.', 'Keep chicken covered with lid until done on one side.', 'Turn chicken over and put lid back on until chicken is done.']

title: Crock Pot Chicken
ingredients: ['1 chicken', '1 teaspoon butter', 'Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Rub bottom and sides of crock pot with butter. Rinse chicken and pat dry. Season inside and out with salt and pepper. Put chicken in crock pot. Add no liquid. Put on lid and cook on low for 8 - 10 hours.']

title: Egg-In-Toast
ingredients: ['butter', 'bread', 'egg']
directions: ['Butter a slice of bread on both sides.', 'With the top of a large glass, press onto bread and cut out circle from center. Place in hot, buttered frying pan.', 'Pour 1 stirred-up egg into hole.', 'Fry on both sides.', 'Also, fry round bread piece.']

title: Guess Again...Carrots!
ingredients: ['2 lb. carrots', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1 small onion, chopped', '6 to 8 oz. sharp Cheddar, grated']
directions: ['Pare, slice and cook carrots until tender.', 'Drain; mash well. Add butter, onion and cheese.', 'Put into a buttered 1-quart casserole.', 'Bake at 350° for 40 minutes, until browned a bit. Garnish with parsley or sprinkle top with buttered crumbs.', 'Serves 8.']

title: Mock Peanut Butter Cups
ingredients: ['Ritz crackers', 'peanut butter', 'chocolate candy coating *']
directions: ['*Or use sweet chocolate chips and 2 tablespoons shortening.']

title: Eggnog
ingredients: ['1 egg, well beaten', '2 Tbsp. sugar', '1 c. chilled milk', '1/4 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Beat egg and sugar.', 'Then beat in milk and flavoring of your choice.', 'Serve cold, sprinkled lightly with cinnamon and nutmeg.']

title: Stuffed Rice Tomatoes
ingredients: ['6 medium sized tomatoes', '3/4 c. cooked rice', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Wash and remove stems from stem end of tomatoes.', 'Take out seeds and pulp.', 'Sprinkle inside of tomatoes with salt or sugar, if no onion is desired.', 'Cook onion in butter until brown.', 'Add rice and tomatoes from which the water has been drained.', 'Salt and pepper.', 'Heat thoroughly.', 'Refill tomatoes with mixture.', 'Cover with buttered bread crumbs.', 'Bake 10 to 15 minutes in moderate oven.']

title: Broiled Lunch Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 slice cheese', '1 sliced tomato', 'bits of cooked bacon']
directions: ['Toast bread; place slice of cheese on toast and broil until cheese begins to melt.', 'Add tomato and bits of cooked bacon. Broil until tomato is hot.', 'Serve immediately.', 'Makes 1 sandwich.']

title: Pasta Salad
ingredients: ['1 cucumber, seeded and chopped', '1 tomato, chopped', '1/2 medium onion, chopped', 'pasta']
directions: ['Cover the cucumber, tomato and onion with Kraft Italian dressing (no fat) overnight.']

title: Fudge Candy
ingredients: ['3 c. sugar', '1 c. cream', '1/4 c. butter', 'dash of salt', '1 tsp. vanilla', '9 oz. peanut butter']
directions: ['Butter 3 plates.', 'Mix sugar, cream, salt and vanilla.', 'Cook on high; bring to boil.', 'Reduce heat.', 'Add butter and boil for 10 minutes or until mixture thickens.', 'Add peanut butter.', 'Stir until melted.', 'Then pour into plates.', 'Let cool and cut into 3-inch squares.']

title: Ice Cream In Plastic Bag
ingredients: ['3 c. milk', '8 Tbsp. sugar', '2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Put in plastic Ziploc bag.', 'In second bag, put approximately 15 cubes of ice and 6 teaspoons of table salt.', 'Freezes best if used with 1 cup of mix per bag.', 'Use 1 quart size bag for mix, 1 gallon size bag ice and salt.', 'Shake for 10 minutes.', 'Tastes like snow cream.']

title: Wedding Soup
ingredients: ['1 chicken', 'salt and pepper', '1 onion, chopped', '1 c. celery, chopped']
directions: ['Boil chicken for 2 to 3 hours.', 'Add onion and celery last hour.', 'Shred with fork.']

title: Ann'S Quick-Serve Ice Cream
ingredients: ['1/2 c. milk', '1 tsp. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Pour ingredients into a small Ziploc bag.', 'Then put ice and salt into a large Ziploc bag.', 'Add small bag into large and shake. Minutes later, you will have great ice cream.', 'This recipe may be doubled or more.']

title: Honey Candied Popcorn
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1/2 c. honey', '1/2 c. cream']
directions: ['Cook to hard ball stage.', 'Pour over packages of microwave popcorn or regular popped corn.']

title: Ritz Pie
ingredients: ['20 Ritz crackers, crushed', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. nuts']
directions: ['Mix ingredients together.', 'In another bowl, beat whites of 3 eggs adding 1/2 cup sugar.', 'Add to first mixture, mixing well together.', 'Press out in greased 8-inch Pyrex pie dish, pulling up on side of dish.', 'Bake 30 minutes at 325°.', 'Whip 1 pint of cream. Place on top of pie after it is cold.', 'Grate bittersweet chocolate over top.', 'Sweeten cream with 4x sugar to taste.']

title: Pickled Carrots
ingredients: ['2 lb. carrots, scraped, cut and cooked']
directions: ['Drain carrots and pour sauce over them while still hot.']

title: Cream Caramels
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. cream', '1 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Stir quick over heat until sugar is dissolved.', 'Stir and cook these ingredients slowly to a soft ball stage (238°).', 'Remove the candy from the fire.', 'Cool it.', 'Beat it until it is creamy.', 'Pour it onto an oiled platter.', 'Cut into squares.']

title: Quick Potato Soup
ingredients: ['4 strips bacon, cut fine', '1/2 c. celery, cut fine', '2 c. raw potato, cut fine', '1/2 c. carrots, cut fine', '1 small onion, cut fine']
directions: ['Add 1 quart water to ingredients; cook until tender.', 'Mash well.', 'Add milk, salt, pepper and butter to taste.', 'Simmer.']

title: Banana Soup
ingredients: ['1 banana', 'milk', 'sugar']
directions: ['Chop up a banana and put it in a bowl.', 'Pour milk over the banana.', 'Put some sugar on it.', 'You can eat it for breakfast or for a snack.', 'Some kids put corn flakes in it.']

title: Ritzy Baked Chicken
ingredients: ['1 box Ritz crackers', '1 stick margarine', 'chicken']
directions: ['Crush Ritz crackers until very fine.', 'Melt butter and dip chicken in it.', 'Then roll chicken in crackers.', 'Bake on cookie sheet, uncovered, for 1 1/2 hours at 300°.']

title: Zora'S Chicken And Dumplings
ingredients: ['1 chicken', '2 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. black pepper']
directions: ['Put chicken in large pot and cover with water.', 'Cook until tender.', 'Take chicken off bones.']

title: Bird'S Nest
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', '1 tsp. butter', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Melt butter in a frying pan. Press out a small circle in middle of bread using a small glass. Place bread in frying pan and crack egg into the middle of the circle. Cook', 'until bread is toasted and flip over. Cook egg until desired taste. Place on a plate and sprinkle with salt and pepper.']

title: Peanut Butter Honey Balls
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. honey', '1 c. dry milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', 'nuts', 'coconut']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients and shape into small balls.', 'Roll in coconut or nuts.']

title: Quick Roast Turkey
ingredients: ['prepared turkey']
directions: ['Prepare turkey for roasting.', 'Place on heavy-duty aluminum foil.', 'Seal securely to prevent drippings from escaping in pan. Place foil wrapped bird, breast up, in bottom of roaster.', 'Roast in very hot oven at 450°.', 'About 15 to 20 minutes before total roasting time, remove from oven.', 'Gently remove foil away from bird to edges of pan.', 'Continue to roast until brown.', 'Sometimes bird is already brown enough at this point.']

title: Lobster Stew
ingredients: ['2 c. milk', '2 c. cream', '1 c. butter', '2 tsp. salt', '1/8 tsp. pepper', '1 lb. lobster meat']
directions: ['Simmer lobster meat in butter until it reaches a good pink color.', 'Slowly add milk and cream, stirring constantly until stew has developed a rich salmon color.', 'Remove from heat and let age 5 or 6 hours.', 'Reheat slowly.', 'Serves 8.']

title: Johnna'S Breakfast Cheese
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. butter', '1/4 c. sugar', '3 slices cheese']
directions: ['In a heavy skillet, melt butter.', 'Stir in sugar and add cheese that has been cut in small pieces.', 'Let come to a slow boil and cook for 3 to 5 minutes on low.', "Stir often so it won't scorch. Spread on toast or biscuits.", 'Also good for an after school snack.']

title: Aunt Eve'S Cheese Cake
ingredients: ['32 graham crackers', '2 Tbsp. sugar', '1/2 c. butter']
directions: ['Crush graham crackers.', 'Add sugar and melted butter; mix well. Reserve 1 cup for top.', 'Chill crust in refrigerator while making filling.']

title: Onion Bread
ingredients: ['1 loaf French bread, sliced', '1 stick butter', '1 large onion, diced']
directions: ['Melt butter.', 'Add onion to butter and cook in microwave until tender, 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Spoon on French bread between slices. Wrap in foil.', 'Warm in oven 10 to 15 minutes.']

title: Toast - Buttered
ingredients: ['bread', 'butter']
directions: ['Take bread.', 'Take butter.', 'Put the butter on the bread and cook.']

title: Tuna Patties
ingredients: ['6 1/2 oz. can tuna', '1/2 c. oatmeal', '1 small to medium onion', '1 egg']
directions: ['Drain tuna.', 'Whirl oatmeal in blender to a fine grain.', 'Chop onion in blender.', 'Mix with tuna and egg.', 'Shape into 4 patties and deep fry to golden brown.']

title: Zucchini Provencale
ingredients: ['zucchini', '1 onion, chopped', '1 can tomatoes', 'olive oil']
directions: ['Wash zucchini.', 'Do not remove skin.', 'Cut into small slices and cook in small amount of water until tender, about 5 minutes.']

title: Cracker Salad
ingredients: ['1 medium onion', '1 tomato', 'crackers', 'mayonnaise', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Chop onion and tomato.', 'Mix together.', 'Add mayonnaise until it is mixed and juicy.', 'Salt and pepper to your taste.', 'Can be refrigerated until ready to serve.']

title: Chocolate-Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 stick butter', '1/2 c. milk', '3 tsp. chocolate', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '3 c. oatmeal']
directions: ['Mix sugar, butter, milk and chocolate in saucepan.', 'Cook on medium heat until comes to a vigorous boil.', 'Let boil 1 minute. Remove from stove.', 'Add peanut butter and oatmeal.', 'Mix well.', 'Drop on wax paper until cool.']

title: Breakfast Toads
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper', '1 tsp. butter']
directions: ['Melt butter in pan; add salt and pepper to taste.', 'Using small glass, cut a hole in slice of bread in center; put in pan.', 'Crack egg into center of hole.', 'Fry until bread is toasted on bottom and flip to fry other side.']

title: Crema Caramella
ingredients: ['2/3 c. sugar']
directions: ['Melt sugar in large skillet over medium heat until it turns a nut brown color.', 'Pour immediately into 1-quart ring mold and coat all sides.', 'Set aside.']

title: Baked Pita Chips
ingredients: ['4 pita bread rounds']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400. Split the bread rounds into halves. Cut each Half into 8 wedges. Arrange the wedges in a single layer on an 11x17 inch baking sheet. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes or until light brown. Makes 64 chips.']

title: Hershey With Almond Pie
ingredients: ['1 1/3 c. coconut', '2 Tbsp. margarine, melted']
directions: ['Line pan and bake at 325° for 10 minutes.']

title: Banana Cake Cream
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 egg white', '1 medium banana']
directions: ['Mix together.', 'Pour over white or yellow cake.']

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: ['3 lb. chicken, boneless']
directions: ['Cook chicken until it is done enough to shred.', 'Save broth and remove chicken.']

title: Microwave Toasted Nuts
ingredients: ['4 c. nuts', '1/2 c. melted butter', '1 Tbsp. seasoned salt']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in large bowl.', 'Place in microwave on High 4 to 6 minutes, stirring twice.', 'Cool on waxed paper.']

title: Lobster Tails
ingredients: ['4 lobster tails', '1 1/2 tsp. salt', 'melted butter', 'lemon', 'black pepper']
directions: ['Thaw frozen tails.', 'In a 3-quart saucepan, bring 6 cups of water and 1 1/2 teaspoons salt to a boil.', 'Add tails.', 'Simmer, uncovered, for 4 to 8 minutes for 3 ounce tails (6 to 10 minutes for 6 ounce tails; 8 to 12 minutes for 8 ounce tails) or until shell turns bright red and meat is tender.', 'Drain.', 'Serve with melted butter and lemon.', '(Optional:', 'black pepper.)']

title: Orange Carrot Breakfast Drink("A Favorite From The '76 Cookbook.")
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. orange juice, chilled', '1 1/2 c. milk', '2 c. carrots, sliced', '1/4 c. honey']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in electric blender container.', 'Cover and blend at high speed until carrots are liquefied.', 'Serve immediately.', 'Makes about 1 quart.']

title: Chocolate Topping
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '2 sq. unsweetened baking chocolate', '1 egg', '6 Tbsp. cream']
directions: ['In a double boiler, mix cream and egg.', 'Add sugar and chocolate (cut up fine).', 'Cook over simmering water until thick. Serve on vanilla ice cream.']

title: Microwave Sweet Potato
ingredients: ['1 medium size sweet potato']
directions: ['Scrub potato and poke several times with a fork.', 'Place on paper plate and cover with another paper plate.', 'Microwave for 3 to 4 minutes or until tender and done.', 'Turn potato after 2 minutes of cooking.']

title: Easy Chicken And Dumplings
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken', '2 cans butter flavored biscuits', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Boil chicken in large pot until chicken comes off bone.', 'Save water in pot.', 'Debone chicken and put meat back in the pot.', 'Add salt and pepper.', 'Bring chicken and broth to a boil.', 'Pinch off biscuits in small pieces and add to pot.', 'Boil for 5 minutes. Simmer an additional 30 minutes.']

title: Cauliflower
ingredients: ['cauliflower', 'mayonnaise', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Peel outside leaves and stem from cauliflower.', 'Place in pan and steam until tender.', 'Take from pan and put on a casserole dish and spread with mayonnaise.', 'Place under broiler until brown.', 'Salt and pepper to taste.', 'Cut in slices and serve.']

title: Toasted Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Toast the bread; put the cheese between toasted bread.']

title: Peanut Butter Candy Roll
ingredients: ['1/2 c. margarine', '4 1/2 c. 10x sugar', '2 Tbsp. milk', '1/2 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Blend together margarine and 2 cups of sugar.', 'Gradually add remaining sugar and milk, blending well until mixture is consistency of pie dough.', 'Sprinkle area with 10x sugar and roll out 1/2 of dough into rectangle about 1/8-inch thick.', 'Spread entire surface with peanut butter.', 'Starting at longest edge, roll up like a jelly roll.', 'Repeat with remaining dough.', 'Wrap in waxed paper and store in refrigerator at least 1 hour.', 'Cut into slices and serve.']

title: No Bake Cookies(Not Chocolate)
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1/2 c. butter', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '3 c. oatmeal']
directions: ['Mix sugar, milk and butter in pan; bring to boil 1 minute. Remove and add remaining ingredients.', 'Drop by the tablespoon on waxed paper.', 'Wait for them to firm up.', 'You should be able to take them right off the waxed paper after they have cooled down.']

title: Broiled Tomatoes
ingredients: ['tomatoes, halved', 'any shredded cheese']
directions: ['Place halved tomatoes on cookie sheet.', 'Sprinkle on cheese. Place under broiler for about two minutes.', 'Can be topped also with any of your favorite dried herbs.', 'Example:', 'Use Parmesan cheese and basil.']

title: Toasty Egg
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'butter', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Take 1 slice of any bread you like.', 'Take piece about size of half dollar from center of bread.', 'Butter both sides and place in skillet.', 'Cook and turn to slightly brown both sides.', 'Break egg into hole in center of bread.', 'Fry, turning over until approximately "over easy."', 'Salt and pepper both sides to taste.']

title: Old-Fashioned Chicken And Dumplings
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken', '1/2 tsp. black pepper', '1 tsp. salt', '1 stick butter']
directions: ['Combine ingredients and cook until chicken is tender.', 'Remove bones and skin.', 'Set aside 2 cups of broth.', 'Put chicken back into broth and boil.', 'With one cup of water, make a stiff dough.', 'Roll thin and cut into strips, about 2-inches long.', 'Drop into chicken, a small part at a time.', 'Cook without lid about 5 minutes.', 'Cover and cook about 5 more minutes.']

title: Grilled Shrimp Kabobs
ingredients: ['1 1/2 lb. peeled deveined shrimp', '1/2 c. melted butter', '1/2 c. honey']
directions: ['Thread shrimp onto wooden skewers, using 2 skewers per kabob to facilitate turning (1 skewer through the meaty part, 1 skewer through the tail part of each shrimp).', 'Brush grill with oil. Combine melted butter and honey (or substitute 1 cup Italian dressing for butter and honey).', 'Cook shrimp over hot coals, basting frequently with honey mixture or Italian dressing for 10 minutes per inch of thickness or until shrimp are tender and no longer translucent in the center.', 'Yield:', '4 servings.']

title: Charleston Shrimp Pilau
ingredients: ['1 c. diced bacon', '2 1/2 c. cooked tomato', '1 lb. shrimp, cooked', '2 Tbsp. chopped onion', '1 c. raw rice']
directions: ['Fry bacon crisp; cook onion in bacon fat and add tomatoes and rice.', 'Mix well.', 'Cover; heat to boiling, then simmer 20 minutes, stirring.', 'Cook 15 to 20 minutes for rice to get fluffy; add shrimp and bacon and put in dish.', 'Bake at 350° for 15 minutes.']

title: Buttered Carrot Sticks(By Children 7 - 12 Years Old)
ingredients: ['8 medium carrots', 'salt', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Wash and pare 8 carrots, then cut lengthwise into 1/2 inch strips on cutting board.', 'Using a measuring cup, pour 1 inch of water into saucepan.', 'Keep track how many cups of water you use, then add 1/2 teaspoon salt for each cup of water.', 'Add the carrots.', 'The water should just cover them.', 'Cover and cook over medium heat 18 to 20 minutes or until the carrots are tender when pierced with fork.', 'Lift the carrots to serving dish with slotted spoon, gently stir in 2 tablespoons butter.']

title: Egg In Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 Tbsp. margarine', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['This is from my grandmother\'s book, "Domestic Cookery," printed in 1951.']

title: Savory Chicken Roll-Ups
ingredients: ['2 to 3 lb. boned chicken', '1 piece of celery', '1 small onion', '1 small carrot']
directions: ['Cook chicken in boiling water until done; I add celery, onion and carrot for seasoning.', 'Debone chicken and cut into small pieces or grind in food processor until coarse.', 'Let broth stand until congealed in refrigerator.', 'Scoop off fat.']

title: A Quick Cookie
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix together until smooth.', 'Roll in small balls.', 'Flatten with fork dipped in water.', 'Bake at 350° for 5 to 10 minutes.']

title: Bacon Tastees
ingredients: ['Club crackers', '1 lb. bacon']
directions: ['Cut bacon slices in half. Wrap bacon around each cracker. Bake at 350° until bacon is done.', 'Cool.']

title: Nightcap Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix well and bake at 325° on ungreased cookie sheet for 13 minutes.']

title: Mama'S Caramel Icing
ingredients: ['2 1/2 c. sugar', '8 Tbsp. butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 egg, well beaten', '3/4 c. milk']
directions: ['Cook 1/2 cup sugar in black skillet until melted and golden. Mix egg, butter and remainder of sugar with milk in a heavy boiler and cook over medium heat until butter melts.', 'Add caramelized sugar.', 'Cook until soft ball can be formed in cold water.', 'I use a candy thermometer and cook it to 232°.', 'Add vanilla; beat.']

title: Birds Nest
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 piece bread', '1 Tbsp. tub spread margarine']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325 degrees.', 'Separate egg and yolk. Beat egg white with beater until it is foamy.', 'Put spread on bread.', 'Spoon egg white onto bread.', 'Add egg yolk to center of egg white.', 'Bake for 15 minutes or until yolk is cooked and white is golden.']

title: "The Big 3" Peanut Butter Cookie
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix together.', 'Do not put anything else in this.', 'Do not grease pan.', 'Bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes.']

title: Tomato Soup
ingredients: ['1/2 lb. bacon', '1 large onion', '1 qt. canned tomatoes', '1 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. black pepper']
directions: ['Cut bacon in small pieces and cook until crisp.', 'Add sliced onion and cook until tender.', 'Drain bacon grease.', 'Add tomatoes, salt and pepper.', 'Bring to a boil.', 'Turn heat to simmer and cook about 10 minutes.']

title: Fruit Shakes
ingredients: ['1/4 c. milk', '1/4 c. orange juice', '1/2 banana', '1 tsp. honey', 'dash of vanilla']
directions: ['Mix 1/4 cup each of milk and orange juice with 1/2 banana, honey and a dash of vanilla in blender.']

title: Chicken Spaghetti
ingredients: ['chicken']
directions: ['Boil chicken, debone and cut up.', 'Save broth.']

title: Hot Chocolate Sauce
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. butter', '1/4 c. sugar', 'few grains salt', '1 sq. chocolate', '1/2 c. evaporated milk', '1/2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Melt butter.', 'Add sugar, salt and chocolate in saucepan.', 'Cook slowly until chocolate dissolves, stirring constantly.', 'Add milk; cook over low heat until thick, stirring constantly.', 'Add vanilla. Serves 4.', 'Chopped, salted nuts may be added.']

title: Dad'S Peanut Butter Candy
ingredients: ['1 jar peanut butter', '2 c. milk', '4 c. sugar', '1 stick butter']
directions: ['Boil milk and sugar until it forms a ball in cold water.', 'Add peanut butter; do not stir.', 'Take butter and grease down a pan, about 13 x 9-inch.', 'Put rest of butter into pot.', 'Wait until it cools, then stir peanut butter until smooth.', 'Pour into greased pan.', 'Let set and cool for 1 to 2 hours.', 'Makes 2 dozen.']

title: Salad Dressing
ingredients: ['6 cloves garlic, crushed with enough salt to make a paste', 'equal parts olive oil and lemon juice']
directions: ['Cut all vegetables into this mixture and let marinate for about an hour. Add lettuce last just before tossing in all the other vegetables.']

title: Honey Balls
ingredients: ['1/3 c. honey', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '3/4 c. instant dry milk']
directions: ['Wash hands before you start.', 'Make dough into small balls. Roll dough', 'in corn flakes.', 'Put honey ball into a plastic bag.']

title: Peanut Butter Preacher Cookies
ingredients: ['1 stick butter', '2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '3 c. quick cooking oatmeal', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Place butter, sugar and milk in 2-quart pan. Bring to a full rolling boil. Remove from heat. Let set 1 minute. Add peanut butter, oatmeal and vanilla. Beat until it begins to stiffen. Drop on waxed paper.']

title: Chris' Peanut Butter Cups(Kid Recipe)
ingredients: ['1 box peanut butter cookie mix', "2 bags miniature Reese's peanut butter cups"]
directions: ['Mix peanut butter cookie mix as directed on box.', 'Divide dough into 36 balls which are the size of a walnut.', 'Place in greased small muffin tins.', 'Bake 10 minutes at 350°.', 'Remove from oven and place a peanut butter cup in center of each ball.', 'Return to oven for 3 minutes.', 'Remove from oven and place in refrigerator.', 'Store in airtight container.', 'Yields 36.']

title: Wine Baked Fish
ingredients: ['4 oz. fish', '1 tsp. margarine', '1/4 c. white wine', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Bake fish in wine and margarine at 350° for 7 minutes, until done.', 'Season with salt and pepper.', 'Serves 1.']

title: Iced Pecans
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. whole nuts', '1 Tbsp. margarine', '1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Line baking sheet with foil.', 'Butter the foil.', 'In a thick skillet, melt margarine; add sugar and mix well.', 'Add nuts.', 'Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, about 9 minutes or until sugar melts and turns to a rich brown color.', 'Remove from heat and stir in vanilla.', 'Spread onto cookie sheet.', 'Cool; break into small pieces.']

title: Bird In A Nest
ingredients: ['1 slice of bread', '1 egg']
directions: ['I wake Dad up with a hug and a kiss and ask can you fix me some French toast?']

title: Chocolate Candy
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '2 sq. chocolate', '1 c. milk', '1 Tbsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Cook very slowly without stirring until it forms a ball when dropped in cold water.', 'Remove from fire; add butter and cool before beating.']

title: Birthday Punch
ingredients: ['2 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid', '1 1/2 c. sugar', '1 can pineapple']
directions: ['Add water to make a gallon.', 'Add ginger ale before serving.']

title: Drying Tomatoes
ingredients: ['3 medium tomatoes, cut in 1/4-inch slices']
directions: ['Place tomato slices in a single layer on paper towels. Microwave on Low (30%) for 1 hour and 30 minutes, carefully rearranging tomato slices every 15 minutes.', 'Test for doneness; dry.', 'Place on paper towels, then cover with paper towels.', 'Allow to stand until all moisture is gone.', 'Store in refrigerator, freezer or at room temperature in airtight container.']

title: Zoe'S Favorite Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg']
directions: ['Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto baking pan.', 'Bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes.', 'Cookies may not seem done, but check bottom, they will firm.']

title: Peanut Butter Cracker Bars
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '2/3 c. canned milk', '6 Tbsp. peanut butter', '32 soda crackers', '1 Tbsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Crumble crackers.', 'Bring to boil the sugar and milk for 3 minutes.', 'Remove from heat and add peanut butter, crackers and vanilla.', 'Pour into a greased dish and let cool, then cut into squares.']

title: Baked Supreme Zucchini
ingredients: ['1 large zucchini', '2 slices crisp fried bacon, chopped', '1/2 c. chopped onion', '4 fresh tomatoes', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Slice zucchini in half lengthwise; remove seeds.', 'Place chopped bacon, onion and tomatoes in hollows.', 'Season to taste. Place in 9-inch cake pan.', 'Bake for 45 minutes in 350° oven.', 'Cut each half zucchini in half and serve.']

title: Carrot Coins
ingredients: ['raw carrots', 'peanut butter']
directions: ['What are coins?', 'Cut your carrots in the size of coins. Carrots and other deep yellow vegetables have lots of Vitamin A, which is good for healthy eyes and skin.']

title: Minute Fudge Or Frosting
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. sugar', '2 1/2 sq. chocolate', '3/8 c. milk', '4 Tbsp. butter', 'dash of salt', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 c. nuts']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in heavy saucepan and cook 1 minute after it begins to boil. Stir until sugar and chocolate are melted but do not stir while candy is boiling.', 'Remove from heat and let set until hand can be held on bottom of pan. This is important. Beat until ready to pour.', 'Add vanilla and nuts during the last minutes.']

title: Apricot Dessert
ingredients: ['2 c. crushed Ritz crackers', '1 stick melted butter']
directions: ['Combine and press into a 9 x 13-inch pan.', 'Do not bake.']

title: Raspberry Rice Cream
ingredients: ['1 c. cooked rice', '3/4 c. sugar', 'pinch of salt', '1 Tbsp. butter', '1 small carton heavy whipping cream']
directions: ['Cook rice until tender; add sugar, salt and butter.', 'Let cool. When rice is cool, whip cream and fold into rice.', 'Refrigerate 4 hours.', 'Serve with Raspberry Sauce.']

title: How To Make Your Own Powdered Sugar
ingredients: ['6 to 8 c. granulated sugar']
directions: ['Do one cup at a time in the blender on high for 2 minutes.']

title: Peach Delicious
ingredients: ['1 1/2 to 2 tubes Ritz crackers', '2 to 3 Tbsp. sugar', '1/2 stick margarine, melted']
directions: ['Mix together.', 'Spread into a 9 x 13-inch dish.']

title: Kyra'S Mild Or Hot Chicken
ingredients: ['12 pieces chicken parts', 'seasoning salt', 'granulated onion', 'granulated garlic']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Set the 12 pieces of chicken on a greased pan.', 'Shake on the seasoning salt, granulated onion and granulated garlic.', 'The more you add, the spicier it tastes.', "Put it in the oven and bake for one hour or until slightly browned and it doesn't bleed.", 'Turn off the oven and let cool 5 to 10 minutes. Then serve and enjoy.']

title: Daddy'S Peanut Butter Candy
ingredients: ['4 c. sugar', '2 c. milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', 'pinch of salt', '1-1/2 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Stir together sugar and milk.', 'Bring to a boil, stirring constantly throughout cooking time.', 'Cook to soft ball stage, checking in water, for approximately 15-17 minutes.', 'Reduce heat after a few minutes but maintain a good boil.', 'When candy is done, remove from heat and add vanilla, salt and peanut butter.', 'Mix well and pour into buttered 15 x 10 inch pan.', 'Let cool and cut into pieces.', 'If thicker pieces are desired, use smaller pan.']

title: Soda Cracker Fudge

directions: ['Bring sugar and canned milk to a boil and boil 3 minutes. Remove from heat.', 'Add peanut butter, vanilla and crushed crackers.', 'Stir well and pour into 8-inch square pan or glass dish.', 'Cool and cut into squares.']

title: Hand Lotion(Cool As A Cucumber)

title: Almost Impossible Peanut Butter Cookies

directions: ['Stir all ingredients together.', 'Drop by teaspoonful onto an ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Crisscross with a fork.', 'Bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes.', 'I think you will be surprised as I was at the results when the recipe was given to me.']

title: Toast Framed Egg
ingredients: ['1 slice bread, toasted and buttered', '1 egg']
directions: ['Cut 3-inch diameter circle in toast.', 'Place toast on microwave-safe plate.', 'Break egg into hole.', 'Pierce yolk with fork. Cover with plastic wrap.', 'Cook, covered, on Roast or Slo cook for 1 minute or until egg is cooked as desired.']

title: Brook Trout In Bacon

directions: ['Clean and wash trout.', 'Pat dry and rub inside with salt.', 'Wrap in bacon and fasten with wooden picks.', 'Place in hand broiler and cook over hot coals, turning several times, until bacon is crisp and fish is done.']

title: Mamaw'S Lillie Peanut Butter Cookies

title: Unbaked Caramel Cookies

Mix thoroughly.', 'Cool 15 minutes.', 'Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper lined tray.', 'Makes 5 dozen.']

title: Chicken Thigh Relleno

title: Peanut Butter Candy 2

directions: ['Heat oven to 350°. Mix all ingredients together and shape into small balls. Put on ungreased cookie sheet and cook 10 minutes.']

title: Apple Snack

title: Canned Tomatoes #1

directions: ['Peel tomatoes by putting in hot boiling water for about 3 minutes or skins', 'crack.', 'Place or stuff in clean sterilized jars and add salt.', 'Seal', 'with', 'jar', 'seals and place on cookie sheet in cold oven.', 'Turn', 'oven', 'to', '250° and bake for 50 minutes.']

title: Honey Spread

directions: ['Soften butter to room temperature.', 'Mix with honey.', 'Serve or refrigerate for later use.']

title: Lavell'S Fudge

directions: ['Mix sugars and milk; cook for 3 minutes.', 'Add peanut butter, vanilla and crackers.', 'Pour in 9 x 9-inch pan.']

Squeeze 1 tablespoon juice from the lemon and stir into butter as dipping sauce.', 'Makes 4 servings.']

title: Simple Homemade Ice Cream

directions: ['Place above ingredients in quart size freezer bag.', 'Place ice in 4 tablespoons of table salt in gallon size freezer bag.', 'Place smaller bag inside larger bag and shake for 5 minutes.']

directions: ['In the peak of the tomato season, chill 1 very large or 2 medium tomatoes that have been vine-ripened and have a good acidy-bite to their taste.', 'Take 2 slices of bread, slice the tomato 1/4-inch thick.', 'Salt and pepper that layer.', 'Add another layer of sliced tomato and again salt and pepper.', 'Place the other piece of bread on top of this, roll up your sleeves, and commence to eat over the kitchen sink while the juice runs down your elbows.']

directions: ['Combine all ingredients and blend thoroughly.', 'Roll into 1-inch balls and place on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Flatten with a fork dipped in sugar.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 minutes.', 'Fast and easy when you need cookies in a hurry!']

title: Watermelon Rind Pickles

directions: ['Carefully remove and reserve rind from melon.', 'Cut rind into desired shapes or pieces.', 'Soak overnight in 1 gallon of cold water and lime.', 'Stir occasionally while soaking.', 'After soaking, rinse well.', 'Place rinsed rinds in saucepan and cook in enough water to cover rinds, for 20 minutes.', 'Drain and soak rinds in an ice bath, changing water and adding ice until cooled.', 'Remove rinds from ice bath and put in boiling water for 10 minutes. Drain and cool with running water.', 'Now you are ready to make your syrup.']

Shape by tablespoonfuls into balls; place about 2-inches apart on a lightly greased cookie sheet.', 'Flatten into 1/4-inch thick by pressing in a crisscross design with fork.', 'Bake for 10 minutes or until golden brown.', 'Cool on cookie sheet for 1 minute.', 'Place on a wire rack to cool completely.', 'Yields 1 to 1 1/2 dozen cookies.']

Cook 15 to 20 minutes in a 350 degree oven, or until cookies are light brown and soft when removed form oven. Thats right no flour or baking powder.']

title: Peanut Butter Cookies(Easy)

directions: ['Slice tomatoes as thin as you would to fry.', 'Pack in jar.', 'Pour cold water over them and add 1 teaspoon salt to each quart.', 'Seal and cook about 3 to 5 minutes after they start to boil.', 'They stay just like you put them in the jar.', 'Real good to fry with okra or by themselves.']

title: Busy Day Grilled Cheese

title: Chocolate Frosting

Beat until thick enough to spread.', 'Do not use flavorings.', 'This will cover a large tube cake.', 'Double ingredients and cook 1 minute longer for larger cake.']

directions: ['Melt Butter in a pan on the stove.', 'Then add the Peanut Butter and stir until blended and melted with the butter.', "Add Confectioners' Sugar and stir together until well blended and starts to take shape.", 'Put into a square pan.', 'Cool and cut.', 'I usually let cool overnight.', 'Then cut into pieces.']

title: Quick Toast Cups

title: Laban (Yogurt)
ingredients: ['1 qt. milk', '1 small container plain yogurt']
directions: ['Rinse kettle out with cold water.', '(This will make it easier to clean later.)', 'Pour in the milk, bring to a boil until bubbles form on top.', "Watch so milk doesn't scorch.", 'Let milk sit until it is cold.', 'At night time, put back on stove and let the milk get barely lukewarm.', 'Take container of yogurt; mix it with some of the milk, then mix well with rest.', 'Put a lid on the kettle, cover with a warm blanket, and set it in the oven.', 'In the morning, put the kettle in refrigerator with a clean cloth on top of the Laban. This will absorb the whey.', 'Wring out and put back until it is the consistency you want it.', 'Put in containers in refrigerator. Makes 4 cups.']

Remove skin.', 'Place salmon on large platter.', 'Serve with melted butter and lemon.', 'Perfect side dishes to accompany the baked salmon are parsleyed new potatoes and green peas with pearl onions.', 'Lemon meringue pie would make an excellent dessert.']

directions: ['1. Put 2 large scoops of Mint Chocolate Chip Ice Cream into a blender.']

title: Doodle-Bug Eggs
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'margarine', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ["When Jim's son, Jeremy, was 3 or 4 years old, he watched while his daddy cooked doodle-bug eggs for him.", 'Jim put some margarine in a frying pan and while it was melting, he took a slice of bread and folded it in half.', 'He took a bite from the middle, making a hole in the center of the slice, entertaining Jeremy in doing this.', 'He put the slice in the frying pan, broke an egg in the hole and cooked for a minute or so each side.', 'Jeremy was delighted with his doodle-bug egg.']

title: Tomatoes

directions: ['Using charcoal briquettes, build a hot, hot fire.', 'Take 1 French filleted carp, season with salt and pepper.\tLay on a 16-inch long by 2-inch thick oak plank (no substitutions).']

title: Robert'S Delicious Chocolate Candy
ingredients: ['chocolate', 'peanut butter']
directions: ['You mix it up in a bowl; pour it in a pan.', 'Then you have to set the timer.', 'You put it in the freezer for 10 minutes for the timer.', 'In the morning, it has to be mixed up.', "You know it's ready when the dark is over, and the next morning, then you get all the ingredients to make it.", 'No fingers in the chocolate and not in the peanut butter.', 'The next morning, the chocolate and the peanut butter go in the freezer for 10 minutes.', 'Take it out of the freezer.', "You have to set the timer before it rings. You got to knock on the chocolate to see if it's hard or not that hard. If it's supposed to be 5 minutes, 5 minutes is the low one to make it not that hard."]

title: Mom'S Slick Dumplings
ingredients: ['Equal amounts of beef drippings and flour', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Mix above ingredients together.', 'Add more flour just until you create a soft, moist dough.', 'Flour a counter top and put dough in center.', 'Using a floured rolling pin, roll dough to approximately 1/8 inch to 1/4 inch thick.', 'Taking a sharp knife, cut the dough into rectangles approximately 2 inches x 3 inches. Take roast drippings and add enough water to make about 3 inches of broth in bottom of large saucepan.', 'Add salt and pepper to taste.', 'If you are short on drippings and the water dilutes it too much, add beef bouillon cubes to make extra fluid or canned beef broth.', 'Gently peel dumplings from counter.', 'Add them to boiling broth one at a time and immerse them totally before adding the next dumpling.', 'Cover and cook about 10 minutes.']

Drain pineapple.', 'Lay bacon on paper towels and cool.', 'Cut each slice of bacon into thirds and wrap each piece around a pineapple tidbit, securing with a toothpick.', 'Cook on a baking sheet for 5 minutes or until bacon is crisp at 400°.']

title: The Standing Rib

title: Chicken Legs

title: Peanut Butter Cake

title: Never Fail Creamy Caramel Frosting

title: Low-Fat Milk Shake

title: Peanut Butter Balls(Candy)

title: Dressing For Summer Fruit Plate

directions: ['Combine juice and grated rind of fruits to egg and sugar that have been beaten.', 'Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly.', 'Boil for 1 minute; remove and cool.', 'Arrange variety of cut up fruits on platter or on small, individual plates. Drizzle dressing on top.', 'May sprinkle with nuts or coconut.']

title: Eggy Guacamole
ingredients: ['1 large egg', '1 avocado']
directions: ['Place your egg in a small pot and cover with cold water. The water should be about an inch or so higher than the egg. Cover the pot with a lid. Over high heat, bring your eggs to a rolling boil.', 'Remove from heat and let stand, 18 minutes for medium sized eggs, 20 minutes for large eggs and 23 minutes for extra large eggs.', 'Drain water and immediately run cold water over eggs until cooled. Rapid cooling helps prevent a green ring from forming around the yolks.', 'Peel eggs and place in a bowl. Mash well and set aside.', 'Cut avocado in half, remove pit and scoop out flesh. Place avocado flesh in a bowl and mash well with a fork. Combine egg and avocado together and mash together well until you have your desired consistency.']

title: Drawn Butter
ingredients: ['1 pound unsalted butter']
directions: ['Melt the butter in the top of a double boiler over just-barely simmering water, 5 to 7 minutes. Set the melted butter aside to cool slightly, then skim the foam off the top and discard. Allow the butter to solidify overnight. Drain off any liquid that collects at the bottom. Melt the butter in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl, and pour into individual bowls before serving.']

title: Sugar Pumpkin Puree
ingredients: ['1 sugar pumpkin - cut into eighths, seeded, and pulp removed']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Arrange pumpkin pieces on a baking sheet.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until pumpkin meat is tender, about 1 hour.', 'Scrape pumpkin meat from the peel and transfer meat to a blender; blend until smooth.']

title: Oven-Baked Banana Chips
ingredients: ['1 firm banana, thinly sliced']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 175 degrees F (80 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment.', 'Place banana slices in a single layer on prepared baking sheet.', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour; turn banana slices over. Continue baking banana slices until dry and crisp, about 1 hour more.']

title: Lemon Pea Salad
ingredients: ['1 cup raw peas', '1/2 lemon, juiced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Mix peas, lemon juice, salt, and pepper together in a bowl.']

title: Peanut Butter And Banana French Toast
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 dash vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons creamy peanut butter', '2 slices bread', '1 small banana, sliced', '2 tablespoons butter']
directions: ['In a small bowl, lightly beat the egg and vanilla together.', 'Spread 1 tablespoon of peanut butter on top of each slice of bread. Place the banana slices on top of one of the slices of bread. Place the other slice of bread on top of the first, to make a peanut butter and banana sandwich.', 'In a skillet or frying pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Dip the sandwich into the egg mixture and place in the heated skillet. Cook until brown on both sides. Serve hot.']

title: Butter Frosting
ingredients: ['1/3 cup butter', "4 1/2 cups sifted confectioners' sugar", '1/4 cup milk', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
directions: ["In a bowl beat butter or margarine until fluffy. Gradually add 2 cups of the confectioners' sugar, beating well.", 'Slowly beat in the milk and vanilla. Slowly beat in remaining sugar. Beat in additional milk, if needed, to make of spreading consistency. Tint with food color, if desired.']

title: Cauliflower Puree
ingredients: ['salt to taste', '1 head cauliflower, cut into florets', '1 tablespoon butter']
directions: ['Bring a 4-quart pot of salted water to a boil; add cauliflower and simmer until tender, 7 to 10 minutes. Drain cauliflower, reserving 1 cup cooking liquid.', 'Blend cauliflower and 1/4 cup cooking liquid in a blender until smooth, adding more water until desired consistency is reached. Add butter and pulse until incorporated; season with salt.']

title: Pumpkin Puree
ingredients: ['1 sugar pumpkin']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).', 'Cut the pumpkin in half, stem to base. Remove seeds and pulp. Cover each half with foil.', 'Bake in the preheated oven, foil side up, 1 hour, or until tender.', 'Scrape pumpkin meat from shell halves and puree in a blender. Strain to remove any remaining stringy pieces. Store in the freezer in freezer safe bags.']

title: Corny Cheese Toasties
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 teaspoon mayonnaise', '1 slice canned corned beef', '1 slice American processed cheese']
directions: ['Preheat skillet over medium heat. Butter each slice of bread on 1 side only. Spread mayonnaise on the un-buttered sides. Place 1 slice of bread, buttered side down, in the skillet. Layer corned beef and cheese slices on bread. Cover with remaining slice of bread, buttered side up. Cook for 5 minutes on each side, or until toast is golden brown, and cheese is melted.']

title: Zucchini And Eggs
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 small zucchini, sliced', '1 egg, beaten', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Heat a small skillet over medium heat. Pour in oil and saute zucchini until tender. Spread out zucchini in an even layer, and pour beaten egg evenly over top. Cook until egg is firm. Season with salt and pepper to taste.']

title: 3-2-1 Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ["3 pounds confectioners' sugar", '2 pounds peanut butter', '1 pound butter, melted']
directions: ['Line a baking sheet with waxed paper.', "Mix confectioners' sugar and peanut butter together in a large bowl until evenly mixed and crumbly. Pour butter into peanut butter mixture and stir to combine.", 'Press peanut butter mixture onto the prepared baking sheet and cool to room temperature.']

title: Home Made Farmer'S Cheese
ingredients: ['1 gallon whole milk', '1 pinch salt', '1 large lemon, juiced']
directions: ['Pour the milk into a large pot, and stir in a pinch of salt. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally to prevent the milk from scorching on the bottom of the pot.', 'When the milk begins to boil (small bubbles will first appear at the edges), turn off the heat. Stir lemon juice into the milk, and the milk will curdle. You may need to wait 5 or 10 minutes.', "Line a sieve or colander with a cheesecloth, and pour the milk through the cloth to catch the curds. What is left in the cheesecloth is the Farmer's Cheese. The liquid is the whey. Some people keep the whey and drink it, but I throw it away. Gather the cloth around the cheese, and squeeze out as much of the whey as you can. Wrap in plastic, or place in an airtight container. Store in the refrigerator."]

title: Reheating Pasta
ingredients: ['8 ounces dry pasta', '3 tablespoons olive oil']
directions: ['Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 5 to 7 minutes or until still slightly less than al dente; drain. Rinse with cold water. Toss with olive oil. Cover and refrigerate until ready to use. To reheat, bring a large pot of water to a boil, add pasta and cook until hot, 1 to 2 minutes.']

title: Sun-Dried Tomatoes Ii
ingredients: ['24 cherry tomatoes']
directions: ['Cut each tomato in half through the middle, not the ends. Put the tomato halves in a food dehydrator, cut side up. Dry for at least 12 hours. When the tomatoes are totally dry and firm, put them in a plastic bag, and store in the freezer.']

title: Bread Bowls Ii
ingredients: ['1 pound frozen bread dough, thawed']
directions: ['Thaw bread dough.', 'Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).', 'Divide bread dough into fourths. Roll each fourth into an 8 inch circle.', 'Brush the back of 4 oven-safe bowls with oil or cooking spray. Place bowls upside down on a baking sheet. Place dough circles on bowls. Brush edge of dough with water and fold it back into a "hem" to make a bowl rim.', 'Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 18 to 20 minutes.']

title: Easy Peanut Butter Frosting
ingredients: ["1 1/2 cups confectioners' sugar", '1 cup peanut butter', '6 tablespoons butter, melted', '1/4 cup milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ["Combine confectioners' sugar, peanut butter, melted butter, milk, and vanilla extract in a large bowl. Mix with a wooden spoon until well-combined and smooth, 2 to 3 minutes."]

title: Instant Pot® Basic Soy Milk Yogurt
ingredients: ['4 1/2 cups soy milk', '2 tablespoons soy yogurt']
directions: ['Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot(R)) and select Yogurt function. Stir in soy milk and soy yogurt. Close and lock the lid. Set timer for 12 hours.', 'Stir yogurt well and transfer to sealed jars. Chill in the fridge for at least 6 hours.']

title: Puerto Rican Garlic Marinade
ingredients: ['1/2 cup olive oil', '4 teaspoons crushed garlic', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 1/2 teaspoons black pepper']
directions: ['In a blender or food processor, combine olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper. Process for 3 to 5 minutes.']

title: Vanilla Honey Simple Syrup
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons milk', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon honey', '2 teaspoons butter']
directions: ['Combine the milk and vanilla extract in a bowl.', 'Heat the honey and butter together in a microwave-safe bowl in the microwave for 30 seconds; stir into the milk mixture. Allow to cool completely before use. Chill in refrigerator if too hot.']

title: Milky Tea
ingredients: ['1 cup milk', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a ceramic or glass mug, combine the milk, honey and vanilla. Microwave on HIGH for about 1 1/2 minutes. Stir.']

title: Peanut Butter And Honey Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons peanut butter', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 teaspoon butter, softened', '2 slices bread']
directions: ['Stir the peanut butter, honey, and butter together in a bowl until smooth; spread on 1 of the bread slices and sandwich with the other slice.']

title: Chocolate Banana Pops
ingredients: ['4 banana, halved', '3 1/2 ounces dark chocolate']
directions: ['Stick bananas with a lollipop stick; place on a baking sheet and place in the freezer for 1 hour.', 'Place chocolate in top of a double boiler over simmering water. Stir frequently, scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching, until chocolate is melted, about 5 minutes.', 'Coat frozen bananas with melted chocolate.']

title: Boiled Tongue
ingredients: ['1 beef tongue', '1 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['Place the tongue in a soup pot with the salt, and add enough water to cover. Bring to a boil, and cook until the outer skin begins to peel off, about 2 1/2 to 3 hours. Peel off the thick outer skin, and serve.']

title: Homemade Vegetable Baby Food
ingredients: ['3 cups chopped carrots']
directions: ['Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with 2 inches of water or just below the bottom of the steamer. Bring water to a boil. Add carrots, cover, and steam until tender, about 10 minutes.', 'Transfer steamed carrots to a food processor and process until almost smooth, scraping down sides periodically. Add 1/4 cup water from the saucepan and process until carrots are smooth. Repeat until desired consistency is reached.', 'Scoop 1/3 to 1/2 cup pureed carrots into sandwich-size resealable bags. Squeeze bag to remove excess air and seal. Flatten bags and stack in the freezer.']

title: Watermelon Cooler
ingredients: ['1 small watermelon, seeded and cubed']
directions: ['Blend watermelon cubes in a blender until smooth. Chill before serving.']

title: Tropical Mangolicious Smoothie
ingredients: ['1/2 fresh pineapple, chopped into chunks and frozen', '1 cup orange juice', '1 mango - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks']
directions: ['Combine pineapple chunks, orange juice, and mango chunks in a blender; blend until smooth.']

title: Simple Sweet Potato Scramble
ingredients: ['1 sweet potato, peeled and cubed', '1 large egg']
directions: ['Steam or boil sweet potato cubes until very tender. Drain if necessary and mash or puree until you have your desired consistency', 'Whisk egg. Whisk in sweet potato puree until well combined. Heat a pan over medium heat. Add egg and sweet potato mixture and cook, stirring often, until cooked through and thickened.', 'Remove from heat, let cool and serve baby!']

title: Grilled Salt And Pepper Bread
ingredients: ['1 loaf French bread', '1/4 cup butter, room temperature', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat grill to medium.', 'Slice loaf lengthwise without cutting completely through the bread. Spread half of the butter on inside surfaces; season with salt and pepper. Coat the outside of the bread with remaining butter; season with salt and pepper.', 'Place loaf cut-side down on the grill; toast until browned, checking often, 3 to 5 minutes. Close loaf using tongs. Grill surface until crispy, checking often, 3 to 5 minutes per side.', 'Transfer loaf to a cutting board using tongs; slice into 10 diagonal slices.']

title: Simple Ghee
ingredients: ['2 pounds unsalted butter', '1 pinch salt']
directions: ['Melt butter in a large skillet over low heat until butter starts to foam and boil, about 10 minutes. Push the foam to the side, without stirring, to see if butter is clear, bright, and golden.', 'Remove skillet from heat and add salt; cool for about 2 minutes.', 'Pour butter through a fine-mesh strainer or cheesecloth to remove foam and particles into a glass container. Ghee will thicken and turn slightly translucent. Store in refrigerator.']

title: Easy Creamy Vanilla Fudge
ingredients: ["3 3/4 cups confectioners' sugar", '6 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons milk', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt']
directions: ['Grease a 9x5 inch pan. Set aside.', 'In a 3 quart saucepan, over very low heat, mix together confectioners sugar, butter, milk, vanilla, and salt until mixture is creamy.', 'Pour quickly into greased 9x5 inch pan. Refrigerate until firm, then cut into squares. Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator.']

title: Foamy Butter Sauce
ingredients: ['1/2 cup butter', '1 egg', "1 cup confectioners' sugar"]
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in the top of a double boiler. Cook, stirring until it forms a smooth sauce. Serve warm over chocolate roll.']

title: Homemade Blender Butter
ingredients: ['2 pints heavy whipping cream', 'salt to taste']
directions: ['Pour cream into a blender. Cover and blend until cream separates into buttermilk and butter, about 5 minutes. Pour buttermilk into a small bowl, using a spoon to press as much buttermilk out of the butter as possible. Place butter in a large bowl filled with cold water.', 'Knead butter in the cold water to remove all buttermilk, straining off and replacing the water 7 to 10 times as you work, until it remains clear, about 5 minutes. Pour off the water and knead butter a few more times to squeeze out any remaining water, about 1 minute. Transfer to a plate and knead in salt.']

title: Wine Glaze
ingredients: ["1 cup confectioners' sugar", '1/4 cup red wine']
directions: ['In a medium-size mixing bowl, combine confectioners sugar with wine. Pour over cake while cake is still hot.']

title: Homemade Peanut Butter
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons peanut oil', '2 pounds honey roasted peanuts']
directions: ['Pour the peanut oil into the bowl of a food processor. Turn the processor on. As the blade is spinning, gradually add the peanuts. Process until smooth, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed, about 2 minutes. Store refrigerated in an airtight container.']

title: Sun-Dried Tomatoes I
ingredients: ['4 pounds tomatoes', 'salt to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C).', 'Wash and halve tomatoes. Gently squeeze out the seeds. Place the tomatoes on a non-stick cookie sheet, and sprinkle with salt to taste.', 'Bake until tomatoes take on a leathery texture. This could literally take all day; smaller pieces will require less oven time.']

title: Honey Tomatoes
ingredients: ['2 large tomatoes, each cut into 8 wedges', '2 1/2 cups honey']
directions: ['Place the tomatoes in a jar, or storage container, and pour the honey over. Refrigerate for 30 minutes, then remove tomatoes from the honey, and serve.']

title: Bacon For The Family Or A Crowd
ingredients: ['1 pound thick sliced bacon']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil. Arrange bacon on baking sheet in a single layer with the edges touching or slightly overlapping.', 'Bake in preheated oven to desired degree of doneness, 10 to 15 minutes. Remove bacon from the baking sheet with tongs or a fork, and drain on a paper towel-lined plate.']

title: Tomato Concasse
ingredients: ['3 tomatoes, cored']
directions: ['Fill a large bowl with ice cubes and water and set aside.', 'Bring a large pot of water to a boil.', 'Cut an X in the bottom of each tomato with a knife.', 'Place prepared tomatoes in the pot of boiling water and cook until the skins begin to peel off, 10 to 40 seconds.', 'Transfer tomatoes to the bowl of ice water and allow to cool for 2 to 3 minutes. When cool enough to handle, peel the skin off each tomato.', 'Cut each tomato in half crosswise and remove and discard the seeds; finely dice the flesh.']

title: Delicious Turkey Glaze
ingredients: ['1/4 cup sugar-free organic apple juice', '1/3 cup melted butter', '1/3 cup honey']
directions: ['In a small bowl, whisk together the apple cider, butter and honey.', 'Brush over entire bird 45 minutes before it completes cooking. Repeat several times before removing turkey from oven.']

title: Butter Icing For Cookies
ingredients: ["2 cups confectioners' sugar", '2 1/2 tablespoons cream', '4 tablespoons butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ["In a saucepan, over medium heat, heat cream and butter until butter is melted. Stir in the vanilla and confectioners' sugar. Remove from heat, and beat with an electric mixer until thick and smooth."]

title: Homemade Stewed Tomatoes
ingredients: ['10 ripe tomatoes', '2 teaspoons salt']
directions: ['To peel the tomatoes, place them in boiling water for 1 minute and then immediately transfer to cold water. Peel and quarter tomatoes, and place in a large saucepan with the salt. Slowly simmer over low heat for 20 to 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent burning.']

title: Creamy Pineapple And Banana Smoothie
ingredients: ['1 cup frozen pineapple chunks, thawed', '1 cup milk', '1/2 banana', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Combine pineapple chunks, milk, banana, honey, and vanilla extract in a blender; blend until smooth.']

title: Goat Cheese Salmon
ingredients: ['4 salmon fillets', '1/2 cup herbed goat cheese', '1/4 cup prepared Dijon mustard mayonnaise blend', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a large baking dish.', 'Arrange the salmon fillets in the baking dish. Make small incisions in each fillet, and stuff with equal amounts of the herbed goat cheese. Spread equal amounts prepared Dijon mustard mayonnaise blend over each fillet. Season with salt and pepper.', 'Bake salmon 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until easily flaked with a fork.']

title: Creamy Avocado Smoothie
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups milk', '1 avocado, cut into chunks', '1/2 cup yogurt', '1 banana, halved']
directions: ['Combine milk, avocado, yogurt, and banana in a blender; blend until smooth. Divide between 2 glasses.']

title: Easy Baked Zucchini Chips
ingredients: ['1 zucchini, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon garlic-flavored olive oil', 'sea salt to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).', 'Place zucchini in a bowl. Drizzle olive oil over zucchini and lightly toss to coat; season with salt. Spread zucchini onto a baking sheet.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 20 minutes.']

title: Substitute Whipped Cream
ingredients: ['1 quart skim milk', "1/2 cup confectioners' sugar", '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ["Place milk in freezer for 1 hour. Remove and pour into a tall cylindrical container. Using an immersion blender, start at the bottom and slowly draw the blender up at a tilt. Gradually add confectioners' sugar while continuing to move blender up and down to build volume. When milk begins to form soft peaks, mix in vanilla extract. Serve immediately."]

title: Grilled Garlic Scapes
ingredients: ['8 garlic scapes', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Combine garlic scapes, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a bowl and turn to coat evenly. Marinate for 20 minutes.', 'Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.', 'Place garlic scapes on the grill and grill until well charred and tender at the thickest part, 1 to 2 minutes per side.']

title: Vanilla Glaze
ingredients: ["1 1/2 cups confectioners' sugar", '2 1/2 teaspoons milk', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon butter']
directions: ['Melt the butter and add to rest of ingredients. Mix until creamy.']

title: Fry Sauce
ingredients: ['1/3 cup ketchup', '2/3 cup mayonnaise']
directions: ['Mix ketchup and mayonnaise together in a small bowl until thoroughly blended.']

title: Steamed Zucchini
ingredients: ['4 zucchini', '2 cloves garlic', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
directions: ['Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Trim ends from zucchini. Cut each one in half, then cut each half lengthwise into quarters.', 'Place zucchini and garlic into a steamer basket, then place the steamer basket into the pot. Steam for 10 to 15 minutes, or until the zucchini are tender.', 'Transfer zucchini to a large bowl. Mash the garlic and put it in the bowl with the zucchini. Drizzle the olive oil into the bowl and toss until the vegetables are coated with oil and garlic.']

title: Honey Roasted Carrots
ingredients: ['8 carrots, peeled', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1/4 cup honey', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Place the whole carrots into a baking dish, and drizzle with olive oil. Mix until the carrots are completely covered with olive oil. Pour on the honey, then season to taste with salt and pepper; mix until evenly coated.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until just tender, or cooked to your desired degree of doneness, 40 minutes to 1 hour.']

title: Fake Whip Cream Frosting
ingredients: ["3/4 cup confectioners' sugar", '1 egg white', '1 cup grated apple', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
directions: ["In a large bowl, combine confectioners' sugar, egg white, grated apple and vanilla. Beat on high speed of an electric mixer until desired consistency is achieved."]

title: Burnt Butter Frosting
ingredients: ['1/2 cup butter', "4 cups confectioners' sugar", '4 tablespoons milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Place the butter in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring constantly, until the butter is a nice tan color. If it gets dark brown or black you have allowed it to burn too long. When butter has been "burned" remove the saucepan from the heat.', "Slowly mix in confectioners' sugar and vanilla. Beat on high speed of an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Beat in the milk a tablespoon at a time until desired spreading consistency is achieved. Use frosting immediately, as this frosting will set up quickly."]

title: Best Croutons Ever
ingredients: ['1/4 cup butter', '4 slices bread', '1/4 teaspoon garlic powder']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.', 'Melt butter in a pot over medium heat.', 'Cut each bread slice into 16 cubes; add bread cubes and garlic powder to melted butter. Stir to coat. Transfer coated bread cubes to the prepared baking sheet.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until crispy, 8 to 10 minutes.']

title: Actifried Chicken Wings
ingredients: ['1 kg chicken wings', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Put the chicken wings in the ActiFry. Close the lid.', 'Leave to cook for 12 minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste.', 'If you wish to add a sauce (barbecue) or spices (paprika, Cajun, etc), add 1 or 2 ActiFry spoons 5 minutes before the end of cooking time.']

title: Blended Banana Ice Cream
ingredients: ['4 banana, sliced']
directions: ['Place banana slices in a resealable freezer bag. Freeze until firm, about 1 hour.', 'Empty banana slices into a blender; blend until creamy and the consistency of ice cream. Scoop into a bowl.']

title: 2-Ingredient Wheat-Free Banana Pancakes (Paleo)
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon butter', '1 large banana, broken into chunks', '1 large egg']
directions: ['Heat a large skillet over medium heat; add butter.', 'Mash banana chunks in a bowl using a fork until it becomes a wet consistency. Add egg and whisk mixture until batter is smooth.', 'Drop batter into the hot butter to make 2 pancakes. Cook until bubbles form and the edges are dry, about 3 minutes. Flip and cook until browned on the other side, about 2 minutes.']

title: Easy Pineapple Sorbet
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups orange juice', '1 cup frozen pineapple chunks']
directions: ['Mix orange juice and pineapple in a blender on high speed until smooth. Transfer to a covered container; freeze for at least 5 hours.']

title: Peanut Butter Granola
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons margarine', '1/3 cup peanut butter', '1/3 cup honey', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '3 cups oatmeal']
directions: ['Melt together margarine, peanut butter and honey.', 'Add vanilla and salt.', 'Add oatmeal and toss to coat completely.', 'Spread on baking sheet.', 'Bake at 375 about 10 minutes. Stir after 5 minutes.', 'Store at room temperature in sealed container.', "Note.watch it closely while it bakes -- it burns easily, especially around the edges where it's spread thinner on the pan.", 'Also note -- I omit the salt without noticing any change in flavour.']

title: Baked Planked Carp
ingredients: ['1 large carp, cleaned', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'olive oil']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325 f .', 'Rub olive oil over one side of plank.', 'Salt and pepper the plank.', 'Rub olive oil on both sides of fish.', 'Salt and pepper both sides of fish.', 'Place fish on seasoned plank.', 'Place in oven and baked for 30 minutes.', 'Remove from oven.', 'Throw carp in trash and eat the plank.']

title: Simple Tomato Puree
ingredients: ['20 heirloom tomatoes, skinned snd cored', '2 tablespoons sugar']
directions: ['Liquidise the tomatoes in a blender.', 'Simmer the tomatoes and sugar together in a large heavy duty saucepan for several hours until a thick puree consistency has been achieved, stirring occasionally ( mine took 8 hours ).', 'Push puree through sieve to remove seeds.', 'Freeze portions in small ziploc feezer bags.']

title: 15 Minute Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup peanut butter', '1 cup sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F.', 'Put peanut butter into a medium sized bowl. Stir in egg until it is a consistent texture.', 'Butter or place waxpaper on a cookie sheet. Then begin to take approximately a tablespoon of the cookie dough and roll it into a ball. Place on the cookie sheet with a little less then an inch of space.', 'Take a fork and push down on the top of the cookies until you have reached the desired thickness of your cookie. (Note: when baked the cookies do not spread a significant amount. Maybe a centimeter or two. Keep that in mind when sizing your cookie.).', 'Optional: Sprinkle some sugar onto the top of the cookies before baking. This is especially helpful if you tend to have a sweet tooth like me!', "Bake for 10-12 minutes. Depending on your oven you may need to cook it for a longer/shorter period of time. (Tip: If you're not sure if your cookie is done try sticking a fork into the center and pull it out. If there is batter on your fork, put your cookies back in the oven for another minute or two. If your fork comes out clean, your cookies are done!).", 'Let cool for 2 minutes, and enjoy!']

title: Alioli
ingredients: ['1 head garlic', '1 cup olive oil', 'salt, to taste']
directions: ['Peel the garlic. Add salt.', 'Crush together in a mortar until a pulp forms. Or, use a little plate with raised nubs that you rub the garlic over to form a paste, then add the salt.', 'Beat oil into garlic slowly, until you get a consistency like mayonnaise.']

title: Mayo And Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon mayonnaise', '3 slices medium cheddar, sliced thick', '2 slices bread, works best on white']
directions: ['Place cheese on bread.', 'Spread with mayonnaise, as much as you want, the more the better.', 'Put other piece of bread on top.', 'Cut into 4 triangles.', 'Voila!', 'A truly yummy, simple sammie.']

title: Beer Braised Onions
ingredients: ['1/2 ounce unsalted butter', '1 large onion, thinly sliced', '8 fluid ounces beer', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['Melt the butter in a pan. Add the onions and cook until tender.', 'Add 6 fl oz beer, sugar and salt. Cook approx 16/18 minutes until the beer is absorbed and the onions are starting to brown.', 'Add the remaining beer and simmer gently.', 'Serve warm to accompany burgers.']

title: Shrimp & Bacon Pasta
ingredients: ['salt and pepper', '5 slices bacon', '1 lb pasta', '1 onion, chopped', '1 lb frozen large peeled and deveined shrimp, thawed', '2 tomatoes, cored and cut into 1/2-inch chunks']
directions: ['Bring a large pot of water to a rolling boil and salt it generously.', 'While the water comes to a boil, cook the bacon in a large, deep skillet, turning occasionally, over medium heat until crisp, about 10 minutes. Transfer to paper towels to drain and crumble.
