Once all chopped, put everything in our already roasting vegetables, add a bit more olive oil and mix it will continue cooking for another 5 minutes. Next, close our vegetables reduce cover and leave to stew for 5 - 10 minutes. Add Basil and dill. At this stage, our future can vegetable soup salt and pepper.', 'Put everything in a pot and fill with water so that she would shut the vegetables. Bring to a boil and add beans. Remove the pan from the heat and put our pots a quarter of the vegetables, chop them in a blender to puree. Put the vegetable puree back in the pan and everything hurt. Let to infuse our soup 20 to 30 minutes and serve.\nBon appetit!']

title: Mango Coulis
ingredients: ['2 cups mango Cubed', '1/2 cup sugar']
directions: ['Combine mango and sugar in a blender and process.', 'Add enough water to make a pourable sauce.']

title: Fried Eggplant I
ingredients: ['egg', 'salt', 'butter', 'eggplant']
directions: ['Pare an egg plant and cut in very thin slices.', 'Sprinkle slices with salt and pile on a plate.', 'Cover with a weight to express the juice, and let stand one and one-half hours.', 'Dredge with flour and sautee slowly in butter until crisp and brown.', 'Eggplant is in season from September to February.']

title: Zucchini Recipes
ingredients: ['zucchini']
directions: ['Zucchini Bacon-Egg-and-Cheese: Saute 1 1/2 cups grated zucchini in butter over medium heat until dry. Add 3 beaten egg whites; scramble. Add 1/4 cup shredded pepper Jack cheese; cook until melted. Serve in a toasted, buttered roll with cooked bacon.', 'Zucchini Frittata: Saute 1 medium sliced zucchini and 1 large peeled, sliced potato in olive oil in a medium nonstick ovenproof skillet until tender; season with salt and pepper. Whisk 8 eggs with 1/2 cup grated Parmesan, 1/4 cup cream, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt and a few grinds of pepper. Pour over the vegetables. Bake at 400 degrees F until set, about 15 minutes.', 'Zucchini-Cheddar Scones: Pulse 2 1/2 cups flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder and 1 teaspoon salt in a food processor. Add 1 stick diced cold butter; pulse until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Pulse in 1 egg and 1/3 cup cream. Add 1 cup each grated zucchini and shredded cheddar, and 2 tablespoons chopped chives. Pulse until clumps form. Pat into a 1-inch-thick round on a parchment-lined baking sheet; cut into 12 wedges and pull apart. Bake at 400 degrees F until golden, 20 to 25 minutes.', 'Zucchini Lemon-Poppy Seed Muffins: Whisk 2 cups flour, 3/4 cup sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Whisk 3/4 cup each milk and vegetable oil, 2 eggs, 1 1/2 cups grated zucchini, 2 tablespoons poppy seeds, 2 teaspoons grated lemon zest and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Stir the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Divide among 12 lined muffin cups. Bake at 350 degrees F until a toothpick inserted into the centers comes out clean, about 20 minutes.', 'Skillet Zucchini Cornbread: Whisk 2 cups flour, 1 cup sugar, 2/3 cup cornmeal, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon baking soda. Whisk 1 cup each grated zucchini and milk, 2 sticks melted butter and 2 eggs. Stir the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Butter a 10-inch cast-iron skillet. Pour in the batter and smooth the top; bake at 375 degrees F until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 40 to 45 minutes.', 'Zucchini Ricotta Toasts: Mix 1 1/2 cups grated zucchini, 1 cup ricotta and 1 tablespoon chopped mint; season with salt and pepper. Spread on grilled bread; drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with flaky sea salt and chopped squash blossoms.', 'Grilled Zucchini: Slice 2 medium zucchini lengthwise 1/4 inch thick; toss with olive oil, salt and pepper. Grill over medium-high heat until lightly charred and tender, 2 minutes per side.', 'Zucchini-Corn Tacos: Make Grilled Zucchini (No. 7), tossing with 1 teaspoon cumin before grilling; chop. Serve in tortillas with charred corn kernels, salsa and crumbled queso fresco.', 'Zucchini Dip: Make Grilled Zucchini (No. 7). Puree with 1/4 cup mint leaves, 1 garlic clove, the juice of 1 lemon, and 3 tablespoons each tahini and olive oil; season with salt. Thin with water. Sprinkle with paprika. Serve with pita bread.', 'Zucchini Saute: Cook 2 sliced celery stalks, 1 each chopped fennel bulb and onion, and 3 smashed garlic cloves in olive oil over medium heat, 5 minutes. Add 3 cups each chopped zucchini, yellow squash and bell pepper; saute 5 minutes. Add 1/2 cup water, 2 tablespoons each red wine vinegar and tomato paste, and 2 teaspoons sugar. Simmer, covered, 15 minutes. Stir in chopped olives and parsley.', 'Zucchini Chips: Shave 1 medium zucchini into long strips using a vegetable peeler; toss with 1/4 cup each flour and grated Parmesan mixed with 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt. In batches, deep-fry in 325 degrees F oil (half olive oil, half vegetable oil), stirring with a fork to separate, until browned and crisp, 3 to 5 minutes. Drain on a rack; season with salt.', 'Zucchini Quesadillas: Saute 1/2 each medium chopped zucchini, onion and poblano chile and 6 chopped squash blossoms with 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt in butter over medium-high heat until softened. Divide between two large flour tortillas along with 1 cup shredded Jack cheese. Fold in half and cook in a large buttered skillet over medium heat until golden and the cheese melts, 3 minutes per side.', 'Roasted Zucchini: Slice 2 medium zucchini 1/2 inch thick; toss with 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon thyme leaves, 1 minced garlic clove, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt and a few grinds of pepper. Roast at 450 degrees F until tender, 10 minutes.', 'Spicy Zucchini Potato Salad: Make Roasted Zucchini (No. 13). Boil 8 ounces baby potatoes in salted water, 10 to 15 minutes; drain. Whisk 1/4 cup olive oil with 1 tablespoon harissa; toss with the zucchini, potatoes, 1/4 cup green olives, 1 sliced celery stalk and 2 tablespoons chopped celery leaves.', 'Zucchini Gratin: Saute 1 chopped onion in 3 tablespoons butter in an ovenproof skillet over medium-high heat, 3 minutes. Add 2 medium sliced zucchini and 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt; saute 4 minutes. Add 2 tablespoons flour; cook, stirring, 1 minute. Whisk in 1 cup milk, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt and a pinch of cayenne; cook, stirring, until thickened, 2 to 3 minutes. Sprinkle with 1 cup shredded dill Havarti, 1/4 cup breadcrumbs and some chopped parsley. Broil until golden.', 'Stuffed Zucchini: Halve 2 large zucchini lengthwise; scoop out the seeded flesh and mix with 2 cups cooked rice, 12 ounces ground beef, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan, 1 egg, 1 tablespoon each chopped lemon zest, chives and parsley, and 1 1/2 teaspoons kosher salt. Spoon into the zucchini halves and bake in a baking dish at 375 degrees F, 45 minutes. Top with more Parmesan and parsley; drizzle with olive oil.', 'Sweet-and-Sour Zucchini with Pork: Marinate 8 ounces thinly sliced pork tenderloin in 1 teaspoon each rice vinegar and soy sauce and 1/2 teaspoon each sesame oil and sugar. Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a nonstick skillet over high heat. Stir-fry the pork until just cooked through, 2 minutes; remove. Add 1 tablespoon vegetable oil and 3 sliced garlic cloves; stir-fry 30 seconds. Add 2 medium thinly sliced zucchini and 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt; stir-fry 3 minutes. Stir in the pork and 1/2 teaspoon each sugar and rice vinegar.', 'Zucchini Bread: Whisk 1 1/2 cups flour, 1 cup sugar and 1/2 teaspoon each baking powder, baking soda and salt. Whisk 2 eggs, 1 1/2 cups grated zucchini, 1/2 cup vegetable oil and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Stir the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Butter an 8-inch loaf pan. Pour in the batter; bake at 325 degrees F until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 1 hour to 1 hour 10 minutes. Let cool.']

title: Oven Baked Chicken Wings
ingredients: ['1 1/2 pounds chicken wings', 'sea salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425F', 'Wash wings in cold water and pat dry', 'Season wings on both sides with all spices', 'Place wings on baking sheet covered in parchment paper in single layer', 'Bake in oven for 40 minutes or until chicken is baked through', 'Create a dipping sauce that you enjoy or just eat as baked', 'Enjoy !!!']

title: Gluten Free Meatballs
ingredients: ['minced beef 2 pounds ground', '1 egg', '1 onion finely chopped', 'salt', 'pepper', 'olive oil']
directions: ['Mix all of the ingredients in a bowl', 'Make meatball sized balls out of the mix (it should hold together well. Add g-free breadcrumbs if too sticky)', 'Fry in olive oil', 'Serve with or without tomato sauce. (we ate one batch with baked rosemary potatoes and another on polenta with tomato sauce)']

title: Oven Baked Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['1 cup rice', '3/4 sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla', '3 tablespoons butter']
directions: ['Fill bowl to within 1 inch of top with milk.', 'Sprinkle with cinnamon.', 'Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour - turn up to 400 degrees for another 1/2 hour or until rice is tender.']

title: Fillet Steak With Onion And Red Wine Sauce And Mashed Potatoes Recipe
ingredients: ['sea salt', '1 pinch sugar', '1 tablespoon butter']
directions:
['Put out your steak from the fridge go allow time to get close to room temperature.', 'Sauce:
Slice your onions thin and in a large pre heated pan add your oil and start to fry your onions with rosemary, salt and peppers until golden. Now it is time to add your wine and stir. When the when your red wine is reduced dissolve your cornstarch in cold water and add to your sauce and stir well. Add your butter and sugar. When it is reduced your sauce is ready.', 'Mashed potatoes: 
Now it is time to boil your potatoes. Peel and cut your potatoes in medium sized cubes and set them to boil in a pan with salt, black and white pepper and butter. 
After about 25-30 minutes your potatoes are ready to be mashed. Test them if they are soft (stick a knife in a potato and if it glides off it is ready). Now add your warm milk, butter, grated nutmeg (optional) and mash with your masker. Taste and seasoning if needed.', 'Steak:
For your steak, season with black pepper, sea salt, white pepper and coat with oil. Heat your pan on high temperature and seal your steak form all the sides. Then make your steak as you like it (blue, rare, medium, done) If you want your steak done or medium you can put it in a oven for some time for it to cook properly on your pan on low heat for about 15 minutes. I like my steak medium-rare so that is about 4 minutes on each side.', 'Plate your food and enjoy.']

title: Watermelon Jam
ingredients: ['3 pounds watermelon', '3 cups sugar 1 1/2 pounds']
directions: ['Peel and seed the watermelon; dice the flesh.', 'Put one layer of watermelon into a bowl and add a layer of sugar; continue until all the watermelon and sugar have been used.', 'Cover the bowl and let it stand in a cool place for 4 hours.', 'Place this mixture in a preserving kettle and cook over moderate heat, stirring frequently, until mixture is thick, about 45 to 50 minutes.', 'Skim off foam with a metal spoon, if needed.', 'Ladle into hot, sterilized jars and seal immediately according to standard']

title: Good And Easy Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Mix ingredients together.', 'Form into balls.', 'Put onto ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Press down.', "Bake at 350 degrees (don't over cook); watch because they burn easily."]

title: Perfect fried egg
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 onion', '1 olive oil, extra virgin']
directions: ['Put olive oil into skillet', 'Cut onion into rings.', 'When oil is .', 'Hot place one ring into skillet', 'Crack egg into center of onion ring.', 'Bust yoke if desired.', 'When almost done cooking carefully flip over and cook a few seconds longer serve.']

title: Vanilla Latte
ingredients: ['2 cups freshly brewed MAXWELL HOUSE Coffee, any flavor Walgreens $6.99 thru 02/06', '3 cups milk', '2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Pour coffee into 6 large cups or mugs.', 'Heat milk in small saucepan on low heat until warm, stirring briskly and constantly with wire whisk to create foam.', 'Remove from heat; stir in vanilla.', 'Stir milk mixture into coffee.', 'Serve immediately with NILLA Wafers.']

title: Buttered Potatoes
ingredients: ['1 lb new potato', '2 tablespoons butter']
directions: ['Boil potatoes.', 'Mash potatoes.', 'Mix in melted butter.', 'Enjoy.']

title: Pb&b Shake
ingredients: ['1 banana, peeled sliced, and frozen', '1 12 cups milk', '12 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon peanut butter']
directions: ['The night before prep, peel and slice the banana, stick the pieces in a plastic baggie, and put that into the freezer.', 'This will add a nice burst of freshness and cold to go through you.', 'At the time of prep, put the bananas, milk, vanilla extract, and peanut butter into the blender.', 'It works out for the better if they go in in that order.', 'Blend the ingredients until the mixture is a nice beige color, or for about 30 seconds.', 'Serve, sip, and smile!']

title: Simply Made Salted Yogurt Toast
ingredients: ['1 White sliced bread', '1 Salted yogurt', '1 Olive oil', '1 Black pepper']
directions: ['Toast the bread (I think thinly sliced is best!)', 'until browned.', 'Spread salted yogurt on top.', 'Top with olive oil and black pepper to taste.', 'Enjoy.']

title: Fennel Salad
ingredients: ['2 bulbs fennel, chopped', '4 ounces olive oil', 'Salt and black pepper']
directions: ['In a mixing bowl, combine chopped fennel and olive oil.', 'Add salt and pepper to taste and mix thoroughly.']

title: Red-Wine Caipirinha
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons granulated sugar', '1/2 lime, cut into 4 wedges', '3 ounces red wine, preferably Rioja']
directions: ['In a highball glass, muddle the sugar and the lime wedges.', 'Fill the glass with ice cubes.', 'Pour the wine into the glass.', 'Stir well, and serve.']

title: mac meets tuna
ingredients: ['2 mac &cheese', '1/4 butter', '2 tuna']
directions: ['set up water for noodles', 'let noodles boil then drain a bur a lil water', 'add 2 cans of tuna to butter and water mix with noodles stir till tuna blends almost with noodles', 'finally add cheese mix and stir till mixed the place in bowl and salt and pepper if u want :)', 'now enjoy']

title: How to Roast Garlic to Perfection and Ways to Use it
ingredients: ['1 head Garlic', '1 teaspoon Olive Oil']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 180 degrees C (350 degrees F).', 'Peel most of the outer garlic head wrappers and trim 1/4 inch off the top of the garlic head.', 'Place the garlic head (or heads, if making multiple batches) on a piece of aluminium foil big, enough to wrap it around the heads.', 'Drizzle extra virgin olive oil over the exposed tops of the cloves and allow the olive oil to run down to the inner parts of the garlic head.', 'Wrap the garlic head in the aluminium foil and place it on the baking tray, in the oven (trimmed top up).', 'Bake for 40 minutes.', '(For deeper color and flavor, extend the roasting time to 5060 minutes.)']

title: Mozzarella-Tomato Melts
ingredients: ['1/2 of a 12-oz. loaf ciabatta bread, cut into thirds', '3 KRAFT 2% Milk Mozzarella Singles Target 2 For $5.00 thru 02/06', '2 large tomatoes, cut into thin slices Safeway 1 lb For $1.29 thru 02/09']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400F.', 'Split each bread piece horizontally in half; fill evenly with 2% Milk Singles and tomatoes.', 'Place on baking sheet; cover with foil.', 'Bake 10 min.', 'or until 2% Milk Singles are melted and sandwiches are heated through.']

title: Chicken-Skin Croutons
ingredients: ['Chicken skin reserved from backbone, legs and thighs of a 3-to-4-pound chicken', 'Salt']
directions: ['Heat the oven to 400 degrees.', 'Lay the skin flat on a baking sheet, making sure not to let the pieces overlap; sprinkle with salt.', 'Roast for 15 to 20 minutes or until the skin releases easily from the pan.', 'Flip the pieces and continue to cook for another 10 to 15 minutes or until its very crisp.', 'Remove the pan from the oven; put the skin on paper towels and reserve the fat.', 'Crumble into a salad or serve as a premeal snack, with more salt if necessary.']

title: Char-Grilled Pineapple With Jerked Honey Rum Glaze
ingredients: ['1 unpeeled medium pineapple, quartered', '1 recipe of jerked honey rum glaze']
directions: ['Cut away the core from the pineapple quarters.', 'Grill over medium-low coals, brushing with glaze until hot and lightly charred, about 5-10 minutes per side.', 'Serve hot with any remaining glaze drizzled over.']

title: Easy Roasted Broccoli
ingredients: ['14 ounces broccoli', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).', 'Cut broccoli florets from the stalk.', 'Peel the stalk and slice into 1/4-inch slices.', 'Mix florets and stem pieces with olive oil in a bowl and transfer to a baking sheet; season with salt and pepper.', 'Roast in the preheated oven until broccoli is tender and lightly browned, about 18 minutes.']

title: Pommes de Terre pour le Petit Dejeuner
ingredients: ['potato, raw', 'bacon grease']
directions: ['Peel and prepare the spuds however you like for the final product, ie diced, sliced as thin as potato chips, or grated.', 'Next, for the real old-fashioned diner-type spud, parboil them THE NIGHT BEFORE!', 'They should be dropped into rapidly boiling water, and then returned to a boil- by the time the water has returned to a"rolling" boil, they should be done.', 'Stir them a couple times and taste-test one or two- the"crunch" of fresh spuds should be all gone, but they can\'t be mushy- then, drain them completely and run COLD water over them until they are no longer warm (If you fail to do this, the internal heat of the spuds will continue to cook them).', 'NOTE: If using grated or very thinly sliced potatoes, drain and rinse them before the water returns to a full boil, because they will cook very quickly.', 'Store the drained, parboiled spuds in a sealed container in the fridge and refrigerate overnight.', "Next morning, pull out the amount of spuds you'll need- about 1 medium potato or 1 large handful per person.", 'Then, pre-heat a skillet or griddle until a drop of water"dances".', "Add your bacon grease- the amount is up to you and the quantity you're cooking- you will need enough to lightly coat all the spuds.", 'Keep the cooking heat around a medium temperature- grills in diners are kept at a constant temperature all day long, and you need even heat for best results.', 'Use a heavy cast-iron or aluminum pan or griddle- you are going to be dropping cold spuds into hot grease and thin pans will cool off rapidly, requiring extra cooking time to re-heat the pan.', 'Drop the spuds into the grease and flip them constantly until they are all coated with grease.', 'Press down to ensure even heating and place a flat pot lid over the potatoes until they are ready to turn the first time.', 'Brown them to your desired preference.', 'Turn them once and, when they are browned on the other side, use your spatula to break them loose from the pan and slide onto a serving plate.', 'Enjoy.']

title: How to Preserve Butter
ingredients: ['1 block Butter']
directions: ['Tear off the paper surrounding the block of butter all except for the base.', 'Slice the butter into 1 cm widthwise.', 'Next, slice the block in half lengthwise, then slice one of the halves in half once again.', 'The large pats of butter are 10 g, and the small pats are 5 g.', 'Keeping the butter on the paper, transfer to a butter dish.', 'This will make clean up easy.', 'User Amanda commented that she also slipped the expiration date on the butter box into the butter dish.', 'Great idea.', 'Go ahead and use it.']

title: Fruited Ice Cubes
ingredients: ['KOOL-AID Sugar-Sweetened Drink Mix, any flavor']
directions: ['Fill ice trays with your favorite flavored prepared KOOL-AID Sugar-Sweetened Soft Drink Mix.', 'Add a few small pieces of fruit (such as blueberries, raspberries, grapes, strawberries) to each cube slot.', 'Freeze until firm.']

title: Longing for Whipped Butter
ingredients: ['100 grams Butter', '20 ml Milk']
directions: ['Bring the butter to room temperature (until you can easily press your finger into it).', 'Whip it well.', 'Add a bit of milk and whip.', 'Add some more milk and whip some more.', 'Continue this way until all of it is whipped in!', '!', 'Transfer to a dish and chill in the refrigerator to finish!']

title: Vanilla Sauce
ingredients: ['12 cup butter', '34 cup sugar', '12 cup evaporated milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Melt butter in a sauce pan.', 'Add sugar and milk.', 'Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2-3 minutes or until thickened.', 'Remove from the heat.', 'Stir in vanilla.', 'Serve with cake.']

title: Pork rillette
ingredients: ['2 cups cooked pork', '1/2 cup mayonnaise', '1 dash salt & pepper']
directions: ['Chopped the pork fine.', 'In a bowl, mix the pork chopped, mayonnaise, salt & pepper.', 'Enjoy on the bread you like .']

title: Butter, Cultured
ingredients: ['1 gallon manufacturing cream', '2 teaspoons salt']
directions: ['Culture the cream: pour cream into a container, cover and let sit at room temperature for 2-3 days.', 'The cream will seperate some, and will sour.', 'This is a good thing!', 'Stir the cream to reincorporate the ingredients.', 'Begin to slowly whip the cream, by hand or using a stand-mixer.', 'When soft peaks begin to form whip faster.', 'The butter fat will begin to seperate from the butter milk -- continue to whip until you have pea sized chunks of the butter fat clinging to the side of the bowl.', 'This step may take some time, but be patient, it will happen!', 'Line a collander or strainer with cheesecloth and place your butter fat / butter milk into the cheesecloth (make sure to catch the butter milk!', 'you can use it for pancakes later!', ').', 'Pull the ends of the cheese cloth together and press down to get rid of more of the butter milk.', "You should now have a large hunk of very soft butter -- it's still got some butter milk incorporated into it, so --", "You now want to rinse the butter under cold running water to remove more of the butter milk -- I do it a small handfull at a time, and I do it over a strainer or collander so I don't lose any small pieces.", "It takes some practice, but you'll get the hang of it quickly.", "After you've rinsed all the butter, place it in a mixing bowl and begin to press it up against the side of the bowl using a flat spoon or rubber spatula.", "You'll release more butter milk and water this way, so make sure to drain that off as you go.", "This is also the step where you will add any 'special' ingredients i.e.", "salt, lavender, honey, whatever -- I prefer to make it un-salted, but recipezaar won't let me post a recipe with only one ingredient, so I'm listing salt --", "when you're done with this step place the butter in some kind of mold (I use a cake pan lined with cheesecloth) and place it in the fridge.", 'after a few hours the butter will have set and if you want to cut it into smaller pieces you can do so --', 'This is an incredibly simplified version of the recipe that I use to make the butter that we sell at the shop I work at -- I make approximately double this recipe every week.', "It's easy and, actually, kind of fun.", "The end product will be much smoother and fresher than any butter you would buy at the store (unless, of course, you're shopping where I work :) .)", 'Starting with a better product will, of course, yield a better result.', 'I suggest using raw, organic, unpasteurized cream, if you can get it.', 'You will be pleasantly surprised with the result, and you will be doing your body, and the local economy, a favor.', 'A note about culturing -- you can omit this step if you like, but I reccomend trying it at least once.', "I think if you do, you'll never go back.", "It gives butter a characteristic flavor and a little more 'zing.'", 'I often have customers questioning this step saying things like "So you just let the milk go BAD?', 'Isn\'t that un-healthy?"', 'I usually try to calm them by pointing out that this has been done for centuries with much success.', 'A note about temperature -- you will find it very difficult to do this recipe in a hot kitchen.', "The butter will melt constantly and you'll lose more in the rinsing process.", 'At the same time, a cold kitchen will make it difficult as well.', 'I find that 70 to 75 degrees is the ideal temperature.']

title: Magic Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix together and form into balls.', 'Press flat on an ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Bake at 350 degrees for 10 min.']

title: Easy Peanut Butter Dip for Fruit
ingredients: ['13 cup creamy peanut butter', '1 teaspoon honey']
directions: ['Spoon peanut butter into micorwave safe bowl top with honey.', 'Microwave for about 30-45 seconds and mix to distribute honey evenly.', 'Dip fruit in while hot and enjoy!']

title: Fry Sauce!
ingredients: ['1 cup Mayonnaise', '1- 1/2 cup Ketchup']
directions: ['Add the mayo to the ketchup.', 'Mix until a pink color.', 'Enjoy!', 'Serve chilled!']

title: Fudge a la Louise
ingredients: ['4 cups sugar', '3 squares chocolate unsweetened dark', '113 cups milk', '2 tablespoons butter plus extra for, greasing platters', '1 cup nuts chopped', '113 teaspoons vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a heavy saucepan mix together the sugar, chocolate, and milk.', 'Place the pan over high heat and stir constantly until the choclate is melted and the sugar is dissolved.', 'Bring to a full boil, and lower the heat so the candy continues to boil gently, not vigorously.', 'Stir no more.', 'Put a candy thermometer into the center of the mixture and cook until the temperature reaches exactly 232 F.', 'Meanwhile, butter a large platter (turkey size) and a flat pan about 11 by 13 inches.', 'When the fudge reaches 232 F, pour it into the readied platter - do not scrape the pan, but let it drip out.', 'Dot with 2 tablespoons butter and let the mixture cool until the platter feels cool underneath.', 'Add vanilla.', 'Take a large slotted spoon and start to stir the liquidy mixture - it will take about 15 or 20 minutes.', 'You will see a steady change from dark to light color, from glossy to dull, from liquid to solid.', 'When the fudge begins to get dull, add the nuts and mix in thoroughly.', 'Put fudge into the large buttered pan and press into shape with the flat of your palms.', "Cut into squares; store in airtight container if there's any left."]

title: Toad in the Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'butter', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Butter both sides of a slice of bread.', 'Using a round cookie cutter, cut a hole in the middle of the slice of bread.', 'Heat a skillet.', 'Put slice of bread in the skillet.', 'Crack egg and pour into hole in the bread.', 'Cook til bread is done on one side.', 'Flip using a pancake turner.', 'Finish cooking til egg is desired doneness.']

title: Asparagus Tips With Lemon Butter Recipe
ingredients: ['18 x to 20 thin spears of asparagus', '1 Tbsp. butter Half a lemon Healthy pinch of nutmeg']
directions: ['To prepare asparagus tips of uniform length, bend each spear by hand, breaking them wherever they snap easily.', 'Set tips aside.', 'Trim tips diagonally into 1 1/2 inch pcs, saving bottom ends and trimmings for another purpose', 'Pour boiling water to the depth of 1/2 inch in large frying pan.', 'Add in asparagus tips in a single layer.', 'Cook, uncovered, over heat till tips are tender when pierced with a fork (two to four min).', 'Drain and set aside.', 'Heat butter in a second frying pan; add in several squeezes of fresh lemon juice and nutmeg.', 'Add in liquid removed asparagus tips; toss to coat.', 'Serve at once.', 'Serves 2']

title: Balsamic Vinaigrette Recipe
ingredients: ["Good Season's Italian Dressing mix extra virgin olive oil water balsamic vinaigrette"]
directions: ['Prepare as directed on package, substituting the extra virgin olive oil for vegetable oil and the balsamic for red wine vinegar.', 'Shake, pour and add in cracked pepper.', 'For an extra , try crumbled gorgonzola and some toasted walnuts.']

title: Grilled cheese and egg
ingredients: ['1 sliced cheese', '1 sliced of bread', '1 one egg']
directions: ['Put a hole in the bread', 'Butter the pan', 'Put the bread in pan', 'Put the egg in the bread hole', 'Wait for 45 to a min before flipping the bread', 'When flip put the cheese on the bread and egg', 'And enjoy your grilled cheese and egg']

title: Easy Glazed Carrots Recipe
ingredients: ['1 pound carrots, sliced', '2 tbsp. butter', '2 tbsp. honey']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together.', 'Place in a microwave dish.', 'Microwave on high till vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally.', 'About 10 to 12 min.']

title: Bacon Twists
ingredients: ['12 slices bacon']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.', 'Twist each slice of bacon into a tight spiral and thread each end onto 2 metal skewers, continue with the rest of the slices.', 'Lay the skewers on the rack of a broiler pan.', 'Bake the bacon in the middle of the oven for 15 minutes, or until crisp.', 'Remove skewers and transfer with a slotted spatula to paper towels to drain.']

title: Tuna Cheese Melt Recipe
ingredients: ['1 sm. can tuna', '1/4 c. finely minced onion', '1/4 c. finely minced celery', '1/4 c. mayonnaise']
directions: ['Mix above ingredients.']

title: Edible Homemade Play Dough
ingredients: ["1 jar 18 Oz. Peanut, 'soy Nut' Or Sunflower Seed Butter", '6 Tablespoons Honey', 'Instant Nonfat Dry Milk']
directions: ['1.', 'Stir the peanut butter (or soy nut butter or sunflower seed butter) and honey together until well blended.', '2.', 'Add enough instant nonfat dry milk to get the desired play dough consistency.', '3.', 'You can roll and cut shapes, decorate with raisins and other edible accents.', 'I put the 2 minutes cook time because its barely that long before the kids will want to eat it!', '4.', 'Try the soy nut butter or sunflower seed butter if you have someone with a peanut allergy.', '5.', 'Store any leftover in a tightly sealed container in the refrigerator.']

title: How to: Cutting an onion
ingredients: ['1 onion']
directions: ['Grab the onion.', 'Cut the onion in half.', 'And in half once more.', 'Make a series of slices across the onion.', 'Now, slice the opposite direction.', 'And repeat previous steps until the onion is fully sliced.']

title: Fresh Fruit Pudding for 2
ingredients: ['12 cup pineapple chunk, packed in its own juice', '1 tablespoon sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix', '12 small apple, chopped', '12 small orange, sectioned', '12 small banana, sliced']
directions: ['Drain pineapple; reserve juice.', 'Set aside.', 'In a small bowl, combine pudding mix and about 1/4 cup of reserved pineapple juice; blend thoroughly.', 'In a small bowl, combine fruit.', 'Gently fold pudding into fruit.', 'Chill and serve.']

title: Vanilla fudge
ingredients: ['100 grams unsalted butter', '300 ml Milk', '350 grams Castor sugar', '1 tsp vanilla extract']
directions: ['Line 18cm baking tray or grease with oil.', 'Melt butter, sugar and milk in saucepan ( stirring all the time ) and bring to boil once melted ( keep stirring )', 'Continue to stir until it turns light brown, after 10-15 min or just when it starts to brown ( reaches softball stage ) then set aside to cool for 5 min', 'When cooled, stir in vanilla extract until lovely golden brown', 'Pour into baking tray then cool at room temperature ( dont put into fridge ) .', 'Cut into squares when set.']

title: Chocolate Milk Shake Recipe
ingredients: ['Lowfat milk', 'chocolate', 'Ice cream']
directions: ['Get a blinder put some lowfat milk ice cream in it.', 'Then put some chocolate in it.', 'Then push blind and let it blind for about minute.', 'Then dump into a c. then get a straw and slirp down.']

title: chocolate truffles
ingredients: ['300 grams dark chocolate', '300 ml double cream', '50 grams butter']
directions: ['break the chocolate into small pieces', 'in a pan heat the cream and butter till the butter is melted.', "Don't let the cream boil", 'pour the cream mixture over the chocolate and stir till melted', 'pour the chocolate mix into separate bowls and add extras.', "I made Bailey's truffles, sambuca truffles, honeycomb truffles and pistachio truffles", 'put in the fridge to set.', 'overnight preferably', 'once set use a melon baller to create good truffle shapes and roll in cocoa powder for classic truffles although you can use any desired coating.', 'enjoy!']

title: French Fried Zucchini
ingredients: ['6 zucchini, young firm ones are best', 'salt, to taste', 'olive oil, for frying']
directions: ['Preheat oil to 350F.', 'Slice the zucchini very thinly lengthwise.', 'Saute in oil until golden brown; drain on absorbent paper and sprinkle with salt.']

title: Green Goodness Juice
ingredients: ['2 cup packed spinach', '1 cucumber', '1 celery stalk', '1/2 inch of ginger', '1 Juice of 1 lemon']
directions: ['Just put it through your juicer and serve.']

title: Quick&Easy Almond Butter Banana Bites
ingredients: ['1 Banana']
directions: ['Peel banana and slice into round bites', 'Add a dollop of almond butter to each banana slice.', 'Sprinkle entire plate of banana slices with cinnamon', 'Microwave for about 20 secs depending on microwave.', 'The thinner the banana slices, the less time.', 'The thicker, more time.', 'Tastes good by itself or on whole wheat waffles']

title: Healthy Banana pancake
ingredients: ['1 banana', '1 egg', '1 flaxseed']
directions: ['Mashed banana', 'Add flour, flaxseed, egg', 'Mix', 'Fry', 'Done']

title: Chicken Test
ingredients: ['1 banana', '1 apple', '1 cup milk']
directions: ['cook it.', 'eat it.']

title: Barbecue Chicken In The Oven Recipe
ingredients: ['1 chicken, cut up and washed']
directions: ['Fry it up like fried chicken then put in the oven.', 'Brush Kraft Barbecue Sauce on it and let bake at 350 degrees for a half an hour.', 'I like Kraft Thick and Spicy with Honey.']

title: Deep-Fried Salty Sweet Potato Sticks
ingredients: ['1 Sweet potato, enough oil to fry, salt']
directions: ['Wash the sweet potato well and use a paper towel to dry.', 'Heat the oil.', 'Cut the parts of the potato that you are going to fry into long strips.', "If you aren't going to be washing in water, you should fry it quickly or it'll change color.", 'Fry slowly at about 170C for a nice color.', 'Sandwich between paper towels to remove the oil, shake some salt over all of them.', 'Repeat steps 2 - 4.']

title: Easy No Flour Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients.', 'Drop onto ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Flatten with a fork.', 'Bake for 10 min at 350 degrees.']

title: Great Shakes
ingredients: ['1 medium banana, frozen', '2 cups skim milk', '1 cup strawberry, frozen', '12 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Cut frozen banana into 4 or 5 pieces.', 'Process all ingredients in a food processor or blender into smooth and creamy.']

title: Slow-roasted Tomatoes in Garlic Olive Oil
ingredients: ['4 Vine-ripened Tomatoes', 'Olive Oil, Enough To Cover The Roasted Tomatoes', '1 teaspoon Sea Salt', '2 heads Garlic, Peeled And Thinly Sliced']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 275 F. Slice the tomatoes in half vertically (you can slice a little piece off the bottom to help the tomatoes sit upright).', 'If using bigger tomatoes slice them in thirds but make sure all slices are about the same width.', 'Rub olive oil on both sides of the tomatoes and line them in a single layer along a rimmed baking sheet.', 'Sprinkle sea salt over them.', 'Bake for 4-6 hours or until they look sun-dried.', 'After they are finished cooking place them in an airtight jar, drop in the garlic slices, mix it all up and cover with olive oil.', 'Let them sit in the fridge overnight to marry the flavors.']

title: Boiled Zucchini Recipe
ingredients: ['2 med. zucchini, peeled, seeded & sliced', '1 med. onion, sliced']
directions: ['Mix zucchini and onion and put in pan with 1/2 c. water, salt and pepper to taste.', 'Cook till soft.', 'Drain and mash.', 'Cook again till all liquid is gone.', 'Add in 1 Tbsp.', 'butter and 3/4 c. Velveeta cheese.', 'Cook long sufficient to heat the cheese.', 'Mix well.']

title: Frozen PB Banana Sandwiches
ingredients: ['1/2 cup creamy peanut butter', '2 Tbsp. honey', '20 squares graham crackers', '1 small banana, thinly sliced']
directions: ['Blend peanut butter and honey in small bowl.', 'Spread about 1 tablespoon peanut butter mixture on each of 10 grahams; top with banana slices and remaining grahams.', 'Freeze for at least 1 hour.', 'Individually wrap and store in freezer for up to 1 week.']

title: Strained Yogurt The Lazy Way!
ingredients: ['1 carton Plain yogurt']
directions: ['Put a sieve on top of a plate to catch the drips.', 'Wash the outside of an unopened carton of yogurt carefully, and dry well.', 'Open the yogurt carton, cover with paper towels, and invert it in one go!', 'Put it on top of the sieve.', 'Poke several air holes in the carton with a knife.', "(Don't hurt yourself!)", 'In the morning, a tofu-like block of yogurt will have dropped out of the carton.', "There'll be almost no yogurt left in the carton, and you'll feel very eco-conscious.", 'Open 2 to 3 holes in a plastic container.', '(Can you see the holes in the photo?', "Maybe it's too small.", '"Nyaakun" told me that you can make it without the paper towels.', "If you strain flavored yogurt in individual portions, it'll becomes creamy and delicious!"]

title: Easy Banana Drink
ingredients: ['1 cup milk', '12 teaspoon vanilla', '1 banana, frozen']
directions: ['Put all ingredients in blender and blend until all the banana lumps are gone.', "Enjoy while it's still cold.", 'This can be made without freezing the bananas.', 'I prefer the cold, thicker drink that freezing the fruit brings.']

title: Pork and Cheese Piccata
ingredients: ['4 slice Thinly sliced pork', '2 slice Processed sliced cheese', '1 egg Beaten egg', '1 Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Put the cheese on a slice of pork and roll up.', 'Add another slice of pork, and roll up to hide the cheese.', 'Form as in the photo and season with salt and pepper.', 'Dip in beaten egg and pan fry.', 'Dip once again in the beaten egg, coat well and pan fry again.']

title: Grilled Eggplant (Aubergine) & Garlic Spread
ingredients: ['1 large eggplant', '5 -6 garlic cloves, cut into slivers', 'olive oil', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['With sharp paring knife, cut slits into eggplant.', 'Insert garlic slivers into each slit, using as few or many as you like.', 'Rub olive oil all over eggplant.', 'Put on hot grill, turning to cook evenly.', 'Eventually, the eggplant will sort of "deflate".', 'Remove from grill; set aside to cool a bit.', 'When cool enough to handle, cut a long slit in eggplant, open it up, and scrape out eggplant/garlic "innards".', 'Place in bowl, salt & pepper to taste.', 'Drizzle with a little olive oil.', 'Serve with pita chips or crackers.', 'Or use as a vegetable side dish.']

title: Biltong (Beef Jerky) Recipe
ingredients: ['1 lb Salt', '2 ounce Sugar', '1 ounce Saltpeter Pepper and chili spices to taste']
directions: ['As you travel around East Africa you will see countless Africans selling food along the roadsides, in the markets, or possibly through bus and train windows.', 'They sell fruit, boiled Large eggs grilled maize, boiled maize, yogurt, lowfat milk, soda pop, fried dough balls, samosas, yellow buns, and real seasonal delicacies like roasted mice and termites.', 'The following are a few East African snack foods you can try.', '"Beef Jerky" is more common in South Africa but still a part of the East African diet.', 'It is generally made from beef, but other game is used when available.', 'Cut strips of meat following the grain of muscle.', 'Make strips 2 inches wide and 1 inch thick.', 'Best made during cold dry weather if possible.', 'Salt the meat by rubbing the mix in well and leave in the basin of salt mix overnight.', 'Dip a cloth in vinegar, wring dry and whip the meat well.', 'Hang the strips of meat in a cold, dry, well ventilated place till dry.', 'You can also hang the meat on an oven rack placed in the top slot of the oven.', 'Dry the meat on low heat.']

title: Cast Iron Grilled Chicken
ingredients: ['1/2 whole Lemon, Juiced', '6 cloves Garlic, Minced', '1- 1/2 teaspoon Sea Salt', '6 whole Chicken Thighs With Bones And Skin']
directions: ['1.', 'To make the marinade add lemon juice, garlic and salt into a large mixing bowl.', 'Stir and set aside.', '2.', 'Remove bones from chicken thighs with kitchen shears.', 'Place bones in a zip-lock bag, freeze and reserve for making chicken stock.', '3.', 'Place chicken thighs on a cutting board skin side up.', 'Cover with plastic wrap and pound with the flat side of a meat mallet until chicken is even, about 1/2 to 3/4 thick.', 'Place flattened chicken in the marinade and coat on all sides.', 'Repeat with remaining chicken.', '4.', 'Heat a cast iron griddle to medium heat.', '5.', 'When griddle is hot, add chicken skin side down and grill 8 minutes.', 'Using tongs, turn chicken and grill another 5 minutes.', '6.', 'Remove chicken from griddle and let it rest for 3-5 minutes.', 'Slice and serve with lemon wedges.']

title: CrispRoasted Rack Of Lamb
ingredients: ['2 racks of lamb, each about 1 1/4 to 1 1/2 pounds', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 500 degrees.', 'Strip most of the surface fat from the lamb.', '(Your butcher may already have done this.)', 'Cut between the ribs, almost down to the meaty eye.', 'Divide each rack in half down the middle, sprinkle with salt and pepper and place in a roasting pan.', 'Roast for 15 minutes, then insert a meat thermometer straight in from one end into the meatiest part.', 'If it reads 125 degrees or more, remove the lamb immediately.', 'If it reads 120 degrees or less, put the lamb back for about 5 minutes, no more.', 'Remove and let sit for 5 minutes; this will give you medium- to medium-rare lamb on the outer ribs, medium rare-to-rare in the center.', 'Cook a little longer for more doneness.', 'Serve, separating the ribs, if desired, by cutting down straight through them.']

title: Willie's Lobster Wraps
ingredients: ['2 lbs lobster meat, pre-cooked', '12 lb bacon']
directions: ['Cut lobster into 2" pieces.', 'Wrap each lobster chunk with a 3" strip of bacon.', 'Broil on broiling pan until lightly browned, then turn and broil other side.']

title: Coconut Cream Pie Creamer
ingredients: ['1 cup Whole Milk, Almond Milk Or Coconut Milk', '1 cup Heavy Whipping Cream', '1/2 cups Sucanat/ Raw Cane Sugar, 1/4 Cup Pure Maple Syrup Or 1/2 Teaspoon Stevia', '2 teaspoons Coconut Extract', '1/2 teaspoons Vanilla Extract']
directions: ['Whisk together milk, cream and sweetener in a medium saucepan over medium heat.', 'When mixture begins to steam up from the pan, remove from heat and stir in coconut and vanilla extract.', 'Pour into a glass bottle and store in the refrigerator.', 'Use according to your own taste in coffee, hot cocoa, ice cream, oatmeal, French toast, etc.']

title: Fromage Fort
ingredients: ['1/2 pound cheese pieces', '1 garlic clove', '1/4 cup dry white wine', 'Black pepper', 'Salt']
directions: ['Put about 1/2 pound of cheese pieces in the bowl of a food processor, add 1 garlic clove, about 1/4 cup of dry white wine and a big grinding of black pepper.', 'Salt is usually not needed, but taste the mixture and add some if it is.', 'Process for 30 seconds or so, until the mixture is creamy but not too soft, and then pack it into small containers.', 'The fromage fort is ready to use now, either served cold or spread on bread and broiled for a few minutes.', 'Broiling will brown the cheese and make it wonderfully fragrant.']

title: Chicken Stuffed Shells With Cheese Sauce Recipe
ingredients: ['1 box tube shaped pasta, uncooked']
directions: ['These are easier to fill than shells.']

title: BunnyLovingCook's Banana Smoothie
ingredients: ['2 cups milk', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1 cup of frozen banana']
directions: ['Blend until creamy.']

title: Bacon And Pepper Sauce Recipe
ingredients: ['1 Tbsp. Butter', '1/4 lb Lean bacon -- diced', '1 tsp Coarsely grnd pepper']
directions: ['In a small skillet heat the butter and saute/fry the bacon till it is crisp.', 'Add in the pepper.', 'Pour the sauce over the cooked pasta and sprinkle with grated Romano cheese.', 'appear.', 'Pizza Sauce']

title: Assorted Dips Recipe
ingredients: ['honey mustard Nonfat Mayonnaise ketchup sweet relish capers grated onion']
directions: ['Serve Honey Mustard dip with jicama.', 'Server Thousand Island dip with celery sticks.']

title: Surprise Party Facial Mask
ingredients: ['12 avocado, mashed', '12 ripe banana, mashed']
directions: ['Mix both until smooth and creamy.', 'Spread on your face.', 'Keep it on for 15 minutes, then wash off with tepid water and pat dry.']

title: Garlic cheese bread sandwich
ingredients: ['1 -2 slices of cheese', '1 -Garlic salt', '1 -2 slices of bread']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450 degrees F for 5 minutes', 'put in the 2 slices of bread and let it toast for 3 minutes till one side, than flip it over', 'after both sides are evenly toasted, spread a light coat of butter on one side on both slices.', 'add a pinch or two of garlic salt on the buttered side of the bread.', 'Once done, put the slices back in the oven with the buttered/seasoned side on the bottom.', 'let that toast for a minute or two', 'Top the two slices of cheese on top of each other and place that right on to of the bread.', 'Once the cheese has melted, take it out.', 'and enjoy :)', 'NOTE: throughout this process the oven is still on and the timer should be ticking down from 20min.']

title: Classic Turkey Club Sandwich
ingredients: ['3 slices bread, any', '1/4 lb turkey sliced lunch meat', '2 slices cheese any', '4 slices tomatoes', '2 slices lettuce', '2 slices bacon cooked', 'to taste mayonnaise', 'to taste salt & black pepper']
directions: ['Spread mayonnaise on two slices of bread.', 'Add one slice of bacon to the bread (cut in half).', 'Add half of the lunch meat to each slice of bread then top with one slice of cheese.', 'Add two slices of tomato to each half and sprinkle with salt and pepper.', 'Then place the lettuce on top.', 'Add mayonnaise to the third piece of bread.', 'Place on one half of the sandwich and add mayonnaise to the other side.', "Place the two sandwich half's together and secure with 4 long toothpicks.", 'Make your first cut corner to corner of a sandwich.', 'Then make a cross cuts.', 'Pick up 1/4 of the sandwich and this place a long toothpick from the bottom thougth the top.', 'Do each 1/4 in turn with a long toothpick from the bottom.', 'Can be served with pickles & potato chips, french fries, coleslaw or potato salad.']

title: Amaretto Orange Juice Recipe
ingredients: ['2 ounce Amaretto fill orange juice']
directions: ['Ice // rocks']

title: Amaretto Mango Juice Recipe
ingredients: ['2 ounce Amaretto fill mango juice']
directions: ['Ice // rocks']

title: Roasted Tomatoes
ingredients: ['8 ripe plum tomatoes', 'Olive oil', 'Salt and pepper', '2 tablespoons sugar']
directions: ['Cut the tomatoes in half lengthwise.', 'Brush an oven dish or baking sheet (or a piece of foil) with olive oil and place the tomatoes on it, cut side up.', 'Sprinkle each with salt, pepper, and sugar (sprinkle the sugar with your fingers) and cook in a 275F oven for 3 1/24 hours, until shriveled and shrunken.', 'Serve them hot or cold, cut side up, on a flat platter.']

title: Shiny and Sweet Glazed Carrots
ingredients: ['1/2 Carrot', '1 tbsp Butter', '2 tsp Granulated sugar', '1 Salt']
directions: ['Slice the carrot.', 'Shave the sharp edges off the carrot slices.', 'Put the slices in a pan with just enough water to cover.', "Add the ingredients, and simmer until there's no liquid left in the pan.", "Keep an eye on it so that it doesn't burn.", 'The surfaces of the carrots should become slightly candied.']

title: Somebody's Mother's Buttercream Icing
ingredients: ['12 cup butter', '14 teaspoon salt', "2 12 cups confectioners' sugar, sifted", '3 -4 tablespoons milk', '1 teaspoon mexican vanilla']
directions: ['Cream butter, add salt and sugar, a small amount at a time, beating all the while.', 'Add vanilla.', 'Add milk if needed to slightly moisten the mixture.', "Depending on what you're serving, add one mini jar of Somebody's Mother's Chocolate, Caramel, or White Chocolate Sauce with Pear William."]

title: Easy Chocolate Ice Cream with Only 2 Ingredients
ingredients: ['1 Chocolate bar', '2 Whole egg']
directions: ['Finely break the chocolate into a bowl.', 'Warm the bowl over hot water.', 'Separate egg whites from egg yolks.', 'Beat the egg white until it forms stiff peaks.', 'When the chocolate melts completely, mix the yolks.', 'The bowl should remain heated over warm water.', 'Remove the bowl from warm water.', 'Add the beaten egg whites (from step 2) in 2 batches.', 'Mix the first batch well, and cut in the second batch.', 'When mixed fully, freeze to finish.', "There's no need to mix while it's freezing.", 'If you prefer it lighter, use 4 egg whites, or add 100 ml of milk.']

title: Honey Caramels
ingredients: ['2 cups honey', '2 cups sugar', '12 teaspoon salt', '1 cup evaporated milk', '12 cup butter']
directions: ['Cook honey, sugar and salt rapidly to hard-ball state - 250 degrees F. Stir occasionally.', 'Add evaporated milk and butter.', "Cook rapidly to hardball stage again, stirring constantly so mixture doesn't scorch.", 'This may take 10 to 15 minutes.', 'Pour into well buttered 9x13 inch pan and cool completely.', 'Once cooled, loosen caramel in pan and place on cutting board.', 'Cut into 1-inch or smaller strips with a very sharp butchers knife.', 'Cut strips into 1-inch squares and place in foil candy cups or wrap in squares of waxed paper.', 'Store in an airtight container.', 'Makes about 100 pieces of caramel.']

title: Slow-Cooked Tomatoes
ingredients: ['12 medium-size ripe tomatoes', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon sugar', 'Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 250 degrees.', 'Without coring, cut the tomatoes in half horizontally.', 'Brush a sheet pan with the olive oil.', 'Set the tomatoes on the pan skin side down', 'Sprinkle the cut faces of the tomatoes with sugar, salt and pepper.', 'Place the tomatoes in the oven, and bake for 3 1/2 to 4 hours, or until their skins are shriveled and the pulp appears somewhat dry.', 'The tomatoes should have a jamlike consistency.', 'Serve warm as a condiment for grilled meats.']

title: Zucchini Chips
ingredients: ['2 whole Medium Zucchini', 'Coarse Sea Salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 200 degrees F. Line baking sheet with parchment paper or a silpat.', 'Spray the prepared baking sheet with cooking spray.', 'Arrange the zucchini slices on the baking sheet.', 'They do not have to be spaced out, but shouldnt touch.', 'Spray the top of the zucchini slices lightly with cooking spray and sprinkle with sea salt.', 'Less is more here, as the zucchini will shrink and absorb the salt!', 'Bake for about 2 hours or until crispy.', 'Allow to cool just slightly on a wire rack.', 'Store in an airtight container at room temperature.']

title: baked French fries
ingredients: ['1 large potato', '1 1/2 tbsp olive oil', '1 salt']
directions: ['wash and peel the potato, then cut it into thin wedges', 'Soak the potato wedges in cold water for 30 minutes, that will release the starch and help it become crunchy', 'after 30 minutes drain and dry the potatoes, then add the oil and make sure they are evenly coated', 'heat the oven to 350F', 'Get a baking sheet and leave it in the heated oven so that it gets nice and hot', "When the baking sheet is hot take it out and then distribute the wedges with about 2 cm between each, make sure they are spaced or they will steam and won't become crunchy", 'Let it bake for 20 minutes (or more depends on your oven) and flip them on the other side half way through', 'After it becomes nice golden brown take it out and season with salt to taste', 'Put some ketchup or mayo on the side and enjoy!']

title: Whipped Cream
ingredients: ['12 pint heavy whipping cream', '3 tablespoons sugar', '12 teaspoon vanilla', '1 teeny tiny pinch salt']
directions: ['Whip until stiff.', 'Continue mixing while adding sugar in a slow stream, then vanilla and a pinch of salt.', 'For pie or shortcake topping use regular sugar, but for cake topping use powdered sugar.']

title: Florentine Cookies Without the Extras
ingredients: ['2 ounces butter', '14 cup sugar', '12 ounce crystallized ginger', '1 tablespoon cream', '4 ounces semisweet baking chocolate']
directions: ['Melt butter in a saucepan, then add sugar and stir over low heat until sugar is dissolved.', 'Bring to a boil and let it boil for 1 minute without stirring (until just turning light golden).', 'Remove from heat and mix well with cream and fruit-nut mixture.', 'Spoon heaped teaspoonfuls onto greased cookie sheet (if you have a Silpat, use it!', '), leaving plenty of space for spreading- try only doing four at a time until you see how large they spread.', 'Bake at 300 degrees F for 10 minutes or until golden brown.', 'Let cool on cookie sheet for 1 minute before carefully removing with spatula.', 'Melt chocolate in double boiler or microwave and spread thinly on flat side of cookies.']

title: Orange Jelly - Jackie French
ingredients: ['1 dozen orange, juice of', '1 cup apple juice', '500 g sugar']
directions: ['Strain orange juice to remove all flesh & pith as these will make end result bitter.', 'Sprinkle the sugar with a few drops of apple juice and boil for 5 minutes.', 'Add other ingredients and boil until a little sets in cold water or the mixture coats a spoon.', "Strain again for a clear jelly although this isn't necessary.", 'eat like a jam, on bread, toast etc.']

title: Curd Cheese
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons yogurt', '2 quarts milk']
directions: ['You will need a saucepan, a bowl, and a sieve.', 'If using yogurt, bring the milk to a boil and then leave it to cool to finger temperature (100 F).', 'Mix with milk with the yogurt in a basin.', 'Put in a warm place for 4 to 5 hours to set as solid as yogurt.', 'Pour the mixture into a sieve lined with a scalded clean cloth.', 'After an hour put a plate on top to weight and encourage the whey to drip through.', 'The curds in the cloth are the cheese.', 'Cover and store in a cool pantry, and it will keep for about a week.', 'Drink the whey, flavored with fruit juice, for your health - or use to to make scones.', 'Keep in refrigerator and eat within 2 days.']

title: Tomato Butter Jelly Recipe
ingredients: ['7 pound ripe plum tomatoes', '7 c. sugar', '1 lemon, cut up and seeds removed']
directions: ['Put tomatoes in warm water and peel them first.', 'Put all ingredients in pot and cook down till thickened, about 2 hrs.', 'Keep on low fire, stir once in awhile.', 'No water.', 'Wash jars and lids in boiling water.', 'Use pint jars.']

title: My Juice Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 apple', '1 pear', '1 orange, peeled', '1 inch fresh ginger', '2 large carrots']
directions: ['Clean the fruit, carrots and cut into a size to fit the juicer.', 'Push al the ingredients through, carrots last.']

title: Strawberry Sauce
ingredients: ['1 pint strawberry, hulled', '13 cup granulated sugar', '1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a medium sized bowl, cut into chunks about 1/3 of the berries, reserve these for later.', "Leave the other 2/3's whole or cut up, whichever you prefer.", 'Place them in a sauce pan over medium heat.', 'Add the sugar and simmer until thick, about 10 minutes.', 'Remove the sauce from heat and set on counter to cool about 5 minutes, stir in the vanilla.', 'Place the cooked berry sauce in the blender and puree.', 'Combine the berry puree with the reserved, uncooked berries.', 'Store in covered container in the refrigerator.']

title: No Waste Roasted Garlic
ingredients: ['2 heads fresh garlic', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375.', "Don't peel the garlic and leave the head intact.", 'Cut about 1/4 inch off the top of each bulb.', 'Put the garlic bulbs on a sheet of aluminum foil and drizzle with the olive oil.', 'Wrap the foil around the garlic and seal to make a package.', 'Shake the package to distrubute the oil.', 'Place the foil package, seam side up in a baking dish.', 'Bake until the garlic cloves are soft, about 30 minutes.', 'The clove should easily be pierced by a knife.', 'To use: squeeze garlic from the skins.', 'Store cloves in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 10 days.']

title: Vickys Whipped Pineapple Pops
ingredients: ['435 grams pineapple chunks in juice', '400 ml full fat coconut milk']
directions: ['Whip the coconut milk until frothy and light', 'Blend up the pineapple and juice until pureed', 'Mix the milk and pineapple together, stir through the lime zest and pour into ice lolly moulds', 'Freeze until set, around 4 hours', "You can add some rum to make pina colada pops but don't give them to your children!", '!', 'Or you can just drink the delicious stuff!', '!', 'Makes around 8 x 100ml pops']

title: Sugar Syrup
ingredients: ['1 cup sugar']
directions: ['Combine the sugar with 1 cup water in a small saucepan over medium heat.', 'Cook, stirring occasionally, until the sugar dissolves, about 5 minutes.', 'Cool.', 'Cover and refrigerate; it will keep indefinitely.']

title: Eggplant toast
ingredients: ['1 tbsp olive oil', '1 slice bread', '2 slice eggplant', '1 slice onion', '2 slice tomato']
directions: ['cut the Eggplant and the tomato in slices', 'Fry the onion in slices', 'add the sliced Eggplant and tomato and fry', 'toast the bread', 'serve as you like', 'you may add some cheese :)']

title: Chakkah Yeh Seedor (Yogurt with garlic sauce)
ingredients: ['1 cup yogurt', '1 tablespoon finely chopped garlic', 'Salt to taste']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients and chill.']

title: Peanut butter cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup peanut butter', '1 cup sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 F', 'Mix all ingredients together in a bowl.', 'Roll into 1" balls & place on a cookie sheet (does not need to be greased).', 'Ours the balls down with a fork.', 'Bake for 10 min.', 'Let cool on pan for approximately 5 min.', 'Remove to cool or enjoy right away.', '(makes around 12 cookies)']

title: How to Make Meringue
ingredients: ['1 Egg white', '1 Sugar']
directions: ['Put the egg whites into a thoroughly dried bowl.', 'Beat the whites on high speed with the hand mixer until white and fluffy.', 'Add 1 tablespoon of sugar from the amount in the recipe.', 'Continue mixing on high speed to form whipped peaks.', 'When soft peaks have formed, add half of the remaining sugar and continue whipping.', "Once the sugar has mixed in, add the rest of the sugar and continue whipping until it doesn't fall out of the bowl when held upside down.", 'Lower the speed of the hand mixer to low to give it a sheen.']

title: Popcorn
ingredients: ['8 cups butter-flavored microwave popcorn', '24 fl oz no salt added tomato juice']
directions: ['Pop a bag of microwave popcorn and measure 2 cups per person for this snack.', 'Store any remaining popcorn in a tightly sealed container for another snack.', 'Serve a 6 fl oz (3/4 cup) glass of tomato juice, chilled or over ice, per person with the snack.']

title: Homemade Rice Flour from Polished Rice
ingredients: ['200 grams Polished rice']
directions: ['Grind up the rice in the mixer without washing the rice first.', 'To get an even flour, try pulsing the mixer, 3 seconds on, 3 seconds off.', "It's done.", "If you're worried about the coarseness of the flour after blending, or if you don't have a blender, you can use a mortar and pestle.", 'You can sift the flour and re-grind what remains to get a fine flour.', "Here's a potato salad and corn mayo pizza made from rice flour.", 'You get an irresistible chewy texture when you use the rice flour.', 'Rice Noodles']

title: Copper River Salmon
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '48-ounce Copper River salmon fillets', 'Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 275.', 'Heat olive oil in a nonstick saute pan.', 'Add fillets, skin side down.', 'When skin blisters, about 1 minute, place pan in oven and roast for 8 to 12 minutes to medium-rare.', 'Remove pan from oven and heat over high flame until skin crisps, about 2 minutes.', 'Season.', 'Serve skin side up.']

title: Juice Away .. Carrot- Apple Juice
ingredients: ['6 carrots', '1 apple']
directions: ['Wash and core you apple.', 'Wash and cut off the carrot tips.', 'Juice Away!']

title: Garlic Honey Toast
ingredients: ['1 slice of bread', 'slice butter', '1 garlic clove']
directions: ['Toast the slice of bread (Although in the picture i chose not to because it was a fluffy onion flatbread)', "Peel the garlic clove and rub it onto the toasted bread until the you've rubbed it on the whole surface.", '(If you didnt toast your bread skip this part)', 'Cut slices of butter to lay ontop of the bread', 'Chop the garlic you used to rub on the bread.', '(If the garlic rubbed off into a very small piece then grab another garlic clove. )', 'Spinkle the garlic ontop of the bread', 'Drizzle honey ontop for a sweet flavor', 'Enjoy and snap a picture/review if you all decide to try it!', ':)']

title: Marc Veyrats Pumpkin Soup With Bacon-Flavoured Whipped Cream
ingredients: ['750 g pumpkin, flesh in big chunks', '125 g smoked bacon, strips cut into large pieces', '1 tablespoon butter', '250 g cream', '12 liter milk', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Heat 150g of cream with the bacon, bring to a boil and reduce to a thick liquid, strain, leave to cool and preserve in the fridge.', 'Throw away the bacon strips.', 'Melt the butter, add pumpkin pieces and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add the milk, salt and leave to cook (covered) for 30 minutes.', 'Whip the remaining cream (very cold) rapidly until consistency of whipped cream.', 'Incorporate the equally cold bacon cream.', 'Keep the mixture in the fridge.', 'After 30 minutes blend the pumpkin milk mixture.', 'Adjust the seasoning by adding salt and maybe pepper.', 'Serve this soup hot and top gently with a tablespoon of bacon cream.', 'Enjoy.']

title: Microwave Peanut Butter Fudge Recipe
ingredients: ['2 sticks butter', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Microwave on high 2-3 min (depends on microwave).', 'Take out, stir.', 'Will look like peanut butter soup.', 'Fold in:']

title: Parmigiano-Reggiano Puffs
ingredients: ['Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese rinds, cut into 1/2-inch dice']
directions: ['On a microwave-safe plate, microwave the cheese rinds at high power until puffed and sizzling, 30 seconds to 1 minute.', 'Transfer the cheese puffs to paper towels to drain.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Dark Turkey Stock
ingredients: ['Bones, leftover meat and carcass from a 15-pound turkey', '2 carrots, peeled and cut into chunks', '1 large onion, peeled and quartered', '1 stalk celery, roughly chopped']
directions: ['Heat oven to 450 degrees.', 'Place bones, meat and chopped or broken-up carcass in a large roasting pan, and place in the oven.', 'Roast, stirring occasionally, for about 1 hour, or until nicely browned.', "Don't worry if the meat sticks to the bottom of the pan.", 'Add chopped vegetables, and roast for about 30 minutes more, stirring once or twice.', 'Remove roasting pan to stove top, and place it over one or two burners, whichever is more convenient.', "Turn heat to high, and barely cover the bones with water, about 8 to 10 cups (it's fine if some of the bones poke up out of the water).", 'When water boils, turn heat down so that the liquid simmers.', 'Cook, stirring occasionally and scraping bottom of pan to loosen any bits of meat, for about 30 minutes.', 'Cool, then strain.', 'Refrigerate, and skim off excess fat.', 'Then, store for up to 3 days in the refrigerator (longer if you bring the stock to a boil every second day), or up to several months in the freezer.']

title: Garlic and Fennel Infused Oil
ingredients: ['2 cloves garlic, peeled and smashed', '1 bulb fennel, tops and bruised outer leaves removed, cored and chopped', '1 cup olive oil']
directions: ['Combine garlic, fennel and oil in a heavy saucepan.', 'Bring mixture to a boil and then reduce to a simmer.', 'Simmer until fennel and garlic are very tender, 45 minutes to an hour.', 'Remove from heat and allow the mixture to come to room temperature.', 'Strain oil, pressing on solids, into a clean bottle and refrigerate.', 'Remove tender garlic and fennel from strainer.', 'Mash mixture and season with salt and pepper.', 'Use as spread for crostini or crackers']

title: Honey Mustard Dipping Sauce
ingredients: ['1/4 cups Honey Mustard', '1/4 cups Mayonnaise', '2 Tablespoons Milk']
directions: ['1.', 'Combine all ingredients in a small bowl; mix well.', '2.', 'Serve with hot appetizers.']

title: Chicken And Waffles Recipe
ingredients: ['2 pound chicken']
directions: ['Cover with water and simmer till tender.', 'Let cold.', 'Remove bones.', 'Cut into bite size pcs.']

title: Quick! Easy! Foolproof! How to Toast and Peel Tomatoes
ingredients: ['1 to peel Tomatoes']
directions: ['Wash the tomato and wipe off any water on the surface completely.', "Stick a fork with a handle that doesn't get hot into the stem end.", 'Using the highest heat possible on your cooktop, move the tomato around so that the flames hit every part of it evenly.', 'The inside of the skin will start to make bubbling noises.', 'If you keep exposing the tomato to the flames, the skin will burst open with a pop!', 'All the tomatoes have been flamed!', "Only the surface is hot, so they'll cool down right away after being flamed.", 'Then just peel off the skin easily.']

title: A Good Relish Recipe
ingredients: ['1 gal Green tomatoes', '1/2 c. Salt lg Onions']
directions: ['Grind tomatoes and onions together.', 'Add in salt and cover with water, let stand 10 min.', 'Drain well.', 'Add in:1 dozen peppers (green and red) 2 warm peppers 1 dozen pickles (canned ones can be used) 1 tbsp.', 'celery seed 3 1/2 pound sugar 1 quart.', 'vinegar Cook 15 min.', 'Seal while warm.']

title: Sushi
ingredients: ['1 ounce raw fresh tuna', '1 ounce cooked sushi rice']
directions: ['Put the fish on top of the rice.']

title: Best Ever Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 whole Sliced Onion', '1 whole Sliced Tomato', '2 pieces Bread, Buttered', '1 piece Butter Or Margarine', '1 piece Cheese']
directions: ['1.', 'Melt the butter in a hot skillet and saute the onion until translucent and well-cooked.', '2.', 'Put the bread, butter side down, on a hot skillet.', 'Put the slice of cheese, tomato, and onion on top.', 'Place the other piece of bread, butter side up, on top.', 'Cook until the bread is browned on both sides.', '3.', 'Enjoy!', 'This recipe is very easy to make and the onion and tomato slices can easily make up to four sandwiches, so you may want to cut the onion and tomato in half and save the other halves for later.']

title: Cherry Tomatoes and Bacon Grill
ingredients: ['4 Cherry tomatoes', '2 pieces Half-strip of bacon', '1 dash Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Remove the blossom ends (the stems) from the cherry tomatoes, cut the bacon horizontally, wrap around the tomatoes and secure with a cocktail stick.', 'Place on baking paper or foil, sprinkle with salt and pepper, and grill for 5 minutes in the toaster oven.']

title: Yogurt Cream
ingredients: ['500 grams Yogurt', '50 grams Sugar', '2 tbsp Skim milk']
directions: ['Line a strainer with a paper towel, then drain the yogurt.', 'It should look like this after draining.', 'Use the strained whey to make bread.', 'Add the sugar and skim milk, and mix.', 'Pour over a coffee-soaked spongecake a la tiramisu style.']

title: Grilled Tuna
ingredients: ['1 pound 2 ounces tuna steaks']
directions: ['Ready either ready a charcoal fire or a top-of-the-stove grill.', 'Wash and dry the tuna steaks and cook according to the Canadian rule: measure fish at thickest part and cook 10 minutes to the inch.']

title: Pina Colada Yogurt
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons crushed pineapple', '14 teaspoon coconut extract', '12 cup plain yogurt']
directions: ['Combine and enjoy!']

title: Accidentally Juiced Up
ingredients: ['1 cup coconut milk', '1 cup pineapple juice', '1 cup mango nectar']
directions: ['Mix all 3 ingredients together in a pour-able container.', 'Serve over ice in your favourite bevvie receptacle.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Unbelieveable Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Mix thoroughly.', 'Shape into round balls.', 'Press flat with fork.', 'Bake on ungreased cookie sheet for 12 to 15 min in 300 to 325 degree oven.']

title: Fried Chicken Wings with Fish Sauce
ingredients: ['5 chicken wings =600 gr']
directions: ['Wash chicken wings well, I usually some salt to gently rub on the skin and rinse them well under the tap to get rid of bad smell.', 'Cut at elbow joints or into small pieces as desired.', 'Put chicken wings into a bowl, marinate with 1/3 teaspoon of seasoning powder, 1 teaspoon of sugar, 2 teaspoons of fish sauce.', 'Squeeze liquid out of minced shallots and garlic into chicken wings, keep the residue.', 'Mix well and set aside to marinate for about 15 minutes.', 'Peel 1 shallot and 2 cloves of garlic then mince or crush.', 'Take 10-12 cloves of garlic to crush then dice into small pieces, set aside.', 'Mix the sauce: I use 30N fish sauce.', '3 tablespoons of fish sauce=35 gr+2 teaspoons of sugar=25 gr+1/3 teaspoon of ground black pepper, stir until dissolved.', '(This is for children.', 'For adults, we can add chili powder to make it more aromatic than using fresh chili)', 'Put the frying pan over the heat, add cooking oil, when the oil is hot, add chicken wings to fry, (oil is only about 1 cm deep and add from big to small chicken pieces), use medium heat, flip each chicken piece to make sure it is evenly golden-brown on both sides.', 'Fry from 15-20 minutes and take out the pieces that are already golden-brown.', 'Drain off excess oil, use paper towels to clean the frying pan (use chopsticks to clamp the paper towels and rub the dark gold crust off the frying pan, remove all these crusts, no need to clean the oil)', 'If your fried chicken wings are not burnt, take back some drained oil into a small ladle and pour back into the frying pan, when the oil is hot, add minced garlic to fry until golden-brown and crispy, remove garlic from the pan.', 'Pour the residue of minced shallot and garlic into the frying pan and fry until fragrant, pour the bowl of mixed fish sauce into the pan, use the minimum heat, pour all the fried chicken wings into the pan and toss evenly in 3-4 minutes, add fried garlic and mix well, turn off the heat, remove pan from the heat.']

title: Honey Mustard Wings
ingredients: ['12 chicken wings, separated at joints, tips discarded', '3/4 cup GREY POUPON Savory Honey Mustard, divided', '1/4 tsp. each salt and pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450F.', 'Toss chicken with 1/2 cup of the mustard.', 'Place in single layer in foil-lined 15x10x1-inch baking pan.', 'Sprinkle with salt and pepper.', 'Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through, brushing with the remaining 1/4 cup mustard during the last 5 minutes of the baking time.']

directions: ['Lightly spray 2 cupcake tins with vegetable spray.', 'Put all ingredients (break banana in pieces) into the food processor.', 'Whiz it around until smooth.', 'Divide evenly between 24 cupcake molds.', 'Freeze until solid.', 'Pop out of cupcake tins, put into plastic freezer bags and keep frozen.', 'Your dog(s) will thank you!']

title: Peaches & Cream Mask for a Healthy Complexion
ingredients: ['1 large peach', '2 -3 tablespoons cream']
directions: ['Peel and pit the peach.', 'Mash peach.', 'Add cream until smooth.', 'Run a nice warm bath!', 'Apply to face and lie back in your bath for 10 minutes or so!', 'This mixture is a bit runny, so you may want to lie back and just relax in your bath!', 'Pamper yourself!', 'You deserve it!', 'Rinse with warm water after 10 minutes.']

title: Dried Carrot Leaves "Seasoning"
ingredients: ['leaves Carrot']
directions: ['Wash the carrot leaves well, and drain the water very well.', 'Using a herb chopper or suitable knife to finely chop the leaves.', 'Spread out the chopped leaves on a plate to aerate and leave in a dry place for about two days to dry.', 'Once dried, keep them in a dry container.', 'Note: adjust drying time of the leaves according to the weather and seasonal conditions.', 'Always make sure the leaves are completely dry before storage.']

title: BBQ chicken baked Potato
ingredients: ['1 Chicken']
directions: ['Pan cook chicken add BBQ sauce and server on baked potato.']

title: Decorative Plum Blossoms with Carrots
ingredients: ['1 Carrots']
directions: ["Cut the carrots into any thickness you'd like.", 'I made mine 7-8 mm.', 'Use the blue lines shown as a guide.', 'To make sure that the sections are balanced, make 3 cuts (2 mm deep).', 'Make a 2-4 mm deep cuts on the edges as well, matching the cuts on the top surface.', "At a slight angle, cut into the edge cuts you've made on the side.", "Once you've finished, flip over the slice and repeat to make a curved petal-like outline.", 'Adjust the shape into a flower.', 'Slice the flower from the center moving left.', '(Make the cut deeper as you move the knife towards you; cut to the edge of the petal, then repeat.)', "Adjust the shape, so it's more rounded.", "Then it's finished.", 'I used it for an ozoni.', 'Our Family Recipe for Ozoni with toasted Mochi.', 'If you make only 2 cuts in Step 2, it makes a cute flower.', 'User "minorimino".']

title: Cheesy Mexican Pasta
ingredients: ['2 cups hot cooked pasta']
directions: ['Add measured amount of VELVEETA Salsa Dip to pasta; toss to coat.']

title: Mary's Graham Cracker Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup reduced fat margarine', '12 cup sugar']
directions: ['Line jelly roll pan with graham crackers.', 'Combine margarine and sugar in saucepan.', 'Heat to boiling and boil 2 minutes.', 'Remove from heat and pour over crackers.', 'Sprinkle chopped walnuts over this.', 'Bake 10 minutes at 350 degrees.', 'Remove from oven and turn off.', 'Let cool 2 minutes and sprinkle chocolate chips over top.', 'Return to oven long enough to melt chips.', 'Swirl chocolate over top.', 'Cool 5 minutes and cut into squares.', '**These bars taste just like English Toffee bars.', 'The key is to make sure that all the edges of the crackers are touching when you pour the margarine mixture over it.', 'You may need to adjust a little bit.', 'This way, when you bake the bottom layer, it forms a crispy crust.', 'Paula Ruehrwein Omaha Ne']

title: Three Fruit Marmalade Recipe
ingredients: ['1 grapefruit', '1 lemon', '1 orange', 'Sugar - 3/4 c. to each c. fruit']
directions: ['Squeeze juice from fruit.', 'Grind peels and pulp in food processor.', 'Measure juice and grnd fruit together and add in twice its volume of water.', 'Bring fruit and water to a boil in a non-reactive pan and simmer till the mix is tender and reduced to half the original volume.', 'Add in 3/4 c. of sugar for each c. of fruit.', 'In deep non-reactive pan stir together fruit and sugar and bring to a fast boil.', 'Reduce heat to slow boil; stir occasionally and test after 20-25 min.', 'If a skin forms, the marmalade is ready to pot.', 'If it is not ready, bring to a rapid boil for 5 more min and test again.', 'Ladle into preheated, sterilized jars.', 'Cover marmalade while warm with melted paraffin wax to seal.']

title: Cajun Greek Salad Recipe
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breast halves in pcs Cajun seasoning lettuce other veggies and olive as desired feta cheese']
directions: ['One of our favorite salad dinners is Greek salad with Cajun chicken.', 'Sounds weird but we had it at a restaurant and loved it.', 'We take chicken breast and slice into small strips.', 'Sprinkle on Cajun seasoning (salt free for us).', 'Then stir-fry in a skillet sprayed with Pam.', 'Put this on top of the Greek salad (feta cheese is a must).', 'If we are really organized we make some toasted garlic bread with a little Parmesan cheese.', 'Yummy!']

title: Cafe Latte
ingredients: ['2 cups milk', '1 1/3 cups hot freshly brewed dark roast espresso coffee']
directions: ['Heat milk in a saucepan set over medium-low heat.', 'Whisk briskly with a wire whisk to create foam.', 'Brew espresso and pour into 4 cups.', 'Pour in milk, holding back the foam with a spoon.', 'Spoon foam over the top.']

title: Green Tropical Smoothie
ingredients: ['1 cup mango', '1 each orange', '1 cup pineapple', '1 cup spinach', '1 cup orange juice']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients together until smooth.', 'Pour and enjoy.']

title: " Zucchini Mix" in Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['3 lbs ripe tomatoes, chopped', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '14 cup minced onion', '1 cup chopped celery', '5 -6 cups diced zucchini', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 12 teaspoons salt']
directions: ['Chop or partially puree tomatoes to your liking.', 'Heat oil in large pan.', 'Add onion and celery, saute for about 10 minutes or until onion and celery are soft.', 'Add zucchini and cook until soft.', 'Add tomatoes, sugar and salt.', 'Bring to boil, and turn down to a simmer.', 'Simmer for 30 minutes.', 'Cool and pack into freezer containers.', 'Freeze up to 3 months.']

title: Pao De Queijo
ingredients: ['1 egg', '80 ml olive oil', '60 ml milk', '65 g cheese', '1 teaspoon salt, to taste']
directions: ['1.Pre-heat the oven to 200c and grease a cupcake tray.', 'Put all the ingredients in a blender and pulse until smooth to create your batter.', 'This recipe is quite simple so feel free to experiment by adding herbs and spices to the mix.', '2.Pour the batter evenly into the cupcake tray and then bake in the oven for 15-20 mins until the batter has puffed up and they are slightly brown on top.', 'Leave them to cool.', 'Devour.', 'from http://www.therealbrazil.com/guide/brazilrecipes.aspx.']

title: Toasty Baked Egg In a Basket
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice of bread']
directions: ['Spray a cookie sheet with Pam.', 'With a spoon press flat the center of the bread so it create a nice bed for the egg.', 'Crack open the egg and place it in the center of the bread.', 'With a spoon or butter knife cover the edges of the bread with butter you can use as much as you like.', 'That way the cheese will stick to the bread.', 'Put the pizza cheese blend all around the edges of the bread.', 'Put it in a toaster oven for about 10 minutes or so, depending of how you like your eggs done... season if you like with salt and pepper and Enjoy...']

title: Pooh's Honey Sauce 1
ingredients: ['1 cup honey', '12 cup cream']
directions: ['Heat honey gently (do not boil) in a double boiler or heavy saucepan.', 'Remove from the heat and slowly stir in the cream.', 'Blend thoroughly.', 'Use on cereals, pancakes, waffles, French toast, ice cream, apple pie, or other desserts.', 'Store in a tightly-closed jar in the fridge, if there is any left over.', 'Winnie-the-Pooh woke up suddenly in the middle of the night and listened.', "Then he got out of bed, and lit his candle, and stumped across the room to see if anybody was trying to get into his honey-cupboard, and they weren't, so he stumped back again, blew out his candle, and got into bed -- The House at Pooh Corner."]
