directions: ['Mix all together and package in Mason jar.', 'Store in refrigerator or freezer for long term storage.', 'Use filled shaker for daily use.']

title: Basic Bread And Dough Recipe (Sourdough) Recipe

directions: ['For the dough I used:(more or possibly less on the quantities)', '1 c. white flour2 c. whole wheat1 tsp.', 'yeast1 c. sour dough1 Tbsp.', 'honey1 c. water and then watch it if you need more water or possibly more flour', 'By the way I use these same things and quantities to make my bread.', 'In the bread I add in various things, for instance caraway seeds, or possibly garlic, or possibly raisins, whatever I feel likeThe bread always comes out good.', 'So this is my always recipe for bread or possibly dough.']

directions: ['So, if you want the juicer fruit look for the smoothest skin!', "Bet you didn't know!", "Try it once and you'll be amazed!"]

title: Barbecue Butterflied Leg Of Lamb Recipe

directions: ['Have butcher butterfly the leg of lamb.', 'Mix all marinade ingredients together.', 'Marinate leg of lamb overnight, turning several times.', 'Grill over barbecue for 40 to 50 min.', 'Slice thinly.']

title: 3-Step Peanut Butter Squares

directions: ['Preheat oven to 325F.', 'Mix egg, peanut butter and sugar until well blended.', 'Spread into 8-inch square baking pan; sprinkle with chocolate.', 'Bake 20 min.', 'Cool completely before cutting into squares to serve.']

title: Milk & More
ingredients: ['8 ounce fat-free milk']
directions: ['Pour an 8-ounce glass of ice cold milk, or heat it through and blend it with your favorite cup of coffee or tea for a late.']

title: Candied Lemon Slices
ingredients: ['1 large lemon', '1 cup sugar']
directions: ['Prepare an ice-water bath; set aside.', 'Using a mandoline or sharp knife, cut the lemon into 12 paper-thin slices; discard the seeds and ends of the rind.', 'Bring a medium saucepan of water to a rolling boil.', 'Remove from the heat, and add the lemon slices; stir until softened, about 1 minute.', 'Drain, and immediately plunge the slices into the ice-water bath.', 'Drain.', 'Bring the sugar and 1 cup water to a boil in a medium skillet, swirling to dissolve the sugar.', 'When the liquid is clear and bubbling, reduce heat to medium-low.', 'Add the lemon slices, arranging them in one layer with tongs.', 'Simmer (do not let boil) until the rinds are translucent, about 1 hour.', 'Transfer to a baking sheet lined with parchment.', 'Let stand until ready to serve.']

title: Basic Salmon Recipe
ingredients: ['1 x Salmon steak per person']
directions: ['Salmon!', 'yes.', 'which and snapper and trout.', 'i even like tilapia.', "and don't find the taste fishy.", 'Which "fishy" smell and taste comes with age.', 'Frzn fish is alright now which I use salt water to thaw it.', "We've been happy with salmon steak cooked in the foreman grill (4-5 mins); grillpan (6-8mins); 400F oven (9-12 mins).", 'Some restaurants overcook salmon: too dry.', 'Once it starts running "white" on the edges, it\'s done.', "Salmon has higher fat but it's the good fat."]

title: Tomato Puree (Basic tomato sauce)
ingredients: ['2 1/2 pounds tomatoes']
directions: ['Core tomatoes.', 'Cut a slit in the skin of each.', 'Place in a 2 1/2-quart souffle dish and cover tightly with microwave plastic wrap.', 'Cook in a 650-to 700-watt oven at 100 percent power for 12 minutes.', 'Prick plastic with the tip of a sharp knife to release steam.', 'Remove from oven and uncover carefully.', 'Pass tomatoes through the medium disc of a food mill.', 'Return tomato puree to dish and cook, uncovered, at 100 percent power for 20 minutes, stirring once or twice, until puree is reduced by half.', 'Remove from oven and use, or let cool to room temperature and refrigerate or freeze in 1-cup or 1/2-cup quantities in microwavable storage containers.']

title: Fried Bacon
ingredients: ['1 pound bacon']
directions: ['Heat a cast-iron or other heavy skillet over medium heat.', 'When hot, add bacon strips in a single layer.', 'Cook until browned on bottom, 3 to 4 minutes.', 'Flip bacon, using tongs, and cook until browned on both sides, about 2 minutes.', 'Drain and reserve fat for another use, and cook remaining bacon.', 'Drain bacon on paper-towel-lined platter.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Daddy's Eggs In The Nest Recipe
ingredients: ['Egg', 'Bread', 'Butter']
directions: ['Make a hole in the center of the bread with a shotglass.', 'Save the piece of bread from the middle.', 'Heat butter in a skillet.', 'Place the bread with the hole in it in the skillet.', 'Crack open the egg into the hole.', 'Cook till brown, flip and cook the other side.', 'Dip the little circle bread into the egg and eat.']

title: Shrimp Shell Stock
ingredients: ['Shells from 2 pounds shrimp', 'Salt and black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Put the shells in a medium saucepan and add about 1 quart water or enough to cover.', 'Bring it to a boil, then take the pan off the heat and let the shells steep until the water cools.', '(Or, if youre in a hurry, use it right away.)', 'Strain the stock, discard the shells, and add salt and pepper.', 'Use immediately, refrigerate for up to 2 days, or freeze for up to a month.']

title: Baked Sausage Links Recipe

directions: ['PAN: 18 BY 26-INCH SHEET PAN TEMPERATURE: 400 F. OVEN', '1.', 'PLACE SAUSAGE ON 3 SHEET PANS (18 BY 26-INCH); BAKE IN 400 F. OVEN 10 Min Or possibly Till HEATED.', 'TURN AFTER 5 Min.', 'SERVING SIZE: 2 LINKS']

title: Chocolate Mexicana
ingredients: ['3 squares sweetened Mexican chocolate, grated', '8 cups milk']
directions: ['Put the milk and chocolate into an earthenware pot and cook over a low heat until the chocolate has melted.', 'Stir constantly so that it does notstick to the pan.', 'When the chocolate comes to a boil, lower the heat and beat vigorously with a molinillo until a thick foam rises to the top.', 'Serve hot in earthenware mugs.']

title: 3 Ingredients Munchie Killers

directions: ['Take a cracker and spread a little bit of peanut butter and then a little bit of the jelly...', 'Enjoy!!', '!']

title: Baked Potato Toppings Recipe
ingredients: ['5 ounce Baked potato']
directions: ['Each of the following makes 1 serving and uses a 5 ounce.', 'baked potato.', 'BROCCOLI AND MELTED CHEESE...Fill an opened warm baked potato with 1/2 c. steamed broccoli florets, 1 tbsp.', 'grated nonfat morrzrella cheese, and 1 teaspoon minced fresh dill or possibly 1/4 teaspoon dry dill week.', 'bread/starch and 1 vegetable.', 'CHEESE AND CHIVES...Fill an opened warm baked potato with 1/4 c. low-fat (1%) low-fat cottage cheese, 1 tbsp.', 'snipped fresh chives, and 1 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds.', 'bread/starch and 1 vegetable.', 'ROASTED GARLIC POTATOES...Cut the bottom off a medium-size head of garlic, place head on a square of aluminum foil, and drizzle 1/2 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil over it.', 'Seal and bake along with the potato at 375 F for 30 min, till the garlic is very soft.', 'Squeeze the pulp out of one or possibly more garlic cloves, to taste, into the opened warm potato.', 'potato with 1/2 c. Italian Mushroom Sauce.', 'Sprinkle with 1 tbsp.', 'minced fresh basil or possibly parsley.', 'ONIONS AND MINT...Lightly spray a nonstick saute/fry pan with butter-flavored cooking spray.', 'Place over low heat, add in 1/2 c. thinly sliced onion, and saute/fry for 4 to 5 min, till soft but not browned.', 'Add in 1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar, 1 teaspoon minced fresh mint (or possibly flat-leaf parsley), and a generous grinding of pepper.', 'Spoon into a opened warm baked potato.', 'Mexican Vegetable Stew into an opened warm baked potato.', 'Sprinkle with 1 teaspoon fresh minced cilantro (fresh coriander) and 1/2 tsp dry-roasted sunflower seeds.', 'bread/starch.', 'YOGURT PRIMAVERA...Combine 2 tbsp.', 'plain nonfat yogurt, 1/4 teaspoon Dijon mustard, 3 tbsp.', 'mixed diced dred, green, and yellow bell peppers, and 1 chopped scallion, white part and 1 inch green.', 'Spoon into an opened warm baked potato.', 'Sprinkle with warm red pepper flakes to taste.', 'bread/starch.']

title: Octopus and Coriander Salad
ingredients: ['1 octopus, whole', '3 garlic cloves, chopped finely']
directions: ['In a pressure cooker, add water, salt and whole octopus.', 'Cook the octopus for 10-15 minutes or for 45 minutes at boiling point in a normal pot.', 'Remove from the water and let the octopus cool down completely.', 'Cut the octopus into pieces.', 'Add the chopped garlic, coriander and a pinch of salt.', 'Drizzle with olive oil and vinegar.', 'Stir well and place in fridge until serving time.']

title: Yuzu Pepper Chicken Wings
ingredients: ['5 Chicken wings - the midsection and the tip', '1 tbsp Yuzu pepper paste']
directions: ['Spread the yuzu pepper paste onto the chicken wings.', 'Place in a plastic bag and rub it in.', 'Leave it in the fridge for 1 hour to let the flavor settle in.', 'Cook for 20 minutes in a 230C oven.']

title: Cucumber Water
ingredients: ['1/2 medium seedless cucumber']
directions: ['Set a cheesecloth-lined strainer over a bowl.', 'Grate the cucumber into the strainer, then twist and squeeze the cheesecloth to extract as much of the liquid as possible.', 'Transfer to a container, cover and refrigerate for up to 2 days.']

title: Choconana Worm
ingredients: ['1/4 cup Dark chocolate', '5 tbsp milk', '1 Firm Banana', '4 tbsp Peanut butter']
directions: ['Sliced banana into 1-inch thick slices', 'Spread peanut butter evenly between slices', 'Mix chocolate chips and milk together and microwave safe dish', 'Melt on medium heat in microwave, stirring every ten seconds.', 'Spread chocolate on one side of banana', 'Freeze in freezer for 10 minutes', 'Enjoy']

title: Sinful Hot Chocolate
ingredients: ['1 ounce dark chocolate, at least 70% cocoa, broken into small pieces', '1 tablespoon sugar', '6 ounces milk']
directions: ['No need to crush the chocolate; I just break it up over the mug I am going to use.', 'Add the sugar and milk.', 'Microwave for about 3 minutes', 'Stir or whisk, add a topping, and enjoy!', 'You can also make this is larger batches on the stove.']

title: Milk Honey Moisture Mask
ingredients: ['1 12 tablespoons honey', '1 teaspoon milk']
directions: ['Mix milk and honey together.', 'Smooth over the face.', 'Leave it on for 10 minutes.', 'Rinse with warm water.']

title: Roast Leg of Lamb
ingredients: ['1 leg of lamb', 'garlic cut in slivers', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['You may have the leg of lamb boned or not, as you choose.Make several gashes in the outside flesh and insert slivers of garlic.', 'Rub the meat well with salt and pepper and then arrange it on a spit.', 'Be sure you balance it evenly.', 'It is wise to use a meat thermometer with a roast; simply stick the sharp end of the thermometer in the fleshiest part of the leg.', 'Roast over medium heat until the thermometer registers 150F.', 'Then remove the roast and let it stand 20 minutes before carving.', 'The meat will continue to cook during that time.', 'This gives you a rare leg of lamb, and in my opinion a tastier, more tender dish than lamb cooked to the well done stage.', 'If you must have well done lamb roast to 165F to 170F.', 'Serve this roast with a fresh green vegetable, some hot French bread and a delicate rose wine.']

title: Butter And Sugar Breakfast Toast
ingredients: ['4 slice bread', '2 tbsp soft butter', '2 tbsp sugar']
directions: ['spread generously any bread of your preferences with soft butter then toast it', 'springkle sugar top covering bread generously and enjoy', 'BELOW,ARE FEW OF MY BREAD RECIPES, I AM GLAD TO SHARE WITH YOU']

title: Roasted carrots
ingredients: ['9 carrots', '1/4 cup honey', '3 tbsp olive oil', '5 garlic cloves', '1 salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['preheat oven to 350F', 'peel carrots and cut carrots in 1/3rds.', 'you can peel and put carrots in baking dish whole if you like.', 'add honey then olive oil.', 'mix with hands, super sticky, but mix well.', 'take off shell of garlic, add to the mix.', 'sprinkle salt and pepper to taste.', 'this is a basic roasting recipe - add different herbs before or after carrots are cooked.', 'Bake carrots for 60 minutes.', "Don't rush a good thing.", 'Maybe consider covering with foil.']

title: Panang beef or beef in red curry peanuts sauce
ingredients: ['350 grams of slices beef, 1 tb spoon of Panang curry paste, 10 of small thai eggplant, 2 slices of chillies remove seeds, 1 c of coconut milk and 1c of coconut cream, 1/2 c of chopped roasted peanuts, 1tb spoon of brown sugar, 1 / 2 tb spoon of fish sauce and 1/2ts']
directions: ['In the heating deep frying pan and oil and fry curry paste till the oil trun redish colour add coconut cream stir till the red oil reach the surface of coconut add beef keep stirring till the beef is cook add chopped peanuts keep stirring for 10 minutes then pour in the coconut milk, eggplants and chillies keep stirring gently add brown sugar beef stock powder and fish sauce let boil and cover for 20 minutes.', 'Served with rice.']

title: Honey Syrup
ingredients: ['1 cup sugar', '13 cup orange juice', 'Juice of 1 lemon', '1 cup honey']
directions: ['Dissolve sugar in the orange juice in a small saucepan.', 'Heat until mixture turns clear.', 'Simmer gently 5 minutes.', 'Add lemon juice and honey, and set aside until ready to use.', 'Before using, warm gently and serve warm.']

title: Sugar Glaze

directions: ['Combine sugar with milk and vanilla.', 'Pour over pound cake with fruit (Raspberries and blueberries great for the 4th of July).']

title: 1 2 3 Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe

title: Coconut Milk
ingredients: ['1 cup dried unsweetened coconut']
directions: ['Place the coconut in a food processor or blender.', 'Add one and one-quarter cups of hot tap water.', 'Blend until the coconut is finely pulverized, about 30 seconds.', 'Pour the liquid through a fine sieve into a bowl.', 'Press and squeeze with your fingers to extract the excess liquid.', 'This is the coconut milk.']

title: Peach Topping For Ice Cream Recipe
ingredients: ['6 ounce. frzn orange juice']
directions: ['Prepare according to directions on can.', 'Add in:']

title: Melted cheese omelette
ingredients: ['2 Egg', '1 Salt and white pepper', '1 table spoon Milk', '1/2 slice Sliced cheese', '5 grams Butter']
directions: ['Cut the sliced cheese in half.', 'Beat the egg and mix in the milk, salt and pepper.', 'Melt the butter in the pan.', 'Once hot enough that a bit of the egg mixture sizzles, pour the rest of it in.', 'Stir briskly.', 'Once half-done, place the cheese in the middle and fold over to one side.', 'Lift up the pan a bit and tap on the quite hard a few times to move the egg to the side of the pan further away from you.', "Here's what it should look like from the side.", "The cooked omelette will hop about when you're tapping on the handle of the pan.", 'Fold it over to let it take the shape of an omelette.', 'Flip it over.', 'Move the omelette to the furthest side of the pan and flip it over again.', 'This will help seal the seams of your omelette together.', "Plate and you're done!", 'It looks like this when cut.']

title: Simple Pineapple Cutting Technique
ingredients: ['1 Whole pineapple']
directions: ['Using a bread knife with a serrated edge will make cutting the leaves and thick prickly skin easy.', 'In order to make a "handle" to use while cutting the pineapple, cut off the pointed parts of the leaves only.', "By holding this end in your left hand and cutting with your right, you won't have to touch the pineapple directly, and your hands won't get sticky.", 'Use the knife to cut off the skin of the pineapple.', "It's alright if there are brown spots remaining on the fruit.", "Once you've cut off the skin, remove the bottom of the pineapple.", 'From this point on, switch from the bread knife to a carving knife or a paring knife.', 'Since the brown spots on the pineapple are aligned diagonally, cut notches in the pineapple along those lines.', 'To cut out the brown spots, cut notches on the other side of the brown spots and remove them.', 'Continue cutting the diagonal lines by slowly turning the pineapple, removing all of the brown spots.', 'Once all the spots have been removed, cut off the handle and all remaining leaves.', 'First, cut the pineapple in half down the middle, then cut into whatever size pieces you like (quarters, sixths, etc).', 'Cut off the central pith of the pineapple.', 'Cut into bite size pieces and serve.']

title: Frozen melon bites
ingredients: ['1 melon']
directions: ['Slice melon of your choice into small, bite-sized pieces.', 'Spread sliced melon over cookie sheet lined with parchment or wax paper.', 'Do not allow pieces to touch.', 'Place in freezer uncovered until frozen.', 'Put frozen pieces into a freezer storage bag or other storage container and place back in freezer to access as you please :)']

title: Scrumptious Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Mix ingredients, starting with creaming sugar and peanut butter, then mix rest in.', 'Shape into 1 inch balls on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Press with fork to flatten slightly.', 'Bake in 350 degree oven for 12 to 15 min.', 'Makes 3 dozen.', 'These are nice and chewy.']

title: Perfectly Juicy 4 Ingredient Roasted Chicken
ingredients: ['1 whole 3-4 Lb. Chicken', '1 bunch Celery', '1/2 sticks Butter', '5 dashes Onion Powder', 'Salt and Pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350.', 'After you rinse off (and out) your bird, sprinkle the inside and outside generously with onion powder, salt, and pepper.', 'During this process you should crave Funyuns ... its normal, I promise.', 'Now, slather that puppy with butter.', 'Butter is good.', 'Say it with me.', 'Butter is normal, natural, and good to me.', 'Tuck some inside the cavity, under skin, and on top of the bird.', 'This will help create a crisp skin and seal the juice into the meat.', 'Plus, butter tastes good.', 'Now, tuck that celery into the cavity of the bird.', 'Dont make it tight but dont let it wiggle and wobble.', 'Stick that baby into the tanning bed aka oven at 350 degrees uncovered for appr.', '30 minutes per pound.', 'Just make sure the juice is running clear (if you can even tell with all the butter, yay!)', 'and the center of the thickest portion of meat is at least 180 degrees.', 'I usually take this out of the oven when its at about 175 degrees in the thickest piece of meat and cover it with foil for about 30 minutes.', 'Then it comes perfectly to 180 degrees and its tender, juicy, and slap yo mama good.']

title: Salt-Cured Cherry Blossoms
ingredients: ['1 Salt-cured cherry blossoms']
directions: ['Fill a bowl with water, and soak the salt-cured cherry blossoms to de-salt them, for 20 to 30 minutes.', "It's best to soak them for a rather long time.", '(See Hints.)', 'Very gently pat them dry with paper towels.', "Line them up on a heatproof dish so that they don't overlap.", '(See Hints.)', 'Microwave for 1 minute.', 'Take them out, and poke apart the flower petals very gently so that they will open up easier.', 'Microwave at 500w for 90 seconds to 2 minutes.', 'Turn the flowers over and microwave for another minute to 90 seconds.', 'Evaporate all the moisture.', 'The flowers are done.', "I put them on Ne-ne's delicious roll cake.", "Here's a closeup.", 'I dusted the flowers with powdered sugar.', 'They have such a nice cherry blossom fragrance.', "I used one as a topping on Ne-ne's Sakura Latte.", 'This is so good too..', "On Takuchi's Sakura Milk.", 'The crushed kanten jelly is so good!', 'I put them in jelly.', 'They bloomed nicely.']

title: Strawberry-Ginger Refrigerator Jam
ingredients: ['1 quart strawberry, hulled', '1 12 cups sugar', '1 lemon, juice of', '5 slices ginger']
directions: ['Rinse and dry the strawberries; place in a 5 quart casserole.', 'Lightly crush some of the berries, then stir in the remaining ingredients.', 'Bring to a boil, slowly, stirring.', 'Raise the heat and boil rapidly, stirring often, for 15-20 minutes or until the jam thickens.', 'Turn off heat and let jam calm down for 5 minutes.', 'Skim off any foam and spoon jam into sterilized jars.', 'Close the jars, turn them upside down, and cool overnight.', 'Refrigerate until needed, up to three weeks.', 'For long-term storage, seal per boiling method.']

title: Easy Avocado Shake
ingredients: ['1/2 Hass avocado', '2 oz coconut milk', '4 oz whole milk', '2 tablespoons sugar']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients into a blender.', 'Add 1 cup of ice and blend.', 'Pour into a fountain glass and garnish with toasted coconut shavings.']

title: Roasted Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['4 pounds Fresh Plum Tomatoes', '1 whole Medium Sized Onion', '3 cloves Garlic', '1 Tablespoon Olive Oil', '1 Tablespoon Butter', 'Salt And Pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375 degrees.', 'Wash tomatoes and place them on a foil-lined baking sheet.', 'Roast tomatoes about 10 to 15 minutes, until their skin begins to crack, flipping them halfway through.', 'While the tomatoes cool, chop and dice your onion and garlic.', 'Place a medium-large pot over medium heat.', 'Add oil and butter.', 'Toss in the onion and let cook, stirring occasionally, for 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Add the garlic and let cook until the onion is translucent.', 'In the meantime, peel your tomatoes and rip them into smallish pieces.', 'I removed some of the seeds, though not all.', 'Add the tomatoes to the onion mixture.', 'Bring to a boil, lower heat, cover, and let simmer for 1 to 3 hours.', '(I realize this is highly unspecific and not very helpful.', 'Cook it as long as you feel you should, until it tastes good and is nice and thick.)']

title: Turkey Cracklings
ingredients: ['Skin from about 1/4 of a roast turkey']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', 'Spread the turkey skin on the parchment and cover with another sheet of parchment and another baking sheet.', 'Set a heavy ovenproof pot on top.', 'Bake for about 30 minutes, until the skin is crisp and golden.', 'Let cool slightly, then break into pieces.']

title: Good All the Way to the Crusts! Simple Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slice Sliced bread', '2 slice Bacon', '2 slice Sliced cheese', '2 tsp Butter', '1 Egg', '50 ml Milk', '1 pinch Krazy Salt']
directions: ['Mix all the ingredients in a bowl and set aside.', 'On a slice of bread, lay one slice of bacon cut in half (using both halves as in the picture).', 'Top with two slices of cheese.', 'Add another layer of bacon.', 'Finally, cover with a second slice of bread.', 'Soak all sides of the sandwich in the mixture.', 'In a frying pan, melt the butter on low heat, then fry both sides of the sandwich.', 'Pour the remaining mixture over the sandwich and continue frying, flipping the sandwich and sopping up the remaining mixture as it fries.', 'Finally, turn the heat to medium and continue frying until both sides are golden brown.', 'Cut thirds as shown, and enjoy!']

title: Loaded Sweet Potato
ingredients: ['1 sweet potato', '1 egg']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400 degrees.', 'Poke holes into your sweet potatoes and bake them on a baking sheet for about 40-45 minutes or until theyre fork tender.', 'Remove from the oven.', 'Slice them open, and scoop out a little bit to make room for your stuffing.', 'Sprinkle cheese on top and pop them back in the oven for a few minutes for the cheese to melt.', 'While you wait for your cheese to melt, mix the salt and greek yogurt.', 'Taste and adjust.', 'Stuff with sliced meat rolls, mushrooms and egg, and then put it back into the oven.', 'Bake until the egg is cooked and then top it with yogurt.', 'Serve and Enjoy!']

title: Gingered Honey
ingredients: ['4 ounces ginger, peeled and sliced paper thin', '1 13 cups honey, warm']
directions: ['Loosely fill sterilized pint jars with ginger.', 'Fill to top with warm honey, covering ginger completely.', 'Cook to room temperature and seal and refrigerate for at least 2 weeks before using.']

title: Turkey On The Grill
ingredients: ['10 to 12 pound turkey', 'Salt', '3 tablespoons Land O Lakes Butter, melted']
directions: ['Thaw and prepare turkey for roasting as directed on package; remove giblets from neck and body cavities.', 'Do not stuff.', 'Season cavity with salt; brush skin with melted butter.', 'Kettle or Covered Charcoal Grill', 'Place coals to one side in grill; heat until coals are ash white.', 'Make aluminum foil drip pan; place opposite hot coals.', 'Place top grilling rack over coals and drip pan.', 'Place prepared turkey onto grill over drip pan.', 'Open bottom vents directly under coals.', 'Cover grill, positioning top vent directly over side of grill with turkey.', 'Adjust vent as necessary to keep a consistently hot fire.', 'Add coals to fire as necessary.', 'Grill turkey 11-20 minutes per pound, turning halfway through the time and basting with butter.', 'Turkey is done when meat thermometer inserted into thick part of breast or thigh reaches 165F.', 'Remove turkey from grill.', 'Let stand 15 minutes before carving.', 'Gas Grill', 'Make aluminum foil drip pan.', 'Place over coals on one side of grill, if using dual control gas grill; heat other side 10-15 minutes on high.', 'Place drip pan over one half of coals to block out direct heat, if single control gas grill is used; heat grill 10-15 minutes on high.', 'Reduce heat to medium.', 'Place turkey onto top rack directly above drip pan.', 'Grill turkey on medium heat 11-20 minutes per pound, turning halfway through the time and basting with butter.', 'Turkey is done when meat thermometer inserted into thick part of breast or thigh reaches 165F.', 'Remove turkey from grill.', 'Let stand 15 minutes before carving.']

title: Easy Fried Rice
ingredients: ['2 cups rice', '1 whole egg', '1 whole onion']
directions: ['chop one onion so that it is very small.', 'saute the onion on medium heat for a few minutes.', 'beat egg and put in pan', 'put two cups of rice in the pan and mix it', 'mix with ketchup if you want.']

title: Toasted Pita Triangles
ingredients: ['1 loaf pita bread']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.', 'Slice the pita bread into 8 triangles and place them on a sheet pan.', 'Place the sheet pan in the oven and toast the bread for 10 minutes.']

title: Luncheon Casserole Recipe
ingredients: ['1/2 c. butter']
directions: ['Saute/fry celery and peppers in butter.', 'Make white sauce.', 'Layer fish or possibly chicken, celery, pepper, pimento, nuts, Large eggs, and mushrooms.', 'Pour white sauce over top of casserole.', 'Top with bread crumbs.', 'Bake in 350 degree oven for 50 min.', 'Yield: 10 generous servings.']

title: Sticky Rice
ingredients: ['2 cups Thai glutinous rice']
directions: ['Cover rice with plenty of water in a large bowl and soak at room temperature at least 3 hours.', 'Drain and put in a cheesecloth-lined steamer basket.', 'Steam rice, covered, over boiling water until shiny and tender, about 20 minutes.', 'Remove from heat and let stand, covered, 5 minutes before serving.']

title: Gentle Flavor Strawberry Jam
ingredients: ['1 Strawberry', '40 % of the strawberries by weight Sugar', '1 tbsp for 2 packs Lemon']
directions: ['Preparation Sterilize jars to store the jam, a strainer to drain the moisture, and tongs to use while you are making the jam.', 'Rest them in a strainer.', 'Pour salt water in a bowl and immerse the strawberries.', 'Rinse the strawberries under the water to remove any excess dirt.', 'Take them out of the water and remove the stems.', 'Weigh the strawberries.', 'Put the sugar equivalent to 40% of the strawberries in a bowl.', 'Put strawberries in a pan, and add some sugar.', 'Then add more strawberries and repeat.This will help coat the strawberries with sugar evenly.', 'Rest for a 2 or 3 hours to a half day.', 'Moisture will come out from the strawberries.', 'You can make the jam even if you skip this step.', 'Cook over medium to high heat.', 'More and more moisture and scum will be released.', 'Remove the scum carefully.', "Don't stir until the jam has thickened.", 'When 70 - 80% of the moisture is gone, squash the strawberries.', 'Steps 6 and 7 are optional.', "For those of you who prefer leaving the strawberries whole, you don't need those steps.", 'Turn off the heat.', 'Squeeze on some lemon and stir.', 'Cool down a bit, and pour into the jar.', "It's done!", '!']

title: Avgolemono (Greek Egg And Lemon Soup) Recipe
ingredients: ['4 c. Chicken Stock', '1/4 c. Uncooked Rice', '1 x Egg Yolk', '1/2 x Lemon, Juice Only']
directions: ['Bring the chicken stock to a boil in a stockpot.', 'Add in the rice.', 'Reduce heat.', 'Simmer till the rice is tender (about 20 min).', 'Beat the egg yolk and lemon juice together in a separate bowl.', 'Stir in 1/2 c. of the stock.', 'Whisk the mix back into the stockpot.', "Reheat but don't allow to boil.", 'Serve.']

title: Lemon Pepper Wings Recipe
ingredients: ['1 cup Chicken']

title: Garlic Jack Chicken
ingredients: ['1 pound Chicken', '1 loaf Garlic Bread', '12 slices Pepper Jack Cheese']
directions: ['Preheat oven per instructions of garlic bread.', 'Cook the chicken how you like (I have done this with grilled, pan-fried, and even store-bought chicken nuggets).', 'Place the chicken on top of garlic bread and cover with cheese.', 'Bake according to bread instructions.', 'My husband loves this served with salsa, but I eat it just as it is.']

title: Oven-Dried Tomatoes and Olive Salad
ingredients: ['3 to 5 lb. Roma tomatoes', 'Olive oil for drizzling']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 275F.', 'Remove stems and slice tomatoes in half lengthwise.', 'Gently squeeze out seeds with fingers.', 'Place cut side up on baking sheet, drizzle with olive oil and season to taste.', 'Bake for 3 to 4 hours, or until slightly shriveled and softened.', 'Remove from oven, place in large jar, cover with olive oil, seal jar and refrigerate for up to 3 weeks time.']

title: Roast turkey with festive stuffing
ingredients: ['1 turkey']
directions: ['Take the turkey out of the fridge half an hour before you are going to start roasting.', 'Put it on the washed kitchen surface and clean with damp kitchen roll.', 'Preheat the oven to 240 degrees .', 'Stuff the turkey', 'Rub the butter all over the turkey with your hands.', 'Do the same with the salt and pepper.', 'Tie the legs together with string or foil.', 'This will prevent the stuffing from spilling out during roasting time.', 'Put the turkey on the oven tray and give your hands a good wash in warm soapy water.', 'Cover the roasting tray with foil and put the whole thing in the oven.', 'After 20 minutes put the oven down to 165 degrees', 'After one and a half hours, take the turkey out and take the foil off.', 'It will look like this.', 'Put it back in the oven for another hour and a half.', 'During this time every half hour pour the turkey juices over the turkey to keep it moist', 'When you think the turkey is done, pierce the part joining the leg to the body with a skewer.', 'If the juices come out clean, the turkey is cooked.', 'If they are murky, it needs more time.', 'Put the excess juices into the stock you have made for the gravy.', 'Turn the oven off and put some serving plates in - they will warm up nicely while the turkey is resting.', 'Put the turkey onto the carving board or plate and let it rest for half an hour before carving.', 'While the turkey is resting, pour the gravy into the oven tray to get all the little tasty bits that have stuck to the tin', 'Use a very sharp knife to carve the turkey and arrange on the warmed plates with the stuffing.', 'Uncork the wine, pull the crackers and enjoy :-)']

title: Easy Steamed Sweet Potato
ingredients: ['1 Sweet potato']
directions: ['Slice the sweet potato into 1.5-2 cm thick slices.', 'The steamed sweet potato slices will look more refined if soaked in a bowl of water to get rid of the excess starch before steaming them (this step is optional).', 'Bring water to a boil in a steamer, and steam the sweet potato for about 15 minutes over medium to high heat.', "That's all there is to it!", 'I made delicious sweet potato mochi referring to "Potato Mochi".']

title: Homemade Coffee Extract
ingredients: ['2 cups Sugar', '1 cup Double-strength Brewed Coffee']
directions: ['*Always keep a bowl of ice water close by when working with molten sugar.', 'If you burn your hand, plunge it into the ice water and keep it there for at least 2 minutes.', 'This will minimize the burn.', 'Preheat a large non-stick pan over medium heat.', 'Sprinkle just enough of the 2 cups of sugar into the pan to lightly cover the bottom.', 'Do not stir.', 'As the sugar melts, sprinkle more sugar over the hot spots.', 'This keeps the temperature even, and prevents scorching.', 'Continue with this method until about half of the sugar has been incorporated.', 'Stir gently with a wooden spoon to melt all the sugar into a smooth caramel.', 'Add the remaining sugar, about 1/4 at a time, and continue to stir to keep the caramel smooth.', 'Continue to cook until the caramel is almost the colour of coffee.', 'The easiest way to see this is by smearing a bit of the caramel on a white card.', 'Expect some smoke when sugar gets this hot turn the exhaust on and BE CAREFUL!', '!', 'Remove from the heat, and gently stir in approximately 2 tablespoons of the hot espresso/coffee beware of splatters!', 'Add the coffee, a little bit at a time, until it is all incorporated, stirring well between additions.', 'Store in a glass jar at room temperature indefinitely.']

title: Easiest Roast Chicken
ingredients: ['2 -3 lbs chicken', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450 degrees.', 'Dry the chicken thoroughly, then salt and pepper all over.', 'Bake for 50-60 minutes; remove and let stand 15 minutes before carving.']

title: Pick me up smoothie
ingredients: ['3 cup brewed coffee of your choice', '1 1/2 cup milk', '2 tbsp sugar', '1 tsp vanilla extract', '1 banana']
directions: ['Pour all ingredients into blender and blend!', 'Add more of whatever to your liking.', "Just render you can add but you can't take away!"]

title: Bacon wrapped asparagus(real quick)
ingredients: ['1 bacon', '1 asparagus']
directions: ['preheat oven to 375', 'trim asparagus spears and place on baking/cookie sheet in groups of 3', 'wrap each group with a slice of bacon secure with toothpick all the way thru bake until Bacon is crisp turn occasionally.', 'serve immediately & enjoy']

title: Chapped Lips Remedy
ingredients: ['2 tsp sugar', '1 tsp honey']
directions: ['Mix ingredients well', 'Apply to lips for five minutes', 'Massage in paste to release dead cells', 'Rinse with warm water']

title: Microwaved Eggs Several Ways
ingredients: ['1 egg', 'butter']
directions: ['Microwave Eggs cooked in their shells will explode!', 'Even out of the shell, eggs can and may explode in the microwave because rapid heating causes a buildup of steam.', 'Always use a wooden pick or tip of a knife to break the yolk membrane of an unbeaten egg before micro-cooking to allow the steam to escape.', 'Covering cooking containers with a lid, plastic wrap, or wax paper encourages more even cooking and (if you forgot to prick the yolks) helps to confine the explosion!', 'Microwave Fried Eggs:.', 'Break and slip one (1) egg into each of two lightly-greased 10-ounce custard cups or a pie plate.', 'Gently prick yolks with tip of knife or wooden pick.', 'Cover with plastic wrap.', 'Cook on 50% power just until eggs are almost desired doneness, about 2 to 3 minutes.', 'Let stand, covered until whites are completely set and yolks begin to thicken but are not hard.', 'Microwave Hard-Cooked (Boiled) Eggs:.', 'Separate yolks and whites of eggs into two (2) lightly-greased liquid measures or small bowls.', 'Stir yolks with fork.', 'Cover each container with plastic wrap.', 'Cook separately on 50% or 30% power, stirring once or twice, allowing about 20 to 30 seconds per yolk, about 30 seconds to 1 minute per white.', 'Remove when slightly underdone.', 'Let stand, covered, about 2 minutes.', 'Cool long enough to handle comfortably, then chop or chill until ready to chop.', 'Microwave Poached Eggs:.', 'Pour 1/3 cup water into 10-ounce custard cup or small deep bowl.', 'Break and slip in two eggs.', 'Gently prick yolks with tip of knife or wooden pick.', 'Cover with plastic wrap.', 'Cook on full power about 1 1/2 to 2 minutes.', 'If necessary, let stand, covered, until whites are completely set and yolks begin to thicken but are not hard, about 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Pour off water to serve in custard cup or lift out with slotted spoon.', 'NOTE: For 4 eggs, use 2/3 cup water in 1-quart bowl or baking dish.', 'Cook 1 1/2 to 3 minutes and let stand as above.', 'Microwave Scrambled Eggs:.', 'In a 10-ounce custard cup, beat together 2 eggs, and 2 tablespoons milk with salt and pepper to taste, if desired, until blended.', 'Cook on full power, stirring once or twice, until almost set, about 1 to 1 1/2 minutes.', 'Stir.', 'If necessary, cover with plastic wrap and let stand until eggs are thickened and no visible liquid egg remains, about 1 minute.', 'NOTE: All microwave cooking times are based on a full power output of 600 to 700 watts.', 'For a lower wattage oven, allow more time.', '1 egg: 30 to 45 seconds.', '2 eggs: 1 to 1-1/2 minutes.', '4 eggs: 2-1/2 to 3 minutes.', '6 eggs: 3-1/2 to 4-1/2 minutes.', '8 eggs: 4-1/2 to 5-1/2 minutes.']

title: Kaya Jam
ingredients: ['100 ml Coconut milk', '1 Egg', '50 grams Granulated sugar']
directions: ['Break the egg into a bowl and beat with a whisk.', 'Then, add the sugar and stir without letting it foam.', 'Add the coconut milk.', 'When everything is mixed together, it will look pale as shown.', 'Pour it into a pot.', 'Slowly bring it to a simmer over low heat.', 'After 7-8 minutes the coconut will become aromatic and the mixture will begin to thicken.', 'As you stir it, occasionally remove it from heat to prevent it from separating.', 'It will gradually become paste-like in consistency.', "Once it turns yellow, it's done."]

title: Buffalo Eggs
ingredients: ['1 slice dense sandwich bread', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 egg', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Use a cookie cutter or glass to cut out a 2 inch circle in the center of the slice of bread.', 'Heat a small nonstick skillet over medium heat.', 'Add 2 teaspoons butter.', 'When butter has melted and is foamy, place the slice of bread in the pan.', 'Cook for 1 minute until golden.', 'Flip the piece of bread over, drop the remaining 1 teaspoon butter in the hole, and when the butter has completely melted, crack the egg into the hole.', 'The white will run under and the yolk will sit in the hole.', 'Cook over medium heat 1 to 3 minutes until as set as desired.', 'If you wish a drier egg, you can flip the toast back over to lightly cook the top of the yolk.', 'Serve hot.', 'You can make more than one portion at a time on the flat surface of a griddle.']

title: Halloween Jack-o-Lantern made from Carrots
ingredients: ['1 Carrots']
directions: ['First, boil 3 mm slices of a carrot.', 'Using a knife, cut them into pumpkin shapes.', 'Bend the end of a straw into a triangle.', 'I recommend using the thin straw from a juice box.', 'With the triangular-tipped straw, punch out the eyes and nose.', 'For the mouth, cut by connecting triangles in a mouth shape.', 'Here is an example of a pumpkin face.', "They're cute as rice toppings.", 'Trying out a Halloween-themed bento.', "Here's one covered in jack-o-lanterns.", "Here's a Halloween-themed bento I made with a kabocha burger.", 'You can even give a normal bento a Halloween flair.', 'Make a lot and store them in the fridge!', 'They keep well in a plastic bag to use any time during the Halloween season.']

title: No Egg Whole Wheat Potica Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. lowfat milk']
directions: ['Sift flour and salt.', 'Set aside.', 'Scald lowfat milk, butter and']

title: Winter Smoothie
ingredients: ['12 cup orange juice', '12 cup cranberry juice', '1 banana']
directions: ['In a blender combine all ingredients; blend until combined.', 'Pour into one tall glass.']

title: Cajun Baked Fish Recipe
ingredients: ['4 med fish fillets Cajun seasoning slices of fresh lemon']
directions: ['Lay fish fillets on a sheet of lightly oiled foil each.', 'Top each fillet with a little Cajun seasoning mix and a few slices of fresh lemon.', 'Fold foil over to enclose, pop onto a tray and bake 180 degrees C 15- 20 mins.', 'Serve with salad & potato wedges.']

title: lime drops Recipe cyounchow
ingredients: ['lime']
directions: ['get lime']

title: Creamy bacon pasta salad
ingredients: ['200 grams of Cooke Italian twist pasta, half of lettuce finally slices, 1 c of mayonnaise, 1 / 2 c of sour cream, 1 ts spoon of pepper 20 black olives, 5 stripes of chopped bacon.']
directions: ['In mixing bowl add lettuce, bacon, mayonnaise and sour cream mix together and add cook pasta pepper and bacon stir and mixed well.', 'No need for salt the flavours come from bacon.']

title: Baked Apple Chips
ingredients: ['1 whole Apple, Thinly Sliced']
directions: ['Arrange thin apple slices in a single layer on a greased or lined baking tray.', 'Place into a preheated 400F oven and immediately reduce the temperature to 170F; bake for about 2-2 1/2 hours, depending on how thick the slices are, and how crispy or chewy you like them.', 'Cool.', 'Store in an airtight container.']

title: Made in 5 Minutes! Seriously Delicious Rusks
ingredients: ['1 slice Sliced bread', '10 grams Butter', '1 tbsp Sugar']
directions: ['Cut the slice of bread into cubes.', 'I cut it into 36 cubes.', 'Place in a dish and microwave at 800W for 1 1/2 minutes.', 'Give it a stir and microwave for another 30 seconds.', 'Meanwhile, heat the butter in a frying pan.', 'Once the butter begins to melt, add the bread and absorb the butter.', 'Add the sugar and brown the surfaces.', 'Once slightly browned, move to a dish and enjoy.']

title: Tropical Yogurt Drink
ingredients: ['1 whole coconut ,water and flesh', '1/2 cup yogurt,natural', '2 tbsp coconut milk', '1 tbsp sugar syrups']
directions: ['This drink use both coconut flesh ,and its cleared water ,mix with some coconut milk ,some yogurt ..make me feel fresh :),blend all until smooth :) ,for more sweet add more syrups on your preference :)']

title: Caster Sugar
ingredients: ['1 Sugar']
directions: ['Pour sugar into a blender, a food processor, or a clean coffee mill.', 'Keep in mind that this technique can scratch up the sides of a plastic container pretty bad, so you might not want to use a brand new food processor or blender.', 'A mortar and pestle would also do a fine job, though somewhat more difficult.', 'Buzz the sugar on high until fine.', 'Substitute for caster or superfine sugar in any application.']

title: Rice and Everything
ingredients: ['2 cups rice']
directions: ['Attention all the busy mommies, next time when you are cooking your rice, throw everything you like inside the rice cooker.', 'Seafood, vegetable or anything you can find in your fridge.', 'Add some salt and pepper and you will get a pot of healthy and taste meal!', 'Note: Do not add additional water.', 'Keep the water level as per your usual input.']

title: All I Oli (Catalan) Recipe
ingredients: ['10 x cloves of garlic peeled and crushed salt about a c. of extra virgin olive oil lemon']
directions: ['Lb.', 'the garlic to a paste with a mortar; beat in oil until it thickens to a thick cream.', 'You may add in juice of 1/2 - 1 whole lemon.']

title: Mother's Yeast Rolls/Donuts/Bread Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1/3 c. evaporated lowfat milk', '1 tbsp. butter']
directions: ['These are very easy.', 'Anyone can make this bread.', 'Combine together: 1/4 c. very hot but not warm water 1/2 teaspoon sugar', 'Set aside.', 'Combine together: 1/4 c. shortening 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 c. scalded lowfat milk (bring to boil)', 'Cold, then add in: Yeast combination 3 1/2 c. flour', 'Let dough rise in a hot place for 1 hour or possibly till double in size.', 'Knead and cut out rolls or possibly donuts, or possibly shape into a loaf of bread.', 'Recipe makes 1 loaf.', 'Place rolls or possibly donuts on a greased cookie sheet or possibly place loaf into a greased loaf pan.', 'Let dough rise again for 30 min or possibly till double in size.', 'For rolls, bake in a 425 degree oven for 10 min.', 'For donuts, fry in vegetable oil till golden.', 'For bread, bake at 350 degrees for 30 to 40 min or possibly till loaf sounds hollow when thumped with finger tips.', 'Glaze recipe follows.']

title: Broccoli in Roast Chicken Drippings
ingredients: ['1/4 cup roast chicken drippings', '1 head broccoli, cut into florets', '2 cloves garlic, chopped']
directions: ['After roasting a chicken, remove it from the roasting pan and place on a serving tray to rest.', 'Leave the oven on.', 'Pour off excess drippings from the roasting pan, leaving just enough to coat the broccoli.', 'Toss broccoli and garlic in the drippings until coated and place in the still hot oven.', 'Roast for 5 to 8 minutes, until tender.']

title: Peanuts
ingredients: ['1/2 cup PLANTERS Honey Roasted Peanuts']
directions: ['Serve each person a 2 Tbsp.', 'serving of crunchy peanuts.']

title: Sauteed Spinach with Bacon and Eggs
ingredients: ['3 bunches Boiled spinach', '2 slice Bacon', '1 Egg', '1 Butter', '1 Salt and pepper', '1/2 tbsp plus Grated cheese']
directions: ['Beat the eggs (add milk for a fluffy result).', 'Chop the spinach and bacon into bite-sizes.', 'Melt butter in a frying pan and saute the bacon.', "When it's cooked thoroughly, add spinach and saute briskly.", 'Add salt, pepper, and grated cheese.', 'Gather the cooked ingredients to the side of the pan.', 'Pour the beaten eggs into the open space.', 'When the eggs are soft-set, mix and cook together with the spinach and bacon to finish.']

title: Peanut Butter Banana Rounds
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', 'peanut butter', 'banana']
directions: ['Crusts off the bread.', 'Spread with Peanut butter.', 'lay a banana on top.', 'Roll the banana up with the bread.', 'Wrap with Cling Wrap.', 'Put in fridge for an hour or two.', 'slice into rounds.', 'Serve the kidlets.']

title: Sunshine Shake
ingredients: ['2 cups orange juice', '1 banana, cut into chunks', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon honey']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in blender and blend until smooth.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Moms Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['6 cups milk', '23 cup rice', '23 cup sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Combine Milk, Rice, and Sugar in large pot.', 'Cook at medium heat until milk is not yet all absorbed.', '(could take 45 minutes to 1 hour.', 'Half way through add the Vanilla.', 'Stir occasionally.', 'When almost done it may start scorching bottom of pot.', 'take off heat and pour into seperate bowls.', 'add cinnamon on top (optional).', 'refrigorate for few hours (best overnight).']

title: Pork & Rice Skillet Dinner Recipe
ingredients: ['2 pork steaks', '3/4 c. diced onion', '3/4 c. rice', '1 lg. can tomatoes']
directions: ['In 10-12 inch skillet, brown pork steaks in small amount of oil.', 'Set aside.', 'Brown rice and onion.', 'Add in tomatoes.', 'Chop into small pcs if necessary.', 'Bring to boil.', 'Add in pork steaks.', 'Cover, reduce heat, simmer for 1 hour.']

title: Bistecca Fiorentina
ingredients: ['1 3/4 pounds beef cut from loin with fillet and bone steak']
directions: ['Prepare the grill so that the charcoal is well lit and red hot without flames.', 'When the grill, slightly inclined, is very hot, put on the meat and grill it without turning and without piercing it in any way.', 'Another secret is to cook it very quickly so as to sear and seal in the meat juices.', 'After 5 to 6 minutes, turn the steak over using a spatula and season with salt and pepper.', 'At the end, the meat should be very well done on the outside.', 'It does stay tasty and tender on the inside.']

title: Banana Bread Pudding
ingredients: ['1 piece bread', '12 cup milk', '1 banana', '1 teaspoon sugar']
directions: ['chop bread and banana into cubes.', 'pour in milk and sugar.', 'wait for stand for 5 minutes.', 'put in oven.']

title: Breakfast Smoothie
ingredients: ['1 banana', '4 ounces crushed pineapple', '13 cup mango, pieces', '1 peach, peeled and diced', '1 cup skim milk']
directions: ['Mix all together in a blender until smooth.']

title: Sesame Curry Chicken Wings Recipe
ingredients: ['1 pound chicken wings, halved']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400 degrees.', 'Mix all sauce ingredients well in a bowl and coat wings.', 'Bake the wings for 30 min basting every 8 min.', 'Broil 3 to 4 min before serving.', '1 to 4 servings.']

title: Sauteed Broccoli
ingredients: ['1 head broccoli', '3 tablespoons butter', 'Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.', 'Remove the broccoli florets.', 'Trim the stalk and cut it into pieces.', 'Blanch the broccoli for 3 to 7 minutes.', 'Test to see if it is done after 3 minutes.', 'Shock broccoli in ice water when it is done.', 'Heat a skillet and add the butter.', 'Add broccoli.', 'Toss to coat and heat, then season with salt and pepper to taste.']

title: Creamy Avocado Tuna Salad
ingredients: ['2 avocado', '1 can tuna flakes in water', '3 tomatoes', '1 large onion', '1 black pepper to taste', '1 juice from 1 small lemon']
directions: ['Chop onions and tomatoes.', 'Drain water from tuna and mix with onion and tomatoes', 'Sprinkle with black pepper', 'Chop avocado and add to tuna mixture.', "Don't worry about stirring too much", 'Lightly drizzle lemon juice over the salad and top with more black pepper', 'Enjoy with warm wholewheat bread or alone!']

title: Vegetable Ribbons
ingredients: ['1 zucchini', '1 carrot', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
directions: ['wash the vegetables.', 'peel the skin off of the vegetables & keep peeling them down to the core with a vegetable peeler while putting the peelings into a medium bowl.', 'add oil & mix well.', 'serve in small bowls.']

title: Eeeeeasy Peasy Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup sugar', '1 egg', '1 cup peanut butter', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
directions: ['preheat oven to 350.', 'cream egg, sugar, vanilla.', 'mix in peanut butter.', 'bake for 8-10 minutes.']

title: Chocolate Butter
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons butter', '1 ounce semisweet chocolate']
directions: ['Melt chocolate, set aside to cool.', 'Cream butter.', 'beat in cooled chocolate.', 'Pour into 4 small ramekins and chill until firm.', 'You may use butter molds-refrigerate for 20 minutes, then pop out and store in plastic bag.', 'Serve with warm brioche or croissants.', 'Or even better, serve with Chocolate Bread.']

title: Slow-Roasted Tomatoes in Olive Oil
ingredients: ['60 ounces, weight Canned Diced Tomatoes, Drained', '1 cup Olive Oil Plus More As Needed', '1 teaspoon Salt', '1 teaspoon Sugar', '6 cloves Minced Garlic']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 275 F. Arrange the tomatoes in a baking dish (I used a large oval baker but a 9x13 should be fine as well).', 'Then pour the olive oil over top.', 'Add more olive oil as needed so that just the tops of the tomatoes are exposed.', 'Sprinkle with the salt and sugar.', 'Bake for several hours (at least 6 hours, or all day), stirring every hour or so, until the tomatoes are very dark red.', 'Add more olive oil during the cooking process as needed so the tomatoes dont dry out.', 'When the tomatoes are cooked, sprinkle the raw garlic over top and cover dish with plastic wrap.', 'Let it sit for at least 20 minutes, then serve as desired.', 'Notes: 1.', 'These are great on crostini, but I love them in marinara, risotto, or just as a topping for fish or chicken.', 'Skys the limit!', '2.', 'May be made up to a week in advance and kept in the fridge.']

title: Classic MINUTE RICE Pudding
ingredients: ['1-3/4 cups milk', '1/2 cup Minute Rice Brand Rice, uncooked', '2 Tbsp. each sugar and raisins', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1 egg', '1/4 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine milk, rice, sugar, raisins and salt in medium saucepan.', 'Bring to a boil, stirring constantly.', 'Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer, uncovered, 6 min., stirring occasionally.', 'Beat egg and vanilla with wire whisk until well blended.', 'Add a small amount of the hot milk mixture; mix well.', 'Return to saucepan; cook and stir on low heat 1 min.', '(Do not boil.)', 'Remove from heat.', 'Let stand 30 min.', 'Serve warm.', 'Store any remaining pudding in refrigerator.']

directions: ['Combine all the ingredients in a bowl.', 'Pour into a 9-by-13-inch nonreactive baking dish and freeze until firm, at least 8 hours or overnight.', 'Just before serving, scrape the ice into fine crystals using 1 or 2 forks.', 'Transfer to tall glasses and serve.']

directions: ['Heat ingredients in medium saucepan over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture comes to a boil.', 'Serve warm over individual servings of gingerbread.']

title: Easy Microwave Koya Dofu Tastes Just Like Silken Tofu
ingredients: ['1 Freeze dried tofu', '1 pinch Sugar']
directions: ['Add around 3 cm of warm water (a little warmer than bath water) to a deep container.', "Place the tofu in the container for 2 - 3 minutes until it's reconstituted.", 'Then cut it into 16-20 cubes (leave the water in the container)', 'Dissolve a pinch of sugar in the container of water.', 'Add the tofu pieces from Step 2 and add water to cover.', 'Lightly cover with a lid and microwave at 600 W for 2 minutes 40 seconds - 3 minutes.', "When it comes to a boil, it's done.", 'Place the tofu in a bowl and top with sauce,', 'or add to miso soup (drop gently when the soup is ready to eat) and enjoy.', 'You could also chill the tofu after Step 4 and then top it with mentsuyu and serve', 'If you add it to something salty, the liquid in the tofu will gradually seep out and will harden, so make sure you add it just before eating.']

title: Baked Ziti Recipe

directions: ['Baked ziti is comprised of three components; sauce, filling (much like a stuffed shell or possibly ravioli filling) and cooked pasta.', 'These are assembled after being prepared, then baked before serving.', 'The final result is reminiscent of lasagna, but much easier and faster to prepare.', "It's sure to become your family's weeknight favorite!"]

title: Ladybirds Carrot Flowers
ingredients: ['1 carrot']
directions: ['Wash and peel the carrot , then cut off either end of the carrot .', "You can either do it whole or if it's easier for you ,you can cut the carrot in half first .", 'Take the prepared carrot and carefully , using a knife , cut a line down the carrot from one end to the other , at a slight angle in ways , about 1-2mm depth , then carefully cut another line down the carrot , at an angle to meet your first cut , about 1mm from your first line cut and carefully take the strip you just cut out .', 'Turn the carrot over and repeat what you just did before but to this side of the carrot , and remove the cut out piece .', 'Turn the carrot till you get to the between your two previous cuts and proceed to cut a third line strip from the carrot , now finally turning the carrot over again to bring the final quarter of the carrot and proceed to cut a line strip piece out .', 'Once you have cut all four strips from the carrot , proceed to cut the carrot into rounds , size depending on your preference and proceed to cook to your liking or preference , i boiled mine with a teaspoon of sugar to just tender , drained and serve hot or cold , the choice is yours to how you prepare and eat them .', 'Enjoy .', ':-) .']

title: Perfect boiled egg
directions: ['Put enough water in the pan so that the egg is covered by 2 cm.', 'water.', 'Take the egg out, bring the water to boiling point and then carefully put the egg back in with the help of a large spoon, taking care not to break the shell', 'After five minutes (exactly 5!)', 'turn the heat off, pour the hot water down the sink and run the cold water tap over the egg for a few seconds.', 'This stops the cooking process from continuing.', 'Take the egg and gently tap one end on a hard surface to make little cracks.', 'Gently peel the shell of this end.', 'Then with the help of a teaspoon, ease the egg out of the shell and onto the slice of toast.']

title: Basic Steamed Artichoke
ingredients: ['1 artichoke', '1/2 lemon']
directions: ['Snap off the stem.', 'With a stainless steel knife, slice off the top, about 1 inch from the pointed end.', 'Use scissors to cut off the tips of the outer leaves.', 'Rub all cut surfaces with lemon juice.', 'Bring water to a boil in a pot with a steamer insert.', 'Place the artichoke in the insert and cover the pot tightly.', 'Steam until the base is tender and the leaves pull out easily, about 40 minutes.', 'If serving whole, pull out the cone of leaves in the center of the artichoke.', 'Use a small spoon to scoop out the choke.', 'If using the heart only, pull away all of the leaves and then scoop out the choke.', 'You will need approximately 8 large artichokes to get the equivalent of 1 13 3/4-ounce can of artichoke hearts.']

title: Coca-Cola Chicken Wings Recipe Remag1
ingredients: ["12-16 Chicken Wings 1/2 cup Mo'er [Cloud ears, Dried Tree Fungus, Dried Vegetables] 1 12oz Coca-Cola NOT DIET diet soda totally changes the flavor. 3-4 oz of Chinese cooking wine/any dry white wine 1-2 tablespoons Chinese Soy Sauce- do not use Kikkoman, it's too thin Water as needed"]
directions: ['Place wings in wok/pot and just cover with water.', 'Add soy sauce and bring to boil, lower heat to a gentle simmer.', 'Add coke and wine and let cook for about 45 minutes.', 'In the meantime, soak the moer in hot water for 45 minutes.', 'Remove from water and pick off any hard woody parts.', 'Add to wings and cook until liquid has reduced and thickened.', 'The sauce should be the consistency of pancake syrup.', 'Finger Licken Good.']

title: Prep-Work for Making Cheap Chicken Delicious
ingredients: ['1 Chicken breast', '1 tbsp Salt']
directions: ['Sprinkle the chicken all over evenly with 1 tablespoon salt, and knead well.', 'Place into a sieve or onto a net, and let sit for 10 minutes to get rid of any excess water or foul odors.', 'Cheap chicken may have a bit of feathers and hide remaining, so make sure to remove it all.', 'Rinse off the salt in water once 10 minutes have passed.', 'Immediately wipe with a paper towel.', 'The osmotic pressure of the salt will pull out the water, so just doing this will make the color of the meat much darker, and the meat will tighten up!', "If you sever the thick tendons, then you won't have to worry about them, and the meat wont shrink when cooked.", "I don't like the tendons either, and it is easy to remove them here.", 'Use a knife to strip them off if they are a little difficult to remove.', "I don't like the fat that is under the skin, so I always get rid of it if there is any.", 'You will be able to take off quite a bit of fat from under the skin.', 'You are now done with the preparations!', 'Feel free to use it in various recipes!']

title: Many uses of a pineapple
ingredients: ['1 large pineapple']
directions: ['First use of a pineapple cut top of leaving half to three quarters of an inch on stick into ground litely cover with dirt water regularly it will grow into a plant make sure you clear the dirt to where its disturbed and gives root chance to form', 'Take the yellow part of pineapple the edible part with the peeling removed cutting around the edges and bottom off set them aside', 'Slice the fruit', 'Take the peelings and bottom add water and boil at least a quart of water per pineapple after its boiled drain liquid add half liter or pint of pineapple juice and add one pound of sugar to every quart or liter add yeast and make pineapple wine in about 6 weeks', "There is a lot to do with pineapples hope you enjoy this isn't even close to being all you can use", 'Here is the pineapple I picked off the plant in the picture when I cut the top off I will plant it and have another pineapple plant', 'Here is a pineapple fruit coming up.', 'I three coming at once.', 'The red in the middle is the start of the fruit']

title: Fried ButterMilk Chicken

directions: ['Rinse Chicken & Season wit Salt & Pepper', 'Pour ButterMilk in a large Bowl then add about 5-6 gushes of Franks Hot or more to your tasting & mix well wit a whisk or fork now lay the Chicken in ButterMilk making sure its fully immersed in the ButterMilk', "Put in refrigerator for 2hrs to marinate..You can cover the Chicken wit Plastic Wrap or Alumina foil if u want its optional...I didn't cover mine if you were wondering", 'Pour flour on a Large Plate & use tongs to remove Chicken one piece at a time into the flour making sure you cover each piece carefully & try not to knock off the ButterMilk off Chicken you want that to stay on thats gonna make it taste more delicious.', 'Pour oil in a Skillet or Wok or Deep Fryer & let get hot before placing the Chicken in it .Turn the Chicken when it becomes brown on one side only giving you twice to turn the Chicken ..Neva keep turning the Chicken because u will lose your coating .When done frying place on paper towel to drain the oil off & BAM Theres your Fried ButterMilk Chicken..Now Enjoy folks']

title: Steamed Broccoli With Butter

directions: ['Trim bottom inch off broccoli stalks and discard.', 'Cut each stalk crosswise into 3 pieces.', 'Cut topmost piece of each stalk into small flowerets.', 'Cut remaining pieces into fine julienne.', 'Put all into cold water for at least 1/2 hour to refresh them.', 'Bring suitably large steamer of water to boil, add all broccoli and steam, covered, for 5 minutes, tossing from top to bottom a few times.', 'When just barely tender, remove to collander, spray liberally with cold water and drain.', 'When ready to serve, melt butter in skillet and toss broccoli with salt and pepper to taste, until heated through.']

title: Opening a Fresh Coconut the Safe and Easy Way!
ingredients: ['1 whole Coconut']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400F with the oven rack placed in the center.', 'Drain the liquid out of the coconut (see note below).', 'Place the drained coconut in a shallow pan and place it in the oven for 10-15 minutes until the hard outer shell is visibly cracked.', 'Remove from the oven and allow to cool completely.', 'Now, the soft meat of the coconut will separate from the hard outer shell.', 'Pull off the shell, then peel the dark skin from the coconut meat using a vegetable peeler.', 'Your coconut is now ready to slice or shred.', 'Note: The easiest way I find to puncture the eyes of the coconut is to use an electric drill, but some people report good results using an ice pick, screwdriver, or hammer and nail.']

title: Fluffy French Toast Made With Frozen Bread
ingredients: ['1 slice Frozen bread', '1 Egg', '200 ml Milk', '1 Sugar']
directions: ['Mix together the egg, milk, and sugar in a deep bowl or tupperware container.', "If you mix up the egg whites to break them up thoroughly, and it'll turn out better.", 'Cut the frozen bread into 4 pieces.', 'Use a skewer to poke holes into it.', "It's hard for the egg mixture to get absorbed near the crusts, so be sure to poke holes there!", 'Soak the bread in the egg mixture.', 'After about two minutes, flip the bread over.', "The bread is soft, so if you're worried about breaking it, use a spatula to flip.", 'Once both sides have completely soaked, fry it up and enjoy!', 'This is a version made without cutting up the bread.', "It might look a bit unappealing with all those holes, but you won't be able to tell at all after it's been fried!", "If it's too soft, it can break, but you can use a spatula to safely flip it over.", 'You can make more french toast with the remaining egg mixture if you like, but I like to pour it over the bread to fill in the holes!', '!']

title: How to Prepare Grilled Horse Mackerel
ingredients: ['4 Horse Mackerel', '1 Coarse salt']
directions: ['[Remove the scutes] Cut off the scutes (hard scales on the outside of horse mackerel) from the tail end using a sawing motion.', '[Remove the gills] Place the fish with its back facing down, and cut the bone under the lower jaw.', 'Open the gill flaps, and use a knife to remove the gills.', '[Remove the guts] Position the fish with the head on your right.', 'Cut a 3-4 cm slit from under the dorsal fin to the stomach.', 'Use the tip of the knife to remove the guts.', '[Rinse] Clean well until all the guts are removed.', 'Dry.', 'Position the head on the left and cut two diagonal slits.', '[Salt] Rub coarse salt all over the fish.', '[Dust with salt] Salt the tail and dorsal fins with salt.', 'Salt inside the cleaned cavity.', 'Set aside for 20 - 30 minutes.', 'Grill for 20 minutes.', "It's done."]

title: Lemons in Honey Honey Lemons
ingredients: ['2 Lemon', '1 Honey']
directions: ['Slice the lemon into thin rounds.', '(The thinner the better )', 'First, add a layer of honey into a plastic container so that it covers the bottom, then add the lemon slices over the top.', 'Then pour enough honey over the lemons to submerge them.', 'So that the honey covers all of the lemons, use a spoon to open up the gaps between the slices.', 'Then allow the honey to run inside the gaps as well.', 'Place a lid tightly over the top and leave the lemons to sit for 1 day.', "They're done.", 'The honey will probably pool at the bottom of the container, so mix the lemons with it before serving.', 'This photo shows my beloved honey lemon yogurt.', 'Please try this dessert with a generous coating of honey.']
