title: Brown Butter
ingredients: ['1 stick unsalted butter']
directions: ['Place the butter in a cold saucepan and set on the stove over medium heat.', 'It will soon begin to melt and sizzle.', 'After the butter melts completely, 2 to 3 minutes, it will begin to foam as the milk solids separate out.', 'As these solids drop to the bottom of the pan, they will toast and the butter will take on a brownish color and a toasty aroma.', 'Watch the heat carefully during this time to make sure the solids do not burn, lowering the heat if needed.', 'When the butter stops foaming and is a light brown color, remove immediately from the heat and pour through a sieve or a coffee filter to separate out the solids, which you can discard.', 'This will make more brown butter than you need for the figs.', 'Try tossing it with vegetables or drizzling over fish.', 'It will keep, covered, in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.']

title: Classic Blasted Chicken
ingredients: ['3 1/2 pound chicken, rinsed and patted dry', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 450 degrees.', 'Season the chicken all over with salt and pepper and place in a roasting pan.', 'Roast for 45 minutes, or until the juices run clear when the thigh is pricked with a skewer.', 'Transfer the chicken to a cutting board and let stand for 15 minutes.']

title: French Toast With Chocolate
ingredients: ['2 slice Sliced bread', '1/2 bar Chocolate bar', '1 Egg', '120 ml Milk', '1 tbsp Sugar', '1 tbsp Butter']
directions: ['Cut each slice of bread into 4 pieces, and cut a slit into each piece.', 'Put a piece of chocolate into each slit.', 'Push it in deep.', 'Mix the egg, milk, and sugar together, and soak the bread in it.', 'Use a shallow container, and make sure to soak both sides of the bread well so that it absorbs all that liquid.', 'Heat up the butter in a frying pan, and pan fry the bread.', 'Put on a lid and cook over low-medium heat.', 'When the bread is browned, turn it over and brown the other side too.']

title: Cheater's Honey-Mustard Chicken
ingredients: ['3 lbs chicken parts, with skin', '14 cup honey mustard, commercially prepared', '2 teaspoons mayonnaise']
directions: ['Preheat broiler.', 'Place chicken parts, skin side down, on a broiler pan.', 'In a small bowl, combine the mustard and the mayonnaise and brush half of this on the chicken.', 'Broil 8-10 inches from the heat for 10-12 minutes and then turn the chicken and brush with the remaining mustard mixture.', 'Broil 10-12 minutes, until done.']

title: Crispy bacon and avocado sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 ripe avocado', '1 lime', '3 very thin rashers bacon']
directions: ['Put the bacon rashers under the grill.', 'Peel and cut the avocado', 'Squees the lime over a seive and add to the bowl', 'Add salt and pepper and mash', 'Spread on one slice of bread', 'Add the crispy bacon rashers', 'Cover with the other slice and cut into two.', 'Serve with a tomato.']

title: Baked Brie Recipe
ingredients: ['1 lb Wedge of Brie Crackers']
directions: ['Place a 1-lb.', 'wedge of Brie on an ovenproof serving platter with a 1-inch-deep rim.. Bake in a preheated 350 degree F oven till softened and slightly runny (20 min).', 'Serve with crackers.']

title: Avocado Honey Cheese Toast
ingredients: ['1 slice Sliced bread', '1/2 Avocado', '1 Cheese', '1 Honey', '1 Olive oil', '1 pinch Salt', '1 pinch Black pepper']
directions: ['Spread olive oil on sliced bread.', 'Sprinkle lightly with salt.', 'Top with diced avocado and cheese.', 'Top with honey and toast.', 'Serve with black pepper if you like!', 'Also check out my Gratin-Style Avocado and Camembert with Honey Mustard.', 'I based it on this recipe!']

title: Easy French Toast in the Microwave
ingredients: ['1 slice Sliced bread', '1 Egg', '70 ml Milk', '1 tbsp Sugar', '10 grams Butter']
directions: ['Put the egg, milk and sugar in a bowl and mix.', 'Cut the bread into your preferred sizes, and add it to the bowl.', 'Microwave the bowl unwrapped at 500 W for 30 seconds.', 'Turn the bread over, and microwave for another 30 seconds.', 'Put the butter in a frying pan, add the toast, and fry until both sides are nicely browned.']

title: Carrot "fettucini"
ingredients: ['3 carrots, cleaned and the ends chopped off', '1 -2 tablespoon butter']
directions: ['Using a vegetable peeler make ribbons of the carrots.', 'Add carrots to a pot of boiling water and cook until tender crisp.', 'Drain.', 'Stir in butter.']

title: Petite Microwaved Cheese Omelette For Your Bento
ingredients: ['1 Egg', '1 tbsp Milk', '1 pinch of each Salt and sugar', '1/2 a slice Melting sliced cheese', '1 Ketchup']
directions: ['Mix the egg, milk, salt and sugar together in a deep dish.', 'Microwave for 1 minute at 600 W.', 'Take the plate out when the surface is cooked.', 'Make a slit in the middle with a knife and place the cheese on one side.', 'Fold over one side of the egg.', 'The cheese will melt and help the two sides stick together nicely.', "Pour your desired amount of ketchup on and it's done.", 'If you are putting it in a small lunch box, cut it in half again before dressing with ketchup.', 'P.S.', ": You can use any type of plate as long as the egg doesn't spill, but it will look more like an omelette if you use a plate that's slightly on the deeper side."]

title: Peanut Butter & Cooked Bacon Filling
ingredients: ['10 lbs peanut butter, softened', '1 lb butter, softened', '1 quart milk, evaporated', '3 lbs bacon, chopped and cooked']
directions: ['Mix together peanut butter, butter, bacon, and milk until smooth.']

title: Topping
ingredients: ['1/2 cup crushed Ritz crackers', '1 tablespoon butter, melted']
directions: ['Combine crackers and melted butter for topping; sprinkle on top of casserole.', 'Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.']

title: Roasted Garlic Mayo
ingredients: ['1 head garlic', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt & pepper', '2 cups mayonnaise']
directions: ['Cut top off 1/4 portion of garlic head.', 'Place garlic head on 6in x 6in square of foil.', 'Drizzle olive oil over and add S & P.', 'Crimp together sides of foil.', 'Make sure all edges are sealed.', 'Bake in 350 degree oven for 25-30 minutes.', 'Remove from oven and let cool.', 'Squeeze cloves of garlic into a seperate bowl and slightly mash to break down cloves.', 'Add mayo and mix.', 'Place in fridge for 30 minutes to set prior to serving.']

title: Peanut Butter Captain Crunch No Bake Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['2 c. each peanut butter Captain Krunch, Rice Krispies, miniature marshmallows, and peanuts']
directions: ['Heat 1 1/2 pounds almond bark.', 'Add in other ingredients and stir till well coated.', 'Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper.']

title: Arbroath Smokies Recipe
ingredients: ['Arbroath smokies Knob of butter Freshly grnd black pepper']
directions: ['Hot by steaming, or possibly heat in a gentle oven, or possibly heat under a moderate grill.', 'Split open and remove backbone.', 'Dust with pepper, add in knob of butter.', 'Close up, heat through again.', 'NOTES : Scots are among the finest makers of smoked fish and Arbroath smokies are quite unlike any other smoked fish in the world.', 'It is difficult to get them outside Scotland, but if you find them, buy them and try them!', 'Small haddocks are cleaned but not split open, salted, tied by their tails in pairs and smoked over oak or possibly silver birch chips.', 'The outside is a beautiful copper colour while the inside has a creamy texture and a most delectable savoury flavour.', 'In the following method, it is important to do no more than heat the fish, as they have already been cooked by the smoking process and any further cooking will only dry them out.']

title: PUMPKIN SPICE PIE
ingredients: ['2c Cold milk']
directions: ['Beat milk, dry pudding mixes, and cinnamon; Spread 1 1/2c onto bottom of crust', 'Add 1 1/2c whipped topping to remaining pudding mixture and stir gently; Spoon over layer in crust', 'Top w/remaining whipped topping', 'Refrigerate 1 hour', 'Top w/pecans before serving']

title: An Italian Snack (Chocolate)
ingredients: ['4 slices really good bread, sliced thick', '1 12 ounces dark chocolate']
directions: ['Preheat a toaster oven or a regular oven to 450F.', 'Arrange half of the chocolate on one slice of the bread, and place another slice of bread on top.', 'Repeat for the second sandwich.', 'Place the sandwiches on a cookie sheet and let them toast in the oven for about 5 minutes on each side.', 'Remove them from the oven, slice in half, and let them cool for a couple of minutes (otherwise youll scorch your tongue) before eating them.']

title: Panir
ingredients: ['1 quart homogenized milk', '1 lemon, juice of, squeezed']
directions: ['Bring the milk to a boil, add the lemon juice.', 'The milk will start to curdle.', 'Turn off the heat, let it sit for a few moments, bring it back to the boiling point; remove from the heat.', 'When half-cool, strain curds from whey through any fine cloth such as a piece of muslin or several thicknesses of cheesecloth.', 'Put a colander lined with cloth in the sink and pour the curdled milk through it.', 'As soon as most of the moisture has drained, gather the top of the cloth, tie it together with anything handy, and let it hang until all the water has dripped through.', 'This usually takes an hour.', 'Note: Under no circumstances squeeze the bag or try in any other way to lend nature a hand.', 'It removes the flavor along with the water, tends to make the panir tacky.', 'Remove the panir from the cloth, place it in a plastic bag and keep it in the refrigerator.', 'This will keep nicely for a couple of days.', 'After that, it will start to smell.']

title: Microwaved Scrambled Eggs with Tomato
ingredients: ['1 Egg', '5 pieces Chopped tomatoes', '1 Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Put the chopped tomatoes in a heatproof container.', 'Add 1 egg and lightly season with salt and pepper.', 'Mix together.', 'Wrap the mixture from Step 2 with plastic wrap and heat it in the microwave at 600 W for 50 seconds.', 'Remove it from the microwave and mix.', 'Wrap again and heat for another 30 seconds at 600 W.', 'Stir the mixture once more.', 'Transfer the eggs to a plate and enjoy.']

title: Mexican Salsa Recipe
ingredients: ['1 med. onion, minced', '1 lg. pepper, minced', '2 good size cloves garlic, chopped']
directions: ['Saute/fry in extra virgin olive oil:']

title: So Easy Amazing Tangy Salty Peanut Butter Apple
ingredients: ['1 apple, sliced and cored, make sure the apple is one of the tangy variety, I used Pink Lady but you can also', '2 tablespoons peanut butter, natural style', '1 dash salt, this is important']
directions: ['Core and slice your apple.', 'Partition and spread the peanut butter over the apple slices.', 'Sprinkle with a bit of salt over all the slices.', 'Enjoy!', 'I like mine with non-fat milk.']

title: Herbal Lemon Butter Salmon (or Tilapia)
ingredients: ['2 salmon steaks', '1 dash salt and pepper each salmon steak', '2 tbsp herbal butter per salmon steak', '4 slice lemon', '1 dash garlic powder per salmon steak']
directions: ['make herbal butter from my profile (butter, lemon, garlic powder, parsley, thyme, etc)', 'lay 2 layers of aluminium foil about 18" long each', 'sprinkle both sides of fish with salt.', 'lay fish in middle of 2 layers of foil.. put 2 pats of butter on each price of fish (2Tbsp).', 'lay 2 slices of lemon on top of fish.', 'fold foil down and then fold in like a big pouch.. lay on either grill to cook or place on cookie sheet and place in oven..', 'cook for about 15-20 min at 350.... fish should be white and flaky...']

title: Glazed Carrots And Onions Recipe
ingredients: ['1 pound carrots, pared & sliced into 1 1/2 inch slices', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 grnd onion, peeled']
directions: ['Pare and slice carrots into 1 1/2 inch slices.', 'Boil water with 1 tsp.', 'salt and add in carrots and 1 grnd onion, peeled.', 'Reduce heat, simmer 20 to 25 min.', 'Drain well.']

title: SNICKERDOODLES
ingredients: ['1c Butter']
directions: ['Preheat oven 400', 'Mix butter, sugar, and eggs', 'Blend flour, cream of tartar, soda, and salt; Stir in mixture', 'Shape dough into 1" balls', 'Roll each ball in sugar/cinnamon mixture', 'Place 2" apart on ungreased sheet; Bake 10 minutes each rotation']

title: Grilled Chocolate Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices of firm bread', '2 -3 ounces semisweet chocolate', '1 -2 tablespoon butter']
directions: ['Melt the butter in a heavy skillet over low heat and swirl each half of the bread, one side only, in the butter.', 'Place the piece of bread, buttery side down in skillet.', 'Layer with chocolate pieces.', 'Top with the other piece of bread, buttery side up and raise heat.', 'Cook exactly as you would an ordinary grilled cheese sandwich, pressing down on the bread occasionally and flipping after the first side browns.', 'Remove when the second side is golden brown and the chocolate has melted.', 'Cool slightly and eat.']

title: Peanut Butter and Banana Smoothie
ingredients: ['1 banana', '1/8 cup peanut butter', '1/2 cup soy milk', '2 tablespoons honey']
directions: ['In a blender, combine banana, peanut butter and soy milk.', 'Blend until smooth.', 'Pour into glasses and drizzle with honey for garnish.']

title: Soft Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. granulated sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients thoroughly.', 'Place by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet in 350 degree oven for 10 min.', 'Yields: 2 dozen.']

title: Backon wrapped chicken hips
ingredients: ['5 piece Chicken hips', '5 slice Bacon', '1 Honey']
directions: ['Clean the chicken hips', 'brush the chicken hips with honey', 'wrap the chicken hips with bacon', 'Put them in the oven for 60 min', 'Each 15 min, remove the pan from the oven and pour the sauce on the chicken hips']

title: Onion, Tuna & Spinach Sandwiches
ingredients: ['1 can Canned tuna', '50 grams Boiled spinach', '3 tbsp Marinated onion', '3 tbsp Mayonnaise']
directions: ['This recipe uses the marinated onion from this recipe "Easy Marinated Onions with Sushi Vinegar".', 'Boil the spinach and squeeze out the moisture.', 'Cut into 2 cm long pieces.', 'Drain the oil from the tuna.', "Combine all of the ingredients and it's done.", '"Extremely Easy Italian Bread".', 'You will be shocked at how easy you can make delicious bread.', 'Here are the amount of ingredients I used when I made it: Instead of 250 g of regular flour, I used 150 g of strong flour + 100 g of cake flour.', 'Instead of regular sugar, I used brown sugar.', 'Instead of regular salt, I used Krazy Salt.', 'Top bread: plain; bottom bread: cheese.', 'I divided the risen bread dough into two portions and added 2 slices (30 g) of processed cheese in one of them.']

title: Breakfast for Ants
ingredients: ['oatmeal', 'salt']
directions: ['Spread the oatmeal around the areas in your garage or yard where you see ants.', 'Check back the next day to see if it works!']

title: Frozen Daikon Radish to Keep in a Ziploc Freezer Bag
ingredients: ['1 Daikon radish']
directions: ['Rinse the daikon radish, and peel about 3 mm of its skin.', 'Cut into 4 cm-thick rounds.', 'If you already know how you will be using the daikon then cut it accordingly.', 'Put the daikon into a Ziploc Freezer Bag.', 'Press out as much air as possible, and tightly seal the opening.', 'Freeze for minimum 6 hours to finish.', 'Take them out and let them sit for a while before cutting.', 'Even if the pieces are thick, you can cut them without any difficulty.', 'Cook as-is.', 'There is no need to defrost or parboil these daikon.']

title: Skillet-Toasted Mini Croutons
ingredients: ['2 garlic cloves', '1 cup olive oil', '3 cups 1/4-inch cubes day-old bread']
directions: ['Halve garlic cloves.', 'In a 12-inch skillet heat oil with garlic over moderate heat until hot but not smoking and cook bread, stirring, until golden, about 5 minutes.', 'With a slotted spoon transfer croutons to paper towels to drain and discard garlic.', 'Season croutons with salt.', 'Croutons keep in an airtight container at room temperature 1 week.']

title: Egg-in-a-Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice of your favorite kind of bread', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 egg', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper']
directions: ['With a biscuit cutter or the rim of a glass, press a hole in the center of the slice of bread.', 'Heat a skillet over medium-low heat and melt in the butter.', 'When the butter is all spread out, place the piece of bread in the skillet and crack the egg straight into the center of the hole.', 'Cook until the egg sets a bit on the bottom, 30 to 45 seconds.', 'Sprinkle the egg with salt and pepper.', 'After about a minute, flip it over with a spatula and salt and pepper the other side.', 'Move the whole piece of toast around the skillet, soaking up all of the glorious butter.', 'Let it cook until the yolk feels soft.', "Here's the key: golden brown toast, white (not brown/burned) whites, soft unbroken yolk.", 'Perfect.']

title: Osechi Decorative Carrot Plum Flowers
ingredients: ['1 Carrot']
directions: ['Peel the carrot and cut it into 1 cm thick round slices.', 'Use a plum flower-shaped cutter to cut out a flower shape.', 'Cut some shallow incisions from the center of the flower to the edges of the gaps in the petals, as in the photo (to delineate each petal).', 'On one side of each incision, make a diagonal cut and remove a narrow triangle of carrot to get more definition between each petal.', 'Moist & Tender Roast Pork,.', 'Matsumae Pickles with Herring Roe,.', 'Chikuzen-Ni For Osechi,.', 'Matsukazeyaki Japanese-Style Meat Loaf,.', 'Simple Chestnut Kinton,.']

title: Steamed Asparagus
ingredients: ['1 bunch asparagus', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper']
directions: ['Set up a steamer, fill the bottom with water and bring to a boil.', 'If the asparagus are very thick, peel them.', 'Start about 2-inch down from the tip of the stalk and peel.', 'It is not necessary to peel thin asparagus.', 'Cut the asparagus to fit into your steamer basket.', 'Cover and steam until the asparagus are bright green and tender, but still somewhat crisp, about 6 to 8 minutes for thick asparagus and 3 to 5 minutes for thin asparagus.', 'Remove from the steamer and season with salt and pepper.']

title: Ceviche Salad
ingredients: ['1 cup cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined', '1 cucumber, peeled and diced', '1 tomatoes, diced', '12 avocado, diced', '14 cup prepared mango salsa', '12 lime, juice of, a', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Combine ingredients, tossing lightly.', 'Chill.', 'Serve with tortilla chips.']

title: Grilled Zucchini I
ingredients: ['1 large zucchini', '4 tablespoons butter', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat grill to medium high heat.', 'Clean outer skin of zucchini, and slice lengthwise into quarters.', 'Place a pat of butter or margarine on each zucchini quarter, and season with salt and pepper to taste.', 'Wrap all four quarters in one piece of aluminum foil.', 'Place foil wrapped zucchini on heated grill, and cook for 10 to 15 minutes on each side.']

title: Sesame Dressed Broccoli
ingredients: ['8 small florets Boiled broccoli', '1 tsp of each Sugar, Soy Sauce, Ground Sesame Seeds, Mentsuyu']
directions: ['Put all of the ingredients into a bowl and stir.', 'White sesame seeds make a nicer visual.', 'Add the broccoli and toss.', 'Done.', "Here's another boiled broccoli recipe topped with mayonnaise and salmon flakes."]

title: Banana Roll Ups
ingredients: ['1 -2 tablespoon butter', '1 -2 tablespoon honey', '2 slices bread', '1 banana']
directions: ['cut crusts of the bread.', 'roll lightly with a rolling pin.', 'spread with butter and set honey.', 'put a peeled banana at one end and roll the bread around it.', 'cut in half.']

title: Slow Cooker Yogurt
ingredients: ['8 cups Homogenized Milk', '1/2 cups Pain 6% Yogurt']
directions: ['Pour milk into your crockpot and turn it on low.', 'Put the lid on and cook it on low for 2 hours and 45 minutes.', 'A timer may come in handy as a reminder to turn it off.', 'After 2 hours and 45 minutes, turn off the crockpot and let the milk sit in the crockpot for 3 more hours.', 'Spoon a small amount of the milk into a small bowl and add the half cup of yogurt to it.', 'Mix together thoroughly.', 'Dump this mixture back into the milk in the crockpot and mix it around well.', 'Put the lid back on your crockpot and wrap the crockpot with a large beach towel or blanket (make sure the crockpot is unplugged and turned off!', ').', 'Let the beach-towel-wrapped crockpot sit for 8-12 hours (or overnight).', 'After 8-12 hours, it should be thickened.']

title: Carolyn's Chicken a la Crock Pot
ingredients: ['1 each chicken', '1 each lemon', '1/4 cup honey', '1/2 cup orange juice']
directions: ['Rinse chicken inside and out well.', 'Roll the lemon on a flat top to soften, and pierce well with a 2 tined fork.', 'Place the lemon in the cavity of the chicken and place the chicken in the crockpot.', 'Mix the honey and the orange juice together and pour over the chicken.', 'Cook on low until done.', 'When you take the chicken out of the pot, remove the lemon very carefully, it will be hot, and squeeze the juice over the chicken.']

title: Watermelon Juice
ingredients: ['4 pounds watermelon, rind removed']
directions: ['Cut watermelon into chunks and press through a sieve into a bowl.']

title: Bailey's Hot Fudge Sauce Recipe
ingredients: ['1/2 c. butter', '2 sqr unsweetened chocolate', "2 c. confectioners' sugar, sifted", '3/4 c. evaporated lowfat milk']
directions: ['In a saucepan over low heat, heat the butter and chocolate.', 'Remove from the heat; add in about 1/3 of the sugar and 1/3 of the evaporated lowfat milk.', 'Stir in and add in half the remaining sugar and evaporated lowfat milk; stir again and add in the rest of the', 'sugar and evaporated lowfat milk.', 'Stir till smooth.', 'Return to the stove and simmer for 8-10 min.', 'Makes 2 c..']

title: Homemade Thousand Island Spread
ingredients: ['1 egg* 1 lemon, juiced 1/4 cup chopped onions 1/4 cup chopped green bell peppers 1/4 cup chopped sweet pickles 1/4 cup chopped green olives 1 tablespoon chopped pimientos 1 hard-boiled egg, finely chopped 3 tablespoons ketchup 1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh chives 1 tablespoon chili sauce Salt Freshly ground black pepper 1 cup vegetable oil373']
directions: ['Combine the first 10 ingredients in a food processor with a metal blade and process until smooth.', 'Season with salt and pepper.', 'While the machine is running, slowly add the oil, a little at a time, until thick.', 'Re-season if necessary.']

title: Banana Mango Breakfast Smoothie
ingredients: ['1 large banana', '1 12-2 cups frozen mango chunks', '1 12 cups reduced-fat milk']
directions: ['Put all ingredients into blender and mix till smooth.']

title: Roasted Garlic, Toasted Garlic, And Poached Garlic
ingredients: ['Whole garlic heads']
directions: ['Roasted Garlic', 'Preheat the oven to 375F.', 'Cut off the top 1/4 inch of the garlic head to reveal the cloves.', 'Drizzle a little olive oil over and season lightly with salt and pepper.', 'Wrap loosely in aluminum foil and roast in the oven for 30 to 40 minutes or until the garlic is very soft when squeezed.', 'You can also open up the foil for the last 10 minutes to allow the garlic to caramelize a bit, which adds another interesting flavor note.', 'Cool and store roasted garlic in the refrigerator in a sealed container for up to 3 weeks or freeze it if you have a bumper crop from your garden.', 'Toasted Garlic', 'Separate the doves and put them unpeeled in a dry saute pan over medium heat.', 'Shake and turn them occasionally until the cloves develop toasty brown spots on the skin.', 'Remove and cool and the skin will easily slip off.', 'The additional benefit of this method is that youve added a lovely toasty flavor to the garlic.', 'Poached Garlic', 'Separate the cloves but dont peel.', 'Put in a small saucepan and cover with at least 1/2 inch cold water.', 'Place over high heat and bring to a boil.', 'As soon as the water boils, drain and repeat the process one more time.', 'Rinse to cool off the garlic.', 'Peel the poached garlic and store, covered, in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.']

title: Queen Anne's Hair Secret
ingredients: ['1 cup honey', '1 cup olive oil']
directions: ['combine olive oil, and honey in a container with a lid.', 'shake well.', 'Let it sit for two days shaking the mixture periodically.', 'When you are ready to shampoo, put the mixture on dry hair, and cover with a plastic bag.', 'Put your feet up, and relax.', 'I let it sit for two hours.', 'When you are ready, shampoo and rinse.', 'This recipe was used by Queen Anne, and was very closely guarded.', 'Makes hair feel amazing.Use more mixture if you have a lot of hair.']

title: Steamed Rice
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon salt', '2 cups uncovered long-grain rice']
directions: ['In a large saucepan bring 5 quarts water to a boil with the salt.', 'Sprinkle in the rice, stirring until the water returns to a boil, and boil it for 10 minutes.', 'Drain the rice in a large colander and rinse it.', 'Set the colander over a large saucepan of boiling water and steam the rice, covered with a kitchen towel and the lid, for 15 minutes, or until it is fluffy and dry.']

title: Watermelon Dash
ingredients: ['12 watermelon, cubed', '1 teaspoon black pepper', 'salt']
directions: ['Blend the chilled watermelon cubes.', 'Pour in a tall glass.', 'Sprinkle black pepper and salt.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Holiday Fudge Sauce Recipe
ingredients: ["1 pound box confectioners' sugar", '1 stick butter', '1 can evaporated lowfat milk', "6 sq. Baker's chocolate", '1 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['In double boiler, heat butter and chocolate till smooth.', 'Gradually add in sugar and lowfat milk.', 'Keep stirring till smooth and creamy.', 'Add in 1 tsp.', 'vanilla.', 'Pour into jars when cold and keep refrigerated.', 'Portions may be heated in microwave for warm fudge sundaes or possibly brownie a-la-mode.', 'Add in minced walnuts and heavy cream for topping.']

title: Apple Sauce Baby Food
ingredients: ['2 each organic apple']
directions: ['Peel and core the apples.', 'Cut each in four pieces', 'Put apple pieces in blender and blend on high.', 'The result should resemble stlre bought applesauce in texture.', 'You can also grate the apples for this recipe.', 'You can also stop blending when apples are still little grainy (like mine) for toddlers.', 'Optional: drizzle with lemon juice to keep it from changing color.', 'Keep refrigerated fir a few hours.', 'Best when eaten fresh.']

title: Rich Hot Chocolate
ingredients: ['2 1/2 cup whole milk', '4 oz 99% unsweetened chocolate, coarsely chopped', '1/3 cup granulated sugar', '1 1/2 tsp pure vanilla extract']
directions: ['Heat milk in a saucepan over medium heat until steam rises from the surface.', 'Whisk in chocolate and sugar, and continue whisking for 1 to 2 minutes, until sugar has dissolved.', 'Whisk in vanilla.', 'Reduce heat to low; keep warm until ready to serve.', 'Serve in small cups.', 'For an airier consistency, remove from heat, and mix with a hand blender set on low just before serving']

title: French Onion Baked Chicken
ingredients: ['1/2 cup onion dip', '1/4 cup milk', '4 pounds chicken, whole cut into 8 pieces', '1 cup crackers crushed', '1 tablespoon butter melted']
directions: ['Heat oven to 350F (180C).', 'In small bowl stir together onion dip and milk.', 'Place chicken in 13x9 inch baking dish.', 'Spoon dip mixture over chicken pieces.', 'Sprinkle crushed crackers over chicken; drizzle with butter.', 'Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until chicken is fork tender.']

title: Banana Peanut Butter Treat(2 Ww Points)
ingredients: ['1 banana, 6 oz', '1 tablespoon peanut butter, smooth']
directions: ['Slice banana in half and then each half slice lengthwise', 'Spread 1/2 the peanut butter on each of two slices of the banana', 'Make a sandwich by putting a plain slice on top of one spread with peanut butter.', 'This should give you two sandwiches', 'Cover with plastic wrap and freeze.', 'Serve frozen.']

title: Bugs On A Log Recipe
ingredients: ['Celery stalks Peanut butter Chocolate chips']
directions: ['Take a stalk of celery and fill center with peanut butter.', 'Place pcs of chocolate chips on top of "log."', 'Variations: cream cheese or possibly Cheez Whiz, raisins']

title: Lemony Radish Salad
ingredients: ['12 lb radish', '1 lemon', '14 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['Clean and coarsely chop radishes and put in bowl.', 'Squeeze lemon juice on the radishes and stir, so each radish chunk gets coated in juice.', 'Sprinkle on salt to taste and stir.', 'Serve.']

title: Bloody Mary On The Hoof Recipe
ingredients: ['cherry tomatoes kosher salt vodka']
directions: ['A simple and kind of elegant "recipe" from the Frugal Gourmet which I read years ago - you take cherry tomatoes, kosher salt, and vodka put in the freezer till it issyrupy - you dip the tomato in vodka and then in salt and eat it - bloody mary on the hoof We are lucky sufficient to be able to get cherry tomatoes year-round here in San Antonio.']

title: Soy Milk Eggnog
ingredients: ['1 Egg', '125 ml Soy Milk', '1 Tbsp sugar', 'to taste Vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a milk pan, beat the egg.', 'Add the milk and sugar, then blend with a hand blender or with a whisk.', 'Cook over low heat.', 'Add the spices and vanilla, stirring constantly until thick.', '(Do not burn it!)', 'Remove the clove.', 'Add the liquor and blend well with a hand blender.', 'All set to enjoy your healthy Christmas drink!', '*note* I added 1 Tbsp Cointreau.', 'and it was yum!']

title: Plain Jasmine Rice
ingredients: ['2 cups jasmine rice']
directions: ['Put the rice in a heavy pan along with 3 cups water.', 'Bring to a rolling boil.', 'Cover tightly, turn heat to very, very low, and cook gently for 25 minutes.']

title: Mango lassi (quicklydelicious.com
ingredients: ['1 cup ripe mango pulp', '1 cup low fat yogurt']
directions: ['Blenderize yogurt and mango pulp and serve chilled.']

title: Cauliflower Poppers (Low Carb)
ingredients: ['2 heads cauliflower', '14 cup olive oil', '1 12 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400 degrees.', 'Wash and clean the cauliflower.', 'Cut off and discard the stem.', 'Cut the cauliflower up into small pieces.', 'In a large bowl, combine the olive oil, salt and pepper.', 'Add the cauliflower pieces and thoroughly coat each piece.', 'Place cauliflower pieces onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.', 'Bake for one hour and turn 3 times during cooking until each piece has a nice brown coloring.', 'The browner they are the better!']

title: Dried Tomatoes
ingredients: ['20 whole Tomatoes']
directions: ['Slice each tomato about 1/8 of an inch thick.', 'I used my dehydrator, but you can use your oven also.', 'If using your dehydrator, place tomatoes on each rack so they are not touching.', 'Turn on and let dry for at least 4 hours; keep checking the dryness.', 'If using your oven, preheat to the lowest temperature (170F), put a sheet of foil over each rack and poke holes in the foil.', 'Spray foil with Pam.', 'Arrange tomatoes so they are not touching.', 'Dry for about 2 hours; keep checking the dryness throughout the process.', 'When tomatoes are dry, let cool completely.', 'Using your vaccum sealer, seal in bags in your desired amounts and enjoy throughout the year.']

title: Zucchini Linguine
ingredients: ['2 8 inch long zucchini, ends trimmed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '12 lemon, juice of', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Julienne just the outsides of each zucchini lengthwise using a mandoline or by hand.', 'Discard seed core.', 'Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.', 'Add zucchini and saute 3 minutes, or until soft.', 'Season with lemon juice, salt and pepper.']

title: Best Western Steak With Onions Recipe
ingredients: ['1 1/2 pound beef liver, 1/4 to 1/2 inch thick']
directions: ['Cut in strips, 2 to 3 inches long.', 'Toss in lemon juice to coat.', 'Blend 1/3 c. flour (more, if needed) with 1 tsp.', 'salt and 1/2 tsp.', 'pepper, and 1/2 tsp.', 'garlic.', 'Use this to toss liver strips in, till they are all lightly coated.', 'Brown liver in about 3 Tbsp.', 'oil in heavy skillet on surface unit at medium to medium-high heat.', 'While liver is browning, prepare onions.', '1/2 c. water 2 beef bouillon cubes 1 tbsp.', 'butter', 'Place together in 2-qt casserole.', 'Cover.', 'Place in microwave and cook 6-8 min till onions are crisply tender.', 'Combine liver and onions in the casserole, or possibly does well in a Dutch oven.', 'Add in 1 Tbsp.', 'flour and 1/2 c. water.', 'Bake at 325 degrees till tender, 20-25 min.']

title: Honey Joys.
ingredients: ['8 cup Cornflakes', '3 tbsp Honey', '1/2 cup Butter', '1/3 cup Sugar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 180?C.', 'In a small saucepan melt the butter, sugar and honey until it starts to froth.', 'In a large mixing bowl, tip in the 8 cups of cornflakes.', 'Pour the melted mixture into the cornflakes and quickly mix evenly through the cornflakes before it begins to set.', 'Place 20 cupcake cases, evenly spaced onto a flat oven tray.', 'Using a spoon, fill the cases to the top.', 'Place completed oven tray into the oven for 10-15 minutes or until lightly browned.', 'Remove tray from the oven and place onto a wire cooling rack.', 'Place the filled rack into the refrigerator for approximately 10 minutes allowing them to set.', 'Time to enjoy and make sure to save some for the kids!']

title: Homemade Conditioner to Make Hair Soft and Strong
ingredients: ['1 banana, mashed', '12 cup plain honey']
directions: ['Mix both the first 2 ingredients together.', 'Wash and shampoo your hair regularly.', 'Apply this prepared paste on your wet hair.', "Leave it on for 30- 40 minutes after you've shampooed your hair.", 'Do this twice a week.', 'Soon, you will have soft, strong and healthy hair!']

title: Meringue Cookies
ingredients: ['1 Egg white', '15 grams Sugar']
directions: ['Whip egg whites and sugar until stiff peaks form.', 'If you chill the bowl with iced water etc.', 'while mixing, it will stiffen quickly.', 'Place small spoonfuls of the mix onto a baking sheet, then bake in a oven for 30 minutes.', 'Check from time to time, turning the oven or grill on and off to adjust the temperature.']

title: Basic Baked Fish Recipe
ingredients: ['3-4 pound fish, dressed for baking', '1/4 c. melted butter', 'Salt', 'Pepper']
directions: ['Place fish in a well greased baking dish and brush with melted butter.', 'Sprinkle inside and outside of fish with salt and pepper.', 'Bake at 350 degrees for 40-60 min, depending on thickness of fish.', 'Fish will be done when the thickest part flakes easily when tested with a fork.', 'Baste once or possibly twice with drippings of melted butter.', 'Garnish and serve with lemon wedges.', 'Makes 4-6 servings.']

title: Homemade Fresh Bread Crumbs
ingredients: ['1 loaf Bread, Preferably A Round, Unsliced Loaf, About 1 To 2 Lbs.']
directions: ['Use a serrated knife to remove bread crust.', 'For a round loaf, remove the crust by cutting the loaf in half top to bottom.', 'Stand each half on its cut side.', 'Cut off the bottom, flat crust first, then work in smaller sections with the knife, peeling the remaining crust off the bread.', 'To remove crust from sliced bread, stack the slices and cut top to bottom to remove crusts from all the slices in one motion.', 'Cut or tear bread into approximately equal chunks, about 1 to 2 inches each.', 'To ensure equal sized chunks that can be made quickly, use the serrated knife to thickly slice the bread, then stack slices and make crosswise cuts to get squares.', 'Fill food processor about half full of bread chunks (work in batches if all the chunks wont fit).', 'Pulse the bread chunks in 5 to 10 second bursts until you reach the desired crumb size.', 'You shouldnt have to open the food processor to scrape down the sides or stir.', 'When a recipe doesnt specify crumb size, aim for just smaller than a peppercorn, with a few larger or smaller pieces.', 'Err on the larger size to avoid ending up with bread powder.', 'If not using right away, store crumbs in resealable freezer bags, labeled with the quantity of crumbs inside.', 'Squeeze out most of the excess air as you seal, without crushing the crumbs at all.', 'Even if you store all the crumbs in a large bag, theyre easy to break up when frozen so you can thaw only the quantity you need.', 'Thaw in a sealed container at room temperature or in the refrigerator, so the crumbs dont dry out.', 'Notes: 1.', 'See link to the blog post for step-by-step photos.', '2.', 'One pound of bread yields about 6 cups of crumbs.']

title: Cauliflower "cous cous"
ingredients: ['1 each Salt and pepper to taste', '1 tbsp Olive oil', '2 clove to 3 garlic cloves', '1 each onion', '1 head cauliflower']
directions: ['Break down cauliflower and remove large stems from florets.', 'Place florets in food processor and process in quick bursts until cauliflower resembles small bits of gravel or beads.', "There may be some pieces that don't process down small enough; these pieces should be removed.", 'Dice onion and mince garlic.', 'Saute in olive oil - add onions to pan first, cook until softened, add garlic and saute a minute more.', 'Remove from heat and transfer to small bowl, reserving oil in pan.', 'Add cauliflower to oil in pan (additional oil may be needed) and cook until slightly browned - appx.', '15 mins', 'Add onions and garlic back in pan and quickly toss with cauliflour, add salt and pepper to taste and transfer to serving bowl.', 'This is just the basic recipe - use your imagination and add whatever you like to switch it up!', 'I like to finish it with a splash of apple cider vinegar and a squeeze of lemon.', 'Toasted nuts like sunflower seeds or pine nuts are also good, as is just a simple sprinkling of fresh chopped Italian parsley or basil.', "The sky's the limit :)"]

title: Unbelievable Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. creamy peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients well.', 'Form 1 inch balls and place on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Stamp with cookie stamp or possibly bottom of decorative glass.', 'Bake at 325 degrees 10 to 12 min.', "(Yes, there really isn't any flour in this recipe.)"]

title: Simple Sweet Potato & Carrot Mash
ingredients: ['1 lb sweet potato', '1 lb carrot', '1 lemon']
directions: ['Peel the carrots and cut the lemon in half or quarters (for squeezing).', 'Boil the sweet potatoes and carrots (together or separately) until soft throughout.', 'Remove potato skins (they should slide off easily, be careful because the potatoes are very hot!', ').', 'Place the sweet potatoes and carrots in a large bowl for mashing.', 'Mash and mix the vegetables together, adding lemon juice as you mix.', 'Add as much or as little lemon juice as you prefer.']

title: Puff cheese madness
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 tbsp milk']
directions: ['Defrost the puff pastry in the microwave if it is frozen.', 'Chip all kinds of cheese together', 'Put a small portion of mixed cheese in the middle of pastry and shape it as you want', 'In a small bowel mix the egg and the milk', 'Brush with the previous mix', 'Preheat the oven 200 C and put it for 15 min.']

title: Easy AvocadoAn Easy Vegetable to Add At the Last Minute.
ingredients: ['1 ripe avocado', '1/4 lemon', '2 teaspoons no sugar added French dressing', 'Salt to taste']
directions: ['Cut the avocado in half lengthwise and remove the pit.', 'Lay the halves cut side up on salad plates, squeeze lemon juice on top, and drizzle with French dressing.', 'Sprinkle with salt.']

title: Barbecued Squid Recipe
ingredients: ['3 lb Squid, cut into rings Lemon-garlic butter [posted in another post. S.C.]']
directions: ['Serve this with a Thai sweet/warm chili sauce.', 'Had it like which in Bangkok and it was one of the best meals I had there.', 'This recipe sounds too easy to be true.', "It isn'teaspoon As with any grilled seafood, the fresher the ingredients and the simpler the cooking, the better the end result.", 'Barbecued squid and an anise flavored aperitif like Pernod, ricard, ouzo or possibly raki, make a wonderful combination.', 'Make a fire, preferably with firewood or possibly Mexican charcoal, started from paper and kindling.', 'Skewer the squid.', 'When coals are red warm, barbecue the rings for 2 to 3 min per side, or possibly till they are brown.', 'Some recipes for grilled squid suggest marinating them.', 'I omit this procedure because it adds flavor at the expense of softening the flesh.', 'Serve warm with lemon-garlic butter.', 'NOTE: Commercial charcoal and lighter fluid are petroleum products.', 'They impart an oily flavor to food.', 'Hardwood, or possibly Mexican charcoal, a commercial product, that is made by burning down mesquite, both give a nice flavor and are certainly less toxic than petrochemicals.', 'Mexican charcoal is available in Northern California through Lazzari Fuel Company, San Francisco.']

title: All Shook Up Vanilla Ice Cream Recipe
ingredients: ['1/2 c. 2% lowfat milk', '1 Tbsp. Sugar', '1/4 tsp Vanilla Pint-size plastic bag Gallon-size plastic bag', '6 Tbsp. Salt Ice']
directions: ['In a pint-size bag, mix lowfat milk, sugar and vanilla.', 'Then seal.', 'Fill gallon-size bag half full of ice and salt.', 'Put sealed small bag in with the ice.', 'Seal large bag.', 'Shake the bag about 5 min till it becomes ice cream.', 'Wipe the small bag off.', 'Open and dig in!']

title: Pot Luck Vegetable Casserole Recipe
ingredients: ['1 bunch broccoli', '1 head cauliflower', '1 pound carrots, cut in long pcs']
directions: ['Steam vegetables separately in small amount of salted water.', 'Arrange alternately in shallow casserole or possibly rectangle Pyrex cake pan.', 'make a medium white sauce; add in 3 Tbsp.', 'Cheese Whiz or possibly 4 slices of American cheese.', 'Pour over vegetables and return to oven or possibly microwave to heat it to bubbly point.', 'Serves 8 to 10.']

title: Sweet Hot Chocolate
ingredients: ['1 can evaporated milk', '1 Goya chocolate bar, I used half']
directions: ['Take your cheese shredder and shred up the chocolate for it can be easily be melted.', 'Pour in the ingredients and put burner to medium-low heat.', 'And stir.', 'Pour in the chocolate slowly and taste.', 'Add Marshmallows if needed.']

title: Vanilla Ice Cream With No Cream
ingredients: ['1 Egg', '2 tbsp Sugar', '1 Milk']
directions: ['Separate the egg white and yolk.', 'Whisk the egg white until stiff peaks form.', 'Next, mix in the egg yolk and sugar, and put it in the freezer.', 'Leave it for an hour, and then stir in the milk.', 'Put it back in the freezer.', 'It should harden within around 3 hours.', "It's done!"]

title: Bourbon Bbq Buffalo Parmesan Wings
ingredients: ['1 Chicken wings']
directions: ['Toss wings in sauce', 'Sprinkle on parmesan cheese', 'Enjoy']

title: The Bread (Ree Drummond/ Pioneer Woman)
ingredients: ['1 loaf French bread, sliced lengthwise', '1 cup salted butter, Softened']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees.', 'Spread one stick of softened butter on each half of the loaf (Thats one stick per half loaf.', 'Yes, you read that right.', 'The idea here is that every speck of the surface of the bread needs to be coated.', ').', 'Place on a cookie sheet and bake for 10 minutes, or until butter is melted and starting to soak into the bread.', 'Crank on broiler and broil bread for 3 to 5 minutes, watching the whole time.', 'Remove when butter has started to brown and blacken.', 'Dont under-broil it!', 'The flavor really kicks in when the butters color changes (The goal here is to broil the bread to the point that the butter becomes very dark brown and, in just a few areas, begins to burn.', 'When that happens, the flavor shows up.', 'If you dont take it to the next level, it will just be buttered, warm bread.', 'Which is fine, and all...but its not The Bread).', 'Slice into strips and serve immediately (When I serve this, I slice it on a cutting board into relatively thin (because its so rich) strips).']

title: Coconut Lemon Buttercream Filling
ingredients: ['1 cup butter', "1 cup confectioner's sugar", '1 cup Shredded coconut', '1 tbsp lemon extract']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in mixer.', 'Blend until nice and smooth (except for the coconut)']

title: Bananas With Peanut Butter
ingredients: ['1 banana', '1 tablespoon peanut butter']
directions: ['Peel Banana.', 'Add Peanut Butter.', 'Take Bite.', 'Repeat until finished.']

title: Broccoli Piemontese
ingredients: ['2 to 3 pounds broccoli', '2 finely chopped cloves garlic', 'Olive oil', 'Salt, freshly ground black pepper', 'White wine']
directions: ['Cook broccoli in boiling, salted water until barely tender.', 'Drain.', 'Saute garlic in enough oil to cover the bottom of a large skillet.', 'When lightly browned, add broccoli and spoon hot oil and garlic over it.', 'Season to taste.', 'Add wine and cook down quickly.', 'Serve the broccoli with pan juices poured over it.']

title: Greek Iced Coffee By Pallas
ingredients: ['1/2 cup coffee', '1/2 cup milk', '2 tsp honey']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup of ice.', 'Pour into a glass or mug.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Cheese Sauce for Pasta
ingredients: ['3 slice Butter', '1 packages Cheese', '1 dash Garlic Powder', '2/3 cup Milk', '1 box Penne Pasta', '1 dash Pepper']
directions: ['In a saucepan, put in your three slices of butter', 'Next add in 1/3 of milk', 'Add in half of your package of cheese', 'Put the temperature at medium', 'To prevent sticking add in another slice of butter and the other 1/3 of milk', 'Put your heat on low', 'Stir and add in your garlic powder and pepper ,I add a bunch but you can add as much as you would like', 'The sauce will be a little thick but it fast good :)']

title: Garlic Puree
ingredients: ['2 dozen heads of garlic', 'Salt', '2 to 3 tablespoons olive oil']
directions: ['Separate the heads into cloves, leave the cloves in their papery husks, and simmer in a pan of water seasoned with 1 teaspoon salt for 30 to 40 minutes, or until very, very soft.', 'Drain, then put through a food mill to extract the soft pulp from the skins.', 'Season the puree with a touch of salt and mix in the oil.', 'Put in a jar and refrigerate until needed.', 'It will last several weeks, or longer if you cover the top with a thin film of olive oil.']

title: Easy BAKER'S Chocolate Curls
ingredients: ["1 oz. BAKER'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate"]
directions: ['Microwave chocolate on microaveable plate on HIGH 5 sec.', 'or just until you can smudge chocolate with your thumb.', 'Hold chocolate, bottom-side up, firmly between thumb and fingers of one hand.', 'Slowly pull vegetable peeler over bottom of chocolate with other hand, allowing a thin layer of chocolate to curl as it is peeled off the chocolate piece.', 'For shorter curls, pull vegetable peeler over one of the narrow sides of chocolate.', 'Refrigerate until ready to use.', 'Use wooden toothpick to pick up curls and arrange them on top of dessert as desired.']

title: Honey Roasted Peanut Butter
ingredients: ['2 cups Honey Roasted Peanuts', '1/2 teaspoons Fine Sea Salt', '1 Tablespoon Peanut Oil, Optional']
directions: ['Transfer the peanuts to a heavy-duty food processor and process the nuts on high for about 5 minutes, stopping to scrape down the sides of the bowl every minute or so, and checking to see that the nuts havent stuck under your food processor blade.', 'Once the peanut butter looks smooth, add the salt and then process for another minute or so to make sure the butter looks glossy and smooth.', 'If you dont have a heavy-duty food processor, add the peanut oil to help the butter along (see notes).', 'Transfer the peanut butter to a small mason jar or airtight storage container.', 'Peanut butter can be used immediately and will keep for several weeks in the fridge.', 'Note: You shouldnt need to add any oil to this recipe unless you do not have a heavy-duty food processor.', 'What makes this peanut butter nice and smooth is time.', 'Keep processing, scrape down the bowl, and process again.', 'It will come together in under 10 minutes, I promise!']

title: Easy Shrimp Scampi
ingredients: ['1 lb shrimp, peeled with just tail left on and deveined', '1 cup white wine', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '12 cup butter']
directions: ['Heat oven to 350.', 'Melt butter in pan in oven.', 'When melted add wine, garlic and shrimp.', 'Cook in oven for 6-7 minutes or until shrimp is pink.', 'Remove and serve.']

title: Almond Joy Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['2 x Unsweetened Chocolate', '1 can Sweetened, condensed lowfat milk', '3 c. Sweetened, flaked coconut', '1 tsp Vanilla extract A healthy pinch of salt Almonds for garnish']
directions: ['Heat in a double boiler, 1 can sweetened condensed lowfat milk and 2 squares ofunsweetened chocolate, till chocolate is melted.', 'Stir till mix is smooth.', 'Pour over a bowl containing 3 c. of sweetened, flaked coconut.', 'Add in 1tsp of vanilla extract and a healthy pinch of salt.', 'Mix well till coconut iscompleted coated.', 'Drop on a cookie sheet that is lined with parchment paper, by tspfuls.', 'Press a whole almond into the top.', 'Bake at 350 degrees F. for 10 to 12 min.', 'Check at 8 min, as bottoms of cookies brown quickly.', 'Remove from oven, cold, remove from pan.']

title: Easy!! Bacon and Sunny-Side Up Toast
ingredients: ['1 slice Sliced bread', '1 Egg', '2 slice Bacon', '1 slice Melting-type sliced cheese', '1 tbsp Ketchup']
directions: ['Press a slice of bread into the center of a round bowl.', 'Coat the surface with ketchup.', 'Crack an egg and slowly pour it into the center of the bread.', 'Arrange the cheese and bacon around the edge of the bread and toast in the toaster for 3 minutes.']

title: Honey-Marinated Cherry Tomatoes
ingredients: ['1 as many as you have Freshly-picked cherry tomatoes', '1 Honey']
directions: ['Remove the stems of the tomatoes and stick in 2 toothpicks into each tomato.', 'Put the tomatoes and toothpicks in a pot of boiling water and blanch them for 30 seconds.', 'Drain and cool the tomatoes in cold water.', 'Peel each cherry tomato and place them in a plastic container.', 'Drain any water in the plastic container and pour enough honey on top of the tomatoes to cover each tomato.', "The amount of honey doesn't have to be precise.", 'Store them in the refrigerator and leave for at least 1/2-1 day before serving.', 'Enjoy as a dessert.', 'If you end up making too much, divide each serving into plastic bags, and freeze them.', 'These honey marinated cherry tomatoes are also delicious frozen.', 'Their texture will become similar to sherbet.', 'They are also delicious served with unsweetened yogurt.']

title: Chicken Spaghetti For A Crowd Recipe
ingredients: ['5 pounds chicken legs']
directions: ['Remove excess fat and skin.', 'Cover with water.', 'Add in:']

title: Lemony Garlic Shrimp & Pineapple Kabobs
ingredients: ['1 packages Frozen Baby Shrimp', '1 pints Sliced Fresh Pineapple', '1 Flavor God/Lemon & Garlic Seasoning']
directions: ['Put together your kabobs', 'Add to grill until shrimp and pineapple get grill marks (im usuing previously cookes shrimp, you can most certainly start with uncooked)', 'Pair with a tasty side!', 'I chose mashed sweet potatos for mine!']

title: Tuna and kale pasta bake
ingredients: ['1 can tuna', 'dash salt']
directions: ['Boil the pasta!', 'I tend to use 3 or 4 portions worth so as to fill the oven dish which lasts me about 4 servings, but depends on your portion size!', 'Boil as much or as little as needed, adjust quantity to requirements :)', 'Add in the peas so the peas and pasta are done at the same time.', 'I usually add them about 3-5mins before the pasta is cooked.', 'Drain the peas pasta!', 'Add in the tuna, mayo, pesto, kale and plenty of cheese.', 'I usually use 1 can of tuna, a large handful, or a couple, of kale (I have small hands and kale shrinks when cooked), plenty of pepper and herbs, a dash of salt and lots of cheese :) I have the queezy mayo bottles and add plenty - hold down for about 5 seconds.', 'You can use all f these ingredients to taste.', 'You can also add some chili flakes or olives too!', '!', 'Mix all together', 'Put into oven about 180C for approximately 15mins or until cheese melted/browning on top', 'Sprinkle more cheese (I chose a mix or grated mozzarella and cheddar for mine) on the top.', 'I also sprinkle more pepper and herbs on top too', 'Eat!']

title: easy oven bacon
ingredients: ['1 lb bacon']
directions: ['place a sheet of tin foil on a cookie sheet.', 'fold up the edges to hold in the grease.', 'lay out the strips of bacon', 'turn on oven to 400F', 'put bacon in oven.', 'You should not pre-heat the oven.', 'cook for 22 minutes or until your idea of done.', 'put slices on paper towels to absorb grease', 'after you are finished, you can use the paper towels to soak up more of the grease on the cookie sheet.', 'fold up the tin foil and throw away.', "no big mess and you don't have to keep turning the bacon.", 'easy, easy, easy']

title: Carved Carrot Maple Leaf (for Garnish)
ingredients: ['1 around 2 cm slice Carrot']
directions: ['Prepare a leaflet or photo of a maple leaf the size and shape you like.', 'This time, I used a leaflet from a sushi shop.', 'Cut out the leaf and lay it on top of the carrot slice.', 'Cut around the cut-out with a knife.', '*Watch out for your fingers.', 'Turn Step 3 on its side and slice to your desired thickness.', 'Here, I sake-steamed the carrot leaves with salmon.', 'Looks like fall.']

title: Mango Orange Cooler
ingredients: ['1 12 cups mango pulp', '2 cups orange juice', '2 tablespoons sugar']
directions: ['Blend all.', 'Serve over crushed ice.']

title: Baked Fennel and Potatoes
ingredients: ['1 kg fennel, thinly sliced', '4 cloves garlic, peeled and sliced into slivers', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 kg potato, thinly sliced']
directions: ['Pre-heat the oven to 180C.', 'Saute the fennel and garlic in the olive oil until mostly soft, about 10-12 minutes.', 'Add the potatoes, stir well and fry for a few minutes.', 'Season with salt and pepper.', 'Lay the vegetables in a greased baking dish, one or two layers deep.', 'I like to season the veggies in between the layers with lots of pepper.', 'If you want to be really decadent you could add a bit more olive oil or butter as well.', 'Bake until soft, about 30 minutes.', 'You may want to take the veggies out once or twice just to keep the top from burning too much.']

title: How To Preserve Ginger in the Freezer
ingredients: ['1 bag Ginger']
directions: ['Rinse the ginger.', 'Peel the skin with a knife or peeler.', 'Wrap each section in plastic wrap and store in the freezer.', 'To use the ginger, unwrap the amount you need to use, then return the rest to the freezer.', "It's a great way to keep ginger from spoiling!"]

title: Easy and Yummy White Bread
ingredients: ['4 cups bread, four', '1 34 cups milk', '2 teaspoons instant yeast', '1 12 teaspoons salt', '1 12 tablespoons sugar', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 teaspoons melted butter']
directions: ['Warm the milk but make sure not to make it too hot .', 'Sieve the flour and the salt into a bowl then add the sugar .', 'Mix it well .', 'Mix the yeast with with a little bit of sugar in the warm milk .', 'Add the olive oil into the mixture.', 'Then pour the yeast mixture into the bowl .', 'Using a fork continue to mix the flour with the liquid .', 'Form a ball then transfer the dough on a lightly floured surface .', 'Knead for about 10 minutes .', "At this stage the dough should still be sticky but don't worry , just wet your palm with some olive oil and continue the kneading process until you form a soft a smooth dough .", 'Put the dough into a lightly oiled bowl .', 'Cover with a damp cloth leave to rise in a draft free place forabout 1 1/5 - 2 hours or until the dough is double in size .', 'Punch down the down .', 'On a lightly floured surface gently roll up the dough and a rectangular shape with 3/4 cm thickness.', 'Roll down , shape into loaf and transfer it into a well greased 1 pound tin loaf .', 'Cover with cloth and let it rise for 45 minutes or until the dough has risen about an inch above the tin.', 'Bake in preheated oven at 175 C fan force for 30 minutes.', 'Take it out from the oven , brush the top with the melted butter .', 'Bake for further 10 minutes.', 'Transfer the loaf on the cooling rack .', "Wait until it's completely cool before slicing it ."]

title: Banana Boat
ingredients: ['1 ripe banana']
directions: ['Get a piece of foil big enough to wrapped the banana, and spray with grease.', "Next cut the stem of the banana, slice 3/4 of through the skin and banana but make sure you don't cut it all the way through.", 'Add the pieces of chocolate into the middle of the banana.', 'You can literally use any chocolate you, mars bar, lion, snickers, bounty, plain chocolate etc.', 'Just cut it into pieces.', 'Then add the marshmallows.', 'Then wrap the banana in foil.', 'Place in the oven or under the grill.', "If grilled it'll take 10-15 minutes, if oven it'll take 15-20 minutes.", 'Remove from the oven rest for a few minutes, and enjoy.']

ingredients: ['2 tbsp. butter', '1 med. onion', '6 lg. garlic cloves']
directions: ['Saute/fry onion and garlic cloves in the butter and let cold.', 'Mix together:']

title: Gingered Broccoli

directions: ['Trim broccoli stalks.', 'Boil until nearly tender.', 'Drain and shock broccoli in ice water.', 'Brown butter with garlic and ginger.', 'Saute broccoli until tender.', 'Season.', 'Variations; lemon zest or juice, white wine, carrots, sesame oil, rice wine vinegar']

title: White & Frothy Cappuccino
ingredients: ['1 cup Coffee', '15 ml Milk', '1 Sugar cubes']
directions: ['Pour the milk into a cup or heatproof container and microwave for 30 seconds to a minute.', 'You could also heat it up in a saucepan.', 'Pour the milk from Step 1 into a heatproof bottle.', 'Add the sugar, put the lid on, and shake for 1 minute.', 'Prepare a cup of hot coffee and pour the milk from Step 3 to finish.']

directions: ['my instructions are as follow, roll up chicken into the cheese.']

title: Hawaiian Coffee
ingredients: ['12 cup milk', '12 cup sweetened flaked coconut', '12 cup coffee']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350F.', 'Place milk and coconut in a small sauce pan and heat over low heat for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Strain the milk into a coffee cup.', 'Place the strained coconut on a baking sheet and bake for roughly 8 minutes or until the coconut is a light brown.', 'Add coffee to the coconut milk and top with the toasted coconut.']

title: Weight Watchers Peanut Butter and Plum Sandwich (2 Points)

title: Vanilla
